name: Mio Pregnancy Saviours Kit (Worth £65.00)
product_description:
Treat expecting mum’s to the Mama Mio Pregnancy Saviours Gift Set; a gorgeous selection of the brand’s must-have, hero products perfect for any mama-to-be. Boasting award-winning, chemical-free formulas, the skincare treats work in tandem to leave skin feeling soft and supple, helping to soothe away any aches, pains and stress for a more comfortable and happy pregnancy.
The Tummy Rub Butter (120g)
The Tummy Rub Butter is an award-winning formula that works to improve skin elasticity to help prevent stretch marks when your bump grows. Delivering maximum protection, it combines omega-rich Organic Oils (Argan, Coconut and Avocado) with Shea Butter to protect your tummy, boobs, hips and thighs from stretch marks and itching. Rich in antioxidant Vitamin E and Omega 3, 6 and 9 to help build skin's strength and elasticity, it seeks to keep skin hydrated for safe stretching.
The Pregnancy Boob Tube Bust Protection Cream (100ml)
The Pregnancy Boob Tube Bust Protection Cream seeks to improve the appearance of the bust area. Harnessing the powers of antioxidant-rich CoQ10 and Milk Thistle, the lightweight cream strengthens and protects delicate skin, whilst Organic Rosehip Fruit Oil moisturises and hydrates. Ideal for those experiencing cup size changes, engorgement and discomfort, its unique blend of Green Cabbage Leaf Extract and Hibiscus works to reduce swelling and improve elasticity for a smoother, firmer-looking décolleté and bust area.
Lucky Legs Cooling Leg Gel (30ml)
A refreshing and relieving formula that works to instantly comfort and revive tired, weary legs. During pregnancy, your body carries a third more blood round your system; this, paired with water retention and carrying a baby can really take its toll on your legs and feet. To help relieve your aches and pains, the cooling gel formula combines stimulating essential oils with Ginger Root and Murumuru Seed Butter to invigorate and hydrate, whilst Menthol and Chamomile ease muscle discomfort.
Liquid Yoga Space Spray (50ml)
Alleviate feelings of stress and anxiety with the Liquid Yoga Space Spray; high intensity bodycare in a bottle. This essential oil-infused mist blends lavender and lavandin to promote a calming, stress-relieving experience. Enhancing positive emotions with a complex of cypress, chamomile and lemon, the spray helps tackle anxiety and nervous fatigue whilst uplifting the spirit, boosting self-esteem and promoting true well-being.

name: works Deep Sleep Pillow Spray (75ml)
product_description:
Designed to give you a relaxing and rejuvenating deep sleep, this Deep Sleep Pillow Spray by this works is sure to become your must-have sleep solution. Formulated with natural oils, this fragrant pillow spray releases relaxing vibes so you inhale calm and exhale your worries.
Containing Lavender, Vetivert and Wild Camomile oils, this Pillow Spray is perfect for those who want to wind down. Also suitable for travelling or as a thoughtful gift. K.D.

name: Jasmine Mint Toothpaste Triple Pack (3 x 75ml)
product_description:
Boasting a unique flavour, Marvis Jasmine Mint Toothpaste Triple Pack (3 x 75ml) combines fresh mint with floral jasmine, whilst producing an invigorating tingling sensation.
Formulated with fluoride to prevent tooth decay, this fantastic toothpaste also targets plaque and tartar, whilst keeping your breath fresh. Presented in an elegant tube, the rich and creamy paste will keep your teeth protected. - L.M.

Directions of Use:

name: Vinexpert Anti-ageing Supplements (30 Caps)
product_description:
Vinexpert dietary supplements from Caudalie, working at the heart of the dermis to provide visible results within a few weeks. Your skin will be left feeling firmer and wrinkles diminished.
Anti-oxidant grapevine polyphenols (OPC), Redensifying, Resveratrol, Grape anthocyanidins and grape-seed, borage and evening primrose oils.
For combination skin take one capsule per day, For normal skin take two capsules per day, For dry skin take four capsules per day.

name: Enamel Science Advanced Toothpaste (75ml)
product_description:
Boasting a unique, non-water based formula, the Regenerate Enamel Science Advanced Toothpaste uses exclusive and clinically proven NR-5™ technology which forms a fresh supply of the same mineral tooth enamel is made of, restoring the high mineral content and protective function of tooth enamel with regular use.
Enamel is the outer coating of a tooth which naturally protects the core against damaging acid attacks. Despite its hardness, this enamel suffers daily erosion caused by food and drink, but now this early erosion process can be reversed with the Advanced Toothpaste and its unique NR-5™ Technology. With regular use, this toothpaste strengthens and protects the teeth against cavities and weakness by restoring the enamel mineral*content and replenishing original whiteness.
The innovative formulation features a dense and rich texture thanks to its high concentration of ingredients, whilst the refreshing mint sensation it delivers will keep your mouth feeling and smelling fresh throughout the day. K.D.
Directions for use:
Advanced Toothpaste should be used daily, at least twice a day in place of your regular toothpaste.

name: Iontech Satin-Hair 7 Hair Brush
product_description:
Give hair more shine and less frizz with the Iontech Satin-Hair 7 Hair Brush from Braun. With Ion Technology, the brush switches on to release millions of active ions that work like a conditioner in your hair, creating touchable smoothness.
Ideal for medium to thick hair, the portable brush features natural bristles that comb smoothly through the hair, helping to fight frizz and remove static. A cushion pad makes for a sensory experience on the scalp with minimal snagging of the hair, and is removable for easy cleaning. Designed for safety, the brush has an On-Off Switch with Automatic Shut Off to prevent it from accidentally being switched on when carried in a bag. – E.W.

name: Hair and Nail (60 Tablets)
product_description: Perfect for the modern busy woman, Imedeen Hair and Nail (60 Tablets) combine biotin, zinc and B-vitamins to help preserve healthy hair and nails. Adding the tablets to your daily routine will add the key nutrients needed to maintain beautiful shiny hair and nails. -SA

name: Time Perfection (120 Tablets)
product_description:
Rule out imperfections with the help of Imedeen Time Perfection (120 tablets). The vitamin supplements help to reduce the look of fine lines and wrinkles.
The new approach works from inside the body to reduce visible signs of ageing. The benefits of the supplements can be seen in as little as 12 weeks - SA

Infused with a nourishing blend of organic oils, including Argan, Coconut, Sweet Almond and Rosehip Fruit, the luxurious treatment can be applied to problem areas on the stomach, hips, buttocks and thighs to improve texture and elasticity. Skin appears firmer, smoother and more refined.

product_description: Combat the effects of hormonal ageing with the help of Imedeen Prime Renewal skincare tablets (120 tablets). Imedeen's exclusive marine complex is enhanced with soy extract and zinc combined with the advanced protection complex vitea - a blend of white tea, lycopene and grapeseed extract. It preserves and revitalises the collagen and elastin content of skin helping to improve skin density and suppleness. The tablets provide skin cells with a quality defence system which works against free radical damage, helping you to fight the effects of menopause. -SA

name: Mio The Tummy Rub Butter (120g)
product_description:
Take control of your body during pregnancy with the Mama Mio The Tummy Rub Butter, an award-winning formula that works to improve skin elasticity to help prevent stretch marks when your bump grows.
Delivering maximum protection, it combines omega-rich Organic Oils (Argan, Coconut and Avocado) with Shea Butter to protect your tummy, boobs, hips and thighs from stretch marks and itching, and antioxidant Vitamin E to intensely moisturise. Rich in Omega 3, 6 and 9 to help build skin's strength and elasticity, it will keep skin hydrated for safe stretching, and is approved for use during pregnancy and nursing. It also helps your body to 'bounce back' after birth.

name: Birch Juice (200ml)
product_description:
Organic Birch Juice is a health supplement from Weleda that helps to improve the appearance of your skin healthily and naturally.
Working to detoxify your body, the juice is made from organic silver birch ingredients that contain flavonoids, saponines and tannins, that protect the skin cells from damage by free-radicals and help support natural purification. The flavonoids extracted encourage the flushing of toxins to restore skin radiance.
Formulated without added sugar or honey, the juice is blended with refreshing lemon juice. As well as helping you rediscover your vitality, using birch juice in a detox programme also brings beauty benefits: cleansing your system purifies the complexion to leave skin clear and bright. -SA

name: Skincare Get Waisted Body Cream (100ml)
product_description:
Improve the appearance of your skin with Mio Skincare's Get Waisted Sculpting Body Cream, a deeply moisturising formula that helps to improve the appearance and elasticity of skin for a firmer, younger-looking silhouette.
Fortified with a host of beneficial ingredients, including pharmaceutical grade Caffeine, renowned for its firming effects, the body cream intensely moisturises to promote smoother-looking skin, and utilises visible firming actives to lend the appearance of tauter skin. Combined with a healthy diet and regular exercise, the sculpting cream can help to improve and firm the look of your tummy. Its Oat Protein Complex (rich in phospholipids, natural moisturisers and antioxidants) will increase the appearance of firm and smooth skin.

name: works Sleep Plus + Pillow Spray (75ml)
product_description:
this works Sleep Plus + Pillow Spray is formulated with a potent blend of Lavender to create a fast acting natural remedy that provides you with instant relief from sleeplessness.
The aromatherapeutic benefits make you feel less tired during the day and will leave you feeling and looking refreshed when you wake up in the morning. -SA

product_description: Perk up your skin and your senses with the Molton Brown Black Peppercorn Body Wash. Some guys like to put a little water in the bath, turn on the shower and pretend they’re in a submarine that’s been hit. The rest of us just treat showering like a pre-work necessity. Bulldog Natural Skincare Original Shower Gel will alleviate some of those 7am blues without resorting to role-play.
Be loyal to your skin. Bulldog Natural Grooming products never contain parabens, sodium laureth sulfate, artificial colours, synthetic fragrances, or ingredients from animal sources.

product_description:
A wonderful multi-tasker, Egyptian Magic Cream can be used to treat an array of skin ailments, from eczema and minor burns to stretch marks and scars. Olive Oil, BeesWax, Honey Bee Pollen, Royal Jelly, Bee Propolis.

product_description:

Glycerin acts as a powerful magnet for hydration and seals it in to ensure optimum moisture levels, whilst Palm and Palm Kernel Oils stimulate cell regeneration and the fatty acids help to balance your complexion by mimicking the same nourishing oils and pH balance found in skin already. You can expect transformed skin with a restored vitality and healthy-looking radiance.

name: Deluxe Anti-Ageing Gift Set - XS-S (Worth £85)
product_description:
Experience next generation skin rejuvenation with the Iluminage Deluxe Anti-Ageing Gift Set (Size XS-S). Utilising high-tech copper technology which is clinically proven to help improve the appearance of skin, the set combines anti-ageing gloves and socks with a rejuvenating eye mask to leave skin feeling youthful, smooth, soft and replenished.
Skin Rejuvenating Gloves:
A pair of anti-ageing fingerless gloves infused with patented Copper technology clinically proven to reduce the appearance of hand wrinkles and age spots. Carefully embedded with high-tech Copper (a compound naturally found in skin and known to play an important role in the skin's natural renewal process), the soft gloves help to improve the tone and texture of skin with continuing effect, and are comfortable to wear day and night. The silky, non-irritating gloves are suitable for machine washing. Over time, hands appear supple, youthful and smoother looking. 88% Cupron® Copper Infused Nylon, 12% Spandex.
Skin Rejuvenating Socks:
A pair of innovative, skin rejuvenating socks that have been woven with high-tech copper infused thread to moisturise dry feet and cracked heels. Clinically proven to promote softer, smoother feet, the socks are comfortable to wear and cushion your feet, delivering skin-refining properties to help your skin and nails look heathier in just four weeks. Non-irritating and comfortable both with and without shoes, the lightweight socks contain anti-bacterial technology and are odour resistant. 89% Cupron® Copper Infused Polyester, 9% Nylon, 2% Spandex. Machine washable, do not use fabric softener in washer. Do not use dryer sheets in dryer.
Skin Rejuvenating Eye Mask:
An anti-ageing eye mask that delivers advanced care to help minimise the appearance of wrinkles while you sleep. Infused with high-tech copper technology which is clinically proven to help reduce the look of wrinkles, the silky soft eye mask works through the night to help promote smoother, younger-looking skin in as little as four weeks. The smart textile eye mask is comfortable and non-irritating to wear, and features an adjustable strap. 100% Copper Infused Polyester. Thread Count 249. Hand wash with very mild detergent. Lay flat to dry.

Delivering maximum results, it contains Seppicalm, a plant-derived skin lightening active to help fade marks, Matrixyl 3000 to promote collagen production and skin repair, and Sweet Almond Oil for its anti-itch properties. Safe during pregnancy and nursing, it's the perfect solution to help keep your skin looking its best during times of change.

Clinically proven to safely and effectively whiten your smile, each flexible strip is coated with a whitening gel and fits perfectly to the contour of your teeth; a host of enamel friendly ingredients work on the surface and beneath, absorbing into the enamel to remove stains and prevent new ones from forming. Deeply embedded stains are reduced, and if used correctly, your teeth appear visibly whiter after just fourteen days.
Expect a beaming, pure white smile with zero effort and zero fuss.

Rose Hand Cream (30ml)

A 2-in-1 formula that works as both a mask and a scrub for beautifully soft and smooth hands. Formulated with a blend of White and Red Clay, which work harmoniously to absorb impurities and leave behind visibly clear skin. Jojoba beads gently and effectively exfoliate hands to eliminate roughness, whilst a rich combination of Shea Butter and Calendula Extract nourish and protect the skin.

Achieve healthy nails and cuticles with the deeply nourishing and conditioning treatment oil. Harnessing the powers of Sweet Almond, Safflower Seed and Avocado Oils, the unique formula helps to strengthen dry and brittle nails, whilst soothing cracked cuticles and delivering intense hydration.

name: Republic Foot Repair (18g)
product_description:
Treat hardworking feet to the Skin Republic Foot Repair, a serum-infused foot mask that performs deep level action to help soften, moisturise and repair dry, cracked skin.
Delivering nutrients and intense moisture with close and continuous contact, the 20 minute treatment works to expertly hydrate and nourish dry feet and cracked heels. Targeting dryness, cracks and chapped patches, the mask helps soothe and maintain health with its combination of antioxidant and vitamin-rich ingredients. Working in synergy, the host of potent ingredients infuse feet with natural goodness; Seaweed Extract and Sweet Almond Seed Extract provide a moisture-boost whilst Green Tea and Baical Skullcap protect and heal.
Deeply moisturising, the treatment will leave feet feeling calm, soothed and super soft.
The Benefits of Using a Sheet Mask:
Sheet masks utilise a Transdermal Delivery System that ensures nutrients, nourishment and moisture are delivered deeply and effectively. Their breathable, 'second skin' nature allows for faster absorption than traditional masks and creams. They are also more hygienic.
Key Ingredients:
Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract - naturally antioxidant and anti-inflammatory. Encourages natural production of collagen and repairs sun damaged skin. Nat
Vitamin E - a potent antioxidant with anti-ageing and moisturising properties.
Honey Suckle Flower Extract - natural antihistamine with antioxidant properties.
Kiwi Fruit Extract - antioxidant with moisture-boosting, collagen-stimulating benefits.
Sophora Angustifolia Root Extract - broad spectrum antiseptic and anti-inflammatory.
Baical Skullcap - powerful anti-inflammatory that speeds up recovery of skin traumas.
Peach Leaf Extract - potent antioxidant.
Green Tea - antioxidant that protects against free radicals.
Seaweed Extract - deeply moisturising.
Sweet Almond Seed Extract - rich in vitamin E, it softens dry, chapped skin.
Peppermint Oil Extract - refreshing and cooling with powerful antibacterial properties.

product_description:

product_description:

The hair removal system adapts to treat different areas of your body, with highly powered, single-shot IPL treatments for stubborn and thicker hair around the bikini line and underarms or use the Duo Salon head for sparse, thinner on arms and legs.
Two flashes per second means you can treat your entire body in as little as 20 minutes, with Active Cooling Technology™ delivering professional cooling to leave the surface of skin feeling cool to touch for a comfortable, salon-like experience.
Five light settings deliver gentle yet effective treatment for a range of hair types and skin tones, allowing you to adjust the intensity for specific areas. A facial attachment allows precise, targeted treatment.

Vitamin E and Vitamin F provide antioxidant protection against free radical damage, whilst strengthening the skin's barrier to maintain soft, supple breasts with rounder and fuller contours.

The Cleanmarine® MenoMin supplements are an all-in-one peri-menopausal and menopausal treatment to keep you feeling at your best.

name: Fango Ferma Firming Mud Mask for Face and Body (222ml)
product_description:
Regain a youthful look with Borghese's Fango Ferma Firming Mud Mask for Face and Body, a powerful formula that works to lift the appearance of sagging skin and combat visible signs of ageing.
Enriched with three natural clays and a blend of Resveratrol, Hydrolyzed Wheat and Rice Protein, the firming mask helps to moisturise and protect skin, lending it a smooth and supple texture. Targeting fine lines and wrinkles, the anti-ageing formula will smoothen the appearance of skin whilst improving elasticity for a younger-looking face and body.

name: & Evelyn Bestsellers Hand Therapy Sample 3 x 25g
product_description:
Crabtree & Evelyn's Bestsellers Hand Therapy Sample combines a trio of best-selling, scented hand creams. 
Each super-moisturising and replenishing formula harnesses the softening and conditioning properties of Shea Butter and Macadamia Oil to comfort and condition your hands, nails and cuticles. The quick-absorbing creams enrich the skin with a host of beneficial ingredients, so skin feels hydrated, soothed and delicately fragranced.
Caribbean Island (Island Wild Flowers, Tropical Citrus Fruits, Jasmine and Sea Air)
La Source (an aquatic fragrance with notes of Musk and Sea Breezes)
Gardeners (fresh green scent with Clover, Lavender and Sage)

name: (125ml)
product_description:
Stretch marks and uneven skin tone are everyday aliments bestowed upon the best of us. Bio Oil tackles your skin blemish woes, from anti-ageing through to dehydration, making this an essential aid in your skincare routine.
Every woman should have some! This bottle of promised wonders fights an impressive range of skin afflictions using a unique and highly effective formula of PurCellin Oil™. Reducing the thickness of the formulation PurCellin Oil™ ensures Bio-Oil is easily absorbed into dehydrated and uneven skin, a treatment that will form an integral part of your skincare regime.
Directions of use:

name: Chic URBAN Electric Toothbrush - Tribal Quest
product_description:
Sonic Chic present the URBAN Electric Toothbrush; a portable, stylish toothbrush with a compact, lightweight design. Featuring a protective, ventilated cap for ultimate hygiene, the travel-friendly device is perfect for the gym, work or use on-the-move.
Boasting 22,000 strokes per minute, the sonic powered brush features a precision head to reach awkward areas and ultra-gentle bristles for a comfortable experience every time. Complete with a replacement brush head and battery.

name: Cross Action Toothbrush Head Refills (x4)
product_description:
Achieve a clean mouth and healthy gums with the Oral-B Cross Action Toothbrush Head Refills. Featuring specially engineered and precisely angled bristles which are set at sixteen degrees, the heads penetrate those hard-to-reach areas for a deeper cleaning action. The various bristle levels deliver optimal tooth coverage and effectively remove more plaque than a regular manual toothbrush. 
Please Note: Compatible with the entire line-up of Oral-B rechargeable handles, except for Oral-B sonic toothbrushes.

name: Epsom Salt 2kg
product_description:
Treat tired, stiff muscles to the Epsom Salt from Westlab; the UK’s leading bath salt experts. Ideal for use after sport activities and exercise, its formula is made of pure magnesium sulphate to eliminate toxins and reduce fluid retention, whilst easing aching and relieving heavy legs.
Helping to supplement skin with optimum levels of magnesium and sulphate, the salt increases energy production, banishes fatigue and minimises soreness of limbs so you can experience a healthy, detoxified body with restored comfort and improved recovery time after workouts. E.N.

name: Enamel Science Boosting Serum Kit (2 x 16ml)
product_description:
With a monthly use, the Regenerate Enamel Science Boosting Serum boosts the effectiveness of the Advanced Toothpaste by 43%**, maximising the power of enamel mineral regeneration*.
When combined with Activator Gel, the unique NR-5™ Serum unleashes a concentrated regeneration boost of the formula, helping to reverse the early enamel erosion process*.

name: Natural Sea Sponge Company - Fina Silk Sea Sponge (Approx 3 Inches)
product_description:
The ethically sourced Natural Sea Sponge Company Fina Silk Sea Sponge boasts the smoothest surface, making it superior to any synthetic alternative in your quest for the perfect accessory to cleanse, exfoliate and massage your skin.
Try using the Fina Silk Sea Sponge from Natural Sea Sponge Company as part of your daily face care routine. The softest of natural sponges, it’s durable, highly absorbent and can be used to gently deep cleanse and apply your make-up, leaving your face feeling fresh and glowing for the day ahead. Fina Silk Sea Sponge is suitable for daily use on delicate skin, whether baby or adult, man or woman.

name: Nourishing Body Lotion - Family Size (400ml)
product_description:
Caudalie’s Nourishing Body Lotion is now available in a super 400ml size! This light body lotion is enriched with plant-derived ingredients to provide intense nutrition and anti-oxidant action for your skin leaving it soft and firm with a delicate scent.
Caudalie Nourishing Body Lotion encourages micro-circulation and fights ageing, to soften and firm your skin. It contains a blend of grape-seed, sesame and borage oils and plant-derived glycerine to moisturise deeply and leave your skin feeling velvety soft and radiant.
Directions of use:

name: Santorini Vine Body Milk (200ml)
product_description:
Say hello to soft, smooth and supple skin with KORRES Santorini Vine Body Milk. Intensely moisturising, it's blend of shea butter and almond oil, known for its anti-inflammatory and immune-boosting effects, work to nourish extra dry skin and soften fine lines.
Also formulated with soothing active aloe, vitamins and trace elements, this multi-tasking body milk provides long-lasting moisture and improves suppleness; leaving your skin nourished, energised, full of vitality and sweetly scented. - L.M.

name: Mio Limited Edition Tummy Rub Butter Ginger and Lime (120g)
product_description:
Take control of your body during pregnancy with Mama Mio's Limited Edition Tummy Rub Butter Ginger and Lime, an award-winning formula that works to improve skin elasticity to help prevent stretch marks when your bump grows.
Utilising the same original formula with a new, limited edition Ginger and Lime fragrance (100% natural!), the body butter is bursting with citrusy Lime, and warming Ginger to help uplift and refresh; perfect for sensitive tummies and delicate noses. Ginger is also known to help ease morning sickness.
Delivering maximum protection, it combines omega-rich Organic Oils (including Argan, Coconut, Rosehip and Avocado) with Shea Butter to protect your tummy, boobs, hips and thighs from stretch marks and itching, and antioxidant Vitamin E to intensely moisturise. Rich in Omega 3, 6 and 9 to help improve skin's strength and elasticity, it will give your skin super strength, elasticity and protection during the whole nine months, and is safe for use during pregnancy and nursing. It also helps your body to 'bounce back' after birth.

name: Advanced Deodorant (73.6g)
product_description:
This breakthrough formula is completely unscented and scientifically tested to provide the maximum levels of odour elimination and prevention. The MenScience Advanced Deodorant is great for active lifestyles.
The cosmeceutical ingredients plus microzeolites, witch hazel and tea tree extract in the MenScience Advanced Deodorant target and help eliminate odour-causing bacteria without the potentially damaging effects of alcohol or aluminium.
This deodorant is ideal for sensitive skin with its non-irritating, hypoallergenic formula and it provides a smooth, dry and clear application that is non-staining and absorbs immediately. It eliminates and prevents odours instead of masking these with fragrance or blocking sweat ducts with aluminium-based components.
Directions for use:

name: Deodorant (125ml)
product_description:
Fight underarm odours with Sukin Deodorant, a natural ingredient antiperspirant that eliminates bacteria that causes odour without using harsh ingredients. Formulated with a tantalising scent of tangerine, mandarin, lavender and vanilla, and an infusion of herbs:horsetail, nettle and burdock, you'll be left smelling lush.
Sukin believe the most powerful and effective ingredients for your   skin and hair care come from nature. Environmentally conscious, Sukin is   a natural personal care company from Australia.
‘Skincare that  doesn’t cost the earth™’ - Sukin’s commitment extends  far beyond  cosmetic. The 100% certified carbon neutral company aims  to reduce the  impact their business has on our increasingly fragile  environment. -SA

name: Avocado Pear Nourishing Night Cream (60g)
product_description:
Wake up to rejuvenated skin in the morning with Antipodes Avocado Pear Nourishing Night Cream (60g). Three main ingredients have been blended together to target the main complexion issues for an all-round glowing canvas when you get up in the morning. - K.R
- Avocado oil improves the stimulation of collagen in skin cells by up to 92% in this formula (scientifically proven)
- Manuka honey acts as an antibacterial to clear blemishes and prevent new ones from occurring
- Calendula oil from marigold petals acts as a protectant against free radicals and environmental damage, whilst also providing a generous dose of moisture

name: Arden Green Tea Honey Drops Body Cream (250ml)
product_description: The Elizabeth Arden Green Tea Honey Drops Body Cream is a rich body cream that was introduced by the famous design house in 1999. It has a flowery and feminine scent that combines an intoxicating blend of citrus lemon, rhubarb, peppermint, oak moss, musk and amber for casual and formal daytime use. When first applied, users will sense caraway, fruity rhubarb, lemon, orange zest and bergamot leading to cool minty peppermint, green tea, sweet jasmine, spicy carnation, fresh fennel and crisp celery spice scents. Underlying notes of oak moss, musk, and amber add to the complexity of this cream. There is no wonder that this body cream has proven to be a bestseller and favourite of women all over the world.

name: Sun Tanning Oil Face and Body SPF 30 (150ml)
product_description:
The Tanning Oil Face and Body from NUXE provides sun protection from harmful rays and prevents signs of premature ageing. Its unique formula with sun and water flowers helps you achieve a natural, even tan and leaves a satin finish on the skin's surface, without making you feel greasy.
Enriched with nourishing and hydrating ingredients, including rice and rosemary extract, the water-resistant oil delivers an uplifting fragrance with notes of sweet orange, Tahitian Gardenia and vanilla. The handy pump bottle allows you to spray all-over the face and body for easy application. E.N.

name: Brown Gingerlily Body Wash 300ml
product_description: Inspired by exotic Tahitian shores, Molton Brown's Gingerlily Body Wash refreshes and subtly fragrances from top to toe. Infused with moisturising White Lily Extract and nourishing Polynesian Tamanu Nut Oil, the shower gel gently cleanses skin, whilst enveloping the skin with notes of warming Ginger Oil, creamy Tuberose and spicy Cedarwood. Transports the mind and body to relaxing paradise, leaving you feeling revitalised and rejuvenated.

name: Super Fast 'Fuzz' Off
product_description:
An innovative, one step removal cream that banishes fuzz, this Super Fast 'Fuzz' Off from Bliss rids facial hair in 2 minutes flat. Featuring a precision tip applicator for the ultimate performance, this fresh-scented cream is intended for use on the upper lip, chin, cheeks and hairline.
Removing fuzz has never been this much fun! Formulated with soothing ingredients Willowherb and Vitamin E, this Super Fast 'Fuzz' Off cream will leave your skin totally fuzz-free and silky soft.
Directions of use:

name: Henriksen Clean Truth Cleansing Cloths Exclusive (Worth £40.00)
product_description:
Clean Truth™ Cleansing Cloths from Ole Henriksen effortlessly remove dirt, make-up and impurities, without stripping moisture. Specially formulated with radiance-reviving vitamin C, the wipes brighten skin tone and refresh the complexion, whilst micro algae and green tea boost collagen production to reveal smoother, firmer skin.
Suitable for all skin types and refreshing skin at home, at the gym or on-the-go, the cloths deliver the brand's signature citrus vanilla fragrance for an uplifting experience. Regenerating CoQ10 supports skin repair and provides antioxidant protection to shield from environmental aggressors. Expect revitalised, purified and silky soft skin. E.N.

name: Vitamin E 5,000iu Oil All Over Body Nourishment (120ml)
product_description:
Nourish, moisturise and help regenerate your skin with JASON 5000IU Vitamin E Beauty Oil. This natural antioxidant combination of almond, apricot, avocado and wheat germ oil protects against fine lines and wrinkles, leaving skin silky smooth.
Topical use of JASON 5000IU Vitamin E Beauty Oil helps decease the appearance of roughness, wrinkles and prevents damage from environmental elements. This multi-functional oil also helps to improve elasticity and promote healing of damaged skin, making it perfect for application on sun burnt or wind exposed skin.
Directions of use:

name: Exfoliating Gloves
product_description:
Prepare skin for tanning with the He-Shi Exfoliating Gloves; a pair of elasticated gloves designed to fit all hand sizes.
Through use of the gloves, dead skin cells are gently and effectively sloughed away, leaving the skin’s surface noticeably smoother and ultra-soft. It is recommended that you thoroughly exfoliate your skin before applying any He-Shi tanning products. Exfoliation prevents drying of the skin and aids in creating an even, streak-free and long lasting glow.
Expect improvements in circulation and super smooth skin; an ideal base for fake tanning.

name: Skincare Skin Tight Body Serum (100ml)
product_description:
Help improve the appearance of saggy and tired skin with the Mio Skincare Skin Tight Body Serum; an innovative formula that absorbs quickly to help skin look smooth and even.
Infused with a cocktail of beneficial ingredients, including Papaya and natural fruit acids, the serum expertly buffs away dead skin cells, whilst Hyaluronic Acid delivers essential hydration to reveal a plumped, refined appearance. Antioxidant-rich Green Tea and Pomegranate Seed Oil work to defend against free radical damage.
Ideal for using after pregnancy to help make skin firmer and help you achieve your toned tummy goal, the powerful serum has short and long term benefits that work to leave skin looking its best. Together with a combination of regular exercising and healthy diet, 'Skin Tight' will help give you a high intensity, multi-weapon approach to improve your shape.

name: Activated Charcoal Toothpaste 75ml
product_description:
Instantly freshen the mouth with the Janina Activated Charcoal Toothpaste;  a teeth-whitening formula that brightens the smile without the use of harsh abrasives.
Gentle enough for daily use, the toothpaste thoroughly cleans teeth with a combination of antibacterial agents. These protect against tartar and calculus, whilst preventing plaque development. The whitening toothpaste is formulated with a patented Bromaine Complex, which combines natural enzymes from Pineapple and Papaya to visibly whiten teeth.
The formula is complete with an effective dose of Activated Charcoal, which works to purify the breath and boost freshness in the mouth. Ideal for those with surface staining or people desiring a brighter smile, the Charcoal toothpaste leaves teeth and gums clean, fresh and healthy, as well as visibly whiter.

name: Tropez Tan Optimiser Body Moisturiser (200ml)
product_description:
Follow St. Tropez’s top tip for a natural looking tan with this Tan Optimiser Body Moisturiser and you can’t go far wrong. Well-nourished, deeply moisturised skin will give you a sleek, smooth base for a gorgeous even tan.
This daily hydrator is packed with a luxurious blend of ingredients, to help keep your skin looking sleek, supple and hydrated every day. Essential for softening dry areas before self tan application, the Tan Optimiser Body Moisturiser has been created by St. Tropez, the tanning experts you can trust to get it right.
Directions of use:

name: Men Expert Fresh Extreme Deodorant Roll-On (50ml)
product_description:
For a long lasting fresh feeling and extreme protection against wetness and odour choose L’Oréal Men Expert Fresh Extreme Deodorant Roll On. Using high performance technology and a 48 hour antiperspirant action it gives unbeatable freshness.
L’Oréal Men Expert have put all their expertise into creating a range of long-lasting antiperspirant deodorants, and with proven 48 hour action and a fresh, minty fragrance L’Oréal Men Expert Fresh Extreme Deodorant Roll On is the top performing choice for those who need tried and tested results.

name: works Perfect Legs for Everybody
product_description:
The Perfect Legs for Everybody from this works offers a duo of skincare treatments to give you instant bare-legged confidence just in time for summer. The pair work in tandem to moisturise, repair and perfect, adding subtle colour and contour for slim, smooth and flawless pins.
Perfect Legs Skin Miracle (50ml)
The Perfect Legs Skin Miracle is an advanced tinted serum packed with multi-vitamins that helps refine, smooth and repair skin. Utilising a powerful blend of botanical extracts and plant-based actives, the lightweight formula contains natural caramel and mica to even skin tone and veil the appearance of imperfections, while a delicate balance of Vitamins C and E provide essential nutrients and moisture, working to smooth the surface texture and deeply hydrate for long lasting comfort.
Perfect Legs Sculpt & Shine (30ml)
The Legs Sculpt & Shine is the best-selling highlighter to add shape, definition and radiance to limbs for a flawless ‘optical illusion’ finish. Fortified with natural Caramel and light-diffusing Mineral Powders, the innovative roll-on formula delivers instant colour coverage with a subtle shimmer. A blend of Hyaluronic Acid and Algae extract provide essential moisture, leaving legs looking sculpted and defined.

name: Kids Dead Sea Salt
product_description:
Specifically developed for infants over three months old, the Westlab Kids Dead Sea Salt soothes itchy, dry skin that is prone to eczema and psoriasis.
Its high grade magnesium content comforts and softens the body from top to toe, whilst supporting the natural repair process and replenishing minerals to heal and calm skin. E.N.

name: Tropez Express Bronzing Mousse (50ml)
product_description:
St. Tropez's Self Tan Express Bronzing Mousse allows you to create a natural-looking tan in just one hour, without that unmistakable fake tan smell. Its advanced, fast-acting formula is streak-free and glides effortlessly onto the skin to create a healthy, natural-looking glow. Leave it on for 1 hour for a sun-kissed effect, 2 hours for a golden glow, or 3 hours for a deeper, more intense bronze colour. Control the depth of your tan to suit your skin tone.

Enriched with 100% natural tanning agent and vegetan premium that matches your pigmentation, the quick-drying and hydrating formula has a rich and smooth texture that’s non-sticky and perfectly suitable for all skin types. For best results, exfoliate 24 hours before tanning and moisturise and exfoliate regularly to prolong your tan and encourage and even fade. Your tan will continue to develop up to 8 hours. - K.N.

name: Instant White Teeth Tooth Gloss
product_description:
Achieve a whiter smile with the Instant White Teeth Tooth Gloss from TINT. Working on all types of teeth including caps, crowns and veneers, the tooth paint is a short term solution for perfectly white teeth. The treatment is easily removed with the accompanying removal pads, allowing you use the formula on special occasions.
Boasting a fresh mint flavour that wears off after 20 minutes, the formula is food and drink proof, allowing you to continue with your day as normal. The tooth gloss dries in 60 seconds and delivers instant results, visibly whitening teeth by up to 15 shades, yet still leaving a natural look.
Unlike other teeth whiteners, the formula does not contain peroxide and cause unwanted sensitivity. The gloss forms a barrier for teeth, working to protect against acid decay and staining, keeping your natural teeth whiter too.
TINT applicator 7ml
Removal Pads 30 Pads

name: Festival Kit (Worth £18.00)
product_description:
Perfect for use on-the-go, the KORRES Festival Kit combines a lip balm, body milk, face sunscreen and pack of cleansing wipes to refresh, protect and hydrate no matter where you are.
KORRES Milk Proteins Cleansing Wipes (25 Wipes)
Perfect for use on-the-go, the gentle wipes effortlessly eliminate make-up and impurities from the face and eyes. Enriched with Milk Proteins to nourish and moisturise skin, preventing dryness and uncomfortable tightness, whilst leaving your complexion fresh, smooth and hydrated.
KORRES Mandarin Lip Butter Stick SPF15 - Pink (5ml)
Instantly hydrate and soften dry, chapped lips with the non-greasy lip balm. Enriched with Shea Butter and Sunflower Wax to nourish and repair lips for long-lasting comfort, whilst Mandarin Oil works to condition dryness, leaving you with moisturised, super smooth lips.
KORRES Basil Lemon Body Milk (40ml)
Combining Almond Oil, Aloe Vera, Pro-Vitamin B5, Shea Butter, Lanolin and Jojoba Oil, the fast-absorbing milk delivers long-lasting hydration to leave skin soft, smooth and supple. Lightweight and non-greasy, the luxurious formula uplifts the mind and body thanks to its vibrant lemon zest aroma.
KORRES Yoghurt Sunscreen SPF 50 (1.5ml Sachet)
A lightweight, non-greasy cream developed to shield skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays. Enriched with Yoghurt, a natural source of lactose, proteins, minerals and vitamins, to soothe skin and lock in moisture for a rejuvenated and hydrated complexion. Offers superior hydration during sun exposure.

name: Sea Fresh Strengthening Toothpaste (170g)
product_description:
Biologically active blue-green sea algae, sea salts and minerals in JASON Sea Fresh Toothpaste help heal, detoxify and strengthen gums and teeth. This refreshing toothpaste will leave your teeth feeling wonderfully clean and your mouth healthy.
Perilla seed extract neutralises bacteria and sugar acids, protecting your teeth from erosion. JASON Sea Fresh Toothpaste also features deep sea spearmint to blast away bad breath to ensure your mouth stays fresh and clean all day.
Directions of use:

name: Divine Nature's Remedy Multi-Purpose Balm 50ml
product_description:
Calm and soothe skin from top to toe with the Pommade Divine Nature's Remedy Multi-Purpose Balm; a 97% natural formula that delivers multiple benefits to the hands, lips, feet, face and body.
Enriched with antiseptic and anti-inflammatory ingredients such as Benzoin, Clove and Nutmeg, the ultra-nourishing balm brings fast relief to minor skincare injuries, including cuts, scrapes, insect bites and burns, whilst its softening, regenerative and protective properties restore long-lasting comfort to dry, itchy skin. Ideal for eczema, dermatitis and psoriasis. Suitable for young children and babies.

name: works Sleep Plus Pillow Spray 120ml
product_description:
Restore a healthy sleep pattern with the this works Sleep Plus Pillow Spray; a natural remedy designed to target restless sleepers.
Boasting this works’ award-winning ‘Deep Sleep’ fragrance, which combines Lavender, Vertivert and Camomile, the spray releases a calm aroma that supports a long, uninterrupted sleep. Sprayed directly onto the pillow before bed time, Sleep Plus is released through motion activated technology and so works continuously throughout the night as you move.
Through use of the effective sleep saviour, the pillow spray allows you to wake up feeling and looking refreshed.

name: Dead Sea Salt 5kg
product_description:
Treat itchy or dry skin to the Dead Sea Salt from Westlab; the UK’s leading bath salt experts. Suitable for use on skin that is prone to eczema, acne and psoriasis, its high grade magnesium content restores and rebalances skin, whilst calcium and potassium support the natural repair process and replenish minerals.
Recognised for its low pollution levels and multiple benefits to health and well-being, the Dead Sea contains bromides to relax muscles and vitamin-rich green algae Dunaliella for antioxidant protection and cell renewal. Helping to supplement skin with optimum levels of moisture and hydration, you can expect soft, smooth skin from top to toe.

name: Dante Dei Colli Fiorentini Cypress Tree Soap 250g
product_description:
Take an aromatic journey through the hills of Florentine with Nesti Dante's Dei Colli Fiorentini Cypress Tree Soap, a perfumed cleansing bar that has been crafted using the old craft saponification method of boiling in a cauldron.
Developed in Florence with high quality ingredients, the natural, vegetable-based soap gently cleanses and purifies your skin to leave the body feeling soft and supple; it transforms into a rich lather that eliminates impurities whilst imparting the regenerating scent of the Cyrpress Tree. The soap is embossed and wrapped in elegant, decorative paper.

name: Soapy Suds Bath Body Wash Duo
product_description:
Treat your skin to the bliss Soapy Suds Body Wash Duo; two of the brand's favourite body washes that will cleanse, refresh and fragrance the entire body from head to toe.
Vanilla and Bergamot Soapy Suds Body Wash and Bubbling Bath (473ml)
Ideal as a body wash to shake up your shower regime or as a stimulating addition to bath time, the vanilla-scented wash whips up a luxe lather to cleanse and condition, leaving skin in tip-top condition. Composed of a complementing cocktail of delicious ingredients, including soothing aloe and moisturising vitamin E, you can experience super hydrated and wonderfully soft skin.
Grapefruit and Aloe Soapy Suds Body Wash and Bubbling Bath (473ml)
A luxurious liquid soap that transforms into a rich lather to cleanse and condition skin. Scented with a revitalising blend of pink grapefruit and aloe, the body wash refreshes and softens skin, whilst soothing aloe and vitamin E lock in moisture to prevent dryness. Can be used as an energising body wash or bubble bath for a relaxing soak.

name: Associates Relax Deep Relax Bath & Shower Oil (55ml)
product_description:
If you need to slow down, instill peace and tranquility, have a worry free mind & a restful night's sleep then Aromatherapy Associates Deep Relax Bath Oil is for you.
After a hard day's work unwind with the Aromatherapy Associates Deep Relax Bath Oil. Using exceptionally high quality ingredients, this realxing oil will help you switch off for a restful, worry free night.

name: Epsom Salt 1kg
product_description:
Treat tired, stiff muscles to the Epsom Salt from Westlab; the UK’s leading bath salt experts. Ideal for use after sport activities and exercise, its formula is made of pure magnesium sulphate to eliminate toxins and reduce fluid retention, whilst easing aching and relieving heavy legs.
Helping to supplement skin with optimum levels of magnesium and sulphate, the salt increases energy production, banishes fatigue and minimises soreness of limbs so you can experience a healthy, detoxified body with restored comfort and improved recovery time after workouts. E.N.

name: Body Care Lotion - Rose (300ml)
product_description:
Incredibly hydrating, the Jurlique Rose Body Care Lotion is suitable for daily use so there’s simply no excuse for dry skin! The refreshing lightweight lotion leaves your skin smooth, fresh and supple with a delicate and pretty scent.
Jurlique values life, energy and beauty, all of which can be found in the Rose Body Care Lotion. This fast absorbing body moisturiser is rich in the living energy of rose, calendula and daisy to leave your mind, body and soul wonderfully glowing and your skin delicately cared for.
Directions of use:

name: Bees Tips and Toes Kit
product_description: Treat skin to the Burt's Bees Tips and Toes Kit; a six-piece collection of pampering products. Loaded with emollient beeswax, vitamin-enriched oils and botanical extracts, these gems are just what your hands and feet need after a long day.

name: Blanc Express Teeth Whitening Strips 30 Strips
product_description:
Achieve natural pearly whites with Mr Blanc's Express Teeth Whitening Strips, a supply of peroxide-free whitening strips that dissolve on the teeth to safely whiten and brighten your smile, on-the-go.
Convenient and easy-to-use, each flexible strip fits perfectly to the contour of your teeth, delivering a host of enamel friendly ingredients that remove stubborn stains and reveal a pure white smile; all without sensitivity to the teeth or gums. The thin, transparent strips sit comfortably on the teeth, and dissolve after fifteen minutes; deeply embedded stains from coffee and red wine are reduced, and if used correctly, your teeth appear visibly whiter after just fourteen days.
Expect beaming teeth with zero mess or residue. Can be used out-and-about, anywhere, anytime.

name: Bake 60 Minute Tan (236ml)
product_description:
Beauty award winner and Fake Bake's best selling tan, the Fake Bake 60 Minute Tan (236ml) is the go-to choice for those with busy lifestyles or for a quick fix before an occasion. Made with a triple-action formula, the smooth tan develops into a rich bronzed colour in the course of an hour.
The coloured lotion provides a 'shows where it goes' application, making it even quicker and easier to give skin an even, streak-free tan. Simply rinse off after 1 hour of developing and you're ready to go!. - K.R

name: Brown Infusing Eucalyptus Stimulating Body Polisher
product_description:
Banish signs of dry and dead skin with the Molton Brown Infusing Eucalyptus Stimulating Body Polisher; an exfoliator that works to leave your skin feeling soft with a healthy glow.
Delivering an exhilarating scent made up of Eucalyptus, Cedarwood and Watermint, the formula stimulates the senses, whilst exfoliating sugar particles buff the skin's surface to refine texture. The body polish is the perfect way to get that relaxed spa experience from the comfort of your own home.

name: Surge Citrus Mint Hand and Body Wash (250ml)
product_description:
Refresh and replenish your skin with Organic Surge Citrus Mint Hand and Body Wash, a gentle cleansing gel infused with essential oils to lock in moisture whilst cleansing away impurities.
Harnessing the energising and invigorating properties of Peppermint, Lemon and Sweet Orange essential oils, the wash performs a delicate cleanse on skin, lifting away daily grime whilst maintaining skin's natural moisture levels. Skin feels soft, moisturised and delicately scented with an uplifting natural fragrance.

name: Dead Sea Salt 500g
product_description:
Treat itchy or dry skin to the Dead Sea Salt from Westlab; the UK’s leading bath salt experts. Suitable for use on skin that is prone to eczema, acne and psoriasis, its high grade magnesium content restores and rebalances skin, whilst calcium and potassium support the natural repair process and replenish minerals.
Recognised for its low pollution levels and multiple benefits to health and well-being, the Dead Sea contains bromides to relax muscles and vitamin-rich green algae Dunaliella for antioxidant protection and cell renewal. Helping to supplement skin with optimum levels of moisture and hydration, you can expect soft, smooth skin from top to toe.

name: Skin Nourishing Shower Cream 300ml
product_description:
Using an exquisite combination of luxurious ingredients the shower cream veils your skin in a Milk Protein Cocoon, whilst enriching the body and balancing the skin.
Nourishing Camellia, Macadamia and Jojoba Oils deeply nourish and moisturise leaving satin soft skin, which looks healthy and supple.

name: Bodycare Tea Tree Face and Body Spray 100ml
product_description:
Meet the needs of irritated skin with the Australian Bodycare Tea Tree Face and Body Spray; a convenient mist with multiple uses for all of the family.
Enriched with a concentrated dose of Tea Tree Oil, the spray offers a soothing and calming effect to skin, whilst reducing feelings of irritation. The natural solution boasts Vitamin E, which tackles stress and irritation that has arisen from blemishes, acne and other minor skin problems. Incredibly versatile, the gentle yet effective spray can be used on the scalp to deter lice, as well as in sports shoes or on hands as a sanitiser.
The non-greasy formula arrives in a multi-directional spray bottle, which is ideal for applying product on hard to reach areas of the body, such as the back.

name: Basil Lemon Body Milk (200ml)
product_description:
Naomi Campbell & Sienna Miller love KORRES Basil Lemon Body Milk!
Give amazing moisture to your skin with the KORRES Basil Lemon Body Milk. It’s a moisturising body milk with an exceptional powdery texture. It has a scent of green spice of dazzling freshness with a vibrant lemon zest touch.
Basil Lemon Body Milk has a combination of provitamin B5, lanolin and Jojoba oil to enhance the suppleness of your skin, while providing lasting hydration.

Please note:Do not massage the cream into your skin because your hands will absorb a large quantity of cream with greater rapidity than the skin on the face and body.
