name: Revive Epsom Salt Bath Soak (500g)
product_description: Relieve aching and tired muscles with the Revive Epsom Salt Bath Soak from Westlab; the UK’s leading bath salt experts. Ideal for use after sport activities and exercise, its reviving blend of Epsom salt, eucalyptus and spearmint refreshes and energises the body, whilst easing stiff limbs after workouts for long-lasting comfort and improved recovery time. Delivering an invigorating fragrance to inspire positivity, the therapeutic bath soak will leave you feeling fortified, revitalised and deeply restored. E.N.

name: Brown Dewy Lily of the Valley & Star Anise Eau de Toilette 50ml
product_description:
Molton Brown present the Lily of the Valley and Star Anise Eau de Toilette; an elegant fragrance inspired by the arrival of Spring. Blending top notes of warming star anise, green mandarin and magnolia, balanced by delicate lily of the valley, white tea and fresh peony, before settling on sandalwood, white musk and ylang-ylang in the base. Presented in a luxurious bottle and matching gift box.
Top Notes: Star Anise, Magnolia, Green Mandarin.
Heart Notes: Lily of the Valley, Peony, White Tea.
Base Notes: Sandalwood, Ylang-Ylang, White Musk.

name: Chic URBAN Electric Toothbrush - Starlight
product_description:
Sonic Chic present the URBAN Electric Toothbrush; a portable, stylish toothbrush with a compact, lightweight design. Featuring a protective, ventilated cap for ultimate hygiene, the travel-friendly device is perfect for the gym, work or use on-the-move.
Boasting 22,000 strokes per minute, the sonic powered brush features a precision head to reach awkward areas and ultra-gentle bristles for a comfortable experience every time. Complete with a replacement brush head and battery.

name: Body Radiance Lotion 250ml
product_description:
Perfectly pamper from top to toe with the NAOBAY Body Radiance Lotion; a luxurious, lightweight formula that works to soften, replenish and protect skin from environmental aggressors.
Enriched with a nourishing blend of Olive Oil, Shea Butter and Avocado Oil, the fast-absorbing moisturiser envelops the body in a veil of hydration, whilst Aloe Vera shields from dryness to leave skin velvety soft, supple and comfortable.

name: Enjoy Life Herbal Lemon and May Chang Bath Oil (100ml)
product_description: Rejuvenate the mind and body with the Enjoy Life Herbal Lemon and May Chang Bath Oil from Kneipp. When combined with warm running water, the comforting oil delivers a revitalising citrus fragrance of refreshing May Chang and zesty Lemon to inspire positivity and lift your mood, leaving you feeling happy, content and balanced. Skin is soft and supple with a stimulating scent.

name: Hand Cream 90ml
product_description:
Revitalise dry, hard-working hands with the Anthony Hand Cream; a fast-absorbing, non-greasy formula to condition, hydrate and soften rough skin.
Powered by vegetable-based Glycerin and Aqua Cacteen, an ingredient derived from the Prickly Pear Plant, the cream deeply moisturises hands, whilst minimising the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and age spots. Suitable for all skin types, you can expect firmer, smoother hands without sticky residue.

name: Cordless Water Flosser and Oral Water Jet Irrigator
product_description:
Make flossing less of a chore with the Cordless Water Flosser and Oral Water Jet Irrigator from beauty specialists Rio. Get a dentist-clean feeling with the powerful water jet in less than 60 seconds, a flossing tool to reach between the teeth and below the gum line for improved oral hygiene and health.
With three cleansing modes to suit individual needs, water flossing is gentle on teeth and gums. The process removes more plaque from between teeth than manual brushing and penetrates deeper than regular flossing alone. Cordless and rechargeable, you can achieve superior results from the comfort of your own home.
Jet Irrigator
Standing Unit
2x Flossing Heads
USB charging cable

name: Forever Gentle Refining Scrub
product_description:
This silky scrub leaves the skin soft and glowing. The synergies between Cranberry beads, Jojoba pearls and Papaya extract effectively exfoliate the skin, both mechanically and enzymatically. Simultaneously, Shea Butter nourishes, while natural antioxidants derived from Lychee and Rosemary protect the skin against environmental stress.
Alchimie Antioxidant Technologies:Cranberry, Papaya (Papain), Jojoba, Lychee (Proanthocyandins, Catechin), Shea Butter, Rosemary (Carnosic Acid, Rosmarinic Acid).
100% made in Switzerland. Dermatologist-formulated and tested.

name: Health MGO 400+ Manuka Honey Syrup 100ml
product_description: MGO 400+ Manuka Honey Syrup is a great tasting natural formula designed to soothe and support the throat and chest. The syrup is formulated with a combination of high grade MGO™ 400+ Manuka Honey, BIO30™ NZ Propolis and herbs, popular for their ability to provide respiratory and immune support. MGO™ 400+ Manuka Honey is 100% natural and has effective and reliable antibacterial properties due to the naturally occurring, active compound Methylglyoxal.

name: Bees Discover Nature Gift Set
product_description:
Treat yourself or a loved one to the Discover Nature Gift Set from Burt's Bees. Housed in a branded wash bag, the collection combines a moisturising lip balm, luxurious lip shimmer, nourishing body lotion and a pack of handy face wipes.
Milk and Honey Body Lotion (25g)
Suitable for normal to dry skin, this lightweight, fast-absorbing lotion delivers long-lasting moisture to the entire body. Nourishing milk powder and honey soften skin, whilst an effective blend of coconut and grape seed oils provide essential nutrients so you can experience rejuvenated skin with a smooth texture.
Rhubarb Lip Shimmer (2.6g)
Made with 100% natural ingredients, the Lip Shimmer helps you achieve the perfect pout. Enriched with nourishing sunflower oil and moisturising vitamin E and beeswax, the shimmer enhances lips, whilst delivering a subtle colour. Antioxidant-rich fruit oils soften lips to leave you with a trendsetting smile.
Vanilla Bean Lip Balm (4.25g)
Infused with nourishing shea butter and soothing vitamin E, the 100% natural lip balm delivers long-lasting moisture to dry, chapped skin. Delivers a yummy vanilla scent and reveals silky smooth, hydrated lips.
Facial Cleansing Towelettes (Pack of 10)
With natural cloth from FSC certified wood cellulose, the face wipes gently remove excess oil, dirt and make-up to leave skin refreshed and purified. Specially formulated with antioxidant white tea to protect skin from environmental aggressors and minimise damage caused by free radicals. A combination of botanical extracts, including cucumber and aloe leaf juice soothe and calm skin.

name: Cocoa & Plum Creamy Baby Oil 85ml
product_description: Developed specifically for your little one's delicate skin, the Cocoa & Plum Creamy Baby Oil from MÁDARA gently conditions and softens from top to toe. Infused with Plum Oil and Cocoa Butter, the certified organic formula nourishes and protects, whilst comforting dry and flaking skin to leave it silky smooth. Fast-absorbing and easy to apply.

name: to Argan Miracle Oil
product_description: The yes to Argan Miracle Oil harnesses the powers of natural ingredient Argan Oil. The multi-tasking moisturiser works to nourish, brighten and condition skin, brimming with antioxidants and essential nutrients to unveil a healthy-looking radiance. The lightweight, non-greasy oil quickly absorbs and can be used anywhere on the body in need of a little TLC.

name: Calendula Soap 100g
product_description: Derived from organic, natural ingredients, the Weleda Calendula Soap cleans delicate, sensitive skin with a creamy, gentle lather. The vegetable-based formula contains precious extracts of Calendula and Chamomile alongside natural cleansing agents of Coconut and Olive Oils to help sweep away dirt and impurities without disrupting skin’s natural balance. The soap bar leaves skin feeling purified yet comfortable with a light, fresh fragrance.

name: Nurture Body Indulgence Gift Set
product_description:
Experience a spa-like treatment with the AromaWorks Nurture Body Indulgence Gift Set. Offering sensual aromatherapy benefits, the set combines a body oil, flannel, candle and bath bombs to help you create the perfect bathing setting where you can truly relax and unwind. Presented in a luxurious gift box, it makes an ideal gift for a loved one.
Nurture Body Oil (100ml)
The body oil contains five essential oils that help soothe both the body and mind whilst enveloping skin in moisture. Offering a sensual aromatherapy experience, the oil combines a harmonic blend of crisp May Chang, sweet Roman Chamomile and delicate Sandalwood with Organic Coconut Oil to leave skin feeling intensively nourished and soothed.
Nurture Candle (10cl)
Infuse a relaxing, calming fragrance into your abode with this candle; expertly crafted from the finest Soy and Beeswax. Blending pure essential oils of May Chang, Roman Chamomile and Sandalwood, the rejuvenating candle delivers a rich, woody aroma to help relieve daily tensions and stresses.
Nurture AromaBomb (2 x 250g)
The natural bath bomb contains a detoxifying blend of essential oils and salts to deliver a therapeutic bathing experience. Enriched with Lavender, May Chang and Sandalwood for a sweet, relaxing aroma, it’s enriched with Pink Himalayan Sea Salt and calming Calamine to help soothe both the body and mind.
Cotton Flannel
Luxuriously soft and fluffy towel flannel for cleansing and drying skin. Embroidered with AromaWorks branding.

name: Black All Over Body Spray (100ml)
product_description: Invigorate the skin and senses with Jack Black's All Over Body Spray; a refreshing formula that can be used as a spray after showering, or as a revitalising fragrance throughout the day. Blending natural citrus notes with herbal rosemary and mint, you can expect a cool, clean and energising scent that stays on the skin for hours.

name: Me Daily 4 Me - The Fabulous Years
product_description:
Inner Me Daily 4 Me - The Fabulous Years is a supplement pack targeted at those in their fifties and sixties, providing enough daily nutrients to maintain a healthy lifestyle.
As you get older your immune system can lower and bones can become weak. These supplement strips contain four capsules to help prevent this by improving the immune system and helping to maintain good health and vitality.
The 'inner you' has needs that change throughout various stages in life. With this in mind, Inner Me have created the Daily 4 Me supplement packs that are tailored to suit three defining age ranges. Whether you're a partying teen, a 30 something mum, or a middle aged housewife, there is a kit for you. - K.R
Directions for use: Take one strip daily with or after meals.

name: and Tone Gradual Lotion Light 200ml
product_description:
Top up your tan with the Gradual Lotion Light from UTAN and Tone. Ideal for fair to medium skin tones, the lotion is designed to be used to intensify and build on existing real or fake tans until the desired level of colour is achieved.
Enriched with an organic tanner, the silky lotion can be used as a regular body lotion, yet delivers a streak-free, sun-kissed finish. The tan is complete with UTAN and Tone’s Body Sculpting complex, which works to flush toxins from the skin and visibly tone and firm the surface. Skin is left supple and sun-kissed.

name: of California Vitamin Cleansing Bar - Bergamot and Pear 198g
product_description:
Supplement skin’s natural moisture and replenishment with the Baxter of California Vitamin Cleansing Bar. Featuring a colour band down the middle, and infused with hydrating Glycerin, Seaweed and Vitamins A and E, the tactful design of this salve helps tend to skin diligently and carefully, providing a relieving, refreshing experience that leaves pores feeling restored, cleansed and gently nourished.
Enriched with fragrance, the Bergamon and Pear scent creates a rich, fruity aroma, allowing for a full regenerative experience. C.R

name: and Bond Bridle Hide Box Wet Pack - Tan
product_description: With a waterproof lining and a carrying handle on one end, this tan Carter and Bond Bridle Hide Box Wet Pack is ideal for carrying your grooming kit in. Measuring 10 inches in length and featuring adjustable leather loops on the inside of the lid to accommodate both a razor and shaving brush, this box wet pack is a traditional option that is expertly handcrafted in England. - E.D

name: Grass Juice Capsules - 90 Capsules (500mg)
product_description:
The Barley Grass Juice Capsules are easily assimilated juice powder capsules ideal for arthritis, high cholesterol and promoting general well-being.
Containing the highest natural levels of SOD Enzyme (Superoxide Dismutase), the antioxidant-rich supplements work to defend against free radical damage and premature signs of ageing, whilst aiding tissue repair and supporting the natural immune system.

name: Plus Healthy Heart - 30 Capsules (151mg)
product_description:
Q10 Plus Healthy Heart Capsules play an essential role in the production of energy and contribute to the normal function of the heart.
Containing a unique blend of Vitamin B1 (Thiamine) and Co-Enzyme Q10 (Ubiquinone), the supplements help to boost metabolism and support the nervous system, whilst increasing energy levels and providing antioxidant properties.

name: Magik Organiks 7 Days to Relaxation Sleep Easy Duo
product_description:
Discover two Sleep Therapy essentials with the Spa Magik Organiks 7 Days to Relaxation Sleep Easy Duo; a two-piece set that encourages restful sleep and relaxation, whilst pampering the skin. Combining Lavender bath salts with a nourishing oil, the set guarantees to condition the skin and relax the entire body.
Deep Sleep Lavender Bath Salts (550g)
Encourage a good night’s sleep with the Deep Sleep Lavender Bath Salts; ideal for soaking away the days worry and stress. Allowing you to thoroughly unwind, the salts are packed with a relaxing cocktail of Dead Sea Salt, Bromide and Magesium, which also work in synergy to combat insomnia. Alongside providing superior relaxation, the salts are enriched with Jojoba and Cactus oils, which offer nourishment and skin softening benefits. Complete with a delicate and harmonising Lavender aroma, the salts seek to improve the length and quality of sleep.
6-Oil Super Serum (50ml)
Discover a beauty essential with the 6-Oil Super Serum; a multi-tasking formula that works to condition and protect skin, whilst promoting a sense of calm and relaxation. Enriched with a skin-loving blend of Vitamin E, Lavender and Rose Hip, the serum works to restore skin’s healthy moisture levels, whilst combating visible signs of ageing. The appearance of fine lines and wrinkles is reduced and skin appears smooth and youthful. Not only delivering anti-ageing benefits, the 6-Oil Super Serum also boasts therapeutic results that can promote a good night’s sleep. Complete with a relaxing lavender aroma.

name: London Get Beached Brush Replacement Head
product_description: Prepare for perfect tanning with the Get Beached Brush Replacement Head from Magnitone London. Featuring rough bristles to buff away dry, flaky skin, the brush head delivers a gentle exfoliating action for super soft, glowing skin from top to toe. Creates a smooth base for streak-free self-tan application, whilst promoting a deeper, longer-lasting natural tan.

name: Ferragamo Emozione Body Butter (150ml)
product_description: Deeply moisturise skin with the Emozione Body Butter from Salvatore Ferragamo. With luxurious scents of rose, soft peach, iris and peony, its creamy texture delivers a veil on the skin's surface to leave it hydrated, smooth and velvety soft. Fast-absorbing, the butter replenishes, perfectly pampers and delicately fragrances the body from top to toe. E.N.

name: Botanicals Pomegranate Noir Advanced Natural Body Moisturiser For Men 100ml
product_description:
Dr Botanicals presents the Pomegranate Noir Advanced Natural Body Moisturiser for Men, a rich and indulgent moisturiser brimming with vitamins, minerals and essential oils. Skin is left feeling protected, hydrated and smooth.
The main active ingredients of Coconut Oil and Shea Butter add a burst of hydration, working to soften and refine skin texture, whilst Vitamin E aims to combat harmful damage from free radicals and environmental aggressors. Suitable for all skin types, this natural moisturiser replenishes and soothes dry skin without any harmful chemicals or additives.

name: Glow and Hydrate
product_description:
Give the gift of a sunkissed natural looking tan in an instant with the TANWORX Glow and Hydrate Skin Essentials set. Whether you want to treat a friend, family member or yourself, the Glow and Hydrate kit is the ideal package to create a flawless, even yet natural looking tan that you don't have to wait for. - K.R
The TANWORX Glow and Hydrate Duo contains:
Hydrating Body LotionUltra moisturising, this lotion is designed to deeply hydrate and smooth the skin in preparation for your tan. Providing a soft and non-sticky canvas, your tan can glide on easily without sticking to dry areas or becoming patchy. Use 10 minutes before self tanning for an easy application and a perfect finish that lasts.
Instant Glow Wash-off TanFuss and stain-free, the wash-off TANWORX lotion provides an natural looking, bronzed glow from the moment it touches the skin. The long-lasting, streak-free formula gives an even tan, without the common fake tan smell lingering, and can be washed off with soap and water just as easily as you applied it.
Tanning MittApply your tanning products quickly and easily without worrying about staining your hands. The tanning mitt has been made with a special formula-resistant barrier, protecting hands and wrists from staining. The soft mitt provides an even, streak-free tan with every product, which can then be put into the washing machine to clean when you're done.

name: Delightful Exfoliating Body Scrub 150ml
product_description:
Restore radiance to skin with the IOMA Delightful Exfoliating Body Scrub. Boasting a luxurious honey texture that transforms into an oil during massage and a milky lotion upon contact with water, the scrub is designed to recover smoothness to dry skin.
Enriched with a potent blend of Cranberry Seeds, Orange Peel and Coconut shell, the Body Scrub effectively sloughs away dead skin cells, dirt and grime, to leave skin touchably soft with a smooth surface.

name: London Well Heeled! Replacement Roller - Extra Buff (x2)
product_description:
Achieve a salon-worthy pedicure with the Well Heeled! Replacement Roller - Extra Buff from Magnitone London. The pack houses two roller heads that are designed to replace your current, well-loved head, which may not be as effective anymore. The replacement rollers are compatible with Magnitone’s Express Pedicure System.
The powerful roller provides an ultra-thorough pedicure to feet in need of pampering. Boasting a long-lasting, micro-crystal roller, the head effectively buffs dry, hard and rough skin from feet. Providing extra buffing action, the roller works to tackle to most stubborn patches of skin, including heels. Expect the roller to reveal salon-soft skin instantly and effortlessly.

name: Jasmine Showergel (250ml)
product_description:
Maintain your skin’s natural moisture levels, while cleansing it with KORRES Jasmine Showergel. It’s a creamy foam shower gel with a lovely, fresh Jasmine scent.
This Showergel has active aloe juice, rich in vitamin C, vitamin E, zinc and antioxidant enzymes, which enhances the immune system of your skin. Furthermore, due to its ability to stimulate collagen and elastin synthesis, aloe vera gel retards skin ageing.
Lookfantastic tip:The Showergel is ideally combined with KORRES body milks in order to retain the fragrance much longer on your skin.
Directions of Use:

name: works Skin Deep Beauty Oil 8ml
product_description:
Treat your skin and senses to this works' Skin Deep Beauty Oil, a luxuriously scented body oil that nourishes dry skin whilst uplifting your mood.
Highly concentrated, the oil combines the potent effects of precious plant oils with Rose Absolute, Jasmine and Bergamot to intensely hydrate dry skin whilst enhancing feelings of well-being.
Apply to pulse points to enjoy its exquisite fragrance, or target dry areas to inspire supple, moisturised and glowing skin.

name: Authority Hand Foot Body Restoration
product_description:
Treat rough skin with the Skin Authority Hand Foot Body Restoration; a softening cream designed to target areas of dryness. Working on the whole body, the rich formula is ideal for stubborn patches of dehydration, such as the hands, feet or elbows.
The effective cream delivers a veil of hydration to skin, which helps to relieve and reduce the appearance of dryness. Utilising AOX Technology™ (a combination of vitamins and antioxidants), the formula is able to visibly reduce dark spots to leave skin even and uniform. Expect skin to be comfortably hydrated and free from irritation.

name: TROPEZ GRADUAL TAN PLUS FIRMING 4 IN 1 (150ML)
product_description:
St Tropez Gradual Tan Plus Firming 4 In 1 provides 24-hour moisturisation and a protective anti-oxidant to reinforce your skin’s natural defences for extra toning and firming. Ideal for those who want to slowly build up a golden tan that gives you a beach-perfect body all year round.
Directions of use:

name: Brown White Sandalwood Body Lotion 300ml
product_description: Perfectly pamper skin with Molton Brown's White Sandalwood Body Lotion; a fast-absorbing moisturiser developed to nourish, comfort and hydrate from top to toe. Blended with Violet Leaf, Narcisse Oil and Chinese Sandalwood Leaf, the luxurious, lightweight lotion conditions and softens skin, whilst imparting a long-lasting, floral fragrance to relax the senses. Housed in a pump bottle for mess-free application.

name: Udderly Gorgeous Bath Salts (250ml)
product_description:
Cowshed Udderly Gorgeous Bath Salts are blended with salt minerals to promote deep relaxation and smell absolutely lush! Take some all important time out, pop some bath salts into your bath and prepare to feel Udderly Gorgeous.
Containing sea buckthorn oil, an emollient packed with vitamins, minerals and essential fatty acids to pamper and protect the skin, the Udderly Gorgeous Bath Salts are just perfect for mums to be. Cowshed’s botanical formulations are naturally paraben, petrochemical and sulphate free, suitable for vegetarians and contain certified organic ingredients.
Directions of use:

name: Tonic Eau de Toilette Gift Set - Junzi
product_description:
Gentlemen's Tonic Eau de Toilette Gift Set combines the 'Junzi' eau de toilette with a gentle body wash and comforting, daily moisturiser. Expect to feel cleansed, pampered and handsomely fragranced.
Junzi EDT (100ml):
An eau de toilette expertly developed from their core fragrance of babassu and bergamot. A Chinese term connoting men of noble refinement, 'Junzi' is a scent for rare men. Combining top notes of black pepper and lemongrass, the fragrance gives way to a floral heart of rose and lavender before succumbing to a handsome, musky base of amber, cedarwood and moss.
Gentle Body Wash (50ml):
Suitable for all skin types, the softening body wash imparts a stress relieving fragrance whilst cleansing, energising and maintaining the skin's natural moisture levels. Fortified with a host of natural ingredients, including: menthol to cool and invigorate; ginger to stimulate circulation; and vegetable glycerine, honey and wheat extracts to soften and condition.
Daily Moisturiser (50ml):
A gentle, hydrating moisturiser enriched with emollient, anti-inflammatory and mineral-rich ingredients. Working to intensely nourish skin, the formula with natural essential oils melts quickly into skin, softening, soothing and protecting for a healthy-looking complexion. Its naturally astringent properties help close pores and heal nicks and burns.

name: Health New Zealand Royal Jelly Elixir with MGO 400+ Manuka Honey 25ml
product_description:
The Manuka Health New Zealand Royal Jelly Elixir with MGO™ 400+ Manuka Honey combines highly nutritious Royal Jelly with high grade Manuka Honey providing natural support for immune defences and skin health.
The MGO™ 400+ Manuka Honey formula is concentrated with high levels of methylglyoxal, which boasts reliable antibacterial properties. Royal Jelly is an extremely nutritious substance produced by bees and provides antioxidant and immune protection, supports collagen production for skin health and aids energy and vitality. The honey is complete with a blend of multiple New Zealand fruit extracts alongside Vitamins C, E, A and is designed to support the body's defence systems naturally.

name: Doctors Vein Away Plus (100ml)
product_description:
Say goodbye to spider veins without the pain or expense of surgery with Vein Away Plus from Skin Doctors. This topically applied cream dramatically diminishes the appearance of spider veins and capillaries.
Skin Doctors Vein Away Plus is formulated with retinyl palmitate, a more stable version of retinol; vitamin K, which helps to fade the appearance of broken capillaries on the body by reducing the tendency of blood to seep out of capillaries into the area under the skins' surface; and lavender which helps soothe the skin.
Directions of use:

name: Guava Showergel (250ml)
product_description:
Maintain your skin’s natural moisture levels, while cleansing it with KORRES Guava Showergel. It’s a creamy foam shower gel with an invigorating blend of tropical fruits that smells delicious!
Guava Showergel has active aloe juice, rich in vitamin C, vitamin E, zinc and antioxidant enzymes, which enhance the immune system of your skin. Furthermore, due to its ability to stimulate collagen and elastin synthesis, this aloe vera gel retards skin ageing.
Directions of use:
Lookfantastic tip:

name: Republic Hand Repair (18g)
product_description:
Treat hardworking hands to the Skin Republic Hand Repair, a serum-infused, anti-ageing hand mask that performs deep level action to help soften, moisturise and repair dry, rough hands.
Delivering nutrients and intense moisture with close and continuous contact, the 20 minute treatment works to expertly hydrate and nourish dry hands and rough skin. Helping to soothe and maintain healthy skin, its combination of 10 antioxidant and vitamin-rich plant extracts work in synergy to infuse hands with natural goodness. Collagen and Shea Butter boost elasticity and moisture, whilst a host of Fruit extracts and Vitamin E repair, help slow down the ageing process and decrease the appearance of wrinkles and age spots.
Intensely moisturising, the treatment will leave hands feeling supple, hydrated and youthful.
The Benefits of Using a Sheet Mask:
Sheet masks utilise a Transdermal Delivery System that ensures nutrients, nourishment and moisture are delivered deeply and effectively. Their breathable, 'second skin' nature allows for faster absorption than traditional masks and creams. They are also more hygienic.
Key Ingredients:
Collagen - maintains skin elasticity and strength.
Shea Butter - deeply moisturising, it heals chapped, dry skin and has anti-inflammatory properties.
Vitamin E - a potent antioxidant with anti-ageing and moisturising properties.
Olive Fruit Extract - antioxidant that helps slow down the ageing process.
Grape Fruit Extract - contains a powerful antioxidant. Helps repair and maintain healthy skin.
Orange Fruit Extract - exfoliates and moisturises with Alpha Hydroxy Acids.
Apple Fruit Extract - refines and protects skin. Helps lighten age spots and promote cell generation.
Lemon and Lime Fruit Extracts - source of Vitamin C known to stimulate collagen and decrease wrinkles.
Rosa Centifolia - a therapeutic astringent to tighten pores and remove excess oil without drying.

name: & Evelyn Vetiver & Juniperberry Triple-Milled Soap (158g)
product_description:
The ideal toning soap for skin in need of love and attention, Crabtree & Evelyn Vetiver & Juniperberry Triple Milled Soap transports you into a mysterious world of softness where a sensual landscape takes over.
Made by blending vetiver, sandalwood and smoked cypress, Crabtree & Evelyn Vetiver & Juniperberry Triple Milled Soap has a luscious fragrance with juniperberry accents. These all-vegetable triple-milled soaps are carefully crafted in Vermont exclusively for Crabtree & Evelyn.
Directions of use:

name: Ambre Solaire No Streaks Moisturising Bronzer Milk (150ml)
product_description:
Garnier Ambre Solaire Moisturising Bronzing Milk 150ml will give you  a wonderful, sun-kissed glow. Perfect for achieving a  safe and temporary tan, the tinted formula guides your application,  giving you natural and streak-free colour.
Enriched with apricot extract, it conditions your skin and keeps it  hydrated, which optimises the colour result and leaves your tan looking  vibrant for longer. Non-greasy and non-sticky, it dries quickly and  doesn't have the traditional fake-tan smell. The colour washes off  easily with soap and water, and is suitable for all skin types.

name: Ambre Solaire After Sun Tan Maintainer 200ml
product_description:
Boost your tan whilst soothing your skin with Garnier Ambre Solaire Tan Maintainer 200ml. Wonderfully soothing and hydrating, it moisturises dehydrated skin that's been exposed to the sun.
Containing a low-level self-tanning agent, it subtly enhances your tan and makes it look deeper, leaving you with radiant, glowing skin. Enriched with glycerine and vitamin E, it provides intense nourishment to keep your skin feeling soft, smooth and supple.
Directions of Use: Apply to sun-exposed skin.

name: works Perfect Legs Skin Miracle (120ml)
product_description: Dare to bare with this works Perfect Legs Skin Miracle. Formulated to combat skin imperfections, discolourations and scars on your legs, this miracle product contains a powerful complex of Vitamins C and E to help even out skin tone and restructure the skin while the Arnica helps to fade bruising. - E.D

name: & EVELYN POMEGRANATE, ARGAN & GRAPESEED HAND THERAPY (250G)
product_description:
Reveal hands that are noticeably softer and smoother with Crabtree & Evelyn Pomegranate, Argan & Grapeseed Hand Therapy. This revolutionary conditioning treatment will leave hands feeling pampered.
Crabtree & Evelyn Pomegranate, Argan & Grapeseed Hand Therapy is an innovative, formula contains rich hydrators to polish and re-texturise skin, while a blend of emollients condition even the driest of hands. Fragranced with the tart sweetness of pomegranate coupled with a burst of citrus and fresh fig leaf, this is a treat your hands will thank you for.
Directions of use:

name: Wellness Body Scrub (450g)
product_description:
Buff your body with this Natio Wellness Body Scrub and reveal a fresh, vibrant glow to your skin. Featuring apricot seed powder which gently buffs away dead skins cells and pure pomegranate that repairs and promotes new cell production.
Revitalise your body with this Natio Wellness Body Scrub. Exfoliating while gently removing dead skin, this gorgeous scrub will leave your skin looking and feeling radiant and silky soft.
Directions of use:

name: Brown Re-Charge Black Pepper SPORT 4-in-1 Body Wash (200ml)
product_description:
Refresh and revitalise with the Re-Charge Black Pepper SPORT 4-in-1 Body Wash from Molton Brown.
Utilising skin conditioners for the face and body, guar gum for a smoother shave, and an ultra-shine complex that leaves hair looking super healthy, the multi-tasking formula works to cleanse, hydrate and soften from head to toe. Delivers a masculine fragrance blended from cardamom, jasmine, cedarwood and spicy Sichuan pepper, the body wash is perfect for post-workout or grooming on-the-go.

name: Vitamin E 32,000iu Oil - Scar & Stretch Mark Treatment 30ml
product_description:
Nourish, moisturise and help regenerate your skin with JASON 32000IU Vitamin E Beauty Oil. This natural antioxidant combats free radical damage whilst protecting skin against fine lines and wrinkles, leaving skin silky smooth.
Topical use of JASON 32000IU Vitamin E Beauty Oil helps decrease the appearance of roughness, wrinkles and prevents damage from environmental elements. This multi-functional oil also reduces scaring and stretch marks, leaving your skin soft and supple.
Directions of use:

name: Paris Men Expert Invincible Sport Shower Gel 300ml
product_description: Experience ultimate seduction with the Men Expert Invincible Sport Shower Gel from L'Oréal Paris. The 3-in-1 wash is suitable for the face, hair and body and is designed to keep you on top of your game, leaving skin feeling clean, refreshed and thoroughly hydrated. Bursting with a powerful woody fragrance.

name: Tropez Untinted Bronzing Mousse (200ml)
product_description:
Achieve sunkissed perfection with St. Tropez's Untinted Bronzing Mousse, a quick-drying self-tan that applies clear and develops over 4-8 hours to create a natural-looking, golden tan.
Streak-free and easy to apply, the lightweight mousse glides effortlessly and discreetly across skin with no fake tan smell, and develops over time, adapting to your individual skin tone to create a gorgeous, natural-looking glow. Its ultra-hydrating formula harnesses moisturising properties which help prolong the length of your tan with even fade; so you can enjoy a radiant, sunkissed body for longer. Quick-drying, the fake tan does not feel sticky on skin and won't transfer. Expect glowing skin with a natural-looking tan. - K.N.

name: Contouring Concentrate (75ml)
product_description:
Caudalie Contouring Concentrate is the only 100% natural anti-cellulite concentrate that promotes drainage in order to smooth lumps and bumps and refine your silhouette with visible results.
Ideal if you’re seeking to refine your figure and smooth out dimpled skin, the Contouring Concentrate from Caudalie helps to do just that, making you feel immediately lighter. This incredible blend smoothes out dimpled skin with results you will actually notice! It gives up to 3.8cm reduction from the thigh and reduces up to 2 grades of cellulite.
Directions of use:

name: Softening Socks (50 Treatments)
product_description:
Slide on the bliss softening socks for 20 minutes when your feet have to go from scary to sandal-ready. Heat-released jojoba oil, olive oil, ceramides, and vitamin E sink in to smooth and soften skin to leave your feet fab!
Heal your hardened heals and tackle tough toes with bliss softening socks. A special polymer gel lining inside the socks envelops dry skin and, when activated by body heat, force-feeds moisture that treats rough and dry feet. These clever socks can be reused up to 50 times and help alleviate dryness and battle the buildup of corns and calluses. Besides, what misguided sole thinks that her feet couldn't use some improvement?
Directions of use:

name: Baby Calendula Body Lotion (200ml)
product_description:
The Weleda Calendula Body Lotion is the perfect, all round product. With its carefully selected formulation of beneficial ingredients, this lotion can be used as a gentle cleaning product, particularly in the nappy area, where it helps to gently remove grime. It can also be used to moisturise and nourish delicate skin after bathing thanks to its extracts of organic calendula and chamomile to help protect the skin from environmental drying effects.Containing 100% natural ingredients, 99% of which are organic, this body lotion has a milky consistency which absorbs quikly and is perfect for sensitive skin. - E.D
Directions of use:- If using to cleanse, apply the lotion onto a cleansing tissue or cotton wool and carefully clean the area.- If using as a moisturiser, after a bath apply the lotion all over the body and rub in lightly.

name: Pedi Man Rollers
product_description: Designed for use with the MICRO Pedi Man, the MICRO Pedi Man Rollers are perfect for replacing the original rollers when they have become worn out. Gentle and effective, they're made from micro-minerals to slough away hard, uncomfortable skin on the soles of your feel, leaving them smooth and soft. - L.M.Directions for Use:Attach the rollers to your MICRO Pedi Man.

name: Liberata Anti-Ageing Self Tanning Serum (15ml)
product_description:
Catering for all skin types, Vita Liberata's Anti-Ageing Self Tanning Serum can be added to your existing facial moisturiser or used alone as a primer to achieve a sun-kissed complexion.
Fortified with Matrixyl 3000 to stimulate collagen production, the fast-absorbing formula works to plump and condition skin, whilst minimising the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles to reveal a younger-looking, more refined finish.
Innovative HyH2O™ technology balances oils in the skin to prevent clogging pores, and a nourishing blend of Cucumber and Rose aid skin regeneration to inspire a glowing, radiant complexion with natural-looking colour.

name: Chapman Skinesis Bodylift
product_description:
Sarah Chapman Skinesis Bodylift is a unique massaging tool that mimics the fast-tapping, pinching and knuckling techniques of the brand's Skinesis massage. Designed with 12 wheels and 72 nodules that roll deeply over the skin to refine, tone and firm, whilst stimulating blood circulation for a healthy-looking glow.
Suitable for use on all skin types, the revolutionary tool relieves aching muscles and supports lymphatic drainage to break down fatty deposits on the upper arms, thighs, buttocks and calves. With regular use, you can experience tighter, defined and smoother skin with an improved appearance. E.N.

name: Reve De Miel Creme Mains Et Ongles - Hand & Nail Cream (75ml)
product_description:
This NUXE Crème Mains Et Ongles Hand & Nail Cream repairs, nourishes and protects your dry and damaged hands. This repairing and non-greasy cream wraps damaged and sensitive hands with softness.
Nourishing and protecting, this astounding NUXE Hand & Nail Cream will help you get heavenly hands. Its ultimate refinery comes from the fact that it also strengthens your nails and softens your cuticles.
With Chilean rose, avocado and sweet almond precious oils, this cream nourishes and fortifies damaged tissues in your hands, whilst acacia honey, with its natural repairing properties, provides elasticity to your fragile skin.
If you feel like a relaxing break, then rub the cream into your hands from your fingertips to your wrist, paying special attention to your cuticles to soften them, granting yourself complete well-being.
Directions of use:

name: Paris Sublime Bronze Gradual Tan - Fair (200ml)
product_description:
Tanned and nourished with moisture, your skin never looks as beautiful as when you are on holiday.
L'Oreal Paris Sublime Bronze Gradual Tan allows you to build a natural-looking and streak free golden tan with confidence, and keeps your skin feeling soft and smooth.
It offers nourished and golden skin all year round.
Enriched with Hydralium, Sublime Bronze Gradual Tan intensely nourishes the skin and leaves it moisturised for up to 24hrs. It is also enriched with a light dose of Soft-Tan, a self-tan ingredient, it allows you to progressively build a natural, sun-kissed look, day after day.
With a velvety smooth texture and light fragrance.

name: Guava Body Butter (125ml)
product_description:
Give extremely rich moisture to your dry and chapped skin with KORRES Guava Body Butter. This easily absorbed cream nourishes your skin, restoring its elasticity and smoothness.
It contains shea butter and quince extract, which have softening, moisturising and restructuring properties. It also contains Guava, an important source of vitamin C, which stimulates collagen synthesis.
lookfantastic tip:KORRES Guava Body Butter is ideal to help avoid stretch marks, during pregnancy or due to weight fluctuation.
Directions of use:

name: and Tone Weekly Self-Tan Lotion Dark 200ml
product_description:
Achieve a long-lasting tan with the Weekly Self-Tan Lotion Dark from UTAN and Tone. The best-selling formula envelops skin in a refreshing scent, as well as delivering a deep, golden tan for up to a week.
Ideal for medium to dark skin tones, the lotion is effortlessly applied and offers an instant bronzed-look and streak-free results. The tan is complete with UTAN and Tone’s Body Sculpting complex, which works to flush toxins from the skin and visibly tone and firm the surface. Skin is left supple and sun-kissed.

name: Vetiver Root, Green Tea And Cedarwood Shower Gel 250ml
product_description: With beautiful earthy and moist wood notes, this Vetiver root, Green Tea and Cedarwood shower gel uses the aromatic roots of Vetiver for a rich, heavy and warm fragrance whilst cleansing your skin in the shower.

name: Sensitive Soap Free Body Wash (500ml)
product_description:
Perfect for delicate skin, the Sensitive Soap Free Body Wash by Sukin is gentle enough to treat even the most irritated, sensitive skin whilst it cleanses. Boasting a skin-healing blend of green tea, soothing aloe vera, cucumber and calming chamomile, the body wash gets to work to provide skin with a boost of hydration, whilst leaving it clean, balanced and soothed. - R.H
Directions For Use: Use a small amount on a sponge in the shower or bath. Rinse thoroughly and pat skin dry.

name: Boo Super Stretchy Miracle Oil (100ml)
product_description:
Prevent stretch marks with Love Boo Super Stretchy Miracle Oil. The 100% natural blend moisturises and nourishes the skin to reduce the appearance of scars, damaged skin and stretch marks.
Boo Boo Super Stretchy Miracle Oil is the ultimate hero product. Enriched with argan oil, one of the rarest and richest oils in the world, as well as passion flower oil to treat dry patches, and mandarin oil to repair damaged skin cells and encourage new cell growth, this luxurious oil restores suppleness and elasticity to leave skin smooth, even and hydrated.
Pregnant women also swear by Love Boo Super Stretchy Miracle Oil to prevent morning sickness thanks to its lemon and ginger extracts. Simply dab some onto the wrists and inhale when sickness strikes.
Directions of use:

name: Stretch Mark Massage Oil (100ml)
product_description:
Weleda Pregnancy Body Oil stops unwanted stretch marks before they start. The natural collagen found in vitamin E helps skin retain its elasticity. This skincare formula also contains wheat germ oil, arnica extract and sweet almond oil. These natural ingredients contain no fillers or synthetic ingredients. This product also helps the skin remain soft during pregnancy so that it can return to normal after the little bundle of joy is welcomed into the world. This massage oil has a light scent and has been tested by dermatologists.
For best results, use daily during pregnancy and up to three months after.

name: Duo Deodorant for Men (Worth £17.00)
product_description:
Stay fresh and comfortable with NUXE Duo Deodorant for Men, a pair of refreshing, roll-on antiperspirants that deliver 24 hour protection.
Helping to keep your underarms fresh, dry and odour-free, the deodorant helps to regulate perspiration to prevent sweat patches, and leaves you feeling instantly fresher and purified all day. It leaves no white marks on skin or clothing. Infused with a handsome, woody and spicy fragrance.

name: to Grapefruit Rejuvenating Body Wash 280ml
product_description:
Revitalise the skin and senses with yes to's Grapefruit Rejuvenating Body Wash; an invigorating formula that can be used to shake up your shower or bath time ritual.
Infused with Grapefruit, rich in Vitamin C, the lightweight, citrus-scented wash whips up a luxurious lather to cleanse and condition skin from top to toe. The body is soft, smooth and energised.

name: Liberata Ten Minute Tan 150ml
product_description:
Achieve glowing perfection with the Vita Liberata Ten Minute Tan; an organic cream formula that delivers natural-looking, streak-free colour in just ten minutes.
Fortified with anti-ageing ingredients, including Matrixyl 3000, Rose and Neroli, the easy-to-apply self-tan supports collagen production and infuses skin with long-lasting hydration, whilst giving a hint of bronze that slowly develops over 4-8 hours.
Its innovative Odour Remove™ technology eliminates the unpleasant fake tan smell. Ideal for the face and body, you can expect radiant, flawless colour that can be reapplied to intensify.

name: Brown Coco & Sandalwood Body Wash
product_description: Transporting you to white-sand, coconut tree-lined beaches in the Philippines, Molton Brown's Coco & Sandalwood Body Wash gently refreshes and fragrances from top to toe. Enriched with Coconut Fruit Extract, the luxurious shower gel rejuvenates tired skin, whilst enveloping the body with relaxing notes of Coconut, Jasmine and Sandalwood.

name: Skincare Boob Tube + Multi-Action Bust Cream (100ml)
product_description:
Treat the décolletage to some much needed attention with the Mio Skincare Boob Tube + Multi-Action Bust Cream; a skin-loving treatment that visibly transforms and improves the appearance of delicate skin.
Effortlessly smoothing onto the chest, the fast-absorbing cream should be applied in the region between the chin and boobs, an area usually exposed to the sun and where elasticity is often lacking regardless of age.
The rich formula utilises CoQ10, alongside an organic blend of Omega-Rich Oils and Shea Butter. It works to envelop skin in a veil of essential moisture, which visibly smoothes and brightens the chest, whilst improving skin tone. Sure to become an essential addition to your skincare regime, the Boob Tube + Multi-Action Bust Cream leaves the décolletage youthful and radiant.

name: & Evelyn Secret to Beautiful Hands Gift Set 2 x 50g (Worth £20.00)
product_description:
Crabtree & Evelyn present the Secret to Beautiful Hands Gift Set; a pair of their best-selling fragranced hand creams to nourish, hydrate and repair. Brimming with a host of powerful natural ingredients and extracts, the luxurious formula rapidly absorbs to deliver pampering skin benefits, even helping to soften and strengthen nails and cuticles.
The Set Contains: 
Rosewater Hand Therapy
La Source

name: Jojoba Company 100% Natural Australian Jojoba Oil 30ml
product_description:
Address a range of skincare concerns and needs with 100% Natural Australian Jojoba Oil from The Jojoba Company, from extreme dryness to redness and inflammation.
Suitable for all skin types, the versatile treatment is the perfect base for any home remedy kit, working to produce a wax that is similar to skin’s natural sebum for deep penetration and maximum efficacy.
Brimming with antioxidants, essential fatty acids and vitamins, the lightweight formula quickly penetrates skin without feeling greasy – as it isn’t actually an oil – and works to soothe, nourish and intensively moisturise. Ideal for chapped lips, rough cuticles, stretch marks and dry patches anywhere on the body, it keeps skin feeling smooth, plump and hydrated with long lasting results.

name: Hot Wax Epilator Replacement Pack
product_description: The replacement pack features an aloe vera infused wax cartidge and waxing strips for the Elle Macpherson Hot Wax Epilator.

name: White Tea, Bergamot And Freesia Shower Gel 250ml
product_description: Using rich ingredients, this White Tea, Bergamot and Freesia shower gel from KORRES uses the exquisite white tea for an invigorating and fresh scent whilst cleansing your skin.

name: Marvis Toothbrush
product_description:
Created in Italy, this unique brand uses a traditional method while creating the rich creamy paste used in Marvis products.
What really sets Marvis apart from other toothpaste brands is the wide range of exotic flavours, enticing and addictive tastes that produce a whirlwind of sensations. Marvis travel the world to find taste combinations to set fire and tantalise your mouth while brushing your teeth.
This stylish toothbrush from Marvis has a long black bristles and a long black handle. Stylish and suave looking this is the perfect toothbrush for the minimalist bathroom.

name: London Sisal Natural Exfoliating Sponge
product_description:
The Hydrea London Sisal Natural Exfoliating Sponge is the perfect addition to your daily cleansing routine. The woven sisal cover encloses a ball of natural sisal fibres that provide a natural way to exfoliate effectively while improving skin tone.
When used in the bath or shower with your favourite cleansing product, the Hydrea London Sisal Natural Exfoliating Sponge creates a rich lather that leaves your skin blooming. Deep cleansing, massaging, exfoliating, de-toxing, regenerating and de-stressing this cleansing aid really is a natural wonder.

name: Aching Muscle Super Soak (400 ml)
product_description:
This Elemis Muscle Super Soak is an essential for all sport fanatics or anyone with rheumatic aches and pains. This deep heat, aromatherapeutic remedy is a powerful antidote to aching muscles.
Using energising and warming extracts of birch, juniper, clove, alpine lavender, wild thyme and blue chamomile combined with mineral rich sea salt to ease tired muscles and recharge your body, Elemis Aching Muscle Super Soak will detoxify and cleanse, while working as a deep heat treatment to relieve muscle strain after exercise and hard work. This soak will warm your body, so it is excellent for warming cold hands and feet. It can ease period pains, swelling and stiffness and boost circulation.
Directions of Use:
Please Note: Not suitable for pregnant women.

name: Healthy Mouth Tartar Control Mouthwash (473ml)
product_description:
Certified organic tea tree oil and aloe vera gel in JASON Healthy Mouthwash help soothe and heal gums for an all-round healthier mouth. A wonderful range of natural ingredients keep your mouth healthy and freshen breath in one simple step.
Anti-bacterial JASON Healthy Mouthwash is concentrated 2:1 with tea tree oil, clove and cinnamon to ensure your mouth is kept fresh and clean. Perilla seed extract helps block sugar acids, protecting your teeth from erosion, keeping your mouth in tip-top condition. This mouthwash is saccharin and alcohol free.
Directions of use:

name: Hydrating Body Lotion (500ml)
product_description:
Lock in moisture with Sukin Hydrating Body Lotion to hydrate thirsty skin. Enriched with aloe vera, nettle, horsetail and burdock, the lotion is combined with rosehip, avocado and jojoba oils to soothe, nourish and improve skin elasticity.
Sukin believe the most powerful and effective ingredients for your skin and hair care come from nature. Environmentally conscious, Sukin is a natural personal care company from Australia.
‘Skincare that doesn’t cost the earth™’ - Sukin’s commitment extends far beyond cosmetic. The 100% certified carbon neutral company aims to reduce the impact their business has on our increasingly fragile environment. -SA

name: & Evelyn Somerset Meadow Body Lotion (200ml)
product_description:
A moistuire rich lotion that nourishes and rehydrates the skin, this Somerset Meadow Body Lotion is formulated with almond oil and conditioning shea butter to leave your skin silky soft and hydrated. Presented in a pump bottle for easy distribution, this body lotion is a must have addition to your beauty regime.
Boasting an aroma that's reminiscent of a gorgeous spring day, this Somerset Meadow Bath and Shower Gel from Crabtree & Evelyn is the perfect feminine scent for the modern woman, with notes of ivy and water lily that captures the freshness of a fine spring's day.

name: Effects Instant Lip Plumper
product_description:
Achieve fuller, smoother-looking lips with the Instant Effects Instant Lip Plumper, an innovative lip plumping formula that increases lip volume by up to 20% in just 2 minutes.
Combining patented oxygen transfer technology with hyaluronic spheres, the volumising solution effectively plumps up lips whilst reducing the look of lines for a smoother, youthful-looking pout that can last for up to 4 days. Lips are volumised and enriched with moisture. No stinging or aggravation.

name: TAN Mousse - Dark 150ml
product_description:
Achieve a flawless, streak-free tan with the SKINNY TAN Mousse in Dark; a convenient tanning foam that delivers long-lasting results. Working on both the face and body, the fluffy formula guarantees an enviable deep tan, without an unwanted orange-hued finish.
Enriched with two, certified natural tanning ingredients, the lightweight mousse quickly and effortlessly glides over skin, offering a dark sun-kissed glow that can last up to fourteen days. The self tan also boasts organic Aloe Vera and active Caffeine, which ensure skin is thoroughly and comfortably hydrated, whilst perfecting the face and body by reducing the appearance of blemishes and cellulite.
The tanner is intelligently created with a makeup guide colour, which allows you to see where the product has been applied to, and therefore produce more even results. Please bear in mind that the guide colour is designed to be darker that the tan developing underneath.
Finished with a fragrant dose of organic Coconut, the tanning mousse leaves skin beautifully bronzed and smelling delicious.

product_description:
Feel perfectly pampered with the Mandarin and Grapefruit Hand and Body Duo from Elemental Herbology. Ideal for the bath, shower or by the washbasin, the kit will leave skin clean, fresh and deeply nourished. Housed in a gift box.
Grapefruit and Mandarin Hand and Body Wash (300ml)
An invigorating formula that works to cleanse and refresh. Infused with Cucumber Juice and Kakadu Plum Extract, the lightweight wash soothes and hydrates, whilst its blend of Mandarin, Lemon, Grapefruit and Rosemary leave skin feeling soft, supple and revitalised.

Harnessing the powers of Mandarin and Geranium botanical oils, the fast-absorbing cream moisturises and conditions dryness, whilst imparting an uplifting fragrance for smooth, comfortable and rejuvenated skin on the hands and body.

Comfort and relieve dry skin with Organic Surge Lavender Meadow Hand and Body Lotion, an ultra-nourishing formula dedicated to softening, smoothing and replenishing your skin.
Its quick-absorbing texture rich in Shea Butter and Glycerine expertly hydrates and protects, keeping moisture locked in whilst preventing irritation. Its blend of Organic Lavender and Geranium essential oils work in synergy to naturally soothe skin and relax the mind. Skin feels nourished and conditioned.

name: Almond Cherry Body Milk 200ml
product_description: KORRES Almond Cherry Body Milk is a creamy, nourishing formula that delivers long-lasting hydration and enhanced softness. Enriched with a host natural ingredients, the velvety body milk harnesses the anti-inflammatory and soothing properties of almond oil, along with active aloe, pro-vitamin B5 and shea butter. Dry skin feels supple and nourished.

product_description:
Invigorate your skin and senses with the Lemon and Sage Bath Duo from bliss. Combining two of the brand's citrus-scented formulas, the kit will cleanse, hydrate and revitalise as it envelops the body with a refreshing, stimulating fragrance.
Lemon and Sage Soapy Suds Body Wash and Bubbling Bath (473ml)
Ideal as a body wash to shake up your shower regime or as a stimulating addition to bath time, the citrus-scented wash whips up a luxe lather to cleanse and condition, leaving skin in tip-top condition. Composed of a complementing cocktail of delicious ingredients, including soothing Aloe and moisturising Vitamin E, you can experience super hydrated and wonderfully soft skin.
Lemon and Sage Body Butter Maximum Moisture Cream (200ml)
A lightweight, quick-absorbing formula infused with the brand's signature citrus scent. Harnessing the powers of Coconut Oil and Sodium Hyaluronate, the cream delivers intense moisture and hydration, whilst antioxidant Vitamin E defends against daily environmental aggressors for long-lasting comfort. Thirsty skin is replenishes and rejuvenated without greasy residue.

product_description:
An invigorating bath and shower gel formulated with uplifting spearmint and peppermint essential oils, Elemis Sharp Shower Body Wash is the perfect uplifting shower partner for difficult mornings or whenever you need a pick-me-up.
Combining plant extracts of nettle, wild marjoram, marshmallow, chamomile and thyme in a soya, wheat and milk protein base, Elemis Sharp Shower Body Wash is a skin friendly formula that offers extremely deep cleansing. The super gentle rich creamy lather will leave your skin clean, soft and tingling with freshness.
Directions of use:

name: Crew Classic Body Wash (450ml)
product_description:
American Crew Classic Body Wash is an all over body wash that protects and relieves dry skin. It has that classic American Crew fragrance that will leave your skin smelling truly irresistible and it will make your skin feel nourished and moisturised.
American Crew Classic Body Wash has a unique blend of spices and citrus that creates a subtle, clean and masculine scent. This body wash naturally nourishes and moisturises your skin to increase its elasticity, as well as assisting your skin in retaining natural oils. Ingredients such as aloe vera, and vitamins A and E help to improve skin quality and maintain moisture, while tea tree oil provides superior deep cleansing without drying out any layers of your skin. It also includes essential antioxidants that are necessary to improve the texture, firmness and feel of your skin.
Direction of use:

name: The Ritual of Hammam - Purifying Treat Small Gift Set
product_description:
Feel perfectly pampered with The Ritual of Hammam - Purifying Treat Small Gift Set from Rituals. Housed in luxurious packaging, the kit combines two of the brand's favourites to cleanse and clarify from top to toe.
Hammam Purifying Body Mud (70ml)
An exfoliating micro-scrub with natural grains that leave skin looking fresh and supple. The purifying body scrub contains mineral-rich Rhassoul Clay and refreshing Eucalyptus to revitalise and refine. Can be used as a deep-cleansing mask by leaving the lotion on dry skin.
Hammam Delight Foaming Shower Gel (50ml)
Deeply infused with aromatic Eucalyptus and Rosemary, the fragrant, calming properties of the formula bring in reminiscences of Turkish baths and saunas, where a full cleansing experience is provided. Made in an enriching gel-to-foam formula, the salve turns into a heady lather when put into contact with water, allowing the body to be fully endorsed and covered.

name: Botanical Body Wash (500ml)
product_description:
Free from S.L.S and S.L.E.S, Sukin Botanical Body Wash stimulates the senses to revive a tired body. Perfect to wake you up in the morning, the wash contains softening jojoba, avocado and rosehip oils to soften, hydrate and purify your skin.
Sukin believe the most powerful and effective ingredients for your skin and hair care come from nature. Environmentally conscious, Sukin is a natural personal care company from Australia.
‘Skincare that doesn’t cost the earth™’ - Sukin’s commitment extends far beyond cosmetic. The 100% certified carbon neutral company aims to reduce the impact their business has on our increasingly fragile environment. -SA

name: TROPEZ SELF TAN BRONZING LOTION - DARK (200ML)
product_description:
This relaxing aromatic scent, infused with nourishing aloe vera makes up the St Tropez Self Bronzing Lotion – Dark, it’s non greasy and dries conveniently fast.
St Tropez Self Bronzing Lotion – Dark, cunningly created to hide stretch marks, varicose veins and scars with an even all year round dark tan. Innovatively this lotion is designed to be custom blended with St Tropez’s body moisturiser so you can choose your shade.
Directions of use:

name: ISSA Play Toothbrush - Pink
product_description:
Introduce yourself to FOREO’s innovative oral-care line with the FOREO ISSA Play Toothbrush; a revolutionary toothbrush that encourages healthy teeth and gums, whilst adding a playful pop of colour to the bathroom.
The ISSA Play utilises the same intelligent technology as the previous ISSA toothbrushes, yet arrives as a battery-powered model. The toothbrush combines sonic pulse technology with a unique, hybrid brush head, which is effective in eliminating plaque, preventing cavities and discouraging tartar build-up. Delivering 9000 high-intensity pulsations per minute, the toothbrush thoroughly cleans and visibly whitens teeth, whilst comfortably massaging gums to promote strong and healthy results.
The ISSA toothbrushes are safe and ultra-hygienic as they harbour considerably less bacteria than regular nylon brushes. The ISSA Play boasts a hybrid brush head, which is crafted using antibacterial silicone bristles to the outer and PBT polymer bristles to the centre. The silicone bristles gently massage gums to prevent damage, whilst the polymer ones provide a more vigorous clean.
Easy-to-use, the ergonomic toothbrush is ideal for daily use and the lightweight design ensures it is travel friendly. The Swedish-designed brush is completely waterproof, which allows for easy cleaning and even in-shower use, which is ideal for those with busy lifestyles. Cost-effective with no changeable brush heads, the ISSA Play is the perfect introduction into the ISSA range. Discover a new kind of clean.

name: Lait-Crème Fluid (500ml)
product_description: Achieve soft, supple skin with the Embryolisse Lait-Crème Fluid, a velvety-textured, versatile lotion. Suitable for all skin types, the lotion can be used as a replenishing moisturiser, make-up remover, after-shave treatment, baby care or to soothe skin after sun exposure. The fast-absorbing lotion comes in a handy pump bottle for easy application. E.N.

product_description:
Soften and smooth baby’s skin with a medley of vitamin-rich oils with Burt’s Bees Baby Bee Nourishing Baby Oil. Apricot is infused with grape seed, wheat germ and sunflower oils to create a rich, natural treat for precious skin.
Burt’s Bees Baby Bee Nourishing Baby Oil offers a natural and healthy alternative to many baby oils that contain mineral oil and other cheap fillers. This nourishing, vitamin rich baby oil is blended from pure apricot oil, rich in vitamins A and E and wheat germ oil to naturally soften sensitive skin.
Directions of use:

product_description:
The Hydréa London Natural Luxury Massage Mitt is made of 60% linen and 40% pure cotton to provide skin exfoliation and muscle stimulus, along with deep skin cleansing. It gives an all over body radiance that will make you feel great.
Gently cleanse and exfoliate with this Hydréa London Natural Luxury Massage Mitt. Linen and cotton let your skin shine through and glow with pure radiance. It is ideal to use during an invigorating shower or refreshing bath.

name: Paris Men Expert Hydra Power Shower Gel 300ml
product_description: Freshen up with the Men Expert Hydra Power Shower Gel from L'Oréal Paris. The 3-in-1 wash is suitable for the face, hair and body and is designed to leave skin feeling clean, refreshed and thoroughly hydrated. Bursting with a woody fragrance, the gel cleans and cleanses without leaving skin dry or tight.

name: & Evelyn Citron, Honey and Coriander Hand Therapy (250g)
product_description: Give your hands the attention they need with this Crabtree & Evelyn Citron, Honey and Coriander Hand Therapy which nourishes skin so it’s noticeably smoother after each application. Infused with macadamia nut oil, shea butter, conditioning lemon, coriander and honey extracts, this intensive cream is formulated without lauryl sulfates, mineral oil, parabens or propylene glycol meaning it offers soft and gentle protection. - E.D

product_description:

Harnessing the powers of Organic Shea Butter and an antioxidant-rich blend of Coconut, Chia Seed and Sweet Almond Oils, the quick-absorbing cream locks in moisture and hydration as it defends against environmental stresses for long-lasting comfort.
Pregnancy and breastfeeding safe, the lightweight, non-greasy lotion utilises a Multi-Fruit Complex to improve skin tone and texture, whilst boosting radiance and leaving the body feeling smooth, supple and moisturised. Imparts the brand's signature fragrance that smells delightful to even the most sensitive noses.

product_description:
Preen and perfect brows with the Rubis Classic Magnifying Tweezers. Handmade in Switzerland from surgical stainless steel, the high-quality tweezers feature slanted tips and an 8-fold magnifier for precise touch-ups at home or on-the-go.
Crafted with superior calibrated tension and perfectly aligned tips that close evenly and firmly for advanced pulling power, you can grip even the smallest of hairs for a professional, airbrushed finish. Acid-proof, anti-magnetic and rustproof.

name: Musclease Active Body Oil (100ml)
product_description:
The dynamic ingredients found in Elemis Musclease Active Body Oil make it perfect for people who exercise regularly and for sufferers of backache, rheumatism or arthritis. It helps relieve muscle tension and promotes relaxation.
Excellent as part of a fitness programme, the Elemis Musclease Active Body Oil, an algae aroma-therapeutic body oil, contains a potent blend of stimulating maritime pine, sea buckthorn, sea fennel and rosemary in a skin-nourishing base to help ease muscle spasm and stressed joints.
Directions of use:

name: Konjac Sponge Company Tattoo Sponge
product_description:
The Konjac Sponge Company presents the Tattoo Sponge, a 100% naturally sustainable product specifically designed for cleaning your new tattoos without causing irritation or damage.
Delicately handmade purely from moisture-rich Konjac plant fibres and Volcanic Water, the innovative biodegradable sponge has a unique net-like structure that turns silky soft when wet and works to eliminates dirt, blood and plasma whilst soothing the area and helping to prevent scabs forming.
It won’t strip skin of natural oils, and aims to soothe and nourish the delicate new skin that forms without causing any further irritation. Konjac is a natural wonder – it’s been used in Southern Asia for over 1,500 years as a medicinal and beauty treatment, and it is alkaline based thus balances any acidity in skin and restores optimum pH levels.
Lasting for up to 3 months, the perfume-free sponge is super hygienic and easily sterilised between uses by popping into boiling water for a couple of minutes. Make sure your new masterpiece looks its best and keep skin in pristine condition with this all-natural cleansing alternative.

product_description:
Indulge your skin with the Cocoa Noir Sensuous Dark Shea Butter Cream from Dr Botanicals. Rich in nourishing botanical ingredients with a sweet and sumptuous dark cocoa hit to treat the skin, the butter cream is designed to visibly firm skin, whilst moisturising and smoothing.
Enriched with Shea Butter and Seabuckthorn Fruit oil, the vitamin rich, vegan friendly cream provides hydration and a soothing feeling for skin. Irritated skin is left feeling calm and visibly youthful and nourished.

product_description:
The Neroli Reviving Bath Oil from Dr Botanicals is an aromatic blend of essential oils brimming with minerals and vitamins, working to pamper skin and boost your mood as you bathe.
Created using only the finest natural extracts, the main ingredient of Neroli Oil boasts an uplifting fragrance that helps relieve anxiety and stress, whilst Sweet Almond Oil soothes and moisturises skin. With Jojoba Oil adding intense hydration, simply add a few drops to your bath and unwind.

product_description:
Experience a luxurious, spa-inspired exfoliating ritual with the Natural Spa Factory Gold Body Scrub; a shimmering formula that utilises quality ingredients to soften and smoothen the entire body.
Harnessing the powers of vitamin-rich Caviar Extract, Grapeseed Oil and golden Jojoba, the cane sugar scrub polishes the skin's surface, effectively buffing away dead, dull skin, whilst enveloping the body with a sensuous Amber fragrance.

product_description:
Catering for energetic, active lifestyles, the L-Glutamine Powder helps to strengthen muscles and aid post-workout recovery.
After physical and mental exercise, the supplement restores essential amino acid levels that are lost during your training sessions, whilst supporting tissue repair and the immune system.

product_description:
Gentlemen's Tonic Eau de Toilette Gift Set combines the 'Honos' eau de toilette with a gentle body wash and comforting, daily moisturiser. Expect to feel cleansed, pampered and handsomely fragranced.
Honos EDT (100ml):
An eau de toilette expertly developed from their core fragrance of babassu and bergamot. Meaning 'respectable' and 'dignified' in Roman, 'Honos' is a scent for men of virtue. Combining top notes of black pepper and bergamot, the fragrance gives way to a spicy heart of cinnamon, sage and nutmeg before succumbing to a handsome, musky base of amber and sandalwood.
Gentle Body Wash (50ml):
Suitable for all skin types, the softening body wash imparts a stress relieving fragrance whilst cleansing, energising and maintaining the skin's natural moisture levels. Fortified with a host of natural ingredients, including: menthol to cool and invigorate; ginger to stimulate circulation; and vegetable glycerine, honey and wheat extracts to soften and condition.
Daily Moisturiser (50ml):
A gentle, hydrating moisturiser enriched with emollient, anti-inflammatory and mineral-rich ingredients. Working to intensely nourish skin, the formula with natural essential oils melts quickly into skin, softening, soothing and protecting for a healthy-looking complexion. Its naturally astringent properties help close pores and heal nicks and burns.

name: Serenity Body Oil 100ml
product_description:
Achieve enviably smooth skin with the Serenity Body Oil from AromaWorks. The uplifting formula is designed to leave skin with a visibly supple finish.
Enriched with a pregnancy-friendly combination of Coconut oil and Evening Primrose, the oil seeks to nourish the skin and deliver intense hydration. The spa-like treatment will leave skin touchably soft.

product_description:
The Moroccan Rose Restoring Senses Bath Oil from Dr Botanicals is a delicate blend of essential oils brimming with minerals and vitamins, working to repair and pamper skin as you bathe.
Created using only the finest natural extracts, the main ingredient of Moroccan Rose Oil boasts high levels of Vitamin C to minimise the appearance of fine lines and imperfections, whilst providing a delicate and calming aroma. Vitamin-rich Argan Oil is bursting with essential fatty acids to help soften and protect skin, plus Jojoba Oil adds intense hydration. Simply add a few drops to your bath and lie back and relax.

product_description:

Vitamin-rich Apricot Kernel Oil supports cell regeneration and deflects free radical damage, as well as helping to boost fatty acids Omega-9 and Omega-6 for an improved skin structure, plus Sweet Almond Oil improves water retention. The aromatic additions of Ginger Lemongrass and Lavender soothe irritations and help relax the mind. Suitable for sensitive skin, it leaves skin feeling smooth and supple with a restored luminosity.

Soothing aloe vera reduces irritation thanks to its skin healing properties and anti-inflammatory chamomile calms skin for long-lasting comfort. Combining 11 pure essential oils, including Vetiver and Rose Pepper blended with Amaranth and Bacuri Oil, the stimulating fragrance encourages you to fall in love with the sense of liberation.
