product_description: The yes to PrimRose Miracle Oil harnesses the powers of naturally soothing Evening Primrose. The sweet-smelling elixir helps to moisturise, smooth and condition skin, brimming with antioxidants and essential nutrients to unveil a more even and calm complexion. The lightweight, non-greasy oil quickly absorbs and can be used anywhere on the body in need of a little relaxation and extra care.

name: Ferragamo Emozione Bath and Shower Gel (200ml)
product_description: Indulge in the luxurious scent of the Emozione Bath and Shower Gel from Salvatore Ferragamo. Gently cleansing skin from impurities without over-drying, the delicate body wash imparts an elegant, floral fragrance of peony, Bulgarian rose and heliotrope, blended with soft peach and iris. Skin is left perfectly pampered, refreshed and hydrated. E.N.

name: Natural Science Verdure Nourishing Hand Cream 75ml
product_description:
Pamper fatigued hands with the Verdure Nourishing Hand Cream from Malée Natural Science. Inspired by Africa’s wetlands, the formula envelops skin in a fresh forest green fragrance that guarantees to uplift and revitalise with warm and earthy notes of Citrus, Mint and Patchouli.
Ideal for dry and chapped hands, including sensitive skin, the luxurious hand cream thoroughly nourishes. The skin-loving formula is enriched with Sweet Almond Oil and Zinc, which work harmoniously to penetrate into the deep layers of skin, deliver intense moisture and offer long-lasting softness. Complete with Avocado Oil, hands are left protected, soothed and ultra-soft.

name: Natural Science Verdure Conditioning Body Cream 200ml
product_description:
Smooth and protect skin with the Verdure Conditioning Body Cream from Malée Natural Science. The rich body cream melts effortlessly and is designed to improve skin’s health and appearance with repeated use. Inspired by Africa’s wetlands, the moisturiser envelops the body in a fresh forest green fragrance that guarantees to uplift and revitalise with warm and earthy notes of Citrus, Mint and Patchouli.
Enriched with a blend of Avocado, Sweet Almond and Wheat Germ oil, the luxurious cream delivers essential moisture to skin and alleviates areas of dryness. The non-greasy formula is complete with Shea butter, which offers additional hydration and a soothing feel. Expect nourished skin that is comfortably hydrated and boasts a revitalising fragrance.

name: Men's Calming Body Wash 300ml
product_description:
Experience a relaxing cleanse with AromaWorks Calming Body Wash for Men, a hydrating blend of essential oils that work in synergy to help clean and refresh your skin.
Infused with 10 BioActive ingredients and a citrusy, spicy scent powered by Mandarin and Bay, the body wash gently cleanses away impurities whilst conditioning and invigorating the body. Skin feels fresh and smells decadent.

name: Brown For Men Moisture-Rich Shaving Soap (100g) with Bowl
product_description: Prepare your skin for a smooth, super close shave with the Molton Brown Men's Moisture-Rich Shaving Soap. Complete with a traditional silver tone bowl for stylish and convenient storage, this soap works up into a rich and creamy lather, with coconut oil which works to soften and hydrate the skin. A must have for every man. K.D.

name: Max Oral Spray - 30ml
product_description:
Top up your Vitamin D levels all year round with the D3 Max Oral Spray; a high strength formula that can be used by adults and children.
With a natural orange flavour, the convenient spray absorbs quickly into the bloodstream to deliver 4,000 IU per day, helping to support the immune system and promote healthy bones. Best taken under the tongue.

name: MICRO Pedi Gift Set with Manicure/Pedicure Kit
product_description:
Pamper your feet and hands from the comfort of your own home with Emjoi’s MICRO Pedi Gift Set with Manicure/Pedicure Kit; the ultimate pamper package containing all the manicure and pedicure essentials you need for comfortable and treated hands, feet and nails.
The MICRO Pedi rapid hard skin remover is joined by a selection of tools for your nails, a patterned compact make-up bag, and coconut extract soothing cream to finish. – E.W.
MICRO Pedi device
The award-winning MICRO Pedi device gently buffs away dry and hard skin leaving your feet soft and smooth in seconds. From walking around the house barefoot to squeezing into uncomfortable shoes, our feet experience discomfort daily. The MICRO Pedi safely removes hard skin and discomfort, making feet look and feel smooth and treated. Portable and convenient, this battery operated device is an ideal companion to take on your travels.
2xAA batteries required, not included
Cleaning brush included.
Micro-Mineral Roller (Anti-Bacterial*)
The MICRO Pedi device comes with an Anti-Bacterial* Micro-Mineral Extra Coarse Roller that has the NEW Flex+ technology. The NEW Flex+ technology allows the rollers to flex with the foot, which allows great control and super smooth results.
Manicure and Pedicure Kit
The MICRO Pedi Manicure and Pedicure Kit has been designed exclusively as an add-on to the MICRO Pedi device to smooth, shape and buff the nails on your hands and feet. The kit comes with five separate miniature attachments, designed to deliver salon quality results; a Cuticle Tool, a Fine Shaping Tool, a Shaping Tool, an Emery Tool and a Buffing Tool.
The kit also comes with a Compact Nail Clipper, a pair of Toe Separators, a Nail File and a Compact Make-Up Bag to store all parts.
Ultra-Finishing Cream
Finish off your manicure and pedicure with the coconut extract ultra-finishing cream. Massage the soothing cream into your skin to keep your feet and hands looking and feeling soft and smooth.

name: Mint Bodyscrub 200ml
product_description:
Experience spa-like exfoliation with BAKEL Mint Bodyscrub, a sea salt body peeling treatment that works to soften, nourish and energise skin.
Combining Mint essential oil with Soja oil and Eucaplytpus, the scrub gently buffs the skin's surface to regenerate and renew; its emollient properties help improve circulation, particularly beneficial for swelling of the lower limbs.  
Utilising only 100% natural ingredients, the body scrub will leave your skin feeling soft, supple and refined.

name: Botanicals Boticario di Havana Hand Cream 115g
product_description: Nourish dry hands with the richly textured Archipelago Botanicals Boticario di Havana Hand Cream, based on their bestselling Havana home fragrance blend that includes Mandarin, Bergamot Leaf, Neroli, Wild Basil, Crushed Thyme and Coriander. The natural ingredients contain antioxidants, Vitamin E and AHAs that offer deeply moisturising relief for rough, dry and irritated skin without leaving an oily or greasy residue.

name: Great Day Bath & Shower Drops
product_description:
Experience an uplifting soak with the Great Day Bath & Shower Drops from NEOM’s Scent To Make You Happy™ collection. Designed to deliver therapeutic benefits to the mind and body, the bath and shower drops leave skin smooth and comfortable, whilst boasting an energising scent.
The luxurious oil comprises a natural fragrance that combines pure essential oils. Enriched with a blend of Wild Mint and Mandarin, the formula envelops skin in a refreshing aroma that banishes feelings of stress, as well as lifts your mood. Complete with Vitamins A and E, alongside skin-loving Safflower oil, expect to feel hydrated and happy.

name: Foot Beauty Cream (75ml)
product_description:
Nourishing your feet without that greasy feeling, the Caudalie Foot Beauty Cream envelops you in an immediate feeling of well-being with its fresh and relaxing texture, leaving the skin wonderfully supple and silky.
Thanks to powerfully moisturising vinolevure grape-seed oil and fair trade shea butter the intensely nourishing Caudalie Foot Beauty Cream transforms dry skin with an ultra-healing effect to leave your feet beautifully healthy and relaxed. Its scent of sweet orange pulp, spearmint and bitter orange peel is balanced with a hint of gentle, comforting rose water. Your feet will never have been so well treated!
Directions of use:

name: Brown Puritas & Pettigree Dew Hand Wash Set
product_description: Pamper hard-working hands with the Molton Brown Puritas & Pettigree Dew Hand Wash Set. Each liquid hand wash combines nourishing and moisturising ingredients to cleanse your hands and nails, whilst offering a luxurious olfactory experience. Hands are left soft and sparkling clean.

name: Detox Himalayan Salt Body Scrub
product_description:
Gently exfoliate with the Detox Himalayan Salt Body Scrub from Westlab. Infused with a blend of essential oils, including juniper berry, grapefruit, refreshing spearmint and invigorating rosemary, the beneficial formula helps to reduce water retention and stimulate circulation.
Apricot, rice bran and antioxidant vitamin E work in unison to boost elasticity, protect and repair skin, and provide anti-inflammatory properties, whilst softening and regenerating the body. Delivers an uplifting fragrance and buffs away dead, dull skin cells to leave you feeling revitalised, detoxified and deeply cleansed. E.N.

name: Man-Age-Ment (60 Tablets)
product_description: Treat your skin by taking an Imedeen Man-Age-Ment (60 Tablets). The innovative formula helps to restore dryness and increased sensitivity which is caused by shaving. Featuring the exclusive Imedeen Marine Complex which is rich in proteins and polysaccharides, the tablets work to protect cells from stress and help maintain healthier looking skin.-SA

name: Sweet Orchid Body Cream 200ml
product_description:
Treat your skin to the Elemis Sweet Orchid Body Cream; a fast-absorbing, lightweight formula to intensely hydrate, nourish and soothe from top to toe.
Enriched with Japanese Stone Orchid, Mauve Butterfly Orchid and Japonica Extract, a fragrant flower traditionally used to calm inflammation and protect from oxidative damage, the cream replenishes moisture to leave skin feeling touchably soft, smooth and supple. Envelops the body with delicate notes of sweet Vanilla, refreshing Citrus and oriental Orchid.

name: Guerande Salt Exfoliating Body Balm (330ml)
product_description:
Gently exfoliate your body with the REN Guerande Salt Exfoliating Body Balm which will leave your skin moisturised, renewed and glowing. Rich in oils and salt extracts this balm will care for your skin whilst exfoliating.
Dead skin cells are removed by the REN Guerande Salt Exfoliating Body Balm’s Sea Salt, while your skin is moisturised by the a luxurious combination of Olive, Basil and Peppermint oils.
Ren products are also free from many artificial ingredients such as Petrochemicals, Sulfates, Parabens, Synthetic Fragrance, Synthetic Colours, T.E.A, D.E.A, Glycols Silicones and Pegs.
Directions for Use

Blending Evening Primrose, Coconut and Sweet Almond Oils with nourishing Shea Butter and Rose Extracts, the lightweight lotion conditions and moisturises the body, whilst leaving behind a long-lasting fragrance of Peach, Rose, Jasmine and warming Amber. Expect silky soft, comfortable skin with a delicate scent.

name: Frangipani Monoi Salt Glow 480g
product_description: The Elemis Sp@ Home Frangipani Monoi Salt Glow is a luxurious salt scrub that feels like it is melting onto the skin on contact, leaving it beautifully soft and nourished. Containing gorgeous ingredients, such as mineral rich salts and hibiscus, this scrub cleanses and exfoliates the skin whilst an infusion of exotic Tahitian monoi oil and frangipani flowers help to seal in moisture leaving you soft and delicately fragranced. - E.D

product_description: Molton Brown's Ylang-Ylang Body Wash refreshes and subtly fragrances from top to toe. The Phytomer Oléocrème Ultra Moisturing Hand Cream seeks to protect, soothe and soften with a powerful selection of marine-sourced actives and nourishing extracts.
The rich, silk-textured cream melts into skin, helping to repair damage and alleviate dry patches with algae-sourced Mekabu Oil, a potent hydrating active. Glasswort Oil helps improve circulation and strengthen the lipid barrier for enhanced water retention, while Pheohydrane restructures the hydroplipid film for long-lasting hydration. Hands feel smooth and supple, imbued with a refreshing citrus scent.

A naturally effective organic roll-on deodorant, Green People Organic Homme 9 Stay Cool Deodorant uses organic ingredients including peppermint and eucalyptus to keep you fresh and confident all day long.

All Green People Organic Homme products are suitable for vegans and vegetarians and are made without parabens, phthalates, artificial perfumes, petrochemicals and ethyl alcohol to bring you the purest, most effective products that nature can offer.

Naomi Campbell loves KORRES Mint Tea Shower Gel!

Mint Tea Showergel has active aloe juice, rich in vitamin C, vitamin E, zinc and antioxidant enzymes, which enhances the immune system of your skin. Furthermore, due to its ability to stimulate collagen and elastin synthesis, aloe vera gel slows skin ageing.
Lookfantastic tip:The Showergel is ideally combined with KORRES body milks in order to retain the fragrance much longer on your skin.

The Emergen-C Orange Pack contains sachets of the original formula Emergen-C fizzy drink. Specially formulated for adults, the drinkable supplement also contains real fruit extracts for added nutrients. Perfect for energy release and immunity support, Emergen-C complements an active lifestyle and a balanced diet. - L.M.

Free from parabens, alcohol and aluminum chlorohydrate, JASON Aloe Vera Deodorant Stick features an all-natural range of ingredients that keep you cool, fresh and confident all day.

product_description:
The Slendertone Abs Replacement Pads are designed to replace worn-out pads in your Slendertone Flex Abs or System Abs for both the male and female version. The three pads are easily replaced so you can quickly resume your toning.
These patented Slendertone Abs Replacement Pads last for up to approximately 20 sessions for great body toning. These adhesive electrode pads need to be replaced regularly to keep their effectiveness, as they will gradually loose their intensity.

product_description:
Breeze through the final stages of pregnancy with the Mama Mio Third Trimester Oil Bundle.  Combining a trio of bestselling Mama Mio products, the bundle is designed to treat and care for mum-to-be during the third and final trimester of pregnancy, when fatigue levels are high and skin can be stressed. Host to a moisturising body oil, soothing breast cream and cooling leg gel, each product within the bundle is suitable for use whilst pregnant and will leave skin thoroughly nourished.
The Tummy Rub Oil 120ml
Help protect your skin against pregnancy stretch marks with The Tummy Rub Oil. Enriched with Omega 3, 6 and 9 essential fatty acids, the oil is able to build the skin's strength and elasticity, helping to relieve itching tummies. Specially formulated with a blend of Organic Oils to lock in moisture and provide maximum protection to help reduce the appearance of stretch marks during and after pregnancy, the luxurious oil works to hydrate skin.
Pregnancy Boob Tube 100ml
The Pregnancy Boob Tube bust cream soothes skin to leave it with a healthy glow. Enriched with organic Omega oils, Boob Tube hydrates by providing antioxidants to strengthen and help reduce the appearance of wrinkles. Specially formulated with unique Green Cabbage Leaf extract, its new and improved formula makes it pregnancy and breastfeeding safe.
Lucky Legs Cooling Leg Gel 100ml
Help revive tired legs with Lucky Legs Cooling Leg Gel. The lightweight yet powerful gel leaves legs and feet feeling comfortable and soothed. Formulated with essential nourishing oils, menthols and spearmint to relax and refresh skin. The additional pressure and water retention when carrying a baby can start to weigh you down, so its compact size fits perfectly in your handbag for whenever you require a boost.

name: Tropez Self Tan Booster (200ml)

This Self Tan Booster from St Tropez is designed to keep your tan on the skin longer, giving you a lasting sun kissed glow. With the ability to prolong your natural or self tan for up to 3 days longer, this booster lotion is created with a lightweight formula that deeply moisturises the skin whilst working to keep your tan.

Described as a bra in a bottle, Love Boo Bosom Buddy is an award-winning bust toner that smoothes, tightens and tones the chest area to bring it back to its former youth.
Love Boo Bosom Buddy contains magic ingredient centella which helps to repair damaged skin, and ginkgo biloba to firm and improve elasticity. Rich argan oil reduces the appearance of stretch marks and nourishes the skin to leave it looking even and youthful. The result is a firm, toned and youthful bust area.

Featuring natural whiteners, JASON Nutrismile Toothpaste helps whiten your teeth without harsh chemicals. Orange, cinnamon and mint natural fresheners eliminate halitosis, leaving your teeth super-clean and your breath fresh.
Containing CoQ10 for gum support and periodontal protection, JASON Nutrismile Toothpaste features a high potency formula of ester-c to help defend against decay and tartar formation. Teeth are left whiter, fresher and healthy.

Doing what it says on the bottle, Fake Bake Flawless Darker (170ml) gives any skin type a flawless and dark, natural looking tan. The triple-action formula delivers an extra dark colour, whilst leaving a tropical black coconut scent on skin.
The Flawless Darker Self Tan includes a professional tanning mitt with its 'shows where it goes' liquid, allowing you to apply an even, streak-free tan in no time at all. - K.R

With natural ingredients such as Tahitan Monoi from Tiare blossoms to hydrate and protect, marshmallow plant extract to lock in moisture and oats to gently cleanse. Directions of use:

name: Frangipani Monoi Body Cream 200ml
product_description:
The Elemis Frangipani Monoi Sp@Home Body Cream boasts a rich and luxurious formula that will leave your skin feeling smooth, soft and supple. Formulated with an expert blend of natural oils, including monoi, coprah, macadamia and sesame, it provides deep hydration and nourishment to intensively condition and care for your skin. Leaving your skin delicately scented with an exotic fragrance of frangipani flowers, it's the perfect treat for dry skin. - L.M.
Directions for Use: Massage into clean, dry skin morning and evening, or as often as needed.

product_description:

Utilising luxurious, natural ingredients, this refreshing body lotion is fortified with an infusion of aloe vera, nettle, and horsetail and burdock to restore skin's moisture and deeply nourish, dry, wanting skin. Skin will be left feeling soft, hydrated and delicately scented. - K.N.

Get silky smooth skin with KORRES Milk Soap. Ideal for stressed skin, this naturally derived cleansing bar is gentle enough to be used on the face and body, and leaves skin looking and feeling soothed and hydrated.
Made with natural milk proteins, KORRES Milk Soap is an exceptionally mild creamy lather soap that leaves a velvety soft feel on the skin. Mineral oil and silicone free, this skin-loving soap is ideal for all skin types, especially those that are stressed and in need of some tender love and care.
Directions of use:

product_description: The Face and Body Delicious Lotion from NUXE provides sun protection from harmful rays and prevents signs of premature ageing. Enriched with nourishing and hydrating ingredients, the water-resistant sun lotion delivers an uplifting fragrance with notes of sweet orange, Tahitian Gardenia and vanilla. E.N.

product_description: Experience a peaceful night's sleep with the Magnesium Flakes from Westlab; the UK’s leading bath salt experts. Works to minimise fatigue, reduce anxiety and aching limbs, leaving you feeling calm, relaxed and prepared for a restful sleep. E.N.

This formula is water-resistant and only one application is needed to provide all day protection giving you more time to enjoy the sun. This duo pack contains 2 x 100ml bottles, providing enough sun protection for the whole family.
Specially formulated to be free from oils, emulsifiers and perfumes, Ultrasun family SPF 30 Super Sensitive is perfect for children’s delicate skins and helps prevent uncomfortable sun reactions such as prickly heat. It also provides extra protection for areas more vulnerable areas such as shins, noses and shoulders.

With micro particles of bamboo extract and ground walnut shells, skin is left hydrated, replenished and revitalised.
Sukin believe the most powerful and effective ingredients for your skin and hair care come from nature. Environmentally conscious, Sukin is a natural personal care company from Australia.
‘Skincare that doesn’t cost the earth™’ - Sukin’s commitment extends far beyond cosmetic. The 100% certified carbon neutral company aims to reduce the impact their business has on our increasingly fragile environment. -SA

product_description:
Treat yourself or a loved one to the Kukui Oil Essentials Collection from Connock London. Housed in a zipped wash bag, the kit combines five luxurious products to restore soft, smooth and comfortable skin on the hands and body.
Kukui Oil Soap (100g)
Harnessing the powers of Kukui Oil and Shea Butter, the vegetable-based, creamy soap creates a rich lather to gently eliminate impurities without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness. Skin is soft, supple and delicately fragranced.

The hands and body are left feeling smooth, supple and refined.

Rejuvenate dry skin on the hands and body with the lightweight, fast-absorbing lotion. Fortified with a moisturising blend of Shea Butter, Kukui Oil and antioxidant Vitamin E, the hydrating formula softens and conditions, whilst defending against environmental aggressors. Nourishing Hand Cream (50ml)
A deeply moisturising hand cream that works to combat dry, rough skin whilst fighting visible signs of ageing. Infused with Kukui Oil, rich in essential fatty acids, the fast-absorbing, non-greasy formula delivers intense hydration, and its dose of antioxidant Vitamin E shields from environmental factors that can lead to fine lines, cracking and chapping.
Wonder Balm (10ml)
Infused with a unique blend of Kukui Oil, Monoi Cocoa Butter and Beeswax, the luxurious formula works to soothe and moisturise areas of dry skin. Ideal for lips, cuticles, elbows, knees and heels, the non-greasy balm is designed to calm irritated skin for long-lasting comfort.

Suitable for all skin types on the face and body.

‘Skincare that doesn’t cost the earth™’ - Sukin’s commitment extends far beyond cosmetic. The 100% certified carbon neutral company aims to reduce the impact their business has on our increasingly fragile environment. -SA
