name: Skincare Liquid Yoga Bath Soak Supersize 450ml (Worth £58.50)
product_description:
Relax your body and ease your mind with the Mio Skincare Liquid Yoga Bath Soak, a lavish milky-formula brimming with essential oils, mineral salts and therapeutic herbs designed to soothe tired muscles – it’s practically a massage in a bottle! 
Fortified with an aromatic V-Tonic™ blend of Spearmint, Cypress, Lavender and Chamomile Oils, the sensual treatment features Magenisum-rich Epsom Salts and extract of Arnica, which both work to de-stress tight, aching muscles.
Naturally-soothing Andiroba Oil penetrates deep into skin tissue, whilst Murumuru Butter is bursting with nutritious omegas to moisturise and hydrate. Free from harsh chemicals and irritants, the indulgent bath soak is the perfect treat after a long day.

name: Pedi Extreme Coarse Rollers - Purple
product_description:
Smooth unruly calluses and buff away hard skin with the MICRO Pedi Extreme Coarse Rollers. Revolutionary in the pedicure world, these strong, coarse rollers are specially designed to combat even the roughest skin, gliding over isolated areas to rid the surface of stubborn, hard or cracked patches without risk of abrasion.
Made up of micro fine materials that won’t irritate, the unique rollers spin 30 times a second with a 360° motion to gently but effectively buff away unwanted hard, dry skin. Expect salon smooth results. - K.N.

name: Santorini Vine Shower Gel (40ml)
product_description: This moisturising shower gel evokes the rugged landscape of Santorini with its fresh and fruity smell of Greek wine grapes. Influenced by sea air and volcanic soil this KORRES Santoini Vine Showergel is a moisturising and protecting treat for your skin. Containing wheat it offers you Vitamins B2, B3 and B5 for nutrition, healthy skin and regeneration. LB

name: Sensitive Body Lotion (500ml)
product_description:
Designed to calm, soothe and balance sensitive skin, the Sensitive Soothing Body Lotion by Sukin is the perfect remedy for tired, irritated skin. Gentle and delicate, this body moisturiser is formulated with hydrating cocoa and shea butters, and blended with soothing aloe vera, chamomile and refreshing cucumber to lovingly calm skin. Your skin will be left nourished, balanced and totally soothed. - R.H
Directions For Use: For best results, apply just after showering/bathing. Massage gently into skin and allow the lotion to do it's magic.

name: Supersalt Epsom Muscle Relief
product_description: Relieve tired, aching limbs with the Supersalt Epsom Muscle Relief from Westlab. Blending the purest of mineral-rich salts with a naturally therapeutic blend of Arnica, Spearmint and Eucalyptus, the bath salts soothe strained muscles and aid post-workout recovery, whilst reviving the mind and body to leave you feeling calm, comfortable and deeply restored.

name: Surge Super Fresh Awakening Body Wash (250ml)
product_description:
Experience the most energising cleanse with Organic Surge Super Fresh Awakening Body Wash, an invigorating cleanser that works to lift away impurities and promote all day freshness.
Specially formulated with a unique combination of naturally derived ingredients that target odour causing bacteria, the body wash gently sloughs away daily grime whilst reviving the senses with its uplifting essential oil fragrance of spicy May Chang and Bergamot. Skin feels super-fresh, stimulated and energised.

name: Paris Sublime Bronze Self Tanning Smooth Milk Fluid (150ml)
product_description:
Say hello to sun-kissed skin with L'Oreal Paris Dermo Exp Sublime Bronze Milk. In just two hours, it develops into a natural looking tan, leaving you with glowing and radiant skin. As well as producing a long-lasting, bronzed look, it also has SPF 8 to protect your skin from the sun's rays.
Ideal for use on both the face and body, you'll be able to sport sun-kissed skin no matter what the season.

name: Skincare Future Proof Active Body Butter (240g)
product_description:
Drench skin in a veil of nourishment with the Mio Skincare Future Proof Firming Active Body Butter; an ultra-hydrating body cream that tackles and eliminates areas of dry skin, whilst protecting the body from free radicals.
Effortlessly gliding over the body, the thick, heavy-duty treatment is the perfect remedy for skin suffering from intense dehydration. The rich formula is infused with a skin-loving blend of Organic Sweet Almond Oil, Olive Fruit Oil and Argan Kernel Oil, which delivers omega-rich moisture that is suitable for even sensitive skin types. Hydration is boosted further with a generous dose of Hyaluronic Acid, a potent humectant that eradicates dry skin, whilst offering anti-ageing benefits.
Treating skin to a healthy-looking, 24-hour glow, the fragrant body butter ensures skin is unbeatably strong, supple and comfortable. With Future Proof Firming Active Body Butter, you can rest assured that skin is well cared for.

name: Calming Lavender Stick Deodorant (75g)
product_description:
Stay calm and fresh with JASON Lavender Deodorant Stick. Free from aluminum chlorohydrate this soothing deodorant will keep you protected throughout the day.
Soothing, safe and providing long-lasting protection, JASON Lavender Deodorant Stick is enriched with lavender oil, vitamin E, shea butter and organic corn starch to provide you with gentle and comforting freshness.
Directions of use:

name: London - Japanese Style Sisal Back Strap
product_description:
The Hydréa London Japanese Style Sisal Back Strap is a 40cm long strap, ideal for scrubbing and exfoliating those hard-to-reach places like your back. It comes complete with cotton rope handles for easy usage and hanging after use. 
Scrub up a treat with this range of sisal exfoliators, leaving your skin utterly blooming. Made from the crushed leaves of the agava cactus, this Hydréa London Japanese Style Sisal Back Strap ideal for perking up lacklustre skin.

name: Bake Flawless Coconut Face and Body Tanning Serum (148ml)
product_description:
Achieve glowing perfection with the Fake Bake Flawless Coconut Face and Body Tanning Serum; a lightweight elixir that melts effortlessly onto skin for a sun-kissed, beautifully bronzed finish.
Combining the luxurious Fake Bake formula with Silk Amino Acids and superfood Coconut Oil, the anti-ageing self tan works to firm, condition and improve skin tone, whilst preventing dehydration and softening the appearance of wrinkles.
Harnessing the powers of Hyaluronic Acid and naturally-derived tanning agents (DHA, Erythrulose and DMI), the non-greasy serum delivers superior hydration and long-lasting, streak-free colour that fades slowly and evenly.

name: Bright Teeth Whitening Kit
product_description:
Smile with confidence; the Mr Bright Teeth Whitening Kit is a simple, safe and effective teeth whitening treatment using a minty-fresh, plant-based formula without damaging peroxide.   
Utilising advanced LED technology, the compact system provides you with an easy-to-use mouth guard and the strongest peroxide-free, take-home whitening gel available.
See instant results in as little as 30 minutes, with a reduction in tooth stains and discolouration and up to 7 shades whiter in two weeks with continued use. Clinically approved and certified, achieve gleaming pearly whites from the comfort of your own home.
4 x Whitening Gels
1 x Led Light
1 x Mouth Guard ( Upper + Lower )
1 x Step By Step Instruction Manual
1 x Zip Case

name: Brown Gingerlily Hand Wash 300ml
product_description: Gently cleanse hands with the luxurious Gingerlily Hand Wash from Molton Brown. Infused with a blend of Polynesian tamanu nut oil and white lily extract, the refreshing formula eliminates impurities without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness, leaving hands soft, supple and rejuvenated. Delicately fragrances hands with a captivating aroma of ginger and cardamom, inspired by the fragrant breezes of a Tahitian paradise. Complete with a pump bottle for mess-free application.

name: Hand & Nail Cream (75ml)
product_description:
Moisture, softness and youth are combined in this anti-oxidant Caudalie Hand and Nail Cream. The fresh orange pulp protects your skin and leaves it silky smooth, with a voluptuous fragrance softened by almond powder and a drop of rosewater.
Containing anti-oxidant grape seed polyphenols, nourishing grape seed oil, shea butter and avocado extracts the non greasy Caudalie Hand and Nail Cream provides relief to dry, chapped hands whilst leaving your nails wonderfully invigorated and strengthened!
Directions of use:

name: Laszlo White Marble Cleansing Bar (100g)
product_description:
Clarify and brighten your complexion with the Erno Laszlo White Marble Cleansing Bar. Creamy and lavish, the innovative soap bar does more than just clean and utilises breakthrough whitening technology to transform your pigmentation.
The exclusive nano-encapsulated LumiWhite Complex blocks excess melanin to help fight discolouration and reveal a natural, long lasting radiance, plus active enzymes help to even out tone and minimise the appearance of sun spots. 
Its Fruit Acid Complex, derived from citrus and natural sugars, breaks down dirt and exfoliates deep within pores to eliminate impurities and excess oil, whilst extract of Willow Bark acts as an anti-inflammatory ingredient to soothe and nourish. Packed with Vitamin C and Shea Butter, skin is left moisturised and protected from free radicals with a healthy-looking glow.

name: X Radiance Body Balm 200ml
product_description:
Achieve glowing perfection with the Sienna X Radiance Body Balm; a lightweight, deeply moisturising formula to help enhance and prolong your tan.
Harnessing the powers of Shea Butter, Sweet Almond Oil and antioxidant Vitamin E, the fast-absorbing, non-greasy balm softens and nourishes skin, whilst unique gold flecks create a luminous veil over the body for a subtle sheen. Expect smooth, supple skin with a healthy glow.

name: Dead Sea Salt 1kg
product_description:
Treat itchy or dry skin to the Dead Sea Salt from Westlab; the UK’s leading bath salt experts. Suitable for use on skin that is prone to eczema, acne and psoriasis, its high grade magnesium content restores and rebalances skin, whilst calcium and potassium support the natural repair process and replenish minerals.
Recognised for its low pollution levels and multiple benefits to health and well-being, the Dead Sea contains bromides to relax muscles and vitamin-rich green algae Dunaliella for antioxidant protection and cell renewal. Helping to supplement skin with optimum levels of moisture and hydration, you can expect soft, smooth skin from top to toe.

name: Brown Coastal Cypress & Sea Fennel Deodorant Spray 150ml
product_description:
Stay fresh and comfortable with Molton Brown Coastal Cypress & Sea Fennel Deodorant Spray, a refreshing spray deodorant that protects against perspiration and unwanted odours.
Helping to keep your underarms fresh, dry and odour-free, the anti-perspirant combines fresh Marine notes with earthy Cedarwood and Salted Cypress for invigorating protection. Skin feels comfortable, dry and revitalised.

name: Arden Eight Hour Cream Intensive Moisturising Body Treatment (200ml)
product_description:
The perfect companion to the original classic, Elizabeth Arden Eight Hour Cream Intensive Moisturising Body Treatment is a fast-absorbing moisturiser that will leave your skin feeling soft, smooth and hydrated for eight hours.
This Eight Hour hydrator saturates deeply and moisturises intensely to reverse skin flaking. You will adore how this Elizabeth Arden Eight Hour Cream Intensive Moisturising Body Treatment cream simply melts into your skin to relieve signs of dryness and sensitivity without leaving a heavy film on your skin.
Directions of use:

name: Works Super Sleep Dual Pillow Spray 40ml
product_description:
Relax and unwind with this works' Super Sleep Dual Pillow Spray. Combining two aromatherapeutic solutions for a good night's sleep, the pillow sprays inspire feelings of calm and prepare you for a deep and restful slumber.
sleep plus pillow spray (20ml):
A fast acting, natural remedy to restore a healthy sleep pattern. Formulated with natural oils, the fragrant formula releases relaxing vibes so you inhale calm and exhale your worries. Contains naturally encapsulated Lavender to gradually release its aromatherapeutic benefits as you sleep.
deep sleep pillow spray (20ml):
A best-selling natural sleep aid that inspires feelings of calm. Designed to inspire a rejuvenating and deep sleep, the pillow spray is formulated with 100% pure essential oils of Lavender, Vetivert and Wild Chamomile; it releases relaxing vibes so you inhale calm and exhale any nerves and worries. Spray onto your pillow before bedtime; feel your troubles melt away and enjoy a peaceful slumber. Suitable to use during pregnancy.

name: Himalayan Salt 1kg
product_description:
Detoxify your body with the Himalayan Salt from Westlab; the UK’s leading bath salt experts. Originating from the Himalayan Mountains millions of years ago, its pure formula contains over eighty minerals, including magnesium to soothe and repair damaged skin and regenerating calcium to promote cell renewal.
Helping to improve absorption of nutrients, increase circulation and stimulate the body's digestive and nervous systems, the salt removes toxins to leave the body feeling cleansed, radiant and healthy. Potassium, an ingredient that works to reduce stress and anxiety also minimises the risk of high blood pressure. E.N.

name: ISSA™ mini - Wild Strawberry
product_description:
Helping children to find brushing teeth a fun activity, FOREO ISSA™ mini is a silicone brush to protect gums and leave your child's mouth thoroughly clean. Featuring parental controls to ensure twice daily brushing, the sad face will appear if teeth have not been brushed for over 12 hours, whilst the happy face will light up when teeth have been brushed for 2 minutes. The brush has 2 speeds and will last up to 200 uses before losing its charge.
Features soft and gentle silicone bristles to create just the right amount of friction and 3D flexibility that helps the brush to reach awkward areas of the mouth. The brush has a pulsing action that will inform you when it's time to polish another quadrant of the mouth for thorough cleaning. -SA
Please Note: A USB charger is included, and not a mains adapter. Also, the brush head only needs to be replaced once a year.

name: Body Oil - Rose (100ml)
product_description:
Hydrate and balance your body with the wonderfully relaxing Jurlique Rose Body Oil. This light herbal, non greasy, massage oil is suitable for even the most sensitive skin, as it absorbs quickly to calm and comfort.
Jurlique values life, energy and beauty, all of which can be found in the Rose Body Oil. It’ll leave your mind, body and soul wonderfully balanced as it leaves you and your skin feeling beautifully relieved from the stresses of the day. Use for the ultimate in relaxation!
Directions of use:

name: MICRO Pedi Extra Coarse Flex+ Rollers – Pink
product_description:
The MICRO Pedi Replacement Rollers remove hard and rough skin on the soles, toes and heels of the feet. Featuring micro-mineral rollers that spin 360°, at 30 times per second, smoothing and buffing away dry skin effortlessly to reveal smooth and soft feet heel to toe.
The Extra Coarse Flex+ Micro-Mineral Replacement Rollers are designed for use with MICRO Pedi, MICRO Pedi Power, MICRO Pedi Professional and MICRO Pedi NANO devices. The new Flex+ technology allows the rollers to flex with the foot which gives you an all over smooth look and feel.

name: Yoghurt Shower Gel 250ml
product_description:
Drench skin in hydration with the KORRES Yoghurt Shower Gel; a creamy body wash that cleanses the body, whilst offering a long-lasting moisturising effect. Effortlessly lathering over skin, the fragrant soap gently and effectively cleanses away daily dirt, oil and impurities.
Boasting a Greek Yoghurt based formula, the refreshing shower gel is enriched with multiple Wheat Proteins, which form a protective film over skin to help the body to maintain healthy hydration levels. Alongside offering a veil of rich moisture, the foaming shower gel is enriched with Active Aloe® to combat loss of elasticity and stimulate collagen synthesis. This helps to reduce visible signs of ageing.
Expect the body to feel refreshed, rejuvenated and comfortably hydrated.

name: Calming Lavender Body Wash (900ml)
product_description:
Luxuriously foamy and featuring certified organic lavender, JASON Lavender Satin Shower Body Wash deeply moisturises and softens your skin. Its sensual fragrance will revitalise your senses, making your bathing experience so much more pleasurable.
Relaxing chamomile and rich oils of avocado, apricot and vitamin E work in tandem with emollients and humectants to provide your skin with deep hydration. JASON Lavender Satin Shower Body Wash offers your skin the benefits of all-natural ingredients.
Directions of use:

name: Arden White Tea Body Cream 400ml
product_description: Envelop skin with the Elizabeth Arden White Tea Body Cream for a Zen-like experience.  Decisively uncomplicated and simple, the sumptuous formula melts into skin, working to soften and hydrate while layering a crisp floral fragrance. Opening with notes of zesty Mandarin and breathtaking Sea Breeze, the rich body cream unfolds into a delicate heart of White Tea and Turkish Rose for a comfortingly pure scent that lingers.

name: Adenogen Hair Energizing Formula (150ml)
product_description: Inspire fuller, thicker hair with the Adenogen Hair Energising Formula from Shiseido. Energising and intensive, the fragrance free lotion promises to treat your roots, revitalise your scalp and thicken your locks. Suitable for men and women, the refreshing treatment is fortified with Shiseido-exclusive 'Andeosine', an ingredient which stimulates the scalp and restores vitality into hair, improving microcirculation and oxygen delivery. Expect revitalised hair that looks thicker, fuller and healthier. - K.N.

name: Relaxing Night In Set (Worth £70.50)
product_description:
Put your feet up and de-stress with the Mio Skincare Relaxing Night In Set. The set is host to a trio of carefully selected products, each designed to offer optimum relaxation. Combining a comforting bath soak, fragrant candle and calming spray, the set is the perfect accompaniment for a relaxing night in.
Liquid Yoga Bath Soak (200ml)
Experience the benefits of the Liquid Yoga Bath Soak, a moisturizing bath formula with Epsom salts to comfort tired and stressed bodies. Enriched with a blend of essential oils, mineral salts and herbs, the bath soak helps calm racing minds whilst its deeply nourishing properties are harnessed from omega-rich murumuru butter. On par with a relaxing massage, the bath soak can help de-stress tight, fatigued muscles and dry, wanting skin feels soothed.
Liquid Yoga Candle
Ease your mind and relax your body with the Liquid Yoga Candle, providing the warm glow of candlelight, popular for easing tensions and aiding sleep. Enriched with a lavender-mint fragrance, the candle is able to lift the mind, body and soul, delivering you to a place of pure relaxation. Breathe and achieve pure zen.
Liquid Yoga Space Spray (150ml)
Experience the emotional benefits of the Liquid Yoga Space Spray, a spirit lifting spritz infused with a cocktail of essential oils to calm, de-stress and rebalance the mind. Contains a blend of Lavender, Chamomile and Lavandin. Ultimately uplifting, spray onto your pillow, pulse points or into the air to experience the beautiful fragrance and beautiful consequences. Immediately, positivity is restored and a peaceful Zen is achieved.

name: Muscle Soother Herbal Juniper Bath Oil (100ml)
product_description:
Soothe a tired, weary body with Kneipp Muscle Soother Herbal Juniper Bath Oil, a tension-easing bath formula that promotes feelings of relaxation after a long, laborious day.
Infused with concentrated essential juniper and wintergreen oils harnessed from pure and natural sources, the bath soak helps ease and soothe tired, aching muscles whilst nourishing the skin. When blended into water, the formula delivers naturally soothing and relaxing properties to help relieve strained muscles whilst diminishing feelings of tension and stress.

name: Carnitine
product_description:
L Carnitine is an amino acid, naturally produced in the liver and kidneys. Stored in skeletal muscle, the heart and brain, the main dietary sources of L carnitine are red meat and dairy products.
L Carnitine is a high quality supplement providing 1000mg of L Carnitine per serving.
L Carnitine is an ideal supplement for those looking to increase their L Carnitine intake. To be taken as part of a varied and balanced diet and a healthy lifestyle.

name: Me Daily 4 Me - The Hectic Years
product_description:
Inner Me Daily 4 Me - The Hectic Years is a supplement pack targeted at those in their thirties and forties, providing enough daily nutrients to give you added energy and maintain a healthy lifestyle.
During your 'hectic years' you are no doubt rushed off your feet. These supplement strips contain four capsules to help you handle your busy lifestyle by giving you energy, and helping to keep your health in check so no unpleasant health surprises slow you down.
The 'inner you' has needs that change throughout various stages in life. With this in mind, Inner Me have created the Daily 4 Me supplement packs that are tailored to suit three defining age ranges. Whether you're a partying teen, a 30 something mum, or a middle aged housewife, there is a kit for you. - K.R
Directions for use: Take one strip daily with or after meals.

name: Fico D' India Gift Box
product_description:
A luxurious collection, presented in a beautifully decorated oval box and enriched with the scent of Fico D'India, a Scillian cactus with healing power. A dry, almost velvety scent, which mirrors the plant: dusky pale green with explosions of remarkable Mediterranean flowers. A beautiful lasting fragrance reminiscent of the colours and scents of Sicily, Ortigia use only natural and traditional based ingredients without additives 
 This Ortigia Fico D'India Fig & Cedar Gift Box contains:
  Fico D'India Fig & Cedar Shower Gel 200ml
 Infused with scent of Fico D'India, this wonderful shower gel is naturally scented and made from an olive oil and glycerine base. 100% free from SLS and parabens.
  Fico D'India Fig & Cedar Votive Candle
 Presented in an Italian glass casing, this highly aromatic Fico d'India candle is a blend of spicy exotic woods, vetiver, patchouli and cedar over an amber base of labdanium, oak musk, galbanum and resins. This candle will bring the ultimate scent to any home.
  Fico D'India Fig & Cedar Hand Cream 70ml
 An intensely rich moisturiser with lanolin and Olive oil and infused with the scent of fig and cedar.
  Fico D'India Fig & Cedar Single Soap 40g
 Classically luxurious triple milled olive oil soap, with almond oil and milk proteins, and with natural colours

name: Men's 24 Hour Roll On Deodorant 50ml
product_description: Keep fresh naturally with the Men’s 24 Hour Roll On Deodorant from holistic brand Weleda. Free from aluminium salts and synthetic preservatives that can cause irritation and block pores, the all-natural formula helps promote a refreshing sensation with woody herbal notes of Rosemary, Vetiver and Litsea Cubeba helping neutralise odours and impart a refined masculine scent. In a convenient roll-on form for ease-of-use and on-the-go.

name: of California Vitamin Cleansing Bar - Flora Cassis 198g
product_description:
Supplement skin’s natural moisture and replenishment with the Baxter of California Vitamin Cleansing Bar. Featuring a colour band down the middle, and infused with hydrating Glycerin, Seaweed and Vitamins A and E, the tactful design of this salve helps tend to skin diligently and carefully, providing a relieving, refreshing experience that leaves pores feeling restored, cleansed and gently nourished.
Enriched with fragrance, the Flora Cassis scent creates a delicate, feminine aroma, allowing for a full regenerative experience. C.R

name: The Genuine Lapland Cream Gift Set
product_description:
The Genuine Lapland Cream Gift Set from Polaar promises to hydrate, repair and protect skin from external aggressions all year round. Housed in festive packaging, you can expect a replenished, comforted complexion, super soft hands and a perfectly pampered pout. E.N.
The Genuine Lapland Face Cream (50ml)
A magical beauty balm that melts effortlessly onto skin to hydrate, pamper and condition even the most sensitive areas. Fortified with a powerful antioxidant blend of arctic raspberries, blackberries and lingon berries to protect against damaged caused by cold temperature, sun exposure and salt. Its non-greasy formula is infused with nourishing Arctic rhodiola, a flower that grows in the extreme climatic conditions of Siberia, to effectively repair dryness, deeply moisturise and restore a comfortable complexion.
The Genuine Lapland Hand Cream (75ml)
Nourish and soften dry, hard-working hands with the luxurious hand cream. Delivering a subtle fragrance, its lightweight, creamy texture is immediately absorbed without leaving hands greasy. Lingon berries, blackberries and arctic raspberries work in synergy to moisturise and protect hands, whilst shea butter and beeswax ensure they are left feeling silky smooth.
The Genuine Lapland Lip Balm (15g)
An intensely hydrating lip balm infused with a vitamin-rich blend of arctic raspberries, blackberries and lingon berries for powerful antioxidant protection against wind, cold temperatures and pollution. Fast-absorbing and non-greasy, the white beauty balm is packed with nourishing shea butter, beeswax and coconut oil to repair dryness and deeply moisturise lips, leaving you with restored, comforted and super soft skin.

name: 10 X Magnification Mirror with Light
product_description:
To achieve beauty looks with precision, try the Rio 10X Magnification Mirror with Light, ideal for daily home use. With additional LED light settings, motorised by a single, discreet power button, this user-friendly mirror aids the make-up process by allowing control, accuracy and increased visibility.
The removable suction pads made this a fully flexible product, with options of using the mirror hand-held, or fitting the mirror to a bathroom cabinet. Double-sided, with a true image mirror to one side, and a magnifying mirror on the reverse, this handy accessory offers the a suitable, practical aid to a beauty routine. C.R

name: Hauschka Freshness and Energy Kit (6 x 10ml)
product_description:
Treat your skin to the Freshness and Energy Kit from Dr. Hauschka, a six-piece collection of the brand's uplifting, stimulating products. Housed in a gift box, the set promises to boost the mind and body to leave you feeling enlivened. E.N.
Lemon Lemongrass Vitalising Body Wash (10ml)
A gentle cleansing formula that delivers an invigorating start to the day. Infused with quince seed extract and vegetable surfactants to effortlessly melt away dirt and impurities, the lightweight, creamy foam envelops skin with a refreshing fragrance of lemon and ginger root to rejuvenate the body and senses. A blend of high quality sunflower and avocado oils prevent over-drying so you can experience clean, moisturised skin.
Lemon Lemongrass Vitalising Bath Essence (10ml)
Invigorate the mind and body with the revitalising bath essence. When combined with warm, running water, the uplifting bath soak delivers a refreshing fragrance of exotic lemongrass and sun-ripened lemons that envelops the body to create a cloud of energy. Infused with sunflower oil to maintain moisture and stimulate skin, leaving you feeling rejuvenated and perfectly pampered.
Lemon Lemongrass Vitalising Body Oil (10ml)
Awaken the skin and senses with the body oil. Enriched with lemongrass, mistletoe and horsetail to refresh and rejuvenate the body, whilst firming and toning skin to leave it feeling smooth and touchably soft. Its unique formula is carefully blended with sunflower oil using innovative rhythmic processing methods, heating the mixture to body temperature 37°C to transfer skin nurturing properties into the oil.
Lemon Lemongrass Vitalising Body Milk (10ml)
A refreshing milk to awaken and rejuvenate the body. Infused with extracts of uplifting lemon and lemongrass, its fast-absorbing formula tones and firms, whilst a blend of jojoba, sunflower and olive oils replenish moisture and deeply nourish from top to toe. Quince seed extract soothes and delivers long-lasting hydration to leave skin touchably soft, smooth and revitalised. The ideal complement to an active, healthy lifestyle.
Quince Hydrating Body Milk (10ml)
Utilising quince seed, blackthorn and sage extracts, the luxurious body milk absorbs quickly into skin to deliver long-lasting hydration. Jojoba and olive oils maintain a healthy moisture balance and increase suppleness, whilst leaving skin silky soft to the touch.
Hydrating Hand Cream (10ml)
Deeply nourish dry, rough and hard-working hands with the hydrating hand cream. Formulated with regenerative Bryophyllum plant, the fast-absorbing cream supports the skin's natural renewal process to leave you with moisturised, silky smooth skin. Soothing and rejuvenating, you can experience hands that are protected from cold, harsh and dry conditions.

name: Sweet Dreams Herbal Valerian and Hops Bath Oil (100ml)
product_description:
Relax and unwind with Kneipp Sweet Dreams Herbal Valerian and Hops Bath Oil, a soothing bath formula that helps promote a good night's sleep.
Infused with concentrated essential valerian oil, lavender oil and hops essences harnessed from pure and natural sources, the bath soak helps to ease away daily stress and tension whilst nourishing the skin. When blended into water, the formula delivers naturally soothing and relaxing properties to inspire the most peaceful, deep sleep. Perfect for an evening soak after a long day.

name: Professional Teeth Whitening System
product_description:
Get gleaming white teeth from the comfort of your own home with the Professional Teeth Whitening System from beauty specialists Rio.
Using professional dentist whitening technology, the high performance unit utilises blue light and specially formulated gel designed to help reverse discolouration caused by smoking, coffee and ageing. 
Adjustable power levels and treatment modes including a quick top-up option allow you to customise the settings to suit your own individual needs.
Professional Teeth Whitening unit
5 x Teeth whitening gel
3 x Moulded mouthpieces
Safety key

name: Schumann Gentle Skin Scrub 105ml
product_description:
Buff your complexion to perfection with the Gentle Skin Scrub from Wilma Schumann, a skin-refining formula that delivers a deep pore-cleansing action to regulate oil production and combat breakouts.
Utilizing luxurious, natural ingredients, the exfoliator is enriched with ultra-fine beads to delicately polish the skin, eliminating dead skin cells and impurities for a smooth, fresh complexion. Its blend of Shea Butter and Avocado Oil moisturize and protect, revealing a soft, radiant and invigorated appearance.

name: Protox Serum 20ml
product_description:
Rediscover your skin's youthful capacity with freezeframe's Protox Serum, an anti-ageing formula that can be used alone to visibly reduce the appearance of wrinkles, or in conjunction with your Botox® injections to enhance their skin-smoothing results.
The non-invasive, balm-like formula combines two mimetic peptides that work in synergy to produce a botox-like visual effect on skin; when paired together, the peptides increase wrinkle relaxing activity by up to 300%* to inspire younger, smoother-looking skin in as little as 2 to 4 weeks*.
Performing a skin-smoothing effect, the serum can be used alone to reduce the appearance of wrinkles, or alongside Botox injections to leave you looking younger for longer.

name: Botanicals Japanese Orange Revive & Invigorate Shea Butter Cream 100ml
product_description:
Indulge your skin with the Japanese Orange Revive & Invigorate Shea Butter Cream from Dr Botanicals. Formulated with a luxurious blend of hydrating and nourishing extracts, the body butter seeks to leave skin firmer looking and visibly restored.
Infused with a combination of Shea Butter and Seabuckthorn Fruit Oil, the vegan friendly formula is rich in Vitamins. The active ingredients work harmoniously to moisturise and offer hydration, leaving your skin soft to the touch, visibly healthier and more youthful looking.

name: Home Spa Shower Gel - Rebalancing 300ml
product_description:
The Rebalancing Home Spa Shower Gel from PUPA seeks to elevate your showering experience into an indulgent pampering session, with exotic oils effectively relaxing the senses while botanic extracts moisturise and cleanse skin.
Enveloping skin in a harmonic blend of aromatherapy oils, fresh notes of Orange, Lemon and Lime balance and revitalise. Precious extract of Tiarè Flower and Polynesian Red Salt work in tandem to sweep away dirt and impurities, leaving skin feeling purified, hydrated and refreshed.

name: Health Propolis Suckles with Peppermint BIO 30 100g
product_description: Manuka Health Propolis Suckles with Peppermint BIO 30™ are delicious lozenges that provide a soothing sensation to the throat. The Suckles are concentrated with Propolis, an ingredient gathered by bees in New Zealand and used to protect their hives against infection. In the lozenges, Propolis works as ‘nature’s antibiotic’ due to the antioxidant and antiseptic properties found in high levels of bioflavonoids. Ideal for maintaining a healthy immune system.

name: Home Spa Shower Gel - Draining 300ml
product_description:
The Draining Home Spa Shower Gel from PUPA seeks to transform your bathing experience into an indulgent pampering session, with exotic oils effectively calming the mind and botanic extracts sculpting the look of body contours.
Invigorating aromatic notes of Orange, Bergamot and Neroli Oils help reduce tension and radiate positivity, while Mint and Eucalyptus awaken the senses. Foaming into a delicate lather, the shower gel sweeps away dirt and impurities, with a blend of Pink Himalayan Salt and Brown Alga extract delivering a draining effect for smoother, firmer and healthier looking skin.

name: Inspire AromaBomb Duo Set
product_description:
Discover a soothing bath time experience with the Inspire AromaBomb Duo Set from AromaWorks. The pair of mint green bath bombs infuse the water with essential oils and seek to combat feelings of anxiety and stress to leave you feeling truly relaxed.
A luxurious blend of Himalayan Sea Salt and Calamine combine to deliver a therapeutic bathing experience. The AromaBomb envelops the body in scents of purity, with notes of fresh Lime, Bergamot and Geranium combining to create a fruity fragrance and a comforting aroma.

name: Express Liquid Tan 150ml
product_description:
Achieve an instant, golden tan with the He-Shi Express Liquid Tan; an effective formula that works to provide streak-free colour for up to 10 days. Suitable for both the body and face, the self-tan offers an enviable glow from head to toe.
The lightweight liquid is easily absorbed and fast drying, leaving skin smooth and hydrated. Utilising moisture-lock technology, the false tan creates long lasting results, as well as alleviating the visible signs of ageing.
The liquid tan can be reapplied in several layers, allowing you to build your desired colour; ranging from a golden glow to a deep and dark tan. Due to its innovative formula, you can apply the tan in confidence, without worrying about streaks or unsightly patches. Expect an even colour that gives you long lasting glow.

name: Deluxe Soft Wax
product_description: Remove unwanted hair with Rio Deluxe Soft Wax. Suitable for removing hair from larger treatment areas such as the legs, arms and back, the wax is perfect for your hair removal needs. - SA

name: Body Finish Cream 200ml
product_description:
Treat skin to extreme nourishment with the Body Finish Cream from AromaWorks. The rich body cream is designed to hydrate and revitalise the skin.
Enriched with a blend of Cocoa Butter and Aloe Vera, the cream works to instantly deliver moisture to skin, whilst also conditioning. Your body will be left with a sweet citrus and herbal scent of Bergamot, Lavender and Neroli.

name: Vitality Hand and Body Wash
product_description:
Cleanse skin and soothe the mind with the ARK Vitality Hand and Body Wash; a soap-free cleanser that produces a luxurious, fragrant lather to sweep away dirt and impurities without stripping away moisture.
A delicate blend of Sea Minerals and Coconut Oil seek to purify and refresh, while emollient-rich Shea Butter infuses skin with hydration, helping restoring its natural lipid barrier. Suitable for hand and body use, skin feels intensively nourished and imbued with a natural, uplifting fragrance of Jasmine, Rosemary and Ylang Ylang.

name: Tonic Shower and Skin Care Gift Set
product_description:
The perfect preening gift for any well respecting gent, the Gentlemen's Tonic Shower and Skin Care Gift Set combines everything a man could wish for to experience the ultimate in male grooming. Presented in a handsome box, the set provides the most luxurious cleanse with natural formulations. - K.N.
Gentlemen's Tonic Gentle Body Wash:
Suitable for all skin types, the softening body wash imparts a stress relieving fragrance whilst maintaining the skin's natural moisture and cleansing and energising the skin. Fortified with a plethora of natural ingredients, including: menthol to cool and invigorate; ginger to stimulate circulation; and vegetable glycerine, honey and wheat extracts to soften and condition.
Gentlemen's Tonic Daily Shampoo:
Suitable for daily use and perfect for all hair types, the formula gently cleanses and revitalises the hair to remove excess grime left over from hair products and daily life. Fortified with a plethora of natural ingredients, including ginger to promote hair growth, babassu and coconut oils to nourish the scalp and nutmeg to stimulate blood circulation.
Gentlemen's Tonic Protein Conditioner:
The perfect complement to the ‘Daily Shampoo’, this conditioner contains protein-enriched active ingredients which have been specially formulated to detangle, protect and strengthen all hair types, improving body and manageability. Specially formulated with yucca vera extracts to help penetrate the hair shaft and act as a natural moisturiser, Gentlemen’s Tonic Protein Conditioner also uses wheat proteins and hydrolysed silk as a moisturising and healing agent.

name: Baby Cloudberry and Oat Hydrating Lotion 100ml
product_description:
Be kind to baby with the Baby Cloudberry and Oat Hydrating Lotion from MÁDARA. Specially formulated for baby’s sensitive skin, but also ideal for children and even adults, the lotion delivers gentle yet intense moisture to nourish and soften skin.
Enriched with Oat milk, the organic formula offers superior nourishment, whilst omega-rich Cloudberry works to repair skin’s barrier. Expect hydrated skin that is calm and comfortable.

name: Revolution Ultimate Hand Repair Oxygen Cream
product_description:
Tackle rough patches and dryness with the Adam Revolution Ultimate Hand Repair Oxygen Cream; an adaptive hand cream especially developed for men to deliver intensive hydrating care.
Ideal for hands often subjected to heavy-duty work, outdoor sports or varying climates, the moisturising formula utilises an Oxygenating Complex – made up of sea-derived minerals and Vitamin C – to effectively stimulate metabolic activity and enhance oxygen levels within fibroblasts. As a result, skin feels re-energised and restored with enhanced protection against free radical damage.
Fortified with a natural complex of ceramides, phospholipids and glycolipids, it improves the natural barrier function for increased repair of callouses, with Allantoin delivering soothing benefits. Hands feel smooth and replenished, effectively protected from further damage.

name: Arnica Muscle Soak 200ml
product_description:
Lift away aches and strains with the Weleda Arnica Muscle Soak; a natural, holistic treatment that seeks to impart homeopathic effects and promote a sense of relaxation.
The bath soak is powered by Arnica Flower extract, renowned for its healing capabilities for bruises and tension, while a blend of Rosemary and Lavender essential oils create a deeply soothing fragrance. Ideal for recovery from physical exertion and pressure, it transforms your bath into a spa-like experience and brings instant relief from discomfort and tension.

name: Jojoba Company Lemon and Coconut Hand Cream 50ml
product_description:
Comfort hardworking hands with The Jojoba Company Lemon and Coconut Hand Cream, a nourishing formula that works to soften and hydrate dry, rough hands.
Infused with 100% natural Australian Jojoba that mimics the skin's natural oils, it absorbs below the surface to deliver vitamins and antioxidants deep down for soft, supple hands. Protective and nourishing, the non-greasy hand cream combines Cocoa, Shea and Mango Butter with natural Macadamia, Lemon Peel and Coconut Oil to replenish skin and keep it safe from external aggressors. Hands feel moisturised and re-energised.

name: & Oil Nourish & Nurture Body Oil for All Skin Types 100ml
product_description: Ideal for all skin types, the Nourish & Nurture Body Oil from You & Oil works to replenish, hydrate and protect from top to toe. Harnessing the powers of Sweet Almond Oil, rich in vitamins and fatty acids, the fast-absorbing formula renews and rejuvenates the body, whilst antioxidant Vitamin E shields against environmental aggressors for long-lasting comfort. Expect smooth, supple skin with a radiant glow.

name: Dante Dolce Vivere Florence Soap 250g
product_description:
Inspired by Italian beauty and lifestyle, the Dolce Vivere 'Florence' Soap from Nesti Dante utilises high quality, natural ingredients to leave you feeling perfectly pampered.
Crafted in Florence using the traditional saponification method, the vegetable-based soap bar gently cleanses and purifies without over-drying; it forms a creamy lather upon contact with water to restore soft, supple skin after every use. Beautifully wrapped in decorative paper, the soap imparts a luxurious fragrance of Blue Iris, Morning Dew and Laurel to rejuvenate the senses.

name: Dante Il Frutteto Medlar and Jujube Soap 250g
product_description: Treat your skin and senses to the Il Frutteto Medlar and Jujube Soap from Nesti Dante. Crafted in Florence using traditional methods and natural ingredients, the vegetable-based soap gently cleanses and rejuvenates, whilst providing calming and stress-relieving benefits to promote a sense of relaxation. Housed in decorative packaging, the soap bar makes an ideal gift for yourself or a loved one.

name: Ultra Hydrating Hand Cream 75ml
product_description:
Rejuvenate tired, over-worked hands with the Trilogy Ultra Hydrating Hand Cream; a lightweight, non-greasy formula that absorbs quickly into skin to restore softness and suppleness.
Harnessing the powers of White Tea, Manuka Honey and Certified Organic Rosehip Oil, the luxurious cream delivers intense moisture and hydration, whilst defending against dryness and environmental aggressors. Hands are smooth, replenished and fragranced with a Sweet Orange, Amber and Vanilla scent.

name: & Evelyn Lily Bath & Shower Gel (250ml)
product_description:
Lather your skin in opulence with this shower gel. An exquisite way to begin or end each day, the Crabtree & Evelyn Lily Bath & Shower Gel lathers richly, cleanses beautifully and leaves skin softly scented with the scent of blossoms.
Perfect as a lavish shower gel or a relaxing foaming bubble bath, the Crabtree & Evelyn Lily Bath & Shower Gel is exquisitely scented with a bouquet of lily of the valley blossoms, white rose and night-blooming jasmine for a deluxe bathing experience. A perfect wind-down treat, let your skin flourish with this delicate lily ‘flower’ gel!
Directions of use:

name: Shiatsu Max 2.0 Back and Shoulder Massager
product_description:
Target hard to reach aches and pains with the HoMedics Shiatsu Max 2.0 Back and Shoulder Massager; a high-performance massage chair from the leading innovators in home massage. Arriving in a muted grey hue, the massage seat is able to complement the colour palette of almost every living room. The cover arrives with a secure strapping system and is the perfect fit for most office and home chairs, simply place on a chair and secure with the adjustable strap.
The chair cover boasts an adjustable seat and headrest, which ensures the massager is suitable for all shapes and sizes, targeting the correct places for each individual. Arriving with a variety of fourteen massage programmes ranging from Shiatsu to Vibration, the massage seat guarantees to feature a sequence to suit your needs, whilst the optional heat function works to intensify any programme.
Offering instant relief, the back and shoulder massager offers the benefits of a professional massage, from the comfort of your own home. The seat eliminates feelings of discomfort and muscle tension that may result from physical work or even being hunched over a desk. It also increases the production of endorphins in the body to deliver a stress-reducing effect.
The cover is crafted from resistant material and is complete with a detachable back cover. This can be placed in a washing machine, whilst the rest of the chair can be simply wiped down, to maintain a pristine condition.

name: Choice Super 8 GOLD Microbiotics - 30 Vegecaps
product_description: The Udo's Choice Super 8 GOLD Microbiotics are vegetarian capsules containing 8 strains of friendly bacteria to help counteract serious flora imbalance and promote good upper bowel health. Helping to replenish healthy gut flora and reduce painful gas, bloating and constipation, Super 8 Microbiotics contain 42 billion active bacteria per capsule and are beneficial for healthy digestion and immune function.

name: Denny Best Defence Hand and Nail Cream - Autumn Leaves 75ml
product_description:
Pamper hardworking hands with the Leighton Denny Best Defence Hand and Nail Cream; a hydrating formula with a limited edition Autumn Leaves fragrance.
Harnessing the hydrating powers of Glycerin, the rich moisturiser envelops the hands and nails in a veil of essential moisture, which nourishes and softens skin. Hibiscus Flower extract works to improve skin’s elasticity to reveal a firmer-looking finish, while White Mulberry Bark extract reduces the appearance of dark spots and blemishes.
Finished with a crucial dose of Cucumber Seed extract, the hand and nail cream is rich in Vitamin C, which offers a soothing sensation to skin and ensures it is free from irritation. Skin is silky soft and comfortably hydrated.

name: Shower Essentials Duo (Worth £41)
product_description:
Care for your skin with the Mio Skincare Shower Essentials Duo. Combining a refreshing shower gel and a gentle exfoliator, the duo contribute towards a pleasurable shower experience, leaving skin hydrated and nourished.
Quickstart Exhilarating Shower Gel (200ml)
Awaken skin with the Quick Start Exhilarating Shower Gel. Without stripping skin of essential moisture, the shower gel delivers Coconut-derived cleansers, fresh Spearmint and V-Tonic™, alongside a blend of vitamins and ingredients containing antioxidant properties, which provide skin with luxurious hydration. Guarana-derived caffeine gives the shower gel a reviving effect, leaving skin refreshed.
Double Buff Exfoliator (150ml)
The Double Buff Enzyme Exfoliator polishes your skin without the use of any rough beads; Pumice, Lava and Bamboo blended with Papaya and Pineapple enzymes do all the work efficiently and gently. The formula gives the appearance of even skin tone and helps to reveal a new, soft layer of skin that is ready to glow. Also suitable for use on your face and perfect for priming your skin before applying self-tan.

name: & Evelyn La Source Hand Wash 500ml
product_description:
Clarify and refresh hands with the Crabtree & Evelyn La Source Hand Wash; a lightweight, pH balanced formula that utilises naturally-derived surfactants to cleanse skin without stripping moisture.
Infused with extracts of Brown Algae and antioxidant-rich Green Seaweed, the luxurious gel gently eliminates impurities whilst softening and conditioning hands to leave them smooth and comfortable. Imparts a crisp, fresh scent of aquatic, musk and sea breeze accords.

name: Bloom Body Cream (200ml)
product_description: Indulge in the luxurious fragrance of Shiseido's Ever Bloom Body Cream, a rich moisturiser that promises to leave your skin feeling silky soft and perfectly pampered. Delicately fragrances the entire body with floral notes of sweet lotus, jasmine and Bulgarian rose oil, blended with gardenia, Tunisian orange blossom and a woody base. Deeply replenishing and fast-absorbing, you can expect smooth, supple skin that is subtly scented. E.N.

name: Black Clean Cream Body Wash (295ml)
product_description: Invigorate and deeply cleanse with the Clean Cream Body Wash from Jack Black's EpicMoisture™ collection. Formulated with seven antioxidant-rich natural oils, including argan, jojoba and olive fruit, the intensely hydrating cleanser removes dirt and impurities, without stripping moisture. Enriched with aloe leaf juice to soothe irritated, stressed skin, whilst ginger, verbena and lemongrass deliver a long-lasting, energising fragrance to stimulate the body and senses. E.N.

name: BB Blur Body Gel 30ml
product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with the Freezeframe BB Blur Body Gel; a three-in-one moisturiser, BB cream and skin perfector clinically proven to enhance luminosity.
Fortified with Kakadu Plum, an Australian Superfruit recognised for its high level of Vitamin C and superior antioxidant protection, the clear formula shields against environmental aggressors and delivers long-lasting hydration.
Optical Blur conceals and corrects imperfections, wrinkles and enlarged pores in just sixty seconds, whilst unique brightening beads give instant radiance and combat uneven skin tone or discolouration. Providing the benefits of a primer, mattifier and anti-ageing cream, you can expect shine-free, picture-perfect skin with a smooth, soft finish.

name: & Evelyn Bestsellers Hand Therapy Sample 6 x 25g
product_description:
Crabtree & Evelyn's Bestsellers Hand Therapy Sample combines a host of best-selling, scented hand creams. 
Each super-moisturising and replenishing formula harnesses the softening and conditioning properties of Shea Butter and Macadamia Oil to comfort and condition your hands, nails and cuticles. The quick-absorbing creams enrich the skin with a host of beneficial ingredients, so skin feels hydrated, soothed and delicately fragranced.
Gardeners (fresh green scent with Clover, Lavender and Sage)
La Source (an aquatic fragrance with notes of Musk and Sea Breezes)
Caribbean Island (Island Wild Flowers, Tropical Citrus Fruits, Jasmine and Sea Air)
Pomegranate (citrus fragrance with sweet Pomegranate and fresh Fig Leaf)
Rosewater (classic English Rosewater scent with leafy green notes)
Tarocco Orange (citrus scent with Orange, Bergamot, and Neroli)

name: Herzog Huile Scintillante
product_description:
Treat your skin to Karin Herzog’s Huile Scintillante, a wonderfully lightweight and lavish body oil that utilises light-reflecting particles to give you a radiant complexion.  
Bursting with essential oils and uplifting natural aromas of cinnamon and sweet orange, the shimmering oil nourishes and conditions skin to leave it feeling sumptuously soft and hydrated. Subtle iridescent particles provide a luminous glimmer, perfect for all skin types especially when tanned for that gorgeous summer glow.

name: the Moon After Dark Bath Oil Glow (100ml)
product_description:
With light citrus notes to lift the spirit at bedtime and provide vitamins your skin needs to stay radiant. Perfect for dry skin.
BEAUTIFUL SLEEP:  Deliciously scented citruses and florals combine to chase away anxiety and encourage a positive spirit so you go to bed full of optimism. With Litsea oil with a scent similar to lemongrass – used in Chinese medicine to calm the mind and spirit.
BEAUTIFUL SKIN: Skin softening oils from the orange tree work hand in hand with geranium and myrrh to heal and rebalance skin’s natural equilibrium. In an easy to absorb blend of vitamin A, B & E rich coconut nut, jojoba and white tea seed oils to deeply nourish and moisturise overnight leaving your skin smooth from top to toe.
DIRECTIONS:Squeeze two full pipettes into a still, deep, warm bath. For a more intense experience, massage lightly into skin before stepping in to the bath. Take three slow breaths and relax. Step out lightly moisturised from top to toe and ready for a perfect night’s sleep.
Avoid contact with eyes. As with all aromatherapy products, best to check with your midwife before using during pregnancy.

name: Moody Cow - Balancing Body Lotion (300ml)
product_description:
Hydrate your skin with Cowshed’s Moody Cow Balancing Body Lotion. Restore harmony with its floral, oriental blend of essential oils. Rose geranium helps regulate emotions and hormones, linden blossom relieves tension, and frankincense soothes and calms.
This stress relieving Moody Cow Balancing Body Lotion from Cowshed will leave your skin feeling blissfully calm, stress free and relaxed. It is enriched with naturally moisturising cocoa butter and vitamin E, and contains no parabens, no petrochemicals and is free from sulphates, artificial fragrances and colours.
Directions of use:

name: Sandalo Shower Gel 250ml
product_description: The wonderfully restorative Sandalo Shower Gel is made with high-quality natural vegetable bases, without Parabens. Infused with the essential oils of the exotic Sandalo tree, with the sensual scent of Narcissus, Vetiver Rose and Jasmine and the wood tones of Cedar and Teak. A wonderful way to introduce this exclusive fragrance made using traditional methods from the plants and flowers of Sicily.

name: Wild Rose Body Lotion 200ml
product_description:
Beautifully scented, the Weleda Wild Rose Pampering Body Lotion stimulates the skin’s regenerative processes to maintain its natural elasticity.
Weleda Wild Rose Pampering Body Lotion contains organic wild rose oil, jojoba oil and hamamelis to noticeably smooth the skin while the fragrance of the Damascene Rose indulges your senses. Perfect for dry or normal skin, this deeply nourishing cream absorbs deeply leaving you with a hydrated and soft feel.

name: Arnica Sports Shower Gel 200ml
product_description:
Refresh with the Arnica Sports Shower Gel, a lightweight, plant-based cleanser from holistic cosmetic brand Weleda.
Ideal for use post sporting activites, the body wash combines energising essential oils with bio-degradable surfactants to effectively sweep away dirt and neutralise odours while invigorating the senses. Extract of Arnica Montana Flower helps stimulate blood circulation, leaving skin feeling clean, fresh and rejuvenated.

name: Bodycare Hand Cream (50ml)
product_description:
Keep your hands soft and supple with Australian Bodycare's Hand Cream. Rich and luxurious, this intensive treatment helps to banish uncomfortable dry patches, so your hands stay smooth and healthy. Formulated with 1% tea tree oil, which is known for its antibacterial properties, it also contains argan oil and shea butter to provide your hands with intense hydration.
Gentle enough for everyday use, this fast-absorbing cream effectively soothes and treats all hand care problems, whilst allantoin repairs your skin and helps to reduce the tell-tale signs of ageing, so your hands stay looking youthful for longer. - L.M.

name: Pomegranate Regenerating Hand Cream Duo
product_description:
Weleda Pomegranate Regenerating Hand Cream contains certified organic shea butter, rich in fatty acids, to protect the skin from moisture loss, while natural plant extracts stimulate cell renewal to keep hands soft. Dermatological tests show that Weleda Pomegranate Regenerating Hand Cream increases the skin’s moisture level by 34% and reduces roughness by 9.1% in just four weeks. This skin-renewing natural wonder nourishes the vibrant look and feel of your skin, to give you firm grip on your timeless beauty with soft, youthful hands.
Now in a valuable duo set so you can ensure your hands are kept in perfect condition around the clock!

name: Fico d'India Body Cream (300ml)
product_description:
Infused with moisturising olive oil and hydrating lanolin, the Fico D'India Body Cream by Ortigia is a must-have for skin in need of a little TLC. The highly perfumed cream sumptously sinks deep into skin, leaving the lingering fragrance of powdery fig and cedar. Non-greasy, light and silky, this cream is perfect for nourishing the body and hands. - R.H
Ortiga is a small Italian soap and scent company, which was founded in Sicily in 2006 by Sue Townsend. Using only natural products and inspired by the aesthetics, colours and scents of Sicily, the brand delivers a range of luxurious soaps, scents, creams, candles and lotions.

name: Energizing Vanilla Hand & Body Lotion 227g
product_description: Give the skin on your hands deep, long-lasting hydration with JÁSÖN Organic Vanilla Hand Lotion. Featuring a blend of energising Sugar Cane and Vanilla Extracts, the natural lotion hydrates and revives dry, tired skin to leave your skin soft, smooth and glowing with health. -SA

name: Clay for Sport Massage and H2O Water Spray
product_description:
Dedicated to purifying skin, Clayspray present the Clay for Sport Massage and H2O Water Spray set; the first emulsified 'clay in spray' treatments. Fortified with a blend of hydrating hydrogel, spring water and carefully selected plant extracts, the mild emulsions are perfectly tailored to suit all skin types and work to purify, exfoliate and remove impurities in the skin by exchanging undesirable substances (including dead cells and sebum) with beneficial minerals without upsetting the skin's natural barrier. Known to increase moisturisation up to 12% and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles on the forehead. - K.N.  
Clayspray 'Clay for Sports Massage':Perfect for post-workout destressing. Dedicated to soothing fatigued skin and reducing muscle and joint tension, the mineral rich formula combines macromolecular hydrogels with white clay and active ingredients to gently exfoliate, regenerate and tone skin. Helping speed up the recovery process, your muscles will feel alleviated and naturally decongested.   
Clayspray H2O Water Spray:Perfect for all skin types, this spring water spray works to refresh and hydrate skin. Free from chemical nasties, the revitalising, mineral rich mist will moisten the complexion with a blend of natural polyphenols and oligoelements and create the perfect base for your favourite Clayspray face mask.

name: Real Body Cream - Oak Moss
product_description: Restore moisture and obtain soft skin with this easy to spread Musgo Real Body Cream. Glycerin, olive and almond oil extracts blended with shea butter make the perfect hydrating formula for tired or tight, dry skin. Together with the distinctive, masculine fragrance of oak moss, it will keep your skin feeling nourished and fresh. E.N.

name: Almond Hand Cream (50ml)
product_description:
Treat sensitive, easily irritated skin to Weleda's Almond Hand Cream, a mild, comforting formula developed to nourish and protect sensitive skin.
Harnessing the strengthening and soothing properties of almond oil, the lotion envelops skin in a veil of nourishment, delivering long-lasting moisture whilst strengthening the skin's protective barrier to shield from environmental aggressors and elements. The soothing lotion absorbs quickly to calm skin, combat tightness and reduce redness. Hands feels balanced, hydrated and protected. - K.N.

name: Paris Men Expert Shirt Protect Fresh Kick Deodorant 250ml
product_description: Protect your shirt from 100% of deodorant marks with the Shirt Protect Fresh Kick Deodorant from L'Oréal Paris Men Expert. As well as preventing embarrassing white marks, the 48 hour anti-perspirant spray also combats wetness and fights the appearance of white residue. The deodorant protects against the yellowing of clothes and is formulated to avoid the deposits responsible for the stiffening of fabrics after washing, drying and ironing. – E.W.

name: B Lavender Hand and Body Crème (60ml)
product_description:
Rejuvenate and nourish skin from top to toe with the Philip B Lavender Hand and Body Crème; a silky moisturiser that works to restore a velvety soft, smooth texture and leave behind a relaxing, soothing lavender fragrance.
With a fast-absorbing formula, the hand and body cream is infused with African shea butter and safflower oleosomes for long-lasting hydration, combating dryness and rough skin for ultimate comfort.
Essential amino acids strengthen skin and increase suppleness, whilst powerful bio-extracts help to firm and brighten the entire body, leaving it healthy-looking, conditioned and glowing. E.N.

name: Ferragamo Signorina Misteriosa Body Lotion (200ml)
product_description: Salvatore Ferragamo present the Signorina Misteriosa Body Lotion; a lightweight, rich moisturiser that cocoons the skin in the brand's luxurious fragrance of wild blackberry, orange blossom, neroli and patchouli. Fast-absorbing and lightweight, its formula melts effortlessly onto the body to soften, hydrate and condition from top to toe so you can experience velvety soft, perfectly pampered skin with a radiant glow. E.N.

name: Body Lotion 300ml - Ginger Flower
product_description:
Treat yourself or a loved one to the Sachajuan Ginger Flower Body Lotion; a luxurious moisturiser that absorbs quickly into skin to soften and condition without greasy residue.
Utilising the brand's exclusive Earth Silk Technology, the anti-ageing formula replenishes and hydrates the body, whilst imparting a revitalising fragrance of Bergamot and Lemon. Skin feels soft, supple and perfectly pampered from top to toe.

name: & Disaster Body Moisturiser 500ml
product_description:
Quench skin's your skin with Triumph & Disaster Body Moisturiser, a hydrating emulsion that utilises natural ingredients to soften, smooth and calm your skin.
Infused with the subtle fragrance of Sandalwood and Neroli, the natural, silky formula delivers all-over hydration from top to bottom. Enriched with a cocktail of Dragon's blood (a healing, natural tree resin), Goji Berries and Aloe Vera, skin is simultaneously hydrated and protected. Suitable for daily use.

name: Karité Paris Shea Body Milk - Lavender 200ml
product_description:
Soothe and comfort your skin with Institut Karité Paris Shea Body Milk in 'Lavender', a lightweight body milk that delivers exceptional nourishment.
Infused with 25% Shea Butter, a vitamin-rich ingredient that intensely nourishes and soothes skin, the milky solution expertly softens, moisturises and protects; its non-greasy, quick absorbing formulation delivers comfort and hydration so skin feels supple and intensely hydrated.
Infused with a delicate Lavender fragrance.

name: Balancing Herbal Lavender Bath Oil (100ml)
product_description:
Relax and unwind with Kneipp Balancing Herbal Lavender Bath Oil, a soothing bath formula that promotes feelings of well-being and relaxation.
Infused with concentrated essential lavender oil harnessed from a pure and natural source, the bath soak helps balance your emotions whilst restoring vitality and nourishing the body. When blended into water, the formula delivers naturally soothing and relaxing properties to help combat fatigue and inspire feelings of tranquility.

name: Sun Travel Kit SPF30 2017
product_description:
Treat your body and hair to NUXE Sun Travel Kit SPF30 2017, a set of protective formulas to keep skin and hair safe in the sun. Combining a high protection face cream with an after-sun shampoo and after-sun lotion, the trio will help keep skin and hair healthy and refreshed during outdoor escapades.
Delicious Cream for Face SPF 30 (50ml)
A high protection sun lotion for face. Infused with Sun and Water Flowers, the cream helps protect against premature ageing and has been specially formulated to treat delicate skin on the face. It melts in quickly without leaving an unsightly white film. Shielding your skin against harmful UV rays, it will keep skin safe whilst promoting a beautiful tan. Infused with an exotic fragrance of Sweet Orange, Tahitian Gardenia and Vanilla. Photostable. Alcohol free.
After-Sun Hair & Body Shampoo (50ml)
A multi-tasking formula that gently lifts away residues that can accumulate after a day in the sun, such as UV filters, salt, chlorine and sand. Performing a refreshing cleanse on skin and hair, it contains Sun and Water Flowers, and expertly removes impurities to leave skin feeling fresh and revitalised, and hair soft and supple. Infused with an exotic fragrance.
Refreshing After-Sun Lotion (50ml)
A soothing aftersun formula for the face and body. Instantly refreshing on application, the Sun and Water Flower-infused formula helps to hydrate skin and prolong your hard earned tan. Its fresh texture leaves skin feeling relieved and comfortable. Enriched with an exotic Sweet Orange, Tahitian Gardenia and Vanilla fragrance. Suitable for all skin types.

name: Surge Tropical Orange and Bergamot Hand and Body Wash (250ml)
product_description:
Refresh and replenish your skin with Organic Surge Tropical Orange and Bergamot Hand and Body Wash, a soothing formula rich in antioxidants that works to lock in moisture whilst cleansing away impurities.
Infused with soothing Organic Aloe Vera and naturally antioxidant Sweet Orange and Bergamot essential oils, the wash performs a delicate cleanse on skin, lifting away daily grime whilst maintaining skin's natural moisture levels. Its dose of Glycerine draws moisture into skin to leave it feeling soft and hydrated.
Expect to feel soothed, moisturised and delicately scented with a natural fragrance.
Suitable for all skin types.

name: Japanese Rose Hand Cream 75ml
product_description:
Nourish and care for hard-working hands. KORRES Japanese Rose Hand Cream is a lightweight and intensely moisturising formula enriched with Shea Butter and Almond Oil to help soften and comfort dry, rough skin.
Formulated with 88.5% natural content, the hand cream blends Calendula with Vitamin B5 to expertly nourish and repair; it melts effortlessly into skin, leaving no oily residue, and effectively hydrates and comforts whilst imparting a subtle perfume of Japanese Rose Buds.

name: & Evelyn Evelyn Rose Bath & Shower Gel 250ml
product_description: Gently cleanse and refresh skin with the Evelyn Rose Bath & Shower Gel from Crabtree & Evelyn. Infused with extracts of Rosa Hybrid and Rosa Gallica, the luxurious body wash eliminates impurities without stripping moisture, whilst Glycerine delivers long-lasting hydration for silky smooth, velvety soft skin from top to toe. name: Total Body Waxing Hair Removal Kit
product_description:
Say hello to soft and smooth skin from head to toe with the Rio Total Body Waxing set. Containing soft wax for the arms and legs, it also features hard wax that's better suited to more sensitive areas, including facial hair and the bikini line.
Heating up rapidly, the wax is easily applied with the wooden spatulas, and is designed to stick to the hairs and not your skin, allowing for quick and easy removal. You'll be able to achieve salon quality results in the comfort of your own home. - L.M.
Before you start, watch the step-by-step DVD for tips and a complete guide to waxing techniques. Always do a patch test on a small area of your skin for possible skin reaction. It is also advisable to wash and dry the area you're going to wax to temporarily remove the body's natural oils and help the wax stick to the hairs.
Place the salon soft wax tub inside the heater, ensure the lid is removed. Switch on the unit to melt the wax. Stir thoroughly until the wax has a similar consistency to syrup.
Put one tablet of hard wax into the heating cup then place the cup inside the heater. Switch the unit to melt the wax. Stir thoroughly until the wax has a smooth, thick honey-like consistency.
With a spatula, apply a thick and even coat of wax in even strips no wider than one inch. Allow the wax to cool on the skin until it is hard but still pliable. Allow the wax to cool on the skin until it is hard but still pliable. Holding skin taut with one hand, flick up the corner of the wax with your finger so that you have an area to grip. In one quick motion, pull the wax off in the opposite direction of hair growth. Do NOT pull away from the skin.
Do not use this product on loose skinned parts of your body or any areas showing signs of varicose veins, skin diseases (for example eczema, psoriasis, dermatitis), cuts and abrasions, irritation, warts, moles, hypersensitivity or sunburn, diabetes, phlebitis, recent scar tissue, other skin conditions. We recommend you consult your physician before treatment if you suffer from any of the above conditions. Do not use on cuts or broken skin.

Conjugated Linoleic Acid (CLA) is a fatty acid found naturally in meat and dairy products. CLA is one of the most popular and widely used supplements.

Choline also contributes to the maintenance of normal liver function and supports normal homocysteine metabolism, elevated levels of homocysteine in the blood (hyperhomocysteinemia) is associated with atherosclerosis and blood clots.
Raspberry extract and Choline tablets can be taken by anyone who is looking to improve body composition and should be taken in conjunction with a healthy, balanced diet.
