Its antioxidant properties and subtle Amber aroma ensure skin is protected, supple and delicately scented. Expect a silky, radiant body.

name: People Age Defy+ Contour & Sculpt Body Lotion (150ml)
product_description:
Treat your skin to the smoothing properties of Green People's Age Defy+ Contour & Sculpt Body Lotion, an intense formula that works to sculpt, firm and smooth away cellulite.
Fortified with thirty-three beautifying actives, including antioxidant Green Tea and metabolism boosting Beech Bud, the lotion performs intense 'body modelling' action; its patented extract from Bayberry enhances moisture levels, firmness and elasticity, whilst regenerating skin to reveal a smoother, more youthful looking body.
Massage into skin day and night and experience its organic aroma. - K.N.

name: Calming Baby Bath Oil (100ml)
product_description: Developed specifically for your little one's delicate skin, the Calming Baby Bath Oil from NAÏF gently cleanses and softens from top to toe. Infused with natural ingredients such as Cottonseed Oil and Chamomile, the nourishing oil creates milky bath water to relieve scratching sensations and combat dryness, leaving skin soft, smooth and comfortable.

name: Calendula Toothpaste 75ml
product_description: Clean teeth naturally with the Weleda Calendula Toothpaste. Ideal for anyone using homeopathic medicines that can cause reactions with Peppermint, the mint-free formula contains Fennel for fresh breath, while Calcium Minerals deliver a gentle abrasive action to combat plaque build-up and Calendula helps soothe sensitive gums. Free from any artificial sweeteners or sugar, it leaves your mouth feeling clean and fresh.

name: Fango Active Mud for Face and Body (222ml)
product_description:
Refine and revitalise your skin with Borghese's Fango Active Mud for Face and Body, an exclusive mud mask sourced from Tuscany's volcanic hills.
Packed full of minerals and detoxifying ingredients, the mask utilises Fango Active Mud which expertly energises and nourishes skin from head to toe. Its gentle exfoliating properties slough away dead skin, unclog pores and deeply purify to reveal smoother, softer, brighter-looking skin. Fine lines appear reduced and the face and body are left feeling firmer and hydrated with improved clarity. Infused with Sweet Almond and Avocado Oils to nourish and comfort.

name: Body Brilliance Exfoliate 200ml
product_description:
Reveal radiant looking skin with the AromaWorks Body Brilliance Exfoliate, a detoxifying scrub that works to buff away dirt and impurities to leave skin feeling softened and revitalised. Harnessing the power of 9 BioActive ingredients, the natural body scrub seeks to encourage superior nutrient absorption on a cellular level to deeply nourish skin.
Formulated with Pink Himalayan Sea Salts, it contains 84 trace minerals that purify and refine skin texture, whilst Neroli and Mango Butter add essential fatty acids and stimulate cell renewal. Blended with Bergamot and Lavender, the sweetly citrus scented exfoliator unveils brighter and regenerated skin.

name: Herzog Oxygen Foot Cream (50ml)
product_description:
Karin Herzog 2% Oxygen Foot Cream has the power to treat many common foot conditions as well as providing an ultimate pampering treat to reward one of the most neglected and forgotten parts of the body.
Specially formulated to repair and care for your feet, Herzog’s Foot Cream contains 2% Oxygen for natural antiseptic, anti bacterial and anti fungal action.
Great in the fight against foot odour, athletes’ foot, nail infections and other bacterial or fungal infections. Infused with the essential oil of Juniper berries to help fragrance and regulate perspiration.
The deodorising and repairing action of this unique cream works for up to 8 hours to really give you confidence to step out
Directions of Use:

name: Surrender Body Oil 130ml
product_description:
Pamper skin and calm an erratic mind with the Mauli Surrender Body Oil; a comforting, multi-tasking treatment based upon Ayurvedic traditions to help balance Vata energies that govern the nervous system, seeking to alleviate feelings of anxiety and encourage a restful night’s sleep.
Initially formulated as part of a luxurious spa treatment at the Bulgari Hotel, the oil contains a specific selection of essential oils that are renowned for healing properties both physically and mentally.
Working to boost circulation and condition skin, the aromatic blend opens on a delicate bouquet of Chamomile, Ylang Ylang and Geranium, with sensual accords of Vetiver and Frankincense. Settling upon a base of Sweet Almond and Sesame, it helps soothe aching bones and joints while clarifying the mind for a greater sense of wellbeing and calm.

name: Botanicals Neroli & Shea Butter Body Nourishing Cream 100ml
product_description:
The Neroli & Shea Butter Body Nourishing Cream from Dr Botanicals has been expertly formulated with essential oils, vitamins and minerals to reveal radiant, healthier-looking skin.
Lightweight and non-greasy, the cream effortlessly melts in, with the main active ingredient of Neroli Oil seeking to repair and restore skin with a firming effect. Shea Butter is brimming with vitamins, aiming to combat environmental aggressors and soften skin with intense moisture, whilst Ximenia Seed Oil intensely nourishes and hydrates. Expect visibly smoother and refined skin.

name: Magik Organiks Sleep Therapy 6-Oil Super Serum
product_description:
Discover a beauty essential with the Spa Magik Organiks Sleep Therapy 6-Oil Super Serum; a multi-tasking formula that works to condition and protect skin, whilst promoting a sense of calm and relaxation.
The lightweight formula effortlessly glides onto the face and can be worn under your usual moisturiser. Enriched with a skin-loving blend of Vitamin E, Lavender and Rose Hip, the intense serum works to restore skin’s healthy moisture levels, whilst combating visible signs of ageing. The appearance of fine lines and wrinkles is reduced and skin appears smooth and youthful.
Not only delivering anti-ageing benefits, the 6-Oil Super Serum also boasts therapeutic results that can promote a good night’s sleep. Complete with a relaxing lavender aroma.

name: Grass Juice Powder - 100g
product_description:
Ideal for arthritis, high cholesterol and general well-being, the Barley Grass Juice Powder dissolves easily and can be blended with all liquids and smoothies.
Containing the highest natural levels of SOD Enzyme (Superoxide Dismutase), the antioxidant-rich supplement works to defend against free radical damage and premature signs of ageing, whilst aiding tissue repair and supporting the natural immune system.

name: of California Vitamin Cleansing Bar - Italian Lime 198g
product_description:
Supplement skin’s natural moisture and replenishment with the Baxter of California Vitamin Cleansing Bar. Featuring a colour band down the middle, and infused with hydrating Glycerin, Seaweed and Vitamins A and E, the tactful design of this salve helps tend to skin diligently and carefully, providing a relieving, refreshing experience that leaves pores feeling restored, cleansed and gently nourished.
Enriched with fragrance, the Italian Lime scent creates a zesty, deep aroma, allowing for a full regenerative experience. C.R

name: Laboratories Keramene - Body Hair Minimiser (180ml)
product_description:
DS Laboratories Keramene Body Hair Minimiser suppresses hair growth to reduce shaving, waxing and other depilatory chores, while softening remaining hair strands, leaving regular users enjoying silky skin for longer. 
Achieve dramatically smoother, less hairy, more seductive skin, while shaving or depilating less frequently, simply by applying the high-performance DS Laboratories Keramene Body Hair Minimiser. The formula works so effectively due to the combination of plant hormones, palmatine and nordihydroguaiaretic acid, all proven in studies to make some hair follicles rest whilst others grow slower. 
Keramene cream is suitable for men and women with excessive or unwanted body hair, especially those who shave, wax, tweeze or otherwise depilate the back, underarms, legs or bikini areas. 
Keramene extends the latency period between sessions of shaving or depilation via two major pathways. Firstly, by inducing hair follicles into the catagen phase, during which hairs stop growing and prepare to be shed. Secondly by suppressing keratinocyte profileration, so hair grows slower. 
Directions for use:

name: Botanicals Coco Noir Sensuous & Indulgent Body Oil 30ml
product_description:
Achieve smoother and firmer looking skin with the Cocoa Noir Sensuous & Indulgent Body Oil from Dr Botanicals. Rich in botanical extracts, the anti-ageing oil is designed to visibly firm skin for a more youthful appearance and to reduce the appearance of imperfections.
Infused with Morrocan Rose Oil and Shea Butter, the vitamin rich formula seeks to have a soothing effect on skin, whilst Neroli visibly firms, smoothes and hydrates, creating an overall younger looking appearance that is looked after and nourished.

name: Ulitmate Foam Collection - Dark
product_description: Give the gift of a long-lasting, sun-kissed tan with this gift set from TANWORX. Whether you want to treat a friend, family member or yourself, the TANWORX Ultimate Self Tanning Collection Dark is the ideal package to create a flawless, yet even tan. - K.R TANWORX Exfoliating Cream Prep your skin for an even tan with this gentle yet effective exfoliating cream. It instantly boost skin tone and texture, removing dead skin cells to reveal a smooth canvas ready to apply your TANWORX Self Tanning Foam. TANWORX Self Tanning Foam - Dark The lightweight tinted foam glides onto skin, giving an instant bronzed glow so you can see where to apply the product. The tan develops and darkens over the course of 3 hours, leaving you with a deep, dark but natural looking tan. The no-drip formula provides a streak-free tan that quickly dries, allowing you to get on with your day as the tan develops. *Wait 8 hours after application before showering or bathing. TANWORX Tan Maintainer A fresh and hydrating moisturiser, it slows down the natural exfoliating process but restoring hydration, meaning a prolonged tan. Apply the same as your usual moisturiser to enhance and maintain your tan. TANWORX Tanning Mitt Apply your tanning products quickly and easily without worrying about staining your hands. The tanning mitt has been made with a special formula-resistant barrier, protecting hands and wrists from staining. The soft mitt provides an even, streak-free tan with every product, which can then be put into the washing machine to clean when you're done.

name: and Bond Bridle Hide Box Wet Pack - Black
product_description: With a waterproof lining and a carrying handle on one end, this black Carter and Bond Bridle Hide Box Wet Pack is ideal for carrying your grooming kit in. Measuring 10 inches in length and featuring adjustable leather loops on the inside of the lid to accommodate both a razor and shaving brush, this box wet pack is a traditional option that is expertly handcrafted in England. - E.D

name: Body Shampoo 200ml
product_description:
Cleanse and pamper skin with the Vani-T Body Shampoo. Free from SLS and sulphates, the gentle body wash has a natural and organic based formula that sweeps away dirt and grime while infusing skin with nourishing anti-ageing actives.
Fortified with Marine Collagen and fruit-extracted Vitamin C, it helps stimulate cellular repair and renewal while botanically-sourced Phytolin™ ensures maximum hydration. A blend of luxurious, antioxidant-rich oils leave skin feeling smooth, supple and revitalised with a delectable coconut scent.

name: Island Apothecary Refresh Hand Lotion (300ml)
product_description:
Keep your hands smooth, soft and supple with Seascape Island Apothecary Refresh Hand Lotion (300ml). Formulated with 100% natural essential oils of soothing Jersey lavender, toning lemongrass, cleansing geranium and nourishing shea butter, this balancing lotion will invigorate and refresh your hands.
Perfect for dry, over-worked hands, the skin-loving formula will provide wonderful hydration to keep your skin feeling touchably soft and comfortable. Free from parabens and artificial colours and fragrances, it's suitable for even the most sensitive of skin. - L.M.

name: Organics Tranquillity Bath Foam (200ml)
product_description: Enjoy an indulgent, relaxing bath with the NEOM Organics Tranquillity Bath Foam. Formulated with 74% organic ingredients, the bath foam contains an expert blend of marshmallow, aloe leaf, coconut and sweet almond oil to soothe and condition your skin. Meanwhile, the relaxing fragrance of lavender, sweet basil and jasmine will promote deep, restful sleep, so you feel revitalised both on the inside and the outside. - L.M.

name: & Oil Nourish & Energise Body Oil for Mature Skin 100ml
product_description:
Catering specifically for mature skin, the You & Oil Nourish & Energise Body Oil utilises a blend of natural ingredients to fortify, hydrate and soften from top to toe.
Infused with Lemon, Lavender and Sweet Almond Oils, rich in vitamins and fatty acids, the luxurious formula absorbs quickly into skin to deliver toning and firming properties, whilst minimising the appearance of dark spots and imperfections for a smoother, more refined texture.
Skin is renewed and regenerated without greasy or sticky residue.

name: Dante Dei Colli Fiorentini Iris Soap 250g
product_description:
Take an aromatic journey through the hills of Florentine with Nesti Dante's Dei Colli Fiorentini Iris Soap, a perfumed cleansing bar that has been crafted using the old craft saponification method of boiling in a cauldron.
Developed in Florence with high quality ingredients, the natural, vegetable-based soap gently cleanses and purifies your skin to leave the body feeling soft and supple; it transforms into a rich lather that eliminates impurities whilst imparting the sensual scent of Iris. The soap is embossed and wrapped in elegant, decorative paper.

name: Dante Dolce Vivere Pisa Soap 250g
product_description:
Inspired by Italian beauty and lifestyle, the Dolce Vivere 'Pisa' Soap from Nesti Dante utilises high quality, natural ingredients to leave you feeling perfectly pampered.
Crafted in Florence using the traditional saponification method, the vegetable-based soap bar gently cleanses and purifies without over-drying; it forms a creamy lather upon contact with water to restore soft, supple skin after every use. Beautifully wrapped in decorative paper, the soap imparts a floral fragrance of White Magnolia, Apricot Blossom and Lilium to rejuvenate the senses.

name: Duo Salon IPL Hair Reduction - EU 2 Pin Plug
product_description:
Achieve long-lasting hair removal with the HoMedics Duo Salon IPL Hair Reduction; an efficient, safe and pain-free device that utilises Intense Pulse Light (IPL) technology alongside Advanced Fluorescence Technology (AFT FREEGLIDE™) in one easy-to-use device.
The hair removal system adapts to treat different areas of your body, with highly powered, single-shot IPL treatments for stubborn and thicker hair around the bikini line and underarms or use the Duo Salon head for sparse, thinner on arms and legs.
Two flashes per second means you can treat your entire body in as little as 20 minutes, with Active Cooling Technology™ delivering professional cooling to leave the surface of skin feeling cool to touch for a comfortable, salon-like experience.
Five light settings deliver gentle yet effective treatment for a range of hair types and skin tones, allowing you to adjust the intensity for specific areas. A facial attachment allows precise, targeted treatment.

name: Botanicals Boticario di Havana Travel Set
product_description:
Immerse yourself in the intoxicating Havana fragrance with the travel set from Archipelago Botanicals. The set combines a travel size body lotion, body wash and shampoo for soft, cleansed skin and hair on the go.
The Set Contains:
Treat your skin to Archipelago’s Botanicals Boticario di Havana Body Lotion. Based on the Havana home fragrance that blends Ylang Ylang, Tobacco Flower and Bergamot, the richly moisturising lotion has a citrus finish that is suitable for both men and women. Containing high quality natural ingredients, rich in antioxidants and AHA’s, the body lotion will keep skin hydrated without a greasy residue, will reduce redness and calm dry, rough skin and is suitable for daily use.
Based on the best-selling Havana fragrance range, the Archipelago Botanicals Boticario di Havana Body Wash, scented with Ylang Ylang, Tobacco Flower and Bergamot, is a gentle, exfoliating body wash packed with antioxidants and AHA’s to hydrate, cleanse and detoxify the skin. With a fresh citrus finish, the body wash is suitable for both men and women and is ideal for daily use for beautifully moisturised, deliciously scented and silky soft skin.
Specially developed for gentle, daily use, Archipelago’s Botanicals Boticario di Havana Shampoo, scented with the bestselling Havana fragrance is  formulated with natural jojoba oil and orange and pineapple extracts. The paraben-free shampoo is suitable for coloured and chemically treated hair that is left clean, soft, shiny and manageable.

name: Compact Percussion Handheld Massager with Heat
product_description:
Alleviate aches and unwind tension with the HoMedics Compact Percussion Handheld Massager with Heat; an advanced device to deliver deep tissue massage for intensive muscle relief.
Delivering up to 3,000 pulses per minute, the system uses dual pivot nodes and rapid percussive pulsations with variable intensity to create a custom treatment, and the ergonomic design is easy and comfortable  to use with a lengthened handle and rubberized grip.  
Changeable nodes allow you to change intensity and strength, with softer nodes for more sensitive areas such as the spine and shoulder blades, and gradual heated nodes to soothe stiff tendons. The Percussion Action Massager directly targets problematic areas, ideal for treating multiple areas all over the body including the lumbar area, legs, arms and back.

name: Moist Foaming Soap - Refill 130g
product_description:
Refresh and cleanse with the RMK Moist Foaming Soap. Transforming into a rejuvenating lather upon application, the carbonated-foam formula sweeps away dirt, oil and impurities while helping boost blood circulation for polished and refined skin.
Enriched with moisturising extracts from Japanese Sake and Rooibos, it delivers a cocktail of beneficial nutrients and antioxidants as well as an uplifting fruity scent. Skin is left feeling soft, smooth and hydrated with a healthy looking vitality.

name: Brown Exquisite Vanilla & Violet Flower Single Wick Candle
product_description: Discover the warm, delicate fragrance of the Exquisite Vanilla & Violet Flower Single Wick Candle from Molton Brown. Transporting your senses to Somerset, where rolling green hills meet Violet quillets, the tranquil candle releases notes of floral Freesia and dainty Rose, contrasted with juicy Bergamot and creamy Madagascan Vanilla. Presented in a glass container and matching gift box, making an ideal gift for yourself or a loved one.

name: London Well Heeled! Replacement Roller - Regular (x2)
product_description:
Get feet sandal-ready with the Well Heeled! Replacement Roller - Regular from Magnitone London. The pack houses two roller heads that are designed to replace your current, well-loved head, which may not be as effective anymore. The replacement rollers are compatible with Magnitone’s Express Pedicure System.
The powerful roller provides a thorough pedicure to feet in need of pampering. Boasting a micro-crystal roller, the head effectively buffs dry, hard and rough skin from feet, including stubborn heels.  Expect the roller to reveal salon-soft skin instantly and effortlessly.

name: Dante Dei Colli Fiorentini Sweet Violet Soap 250g
product_description:
Take an aromatic journey through the hills of Florentine with Nesti Dante's Dei Colli Fiorentini Cypress Tree Soap, a perfumed cleansing bar that has been crafted using the old craft saponification method of boiling in a cauldron.
Developed in Florence with high quality ingredients, the natural, vegetable-based soap gently cleanses and purifies your skin to leave the body feeling soft and supple; it transforms into a rich lather that eliminates impurities whilst imparting the romantic scent of the Sweet Violet. The soap is embossed and wrapped in elegant, decorative paper.

name: Pomegranate Ribbon Box (Worth £35)
product_description:
Treat yourself or a loved one to Weleda's Pomegranate Ribbon Box. Combines a creamy body wash, skin-softening body lotion and fruity-floral fragrance spray, all wrapped in a branded gift box.
Pomegranate Creamy Body Wash (200ml)
Harnessing the powers of Organic Pomegranate Seed Oil, the luxurious body wash gently cleanses from top to toe to leave you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated. A warming blend of Sandalwood, Davana and Neroli Essential Oils invigorates skin and stimulates the senses to rebalance your body and mind. With regular use, skin will feel soft, smooth and perfectly pampered.
Pomegranate Body Lotion (200ml)
Specifically formulated for maturing skin, the body lotion absorbs quickly into skin to prevent premature signs of ageing. Enriched with Pomegranate Seed Oil, Apricot Kernel Oil and moisturising Shea Butter to soften and condition, whilst protecting against external aggressors so you can experience smooth, comfortable skin. with a youthful glow.
Jardin de Vie Grenade (50ml)
A joyful, energising fragrance inspired by flowering trees in oriental gardens. Opening with fruity notes of exotic Mango and Orange, the scent is enhanced by Neroli and Davana in the heart, before settling on a creamy Vanilla base. Housed in a vibrant red bottle, simply spritz onto skin to experience the rich, sensual fragrance. Suitable for vegans.

product_description:
Utilising Ultra Pure Grade lanolin, a natural substance taken from freshly shorn sheep, the Lanolips Lano Rose Hand Cream Everyday delivers extreme hydration to dry hands and nails.
Natural and animal cruelty free, the balm has a light texture and is fortified with rose oil and keratin to nourish and moisturise wanting hands. Quickly absorbing into the skin, the pH balanced formula will expertly hydrate your hands and revive your cuticles. Skin and nails will feel nourished, soft and comfortable. Light enough for every day use. - K.N.

name: Birthing Company Down Below Perineal Massage Oil 50ml
product_description:
Natural Birthing Company's Down Below Perineal Massage Oil is a safe and 100% natural oil formula that can be used during perineal massage to help increase elasticity 'down below'.
Perineal massage is recommended from 34 weeks of pregnancy to help prepare for labour; the massaging action helps to gently stretch skin and increase elasticity of perineal muscles to reduce the risk of tearing or episiotomy (needing a cut) during labour.
Blending Rosehip, Apricot, Calendula and Evening Primrose Oils, the relaxing formula helps to prepare your intimate area for child birth, and also doubles as a body massage oil; it moisturises skin and may reduce the appearance of stretch marks during and after pregnancy.

name: Brown Orange & Bergamot Body Wash
product_description:
Experience an invigorating cleanse with Molton Brown Orange & Bergamot Body Wash, an energising bath and shower gel infused with extracts of Seville Orange to expertly cleanse and revitalise skin.
Gently lifting away dirt and impurities, the skin-enriching formula cleanses skin whilst imparting a Spanish-inspired fragrance of Bergamot and Neroli. Skin is left feeling fresh and deliciously scented.

name: 550+ Pure Manuka Honey Blend
product_description:
MGO™ 550+ Manuka Honey Blend is derived from Leptospermum Scoparium, a plant unique to New Zealand; its flowers are powerfully fragrant and full of nectar which attributes Manuka Honey with its rich, dark and full-bodied flavour.
MGO™ 550+ Manuka Honey is certified to contain a minimum of 250mg/kg methylgyoxal. Methylgyoxal is a naturally occurring compound in Manuka Honey that lends the substance its remarkable and unique properties. No other system of measurement gives such a clear and simple indication; the higher the MGO™ rating, the higher the Methylglyoxal content.

name: London Eco Friendly Shower Cap - Zebra
product_description:
Add some glamour to your shower time with Hydrea London Eco Friendly Shower Cap in Zebra. These beautifully stylish shower caps not only look gorgeous but they are comfortable and functional too.
With each high quality cap lined with soft, eco-friendly waterproof PEVA material, keeping your hair perfectly secure and dry in the bath or shower, Hydrea London Eco Friendly Shower Cap in Zebra is also perfect for using during your hair treatments. They work wonders for intensifying that conditioning!

name: Bees Cream to Powder
product_description:
Relieve your baby's dry, irritated skin with the Burt's Bees Cream to Powder. Formulated with a gentle blend of 99% natural ingredients, is the perfect 2-in-1 for those busy Mums and Dads.
Starting off a cream texture, it glides onto targeted areas quickly and easy, while then drying to a powder absorbing excess water and leaving skin soft. Doubling up as a nappy cream and powder in one, it is the ideal go-to product to keep in your baby bag. - K.R

product_description:
Revitalise the mind and body with Bubble T's Lemongrass & Green Tea Shower Gel; a hydrating formula dedicated to cleansing, refreshing and nourishing skin from top to toe.
Infused with an antioxidant blend of Goji Berry and Lemon Extract, the body wash gently eliminates impurities without stripping moisture, whilst delivering an uplifting fragrance of Green Tea and zesty citrus notes to leave you bursting with energy.

name: Daily Body Wash (354ml)
product_description:
MenScience Daily Body Wash is a multifunctional cleanser that leaves your skin and pores super clean, smooth, and refreshed. Glycolic and salicylic acids help dissolve dull build-up and cleanse deep within pores and follicles.
MenScience Daily Body Wash is recommended for daily cleansing, to smooth and renew, perfect for devitalised skin and sensitive skin. Its unique formula smoothes and revitalises your skin, dissolving dead cells and dull build-up, while gently removing sweat, dirt, and impurities, rinsing off quickly without leaving any residue. It restores your skin's natural softness and healthy appearance, clearing grime and residues from within the pores and follicles..
Daily Body Wash contains glycolic acid and alpha hydroxy acid (AHA), which leads to smoother, softer skin, and a reduction in the appearance of fine lines, dry patches and dark spots; salicylic acid, for treatment of acne, ingrown hairs, and dandruff, and combating signs of ageing; allantoin, a superior anti-irritant and soothing agent of botanical origin; aloe vera extract; urea, a moisturiser capable of attracting and retaining water; and tea tree extract.
Directions of use:

name: Paris Men Expert Clean Power 48H Roll-on Anti-Perspirant (50ml)
product_description:
Stay fresh and dry with the L’Oréal Paris Men Expert Clean Power 48H Roll-on Anti-Perspirant.
Suitable for groomed underarms, the long-lasting deodorant is designed to make hair appear thinner upon regrowth, and its 48 hour protective formula harnesses the odour combatting powers of antibacterial Zinc + ER-195 to leave underarms feeling fresh, clean and protected. Infused with a fresh, woody fragrance and anti-wetness micro-captors, the anti-perspirant will leave you feeling dry and comfortable with a clean, refreshing scent. - K.N.

name: Brown Water Mint Body Wash
product_description:
Experience a revitalising cleanse with Molton Brown Water Mint Body Wash, an energising bath and shower gel infused with Croatian Water Mint to cleanse and refresh skin.
Gently lifting away dirt and impurities, the skin-enriching formula cleanses skin whilst imparting a cooling fragrance powered by zesty Tangerine and Peppermint. Its dose of deodorising Buchu extract leaves skin feeling pure, fresh and invigorated.

name: Bodycare Deodorant (65ml)

Non-irritating and safe enough to use after underarm hair removal. - K.N.

The best-selling formula is created using Grapefruit, Petitgrain and Lavender Essential Oils, which provide a gentle yet effective cleanse, whilst also toning the skin. Also enriched with Vitamin E, the soothing soap restores healthy moisture levels to skin.
Finished with a refreshing scent, the hand wash leaves hands cleansed and rejuvenated.

name: Fig Body Milk (200ml)
product_description:
KORRES Fig Body Milk has an exceptional moisturising, yet powdery texture that will leave a juicy scent of freshly cut figs on your skin.
KORRES Fig Body Milk is rich in trace elements that "awaken" the epidermis with an energy boost to skin cells. The combination of provitamin B5, shea butter and jojoba oil enhances the suppleness of your skin, while also providing long-lasting hydration.
Active Aloe®, extremely rich in vitamin C, vitamin E, zinc and antioxidant enzymes, supports the immune system of your skin, leaving it perfectly protected and soft.
Directions of use:

name: Men Multi-Use Shower Gel 200Ml
product_description:
The Multi-Use Shower Gel by Nuxe is an innovative 3-in-1 gel designed specifically for men. Working to cleanse the face, body and hair, the energising formula hydrates and nourishes to give a rejuvenated and refreshed feeling.
Containing a vegetable cleansing base, it'll leave skin feeling soft and hair feeling supple. A must have for any man! K.D.
