Give long lasting hydration to your skin with KORRES Vanilla Cinnamon Body Milk. This rich and creamy moisturising body milk has a woody pulsation that counterpoints the vanilla sweetness.
The body milk has an exceptional powdery texture and it provides a matte finish on your skin. It has a combination of provitamin B5, lanolin and Jojoba oil to enhance the suppleness of your skin, while active aloe juice supports its immune system.
Lookfantastic tip:
The Body Milk is ideally combined with KORRES Showergels in order to retain the fragrance much longer on your skin.
Directions of Use:

name: Himalayan Salt 2kg
product_description:
Detoxify your body with the Himalayan Salt from Westlab; the UK’s leading bath salt experts. Originating from the Himalayan Mountains millions of years ago, its pure formula contains over eighty minerals, including magnesium to soothe and repair damaged skin and regenerating calcium to promote cell renewal.
Helping to improve absorption of nutrients, increase circulation and stimulate the body's digestive and nervous systems, the salt removes toxins to leave the body feeling cleansed, radiant and healthy. Potassium, an ingredient that works to reduce stress and anxiety also minimises the risk of high blood pressure. E.N.

name: Antioxidant Cranberry Body Wash 887ml
product_description:
JÁSÖN Anti-Oxidant Cranberry Body Wash Pump (900ml) is a body cleanser that soothes and protects skin from signs of stress as well as thoroughly cleansing. Cranberry oil and aloe vera provide a gentle yet hydrating formula that helps reduce and prevent redness and rashes caused by stress, for healthy glowy skin.
Vitamin E and Pro-Vitamin B5 have been added to the natural blend for brighter protected skin from head to toe. - K.R

name: Body Ultimate Blends Restoring Lotion (400ml)
product_description:
Nourish and refresh skin with the Garnier Body Ultimate Blends Restoring Lotion. Carefully embedded with sensitive, reviving properties, the gentle cream sensitively heals the skin by inputting essential oils to areas of acute damage, ensuring an even, purer complexion.
Part of the Garnier Ultimate Blends range, the Restoring alternative caters especially to skin in need of renewal, providing ample levels of moisture, elasticity and suppleness. C.R

name: Dead Sea Salt 2kg
product_description:
Treat itchy or dry skin to the Dead Sea Salt from Westlab; the UK’s leading bath salt experts. Suitable for use on skin that is prone to eczema, acne and psoriasis, its high grade magnesium content restores and rebalances skin, whilst calcium and potassium support the natural repair process and replenish minerals.
Recognised for its low pollution levels and multiple benefits to health and well-being, the Dead Sea contains bromides to relax muscles and vitamin-rich green algae Dunaliella for antioxidant protection and cell renewal. Helping to supplement skin with optimum levels of moisture and hydration, you can expect soft, smooth skin from top to toe.

name: Chapman Skinesis Professional Cleansing Mitts x 4
product_description:
The Skinesis Professional Cleansing Mitts from Sarah Chapman allow you to experience salon style results in your own home. Specially designed with two layers of dual effect cotton fabric and a sponge inner to retain heat and moisture for high performance cleansing, the mitts fit comfortably onto the fingers for easy use.
Featuring one textured side to gently exfoliate the skin's surface, drawing out dirt and impurities, whilst the fine-weave side is ideal for the removal of eye make-up. Suitable for all skin types, you can expect a brighter, revitalised and clarified complexion.

name: Yoghurt Cooling Gel (150ml)
product_description: Rejuvenate and refresh skin after sun exposure with the KORRES Yoghurt Cooling Gel. The fast-absorbing gel delivers an instant cooling effect to soothe skin for long-lasting comfort. Enriched with yoghurt, a nourishing ingredient and natural source of lactose, proteins, minerals and vitamins, the after-sun deeply moisturises the skin's surface to leave it feeling calm and hydrated.

name: Thomas Roth Un-Wrinkle Peel Pads
product_description:
Reveal a refreshed complexion with the Peter Thomas Roth Un-Wrinkle Peel Pads; a gentle yet effective daily peel that chemically exfoliates the skin to restore a natural glow to the visage, whilst preparing the face for products to follow.
The pads utilise a 20% proprietary solution that combines Alpha, Beta, Gamma and Amino Acids. The acids blend with potent botanical extracts and antioxidants to perform an exfoliating action to skin when the pad is swept across the face. The peeling treatment also boasts moisturising properties, which ensure the complexion is calm and comfortable during exfoliation.
After use, the look of fine lines, wrinkles and enlarged pores are reduced, leaving the visage youthful and clarified. Ultra-convenient to use, the pads leave skin soft, smooth and visibly supple.

name: Foaming Cream Milk (200ml)
product_description:
Experience cleansing luxury with Embryolisse Foaming Cream Milk, a moisturising, soap-free emulsion that works to cleanse and nourish even the driest, most sensitive of skin.
With a rich and creamy texture derived from superfatty agents, the milky wash combines sweet almond oil with shea butter to gently and effectively soothe and clean your skin. Perfect for all skin types, the foaming milk will leave your skin feeling soft, supple and comfortable. - K.N.

name: Seaweed And Sage Body Wash (200ml)
product_description:
Stimulate your shower experience with REN Seaweed and Sage Body Wash. Formulated with seaweed extract and essential oils including geranium, cypress, rosemary and sage, this body wash tones and invigorates.
Using only 100% natural fragrances and being free from harsh sulphates and synthetic colours, the REN Seaweed and Sage Body Wash revitalises your skin while caring for it simultaneously.
Directions for Use

name: Santorini Vine Body Milk (40ml)
product_description: KORRES Santorini Vine Body Milk evokes the rugged landscape of Santorini with its fresh and fruity smell of Greek wine grapes. Influenced by sea air and volcanic soil it is a moisturising and protecting treat for your skin. This body milk will bathe your skin in moisture, combining almond oil, aloe vera, provitamin B5, shea butter, lanolin and jojoba oil for long lasting hydration and enhanced suppleness. Aloe in particular will provide your skin with superior protection from free radicals and give it nutrients such as Vitamin C, Vitamin E and zinc. LB

name: Naturally Unscented Deodorant Stick for Women (75g)
product_description:
Formulated from a fragrance free combination of green tea extract, vitamin E and corn starch for gentle freshness and long lasting protection, JASON Naturally Fresh Unscented Stick For Women keeps you cool and confident throughout the day.
Stay cool with JASON Naturally Fresh Unscented Stick For Women. Free from parabens and aluminum chlorohydrate, this natural stick defends against perspiration without masking the fragrance of your choice.
Directions of use:

name: Surge Lavender Meadow Hand and Nail Cream (75ml)
product_description:
Treat hardworking hands to the nourishing properties of Organic Surge Lavender Meadow Hand and Nail Cream, an antioxidant-rich formula that works to treat and comfort wanting hands and cuticles. Clinically proven suitable for sensitive and eczema prone skin.
Infused with a host of naturally conditioning ingredients, including Organic Shea Butter and Cocoa Butter, the quick-absorbing blend combines Organic Lavender and Geranium essential oils to keep moisture locked in; its deeply hydrating formula intensely moisturises skin to combat areas of dryness and irritation. Hands feel soft, supple, protected and replenished.

name: Krill Oil - 60 Gel Capsules (500mg)
product_description:
Cleanmarine Krill Oil gel capsules are an easy-to-consume food supplement to provide you with essential Omega 3 acids, which contribute to healthy heart, brain, eye and joint function as well as helping to enhance your mood and improve concentration.
Why choose Krill Oil over Fish Oil? Krill are shrimp-like crustaceans that provide a more sustainable and ethical source of Omega 3 with zero by-catch. The acids within Krill Oil are bound to phospholipids, a major component of human cell membranes, thus are much more rapidly absorbed than the fatty acids from fish oil supplements.
Krill Oil is also rich in Astaxanthin, a natural antioxidant, and there’s no fishy aftertaste. When taken on a regular basis, the Krill Oil supplements help maintain a healthy blood pressure and support normal brain function.

name: Heavenly Body Care Set (Worth £60.00)
product_description:
Treat your skin to the bliss Heavenly Body Care Set; a duo that work in tandem to leave you feeling perfectly pampered from top to toe. Complete with a branded wash bag, you can achieve super soft, smooth skin no matter where you are.
bliss Hot Salt Scrub™ (400g)
A skin-refining scrub infused with algae extract and glycerin to hydrate and soften the body. Self-heating sea salt gently exfoliates to diminish dry, dead skin, whilst a stimulating blend of rosemary and eucalyptus invigorate the mind and body. Eases muscles, loosens knots and clears sinuses to leave you rejuvenated and revitalised.
bliss 24-'heaven' Healing Body Balm (240ml)
A rich and luxurious cream to nourish skin and deliver twenty-four hour hydration. Perfect for areas that are cracked, chapped or uncomfortable, its fast-absorbing formula helps to replenish skin and relieve dryness, whilst a blend of exfoliating lactic acid and soothing oatmeal leave your body smooth and supple.

name: Republic Neck and Décolletage Repair Mask (38ml)
product_description:
Rediscover youthful skin with Skin Republic Neck and Décolletage Repair, an anti-ageing sheet mask treatment that provides deep level repair to help firm, smooth and lift the appearance of your skin.
Delivering nutrients and intense moisture with close and continuous contact, the 20 minute treatment is dedicated to rejuvenating and hydrating the delicate skin around your neck and décolletage. Combining Collagen with CoQ10 and Mulberry Bark Extract, the treatment peforms a firming and plumping effect on skin whilst brightening to reveal a more youthful look; fine lines and wrinkles are diminished and the severity of freckles and age spots are reduced. Rich in vitamins and antioxidants, it helps fight free radical damage and slows down signs of ageing. Its dose of Aloe and Liquorice work in tandem to lock in moisture and restore suppleness and youthful vitality.
Skin is glowing, radiant and revitalised.
Key Ingredients:
Collagen - maintains skin elasticity and strength.
CoQ10 - a naturally occurring enzyme essential for good health.
Mulberry Bark Extract - a natural skin brightener and anti-inflammatory.
Liquorice - helps restore suppleness to dry skin.
Green Tea - antioxidant that protects against free radicals.
Aloe - natural moisturiser that encourages natural collagen and elastin production.
Witch Hazel - naturally astringent and helps control water loss.
Vitamin E - a potent antioxidant with anti-ageing and moisturising properties.
Rice Bran Oil - rich in antioxidants to help fight free radicals and slow down signs of ageing.
Bearberry/Arbutin - improves clarity and helps diminish dark spots and pigmentation.
Vitamin C - an antioxidant that helps slow down free radical damage.
The Benefits of Using a Sheet Mask:
Sheet masks utilise a Transdermal Delivery System that ensures nutrients, nourishment and moisture are delivered deeply and effectively. Their breathable, 'second skin' nature allows for faster absorption than traditional masks and creams. They are also more hygienic.

name: Lemon and Sage Body Butter Pro-Size (946ml)
product_description:
The Lemon and Sage Body Butter from bliss is a luxurious moisturising butter to leave skin soft, hydrated and subtly scented with a refreshing citrus fragrance. Its paraben-free formula contains coconut oil to rejuvenate, soybean to deliver nourishing vitamins and algae extract to improve suppleness and firmness of skin. The non-greasy, thick butter provides antioxidant heather flower extract helps to regenerate and deeply condition skin, whilst boosting cell renewal to fight against signs of ageing and reduce fine lines and wrinkles. E.N.
Directions for use: Apply a generous amount to skin after cleansing. Focus on particularly dehydrated areas.

name: Divine Oil 50ml
product_description:
A nourishing multi-purpose miracle oil, Caudalie Divine Oil is an indulgent treat for dry skin, hair and nails. The unique blend of natural oils, gentle fragrances and softening shea butter can also be used to restore the skin in the bath or during a massage.
Rich argan oil reconditions and strengthens skin cells whilst extra virgin hibiscus oil prevents moisture loss. Caudalie Divine Oil leaves skin dramatically softer and youthfully supple; the light, dry oil formula sinks into the skin super quickly. The oil carries a beautiful fragrance that leaves skin and hair with a dewy freshness. Look and feel divine with velvety soft skin and a subtle, floral and sun-kissed fragrance, punctuated with woody undertones. Gorgeous!
Directions of use:

name: Mio Third Trimester Butter Bundle (Worth £72.50)
product_description:
Breeze through the final stages of pregnancy with the Mama Mio Third Trimester Butter Bundle.  Combining a trio of bestselling Mama Mio products, the bundle is designed to treat and care for mum-to-be during the third and final trimester of pregnancy, when fatigue levels are high and skin can be stressed. Host to a moisturising body butter, soothing breast cream and cooling leg gel, each product within the bundle is suitable for use whilst pregnant and will leave skin thoroughly nourished.
The Tummy Rub Butter (120g)
Help protect your skin against pregnancy stretch marks with The Tummy Rub Butter. Enriched with Omega 3, 6 and 9 essential fatty acids, the butter contributes towards skin's strength and elasticity, whilst organic Shea Butter provides a barrier to lock in moisture. Specially formulated with organic Rose Hip oil, which works to prevent and reduce the appearance of stretch marks during and after pregnancy, the luxurious butter works to hydrate skin, while Argan Oil helps nourish.
Pregnancy Boob Tube (100ml)
The Pregnancy Boob Tube bust cream soothes skin to leave it with a healthy glow. Enriched with organic Omega oils, Boob Tube hydrates by providing antioxidants to strengthen and help reduce the appearance of wrinkles. Specially formulated with unique Green Cabbage Leaf extract, its new and improved formula makes it pregnancy and breastfeeding safe.
Lucky Legs Cooling Leg Gel (100ml)
Help revive tired legs with Lucky Legs Cooling Leg Gel. The lightweight yet powerful gel leaves legs and feet feeling comfortable and soothed. Formulated with essential nourishing oils, menthols and spearmint to relax and refresh skin. The additional pressure and water retention when carrying a baby can start to weigh you down, so its compact size fits perfectly in your handbag for whenever you require a boost.

name: Fuzz Off Bikini Hair Removal Cream 60ml
product_description: Say goodbye to messiness and discomfort when using removal creams with Bliss Fuzz Off Bikini Hair Removal Cream. The fresh scent hair removal cream for the bikini area has a unique angled precision applicator allowing for fast, customised results. This ultra powerful, gentle cream soothes and smooths the bikini area with vitamin E, cocoa butter and Shea butter, allowing the control you need to style efficiently for optimal results. -SA

name: ISSA™ mini Brush Head - Wild Strawberry
product_description: The FOREO ISSA™ mini Brush Head in Wild Strawberry is made using premium grade silicone and without BPA and phthalates. Suitable for the ISSA™ toothbrush, the brush head discourages the formation of bacteria to leave your mouth feeling ultra clean. Boasting flexible bristles, the brush will give you a 3D clean and what’s more, it only has to be replaced once a year. – I.M

name: London Chinese Loofah With Rope
product_description:
The Hydrea London Chinese Loofah features a rope handle for easy smoothing and even easier storage. Use on the whole body to soften rough skin while this body buffer doubles as a relaxing massager.
Hydrea London Chinese Loofah is the ideal way to remove dry skin and impurities to leave your skin feeling softer, smoother, more fresh and toned. Your skin is your body's largest organ so care for it the natural way with the Natural Sea Sponge Co & Hydrea London.

name: Surge Fresh Ocean Hand and Body Lotion (250ml)
product_description:
Comfort and relieve dry skin with Organic Surge Fresh Ocean Hand and Body Lotion, an ultra-nourishing formula dedicated to softening, smoothing and replenishing your skin.
Its quick-absorbing texture rich in Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter and Glycerine expertly hydrates and protects, keeping moisture locked in whilst preventing irritation. Its blend of Citrus and stimulating Rosemary essential oils work in synergy to naturally eliminate toxins and rejuvenate dull skin. Skin feels nourished and conditioned.

name: Jasmine Hand Cream (40ml)
product_description:
Rejuvenate dry, over-worked and rough hands with Jurlique's Jasmine Hand Cream; a rich, non-greasy moisturiser that works to restore velvety soft, supple skin whilst delivering a soothing jasmine fragrance.
Deeply nourishing and rebalancing, the fast-absorbing cream is infused with almond and safflower seed oils to soothe and calm skin, leaving hands comfortable with long-lasting hydration.
Packed with natural antioxidants and plant-based ingredients to protect from environmental aggressors, helping to maintain youthful-looking, silky smooth hands. Presented in a branded box, making the perfect treat for yourself or loved one. E.N.

name: Bake Oil Free Mistifier Moisturiser Body Spray 120ml
product_description:
Helping to prepare your skin for the perfect tan, Fake Bake Oil Free Mistifier Moisturiser Body Spray, is a spray on moisturiser that combines two anti-oxidants including green tea and vitamin E which protect the skin from free radicals that age the skin.
The moisturiser also contains Ginger Root and Aloe Vera that soothes the skin. The mistifier is easy to apply and will leave you with hydrated skin that boasts radiant shine. -SA

name: Skincare Atlantic Kelp and Magnesium Anti-Fatigue Body Wash 300ml
product_description:
Refresh sluggish skin with the REN Skincare Atlantic Kelp and Magnesium Anti-Fatigue Body Wash; an energising cleanser that has an uplifting effect on both the skin and the senses.
Lathering over the body, the nourishing body wash effortlessly eliminates daily dirt and impurities from skin. The formula is enriched with Atlantic Kelp Extract, which ensures skin is comfortably hydrated and ultra-smooth.
The shower gel also boasts a blend of Plankton Extract and Magnesium, which seeks to energise the body by encouraging cell renewal and reducing stress damage. Finished with a signature dose of REN’s anti-fatigue essential oil blend, the anti-fatigue face wash not only cleanses the skin, but has an uplifting effect on the senses.

name: Tropez Classic Bronzing Lotion (120ml)
product_description:
Achieve a sun-kissed glow with the St. Tropez Classic Bronzing Lotion; an iconic self-tan formula that promises to deliver streak-free, radiant colour with no transfer or sticky residue.
Infused with vitamin E to protect skin, the ultra-hydrating lotion dries quickly and develops over 4-12 hours to leave you with a deep, long-lasting tan, whilst innovative Aromaguard™ Fragrance Technology banishes the unpleasant fake tan smell. Easy to apply, you can expect a natural-looking, golden colour that fades slowly and evenly. E.N.

name: Liberata Trystal Pressed Self Tanning Bronzing Minerals - Sunkissed
product_description:
Achieve glowing perfection with the Vita Liberata Trystal Pressed Self Tanning Bronzing Minerals; a long-wearing bronzing powder with a natural-looking, matte finish.
Infused with organic DHA actives and innovative Trystal3™ technology, the pressed powder glides effortlessly over the skin to define your favourite facial features whilst enhancing natural radiance to reveal a luminous glow. Can be applied over moisturiser and foundation for an all-over flush of colour.

name: Men's Body Hair Removal Serum (120ml)
product_description: The Inhibitif Body Serum for Men targets the hair follicle to slow down the growth rate of unwanted hair. Specially formulated with hydrating hyaluronic acid and plant-based active molecules, the serum moisturises skin and effectively reduces irritation and redness after shaving. Suitable for all skin types, it targets ingrown hairs and minimises visible regrowth and density of hair to allow you to shave or wax less often. E.N.

name: works In Transit Reviving Shower Gel (300ml)
product_description: Suitable for all skin types, the In Transit Reviving Shower Gel from this works gently cleanses skin to remove dirt and impurities. Its sulphate-free formula is enriched with essential oils, including zesty mandarin, rosemary and bergamot to leave the body and senses refreshed and rejuvenated. Ideal for use on-the-move, the shower gel allows you to experience cleansed, hydrated and silky soft skin. E.N.

name: T Shower Gel - Hibiscus & Acai Berry Tea 200ml
product_description:
Revitalise the mind and body with Bubble T's Hibiscus and Açai Berry Tea Shower Gel; a hydrating formula dedicated to cleansing, refreshing and nourishing skin from top to toe.
Infused with an antioxidant blend of Goji Berry and Hibiscus, the body wash gently eliminates impurities without stripping moisture, whilst delivering a delicious Strawberry fragrance to leave you bursting with energy and ready to face the day ahead.

name: Brown Comice Pear & Wild Honey Hand Cream
product_description: Soften and condition hands on-the-go with the Molton Brown Comice Pear & Wild Honey Hand Cream; a lightweight, fast-absorbing formula inspired by sun-drenched English meadows. Infused with White Truffle Extract, the luxurious cream moisturises and hydrates hands, whilst delivering a delicious fragrance of honeyed Comice Pears, fresh Gardenia and sweet Biscuit.

name: works Deep Sleep Shower Gel (250ml)
product_description:
This Deep Sleep Shower Gel by this works is designed to rejuvenate and relax the body whilst providing a thorough and deep cleanse to leave your skin soft and supple. Formulated with calming essential oils Lavender and Camomile abd Vetivert, this gel is free from sulphates and alcohol.
The perfect way to wind down after a stressful day, this shower gel protects the skin whilst calming a soothing to leave you feeling totally relaxed, hydrated and lightly fragranced. K.D.

name: Baby Calendula Moisturising Body Cream (75ml)
product_description: This Weleda Calendula Moisturising Body Cream is a rich body cream which protects and cares for the delicate and sensitive skin of babies and children. Helping to soothe irritation and combat excessive moisture build up, this cream contains extracts of biodynamic calendula and organic chamomile which protect dry or sensitive skin, allowing it to breathe freely. - E.D

name: Earth's Best Lavender Shampoo and Body Wash (251ml)
product_description:
JASON Earth’s Best Baby Care Shampoo & Body Wash gently cleanses baby’s skin and hair with mild tear-free surfactants. 70% organic, this hypo-allergenic formula is lightly scented with lavender oil to calm your baby during bath time.
Gentle enough to use on babies with eczema and cradle cap, JASON Earth’s Best Baby Care Shampoo and Body Wash nourishes skin and hair with glucan, oat oil and panthenol. Your baby’s body and hair will be left wonderfully soft with this mild wash.
Directions of use:

name: Evening Primrose Body Wash (200ml)
product_description:
The Evening Primrose range by Weleda is an award winning skincare series for women aged 56+. Instead of providing an anti-ageing effect, these products make mature skin look alive, a process Weleda calls “Age Revitalising”. With Evening Primrose they tone and hydrate the skin whilst boosting its radiance and metabolism.
Try for yourself and discover the Evening Primrose body wash’s smoothing, moisturising and truly rejuvenating effects. Ingredients such as organic Macadamia Nut Oil and Evening Primrose Oil make this body wash a feast for mature skin, giving it all the nutrients it needs. LB
Suitable for vegans.

name: Fuzz-Fighting 'Bod' Squad (Worth £49.00)
product_description:
bliss present the Fuzz-Fighting ‘Bod’ Squad; a trio of the brand's favourite products housed in a spotted wash bag. Combines a fuss-free hair removal cream, luxurious body butter and pads to prevent ingrowing hairs.
bliss 'Fuzz Off' Bikini Hair Removal Cream (60ml)
Banish unwanted bikini hair with the powerful, one-step removal cream; an innovative formula powered by oils from Brazil, Shea and Cocoa butters to prevent dryness. Its unique precision applicator tip allows you to achieve a perfectly smooth and shaped bikini line with ease.
bliss Lemon and Sage Body Butter (200ml)
A moisturising body butter with the brand's signature citrus scent. Enriched with sodium hyaluronate to lock in moisture, whilst coconut oil softens and antioxidant vitamin E smoothens and protects skin from environmental aggressors. Hydrates thirsty skin to leave it rejuvenated, supple and refreshed.
bliss Ingrown Hair Eliminating Pads (10 Packets)
Reduce hair growth between waxing and shaving with the innovative pads, packed with salicylic and glycolic acids to gently exfoliate the skin, whilst oat extract and witch hazel soothe and prevent irritation to restore long-lasting comfort. Perfect for men or women, use the pads daily to keep skin smooth, soft and lump-free.

name: Maxiwhite Intensive Whitening Toothpaste 75ml
product_description:
Experience fast results with Janina Maxiwhite Intensive Whitening Toothpaste; a low abrasion formula that visibly whitens teeth from the first use.
Gentle enough for daily use, the toothpaste thoroughly cleans teeth with a combination of antibacterial agents, which protect against tartar and calculus, whilst preventing plaque development. The whitening toothpaste utilises a patented Bromaine Complex, which combines natural enzymes of Papaya and Pineapple to visibly whiten teeth without using harsh abrasives. The addition of Hydroxyapatite intensifies brushing and accelerates whitening results.
The toothpaste is the perfect profuct for those seeking a brighter smile, or those with surface staining from coffee, nicotine etc. The intensive formula guarantees to leave teeth and gums clean and healthy, as well as visibly whiter.

name: Brown Black Pepper Anti-Perspirant Stick 75g
product_description:
Stay fresh with the Molton Brown Re-charge Black Pepper Anti-perspirant Stick, a spice-infused, roll-on deodorant enriched with anti-perspirant active and Andiroba Tree Oil.
Helping to keep your underarms fresher for longer, the deodorant promotes soft skin whilst imparting an energising fragrance of Black Peppercorns, Oakmoss and fresh Coriander.

name: SPF50+ Glimmer Sun Lotion (100ml)
product_description:
Achieve a radiant, sun-kissed effect with Ultrasun's SPF50+ Glimmer Sun Lotion; a fast-absorbing, water-resistant formula that provides very high sun protection to sensitive skin types.
Developed using innovative Infrared Technology, the powerful, antioxidant-rich lotion envelops skin with tiny golden 'glimmers' for a golden sheen, whilst delivering broad spectrum UVA and UVB protection with just one application. A holiday must-have for naturally glowing, protected skin without greasy or sticky residue.

name: Nourishing Body Lotion (250ml)
product_description:
This light body lotion from Caudalie is enriched with plant-derived ingredients to provide intense nutrition and anti-oxidant action for your skin. This Nourishing Body Lotion will leave your skin soft and firm with a delicate scent.
Caudalie Nourishing Body Lotion encourages micro-circulation and fights ageing, to soften and firm your skin. It contains a blend of grape-seed, sesame and borage oils and plant-derived glycerine to moisturise deeply and leave your skin feeling velvety soft.
Directions of use:

name: Fig Showergel (250ml)
product_description:
This creamy-foam shower gel gives you quantifiable, lasting moisturising effect. KORRES Fig Shower Gel has a pure, yet delicate aroma of freshly cut figs.
It contains Active Aloe, rich in vitamin C, E, zinc and antioxidant enzymes, which enhance the immune system of your skin. Furthermore, due to its ability to stimulate collagen and elastin synthesis, Active Aloe helps reduce the visible signs of ageing.
Directions of Use:

name: Ultrawhite Whitening Extra Strength Toothpaste 75ml
product_description:
Reveal a brighter smile with the Janina Ultrawhite Whitening Extra Strength Toothpaste; a low abrasion formula that gently and effectively whitens teeth.
Safe enough for daily use, the toothpaste thoroughly cleans teeth with a combination of antibacterial agents, which protect against tartar and calculus, whilst preventing plaque development. The whitening toothpaste utilises a patented Bromaine Complex, which combines natural enzymes to visibly whiten teeth without using harsh abrasives.
Ideal for those with surface staining or people desiring a brighter smile, the extra strength toothpaste leaves teeth and gums clean and healthy, as well as visibly whiter.

name: CHEMISTRY Extreme Hydration Complex (100ml)
product_description:
Perfect for hands that are exposed to cold weather or harsh conditions, HAND CHEMISTRY Extreme Hydration Complex has an ultra-concentrated, 24% active ingredient formula that contains five hydration active technologies from plant and marine sources to offer deep, long-lasting moisture and produce visible improvements to your skin's texture.
Made with a Pseudoalteromonas Complex which regenerates your skin, it also contains tremella fuciformis, a mushroom derivative that delivers hydration below your skin's surface. Meanwhile, the Protective Shield Matrix forms an invisible layer on the surface of your skin to aid moisture retention and protect against extreme coldness. - L.M.

name: Bake Fair Gradual Self Tan Lotion 170ml
product_description:
Ideal for first time tanners or for a buildable colour, the Fake Bake Fair Gradual Tan Lotion (170ml) is a tinted moisturiser that leaves skin with a natural looking, golden tan. Unlike other gradual tan moisturisers, Fake Bake Gradual Tan gives results from the first use, while also allowing you to build to a deeper tan if desired.
Enriched with protective and nourishing skin antioxidants, the moisturiser-like lotion makes it easy to smooth and blend so you're left with a patch and streak-free tan.
Whether you want to give yourself a darker tan, a first time tan, or  prolong your holiday tan, it allows those with fair skin to control the  colour of their tan, and leaves skin with a sweet smell of coconut. - K.R

name: Replacement Pads - Abs Belt (Triple Pack)
product_description: This value triple pack of Slendertone Replacement Pads provides three sets of adhesive pads to replace old pads in your Slendertone Abs Belt. Super easy to swap with minimal fuss, these patented pads last for up to approximately 20 sessions for great body toning. In order to maintain effectiveness, the pads need to be replaced regularly as they lose intensity over time. Achieve the body you’ve always dreamed of.

name: Rose Hand Cream Intense
product_description:
Utilising Ultra Pure Grade lanolin (Nature's Wonder Moisturiser™ which has a molecular structure that closely resembles and mimics your own skin lipids), the Lano Rose Hand Cream Intense delivers intensive hydration to very dry hands and nails.
With a rich, silky texture, the balm is fortified with antioxidant Rose Oil and comforting Shea Butter to nourish and moisturise wanting hands, leaving a silky, protective veil for continual hydration. Quickly absorbing into the skin, the intense formula will expertly hydrate your hands and revive your cuticles. Skin and nails feel nourished and replenished. Doubles as an excellent foot cream.

name: Almond Cherry Shower Gel 250ml
product_description:
Experience a nourishing cleanse with KORRES Almond Cherry Shower Gel.
Working to lift away impurities whilst intensely hydrating, the shower gel's moisturising properties make it ideal for every day, and its dose of wheat proteins create a protective shield on skin to maintain normal hydration levels. Skin feels clean and deeply nourished.

name: Brown Tobacco Absolute Deodorant Spray (150ml)
product_description: Molton Brown Tobacco Absolute Deodorant Spray delivers long-lasting freshness without leaving marks or stains. With a fast-drying formula, the deodorant fragrances skin with a deep, captivating aroma of cedarwood, nutmeg and rosewood, blended with contrasting citrus notes of bergamot and grapefruit and earthy Paraguayan tobacco, leather and balsam. E.N.

name: Body Wash Infused Sponge Animals - Duck
product_description:
Liven up bath time with the Spongellé Body Wash Infused Sponge Animals. Forming the adorably cute silhouette of a classic yellow duck, the multi-use sponge has been specifically designed for kids, harnessing proprietary infusion technology to deliver an in-built body wash system for effortless multi-tasking.
Dirt and grime is effortlessly swept away without the use of harsh chemicals, and each sponge is infused with a delectable ‘fruitilicious’ scent and soothing extract of Chamomile. Have fun at shower time while ensuring your little ones are left feeling squeaky clean.

name: ISSA Play Toothbrush - Black
product_description:
Introduce yourself to FOREO’s innovative oral-care line with the FOREO ISSA Play Toothbrush; a revolutionary toothbrush that encourages healthy teeth and gums, whilst adding a playful pop of colour to the bathroom.
The ISSA Play utilises the same intelligent technology as the previous ISSA toothbrushes, yet arrives as a battery-powered model. The toothbrush combines sonic pulse technology with a unique, hybrid brush head, which is effective in eliminating plaque, preventing cavities and discouraging tartar build-up. Delivering 9000 high-intensity pulsations per minute, the toothbrush thoroughly cleans and visibly whitens teeth, whilst comfortably massaging gums to promote strong and healthy results.
The ISSA toothbrushes are safe and ultra-hygienic as they harbour considerably less bacteria than regular nylon brushes. The ISSA Play boasts a hybrid brush head, which is crafted using antibacterial silicone bristles to the outer and PBT polymer bristles to the centre. The silicone bristles gently massage gums to prevent damage, whilst the polymer ones provide a more vigorous clean.
Easy-to-use, the ergonomic toothbrush is ideal for daily use and the lightweight design ensures it is travel friendly. The Swedish-designed brush is completely waterproof, which allows for easy cleaning and even in-shower use, which is ideal for those with busy lifestyles. Cost-effective with no changeable brush heads, the ISSA Play is the perfect introduction into the ISSA range. Discover a new kind of clean.

name: Spongology Body Wash Infused Back Buffer - Lavender & Eucalyptus
product_description:
Experience a revolutionary cleanse with the Spongellé Spongology Body Wash Infused Back Buffer in 'Lavender & Eucalyptus' from the brand's Shower with Nature Collection. The eco-friendly back buffer has been designed to easily cleanse those hard to reach areas with its time-released body wash.
Utilising Proprietary Infusion Technology that offers a guaranteed number of washes (over 30), the saturated buffer expertly cleanses, exfoliates and massages skin; it combines organic extracts to expertly lift away impurities whilst softening and hydrating. Its unique surface changes as you squeeze, from a gentle exfoliator to a soft, silky texture with rich and creamy lather that leaves skin feeling smooth, purified and revitalised.

name: Brown Japanese Orange Body Wash
product_description:
Experience an uplifting cleanse with Molton Brown Japanese Orange Body Wash, an aromatic bath and shower gel inspired by traditional Japanese baths.
Gently lifting away dirt and impurities, the skin-enriching formula cleanses skin whilst imparting a citrusy fragrance powered by Bergamot and Yuzu extract. Skin is left feeling pure, fresh and revitalised.

name: Sunshimmer In Shower Self-Tan 200ml
product_description:
Revolutionise your tanning routine with Rimmel's Sunshimmer In Shower Self-Tan, an innovative in-shower self-tan with one minute, express application.

One shade suits all, the formula is perfect for all over the body and delivers a softening and hydrating veil whilst working with your skin to create a radiant, sunkissed glow. Its glide-on, rinse-off formula is easy to apply and can be built upon to create a more intense tan. Skin feels soft and hydrated, and looks beautifully golden. - K.N.

name: Body Ultimate Blends Delicate Oat Milk Balm (200ml)
product_description:
Gratify and enrich skin with the Garnier Body Ultimate Blends Delicate Oat Milk Balm. Working predominantly to protect the outside epidermis, the restorative, active salve inputs extra hydration and moisture to weakened cells, helping to relieve tension and impairment.
Embedded with cleansing Oat Milk and White Almond Cream, the calming ingredients, inductive of serenity, soften and repair, whilst the rich, delicately spiced scent delegates a lively, opulent note. C.R

name: Body Scrub - Lemon & Sage (340g)
product_description:
Skin softening, circulation invigorating, creamy and oh-so refreshing, bliss body scrub – lemon & sage is a multi-talented scrub designed to lift away dead cells to leave your skin smooth, supple and super-silky.
Made to be massaged before you shower, bliss body scrub – lemon & sage features perfectly round, polyethylene beads that roll over the skin’s surface to gently slough away dead cells for smoother skin. Shea butter restores suppleness and improves the appearance of your skin whilst aloe hydrates, calms and heals your skin leaving it feeling reinvigorated and refreshed.
Directions of use:

name: You Have My Heart on a String Body Wash Infused Buffer - Peony Blossom
product_description:
Pamper your skin with the Peony Blossom scented You Have My Heart on a String Body Wash Infused Buffer from Spongellé. The red, heart shaped sponge is ideal for the shower and arrives with a useful hanging ribbon for when it is not in use.
Enriched with extracts of Yuzu, Edelweiss and Vetiver root, the multi-purpose buffing sponge is designed to cleanse, exfoliate, massage and hydrate the skin. The dual sided sponge comprises a soft side for cleansing and toning, whilst the textured side stimulates circulation and exfoliates the body.
The innovative buffer is infused with Peony Blossom fragranced body wash, which envelops the body in a subtle, yet energetic aroma. Creating a creamy lather for up to 14 showers, the sponge leaves skin thoroughly cleansed and feeling soft and silky.

name: Spearmint Exfoliating Sea Salt Scrub (350ml)
product_description:
Smooth your skin and awaken your senses with Cowshed Spearmint Exfoliating Sea Salt Scrub, an invigorating and cleansing polish that leaves skin refreshed and silky soft.
Cowshed Spearmint Exfoliating Sea Salt Scrub is made with aromatic spearmint essential oil and natural sea salt crystals to cleanse and buff the skin to perfection. Seaweed and honey treat your skin to nourishing anti-oxidants as rich macadamia oil wraps your skin in luscious moisture. Suitable for leaving all skin types silky soft and supple. Free from parabens, petrochemicals, sulphates and artificial colours.

name: Brown Gingerlily Body Lotion 300ml
product_description: Perfectly pamper skin with Molton Brown's Gingerlily Body Lotion; a fast-absorbing moisturiser developed to nourish, comfort and hydrate from top to toe. Enriched with White Lily Extract and Polynesian Tamanu Nut Oil, the luxurious, lightweight lotion conditions and softens skin, whilst enveloping the body in an exotic fragrance of Ginger, Tuberose and Cedarwood. Housed in a pump bottle for mess-free application.

name: Body Ultimate Blends Nourishing Oil (150ml)
product_description:
Soften and hydrate skin with the Garnier Body Ultimate Blends Nourishing Oil. Smooth and easy to apply, the gentle, lightweight texture absorbs into the skin like a cream, implementing intense levels of moisture, support and relaxation.
The natural strengthening properties imbue skin with prime defence to impurities, whilst the delicate, subtle shine of the oil leaves the complexion looking visibly glowing and radiant. C.R

name: Suncare Healthy Tan Secret Anti-Ageing Tan Accelerator (15x10ml)
product_description:
Give yourself a glowing tan with the BAKEL Suncare Healthy Tan Secret Anti-Ageing Tan Accelerator. Applied before your sunscreen, this clinically proven cream works to strengthen your skin’s natural defences in order to combat the harmful effects of UV rays.
Formulated with antioxidant-rich Mauritia oil and beta carotene, it helps your skin to tan more quickly as well as protecting against ageing. In addition, emblica fights against the oxidative damage and sunspots caused by sun exposure, promoting a more even tan.  Cruelty and vegan free, this product is suitable for all skin types. – I.M
Bakel utilise 100% natural active ingredients in all of their products, ensuring whatever touches your skin is good, natural and pure. With no perfumes, alcohol, artificial colours, preservatives or animal derivatives, every Bakel treatment is dermatologically tested and boasts minimal allergy risks. Built upon a strong foundation of objective confirmed and scientifically proven formulas, Bakel products are suitable for all skin types and fight against the main causes of skin-ageing.

name: Udderly Gorgeous Stretch Mark Oil (100ml)
product_description:
This specially formulated Stretch Mark Oil from Cowshed contains a soothing blend to keep you looking and feeling Udderly Gorgeous. Calendula and jojoba oils work with vitamin E to moisturise and soften the skin and prevent those dreaded stretch marks.
Containing sea buckthorn oil, an emollient packed with vitamins, minerals and essential fatty acids to pamper and protect the skin, the Udderly Gorgeous Stretch Mark Oil is just perfect for pregnant bellies. Cowshed’s botanical formulations are naturally paraben, petrochemical and sulphate free, suitable for vegetarians and contain certified organic ingredients.
Directions of use:

name: Infusion Blanc Moisture Soap 300ml
product_description:
Envelop skin in a heavenly aroma with the Infusion Blanc Moisture Soap from MÁDARA. Suitable for both the hands and body, the wash is designed to cleanse, soften and hydrate the skin, whilst delivering a sensual fragrance.
The shower gel boasts a heady aroma, consisting of White Jasmine Flowers, blending with soft Meadowsweet and an alluring hint of Butterfly Orchids. Offering cleansing and moisturising properties, the luxurious formula leaves the hands and body clean, soft and aromatically fragranced.

name: Boo Happy Baby Shower - Body Wash and Top To Toe
product_description: The Love Boo Happy Baby Shower - Body Wash and Top To Toe contains two nourishing body washes - one for mother and one for baby. Formulated with an expert blend of hydrating and softening ingredients, the mild and gentle products are suitable for even the most sensitive and delicate skin. - L.M.

name: Paris Men Expert Carbon Protect Deodorant 250ml
product_description: With 48 hour protection, the Carbon Protect Deodorant from L'Oréal Paris Men Expert releases a long-lasting intense ice fragrance. The anti-perspirant spray offers four-in-one protection, fighting against odour, perspiration, bacteria, and yellow stains. – E.W.

name: Klein Eternity for Men Hair and Body Wash (200ml)
product_description: Revitalise from head to toe with the Eternity for Men Hair and Body Wash from Calvin Klein. Its two-in-one formula eliminates impurities from skin without over-drying, whilst gently cleansing the hair to leave it soft and full of shine. Imparts a masculine fragrance of fruity mandarin, zesty lemon and bergamot, blended with geranium, sage and basil. Perfect for travelling, home or sports activities, the hair and body is left refreshed and subtly scented. E.N.

name: Hand and Nail Cream (50ml)
product_description:
MONUspa Hand and Nail Cream is a beautifully rich conditioning cream, making it the perfect treat to soothe hard working hands, leaving them feeling smooth, soft and in gorgeous condition. Don’t leave home without this beauty must have!
Used by professional therapists, MONU have perfected their unique beauty treatments using only the purest ingredients to deliver you beautiful products that care for your skin. Infused with uplifting Lemon and Lavender scents, this MONUspa Hand and Nail Cream is a treat for your senses too! Pop it into your handbag and keep your hands feeling soft and smooth all day long!
Directions of use:

name: Botanicals Boticario di Havana Body Wash 891ml
product_description: Based on the best-selling Havana fragrance range, the Archipelago Botanicals Boticario di Havana Body Wash, scented with Ylang Ylang, Tobacco Flower and Bergamot, is a gentle, exfoliating body wash packed with antioxidants and AHA’s to hydrate, cleanse and detoxify the skin. With a fresh citrus finish, the body wash is suitable for both men and women and is ideal for daily use for beautifully moisturised, deliciously scented and silky soft skin.

name: Glowing Apricot Hand & Body Lotion 227g
product_description:
Relieve very dry, dull skin with JÁSÖN Organic Apricot Hand and Body Lotion, a botanically rich, non-greasy daily lotion that works to deliver long-lasting hydration.
Formulated with apricot and almond oil, the lotion hydrates and nourishes even the driest of skin, to leave your skin gorgeously soft and glowing with radiance. -SA

name: Semonin Exfoliating Shower Gel 200ml
product_description:
Achieve touchably soft, smooth skin with the Anne Semonin Exfoliating Shower Gel; a refreshing formula that works to eliminate impurities from the body without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness.
Enriched with natural Cellulose Extracts (derived from biodegradable wood pulp), the shower gel gently buffs the skin's surface to diminish dead skin cells, whilst antioxidant Vitamin E protects and regenerates to leave the body detoxified, revitalised and refined. Imparts a luxurious fragrance of Jasmine and Green Tea.

name: Doctor ApiNourish Firm Body Moisturiser 130ml
product_description:
Look the bee’s knees with the ApiNourish Firm Body Moisturiser from Manuka Doctor, a luxurious body cream that works to smooth, firm and lift, enriched with extracts straight from the hive which are scientifically proven to leave skin looking more youthful.
A rich yet easily absorbed formula, the signature ingredients Purified Bee Venom™ and manuka honey boost collagen and naturally stimulate elastin reproduction to plump skin and refine the appearance of lines.
Deeply hydrating, Shea butter and Silk extract help soften dry areas and seal in moisture, whilst Chicory Root, Caesalpinia Spinosa Gum and Red Algae work to contour, tighten and tone. It's a must-have anti-ageing product for healthy, glowing skin.

name: Energy Burst Bath & Shower Drops
product_description:
Enjoy an uplifting soak with the Energy Burst Bath & Shower Drops from NEOM’s Scent To Boost Your Energy™ collection. Designed to deliver therapeutic benefits to the mind and body, the bath and shower drops leave skin smooth and comfortable, whilst boasting a rejuvenating scent.
The luxurious oil comprises a natural fragrance that combines pure essential oils. Enriched with a blend of sun dappled Grapefruit, Lemon, and Rosemary, the formula envelops skin in a refreshing aroma that encourages clear, positive thinking. Complete with Vitamins A and E, alongside skin-loving Safflower oil, expect to feel hydrated and refreshed.

name: Men Expert Fresh Extreme Deodorant Spray (250ml)
product_description:
For a long lasting fresh feeling and extreme protection against wetness and odour choose L’Oréal Men Expert Fresh Extreme Deodorant Spray. Using high performance technology and a 48 hour antiperspirant action it gives unbeatable freshness.
L’Oréal Men Expert have put all their expertise into creating a range of long-lasting antiperspirant deodorants, and with proven 48 hour action and a fresh, minty fragrance L’Oréal Men Expert Fresh Extreme Deodorant Spray is the top performing choice for those who need tried and tested results.

name: Style+ Black Pepper & Bergamot Shower Gel 100ml - Create & Shape
product_description:
Show your skin and hair who's boss with the men-ü Style+ Black Pepper & Bergamot Shower Gel and Create & Shape. The pair work in synergy to leave your skin clean and fresh, and your hair styled to perfection.
Black Pepper & Bergamot Shower Gel (100ml):
An invigorating shower gel enriched with a host of active ingredients and moisturising agents to leave skin clean and refreshed. Transforming into a rich lather, the concentrated formula delivers Pro Vitamin B5 and Vitamin E to keep skin soft and protected. Infused with a spicy, fruity scent to energise the senses.
Create & Shape (100ml):
A flexible hold styling formula that allows you to shape and re-shape your hair with medium hold and natural shine. Adding texture and definition to your hair, the fibrous formula will help to smoothen frizz while keeping your style in place.

name: People No Scent Baby Lotion (150ml)
product_description:
Featuring organic hemp, calendula & aloe vera the Green People No Scent Baby Lotion is a three in one organic baby lotion. Massaging, moisturising and cleansing little bottoms this natural cream is especially formulated for delicate, young skin.
Containing herbal ingredients to protect and heal sensitive skin, the Green People Dry Skin Baby Lotion promises to calm and soothe baby’s skin. Certified organic and free from parabens, lanolin, phthalates and artificial perfumes it is the purest moisturiser nature can offer.
Green People use recyclable packaging that is non air freighted. Containing only the purist natural and organic ingredients hand made in small quantities, they ensure you receive the products as fresh as possible. These products are also suitable for vegans and vegetarians.
Directions of use:

name: & Evelyn Caribbean Island Wild Flowers Body Polish (175g)
product_description: Buff away the day's impurities with the Crabtree & Evelyn Caribbean Island Wild Flowers Body Polish. Combining soothing aloe vera and grapefruit peel powder with avocado stone granules, the foaming body polish works to moisturise and exfoliate to leave your skin smooth, clean and radiant. Deeply hydrating, your skin will soak up the benefits of glycerine and soybean oil whilst giving in to a delicious scent of spider lily, wild flowers and tropical citrus with a splash of sea air. - K.N.

name: Holistic Skincare Gentle Exfoliating Scrub – 150ml
product_description:
Smooth skin and remove dead skin cells with the Gentle Exfoliating Scrub from Joshi. The face scrub contains moisturising Shea Butter to keep the skin nourished and soft, whilst Vitamin E works as an antioxidant to protect against cell damage.
Grape Seed Oil, a rich source of Linoleic acid, is an essential fatty acid with anti-inflammatory and hydrating properties. Crushed grape seeds and jojoba beads act as the exfoliants to refine skin’s texture and brighten the complexion. Fragranced with Rosemary essential oil. – R.R.

name: Botanicals Advanced Body Cream (200ml)
product_description:
Synergising the brand's skincare expertise and the finest ingredients from around the world, Dr Botanicals present the Advanced Body Cream. Suitable for all skin types, the rich, renewing formula melts effortlessly onto skin to replenish moisture and deliver long-lasting hydration for restored comfort.
Working to soften dry or mature skin and rebalance combination or oily skin types, the lightweight body cream is infused with a blend of botanical extracts, including elderflower, coconut oil, jasmine and shea butter to deeply nourish the body, whilst antioxidant vitamin E protects from environmental aggressors and fights against signs of ageing. Boosts elasticity and minimises the appearance of wrinkles, revealing younger-looking, smoother and brighter skin. E.N.

name: Supersalt Dead Sea Skin Repair
product_description: Treat dry, eczema-prone skin to the Supersalt Dead Sea Skin Repair from Westlab, the UK’s leading bath salt experts. Harnessing the powers of mineral-rich Dead Sea Salt and essential oils of Lavender and Chamomile, the bath salts help to moisturise and protect delicate skin, whilst relieving feelings of itchiness for long-lasting comfort. Enriched with Magnesium, Calcium and Potassium, Dead Sea Salt rebalances, repairs and restores softness and suppleness.

name: Earth's Best Mineral Sunscreen SPF30 (113g)
product_description:
Hypo-allergenic and fragrance and paraben free, JASON Earth’s Best Baby Care Mineral Based Sun Block SPF30+ keeps baby’s skin protected from the sun’s harmful rays without upsetting their delicate skin.
Allow your baby to play safely in the sun with JASON Earth’s Best Baby Care Mineral Based Sun Block SPF30+. Formulated specially to be kind to delicate skin, your child will be protected whilst their skin is kindly cared for.
Directions of use:

name: Black Epic Moisture Hand and Cuticle Cream
product_description:
Hydrate and soothe dry, over-worked hands with the Epic Moisture Hand and Cuticle Cream from Jack Black. Specifically developed for men, the fast-absorbing formula deeply moisturises and protects chapped skin and delivers a refreshing fragrance of ginger and verbena.
A powerful cocktail of allantoin and glycerin softens the hands and cuticles, whilst a dose of antioxidants and macadamia nut oil deeply nourish and condition. Ideal for use on rough elbows and feet, you can expect rejuvenated, smoothened skin with restored comfort. E.N.

name: Calming Lavender Roll-On Deodorant (85g)
product_description:
Soothing, safe and providing long-lasting protection, JASON Lavender Roll On Deodorant is enriched with certified organic tea tree oil, vitamin E and corn starch to provide you with gentle and comforting freshness.
Stay calm and fresh with JASON Lavender Roll On Deodorant. Free from aluminum chlorohydrate this soothing deodorant will keep you protected throughout the day.
Directions of use:

name: Gold Shimmer Oil (100ml)
product_description:
The Omorovizca Gold Shimmer Oil is a luxurious, shimmering oil treatment that infuses skin with essential nutrients and vitamins to leave it feeling hydrated, replenished and rejuvenated.  
Imbued with the lush delicate scent of Ylang Ylang, the lightweight formula contains Collodial Gold particles, which help combat microdamage and strengthen skin’s natural barrier while leaving a subtle iridescent shimmer.
Calendula Oil calms and soothes irritations, while antioxidant-rich Vitamin E fights free radical damage and stimulates collagen production for a plumping effect. Ideal for dry, dull and fatigued skin, the indulgent oil pampers and nourishes for a healthy-looking radiance.

name: Sun Radiance Self-Tanning Face & Body Cream 125ml
product_description:
This sun radiance self-tanning face and body cream from Phytomer will provide you with a natural looking sun-kissed even tan.
It is easy to apply and will leave you with a long lasting natural colour.

name: Sole Mate
product_description:
A perfectly matched, dual sided foot file and smoother, the Tweezerman Sole Mate provides a specialised experience for expert pedicure maintenance. With an ingenious patented magnetic design, this no-fumbling tool is simple to use and take on the go.
The secret of the Tweezerman Sole Mate is its uniquely shaped built-in case, contoured not only for excellent ergonomic function, comfort and control, but to conveniently keep the two expert tools compactly stored, clean and protected. With one side providing professional quality removal of calluses and rough dead skin, and the other buffing skin to touchably smooth softness, this lightweight and sleek foot file will ensure your toots look and feel top notch all year round.

name: Brown Rosa Absolute Bathing Oil 200ml
product_description:
Experience the sumptuous fragrance of Molton Brown's Rosa Absolute Bathing Oil; a delicately scented elixir inspired by mysterious paintings of Lombardia's Late Renaissance period.
Releasing notes of Italian Rose, sweet Blackcurrant, aromatic Geranium and rich Patchouli, the intoxicating elixir will seduce your senses, whilst restoring velvety soft, supple and perfectly pampered skin with a delicate scent. Housed in a luxurious gift box.

name: Nurture Body Oil 100ml
product_description:
Invigorate your senses and soften skin with the AromaWorks Nurture Body Oil, a nourishing blend of five essential oils that help soothe both the body and mind whilst enveloping skin in moisture.    
Offering a sensual aromatherapy experience, the oil combines a harmonic blend of crisp May Chang, sweet Roman Chamomile and delicate Sandalwood with Organic Coconut Oil to leave skin feeling intensively nourished and soothed. Discover your inner calm whilst improving skin texture.

name: The Ritual of Dao Body and Massage Oil (100ml)
product_description:
Create a spa-like experience at home with Rituals The Ritual of Dao Body and Massage Oil, a calming formula that works to nourish and soothe dry skin.
Utilising an ancient Chinese philosophy that helps one achieve perfect harmony, the oil combines the nourishing properties of Yi Yi Ren with a gentle White Lotus fragrance to moisturise and calm wanting skin. Enjoy its relaxing properties. Skin feels calmed and comfortable.

name: London - Walnut Wood Bath Brush
product_description:
Beautifully sculpted from strong and polished walnut wood, the ergonomic design of the Hydréa London Oval Walnut Bath Brush makes it ideal for bathing and spa use. Perfectly designed for long reach use with the smoothly curved detachable handle. 
The Hydréa London Oval Walnut Bath Brush with its unique contoured brush head and woven hand strap is perfectly designed to fit the hand for firm brushing. This contemporary body brush will complement the most stylish of bathrooms and is the simple and natural way to improve your energy and wellbeing. 
Brushing with the Hydréa London Oval Walnut Bath Brush stimulates the lymphatic system to remove toxins and help reduce the appearance of cellulite, while stimulating blood circulation to encourage cell renewal. The exfoliation action removes dead skin cells and prevents in growing hairs leaving your skin smooth and fresh.  A regular gentle brushing routine will leave your body youthful and radiant from the inside out. 
Directions of Use:

name: Organic Baby & Kids Oat & Camomile Gentle Wash 200ml
product_description:
Be kind to young skin with the Oat & Camomile Gentle Baby Wash from MÁDARA. The mild formula is designed especially for delicate skin, perfect for babies and children.
Infused with Camomile and Oats, the wash produces a soft foam, which gently cleanses the body hands and face. Leaving skin clean and happy.

name: Hauschka Moor Lavender Calming Body Oil (75ml)
product_description:
Treat your skin to the Dr. Hauschka Moor Lavender Calming Body Oil; a fast-absorbing oil developed to calm, warm and comfort skin from top to toe. Infused with horse chestnut, horsetail and moor extract to melt away the tensions and stresses of everyday life and promote a restful night's sleep.
Its unique formula is carefully blended with olive oil using innovative rhythmic processing methods, heating the mixture to body temperature 37°C to transfer skin nurturing properties into the oil. Expect deeply relaxed, protected and softened skin with a soft scent of soothing lavender. E.N.

name: AromaBomb Quad Set
product_description:
Let your troubles melt away with the AromaWorks AromaBomb Quad Set, a combination of four lavish bath bombs that turn an everyday bath into a luxurious spa-like experience. Enriched with nourishing essential oils and sensual fragrances, it makes the perfect gift for a friend or loved one.
Nurture AromaBomb
Release the stress of the day with the Nurture bath bomb, a detoxifying blend of essential oils and salts to deliver a therapeutic bathing experience. Enriched with Lavender, May Chang and Sandalwood for a sweet, relaxing aroma, the bath bomb contains Pink Himalayan Sea Salt and calming Calamine to help soothe both the body and mind.    
Serenity AromaBomb
Made from the finest salts and powders, the Serenity bath bomb blends four pure essential oils with detoxifying Himalayan Sea Salt and calming Calamine to leave you feeling relaxed and at ease. Enjoy a Zen-like bathing experience and let your troubles melt away as the warm, citrus fragrance powered by Lemongrass and Neroli envelops your senses.
Inspire AromaBomb
A luxurious blend of Himalayan Sea Salt and Calamine combine to deliver a therapeutic bathing experience. The Inspire bath bomb envelops the body in scents of purity, with notes of fresh Lime, Bergamot and Geranium combining to create a fruity fragrance and a comforting aroma.
Soulful AromaBomb
The Soulful bath bomb infuses the water with essential oils and helps combat feelings of anxiety and stress to leave you feeling truly relaxed. A lush blend of Himalayan Sea Salt and Calamine combine to deliver a therapeutic bathing experience. It envelops the body in scents of purity, with notes of Juniper Berry, Patchouli and Bergamot combining to create a warm, spicy fragrance and a comforting aroma.

name: Ambra Nera Shower Gel (250ml)
product_description: This spicy Shower Gel is made with natural vegetable bases, an Olive Oil base, without parabens. Infused with scent of spicy exotic woods, Vetiver, Patchouli and Cedar over an amber base of Labdanum, Oak Musk, Galbanum and Resins, this makes for a delightful Mediterranean shower experience.

name: Exfoliating and Cleansing Bar 198g
product_description: Revitalise skin from top to toe with the Anthony Exfoliating and Cleansing Bar; a dual-action soap bar for the face and body. Infused with skin-polishing Jojoba Spheres, the luxurious formula effortlessly eliminates impurities and buffs away dead skin cells, whilst moisturising Shea Butter and Coconut Oil restore softness and suppleness. Suitable for all skin types, its dose of Cucumber Extract and Grapefruit fragrance promise to leave the face and body feeling soothed, refreshed and hydrated.

name: Spa Factory Lime and Lemongrass Body Scrub
product_description:
Invigorate the skin and senses with Natural Spa Factory's Lime and Lemongrass Body Scrub; a revitalising, awakening formula that works to revive tired, aching bodies.
Fortified with vitamin-rich Sweet Almond and Grape Seed Oils, the exfoliating salt scrub gently buffs away dead, dull skin cells, whilst providing antioxidant protection to shield from free radical damage. Envelops the body with an uplifting cocktail of Lime and Lemongrass, leaving you feeling restored and rejuvenated from top to toe.

name: & Oil Nourish & Invigorate Soap for Men 100g
product_description: Catering specifically for men, the You & Oil Nourish & Invigorate Soap delivers a deep cleansing action to leave you feeling refreshed and revitalised around the clock. Enriched with Olive and Coconut Oils, the soap diminishes dirt and impurities whilst locking in moisture and protecting skin from environmental aggressors.

name: Balancing Lavender Body Wash (200ml)
product_description:
Experience a soothing cleanse with Kneipp Balancing Lavender Body Wash, a soap-free, pH balanced formula that performs a gentle cleanse whilst relaxing the body and mind.
Infused with natural Lavender oil, the aromatic body wash gently lifts away dirt and impurities whilst easing away feelings of tension. Its calming aroma inspires feelings of well-being and has a balancing effect after a long, hard day. Skin feels fresh, soft and supple.

name: Doctor 24K Gold & Manuka Honey Hand Oil 25ml
product_description:
Pamper hardworking hands with the Manuka Doctor 24K Gold & Manuka Honey Hand Oil; a hydrating solution that effortlessly melts into hands, leaving skin nourished and nails strengthened.
The hand oil is fortified with 24k Gold, Manuka Honey and a variety of luxurious Plant Oils, which work in synergy to envelop hands in a veil of essential and long-lasting moisture. Not only hydrating dry hands, the oil helps to restore elasticity to skin to leave hands visibly firm and supple.

name: Spa Factory Coconut and Lychee Body Buff
product_description:
Slough away dead skin cells with the Coconut and Lychee Body Buff from Natural Spa Factory. The luxurious, fine grain salt scrub is blended with Coconut pulp, Lychee seeds and Grape Seed oil, guaranteed to leave skin smelling good enough to eat.
Ideal for those with sensitive skin, the scrub is enriched with Coco Nucifera, which is naturally antibacterial and antifungal, as well as thoroughly moisturising. The formula is also rich in Vitamin E and a blend of proteins, which help to keep skin smooth and protect against dehydration. Skin is left protected against premature ageing, including fine lines and wrinkles, as well as defending against free radicals.

name: Advance Multivitamin Tablets - (60 Tablets)
product_description:
Centrum Advance Multivitamin Tablets are perfect for those with on-the-go, busy lifestyles that mean it isn’t easy to maintain a completely balanced diet, delivering essential vitamins and minerals to supplement your nutritional needs.   
The world’s number one multivitamin is established through 30 years of scientific research and nutritional expertise, combining 25 key nutrients with all 13 essential vitamins to support vitality and immunity while contributing to normal vision and heart health.
B Vitamins help to release food-based energy for an overall boost, plus Vitamin C supports the immune system and increases antioxidant levels. Vitamins A, C and Biotin maintain healthier looking skin, while Calcium improves the normal function of digestive enzymes to enable a normal metabolism. Feel at your best with the quick and easy-to-take daily food supplement.

name: Life Elixirs Fortitude Bath and Shower Elixir 100ml
product_description:
Empower the spirit with the Elemis Life Elixirs Fortitude Bath and Shower Elixir; a luxurious bath and shower oil that conditions and fragrances skin, whilst encouraging feelings of confidence.
Intelligently combining 19 essential oils, including Geranium, Cedarwood and Ylang Ylang, the sensuous fragrance seeks to promote strength and determination. Simply apply to running bath water, or to the body whilst showering and the silky oil will help you to find your inner resolve.
Skin is nourished and delicately scented.

name: Tresor La Nuit Shower Gel 200ml
product_description:
Experience an invigorating cleanse with Lancôme Tresor La Nuit Shower Gel, a refreshing body wash infused with the intoxicating scent of the Tresor La Nuit fragrance.
Enriched with cleansing agents, the shower gel transforms into a rich lather to gently lift away dirt and impurities. Skin is left feeling soft, supple and delicately fragranced with notes of Raspberry, Damascena Rose and Vanilla.

name: Home Spa Scented Water - Anti-Fatigue 150ml
product_description:
Awaken your senses with the Anti-Fatigue Home Spa Scented Water from PUPA; an ultra-fine mist that fuses together Cedarwood and Vetiver for a bold, unisex fragrance to uplift and invigorate.
A delicate balance of effervescent Orange Oil notes and transparent water accords create a fresh and positive scent, with Lavender Oil transporting the mind to an undulating field of hazy purple flowers. Suitable for all over body use, the addition of Bamboo extract leaves skin feeling comfortable, toned and supple.

name: Home Spa Massage Cream - Anti-Stress 250ml
product_description:
Soothe both your skin and mind with the Anti-Stress Home Spa Massage Cream from PUPA. The velvet-smooth, emollient-rich formula effortlessly absorbs into skin, ideal for an indulgent massage with aromatherapy benefits.
Enriched Pearl extract, it cocoons skin in a soft veil of moisture and light reflecting pigments, creating a youthful visage. The addition of Patchouli Oil creates a familiar, warm scent that instantly calms the mind and alleviates stress. Skin feels smooth and supple while your senses feel relaxed and tranquil.

name: Spa Factory Fig and Vanilla Hand Wash
product_description: Purify skin with the Fig and Vanilla Hand Wash from Natural Spa Factory. Combining the alluring earthy tones of Fig with the delectable sweetness of Vanilla, the sulphate-free hand wash is formulated with naturally-extracted Coco Glucoside for an indulgent creamy lather and Vitamin-E rich Tocopherol for powerful antioxidant protection. Suitable for daily use, skin is left feeling softened, cleansed and hydrated.

product_description:
Sambucol Effervescent Immuno Forte is a health supplement that helps to support the immune system. With an AntiVirin® formula, it's rich in vitamin C, zinc and antioxidants which can help to boost your body's natural defences.
Featuring a delicious berry flavour, the non-drowsy supplement is free from alcohol and gluten. Simply dissolve one tablet in a glass of hot or cold water and enjoy the drink. Suitable from ages 4+. - L.M.

name: & Evelyn La Source Hand Therapy (250g)
product_description:
The award-winning shea butter hand cream formula in this Crabtree & Evelyn La Source Hand Therapy will leave your hands feeling incredibly smooth and soft. The perfect fit for dry, rough skin.
Formulated with marine and botanical extracts, this Crabtree & Evelyn La Source Hand Therapy has a calming and uplifting fresh fragrance with a hint of peppermint and lavender. The shea butter and herb formula works to soothe, moisturise and condition dry or rough hands. Scented with a crisp, clean scent reminiscent of fresh sea air, let this hand therapy take your senses on a voyage across the ocean. 
Directions of use:

name: Clarity Hand Lotion (500ml)
product_description:
Rejuvenate dry, tired hands with this non-greasy, creamy hand lotion from Jurlique. Enriched with uplifting natural herbal extracts, this specially created formula contains primrose, macadamia and avocado oils, combined with shea butter to deeply nourish and moisturise hands. The gender-neutral scent of patchouli and orange blossom makes it ideal for anyone who wants to replenish and soften skin.
Directions for use: Apply 1-2 pumps of lotion to hands and massage in until absorbed.

name: Konjac Sponge Company 100% Pure Lilac Lady Sports Sponge
product_description:
The Konjac Sponge Company presents the 100% Pure Lilac Lady Sports Sponge, a naturally sustainable cleanser perfect for after a workout. Delicately handmade purely from moisture-rich Konjac plant fibres and Volcanic Water, it helps revive tired and aching muscles and keeps skin feeling supple.
The innovative biodegradable sponge has a unique net-like structure that turns silky soft when wet and works to deeply cleanse and gently exfoliate; getting rid of sweat and dirt whilst stimulating blood flow and cell renewal. Konjac is a natural wonder – it’s been used in Southern Asia for over 1,500 years as a medicinal and beauty treatment, and it is alkaline based thus balances any acidity in skin and restores optimum pH levels.
Lasting for up to 3 months, the sponge is presented in a handy travel pouch so that you can keep the rest of your sports kit dry. Suitable for use with or without a cleanser, just add water and experience an all-natural, refreshing cleanse that will leave skin feeling smooth and revitalised.

name: Mist Intense (148ml)
product_description:
XEN-TAN Mist Intense is perfect if you forgot to tan the night before, as you can easily apply it in the morning for a radiant glow. Spread the fine mist easily over your skin for a dark, instant colour which leaves a gorgeous tan for up to 7 days.
Gently fragranced this paraben free XEN-TAN Mist Intense spray makes that awful chemical fake tan smell a thing of the past. Delivering a long-lasting olive colour this light, non sticky mist dries quickly for an instant glow that also works as a great top up to the XEN-TAN lotion or mousse. Just dress and go!
Directions of use:

name: Hero Project Hand Rehab Diamond Dusted Hand & Nail Therapy with SPF 20 75ml
product_description:
We put our hands through a lot, so The Hero Project have developed the Hand Rehab™ Diamond Dusted Hand & Nail Therapy with SPF 20 to give them the pampering they deserve. The rich, ultra-hydrating hand cream melts into skin without feeling greasy, imparting a smooth, supple texture with additional protective benefits.
Subject to continuous washing, multi-tasking and damaging UV rays, hands are one of the first places to show signs of ageing. The luxurious Hand Rehab™ contains a powerhouse blend of moisture-rich Hyaluronic Acid and Aloe Vera for long lasting hydration, as well as finely-milled Diamond Dust, which gently buffs away dead skin cells and impurities while strengthening nails and tidying cuticles.
As a result, hands appear brighter and feel sumptuously softened, with the appearance of wrinkles and dark spots visibly reduced. Give your hands the extra TLC they deserve with this multi-tasking beauty treat.

name: Strawberry Pack (8 Servings)
product_description:
The Emergen-C Strawberry Pack contains sachets of the original formula Emergen-C fizzy drink. Containing 1000mg of vitamin C and other immunity-supporting antioxidants, the supplement also has seven different B vitamins which naturally enhance your energy levels, whilst electrolytes replenish your system after a tough workout!
Specially formulated for adults, the drinkable supplement also contains real fruit extracts for added nutrients. Perfect for energy release and immunity support, Emergen-C complements an active lifestyle and a balanced diet. - L.M.

name: Evening Primrose Ribbon Box (Worth £35)
product_description:
Treat yourself or a loved one to the Evening Primrose Ribbon Box from Weleda. Combines a creamy body wash, skin-softening body lotion and fruity fragrance spray, all wrapped in a branded gift box.
Evening Primrose Revitalising Body Wash (200ml)
A fresh, floral shower cream developed for mature skin. Harnessing the powers of Macadamia Nut Oil and Organic Evening Primrose, the luxurious body wash delicately cleanses skin, whilst imparting a relaxing fragrance to leave you feeling calm and restored. Expect soft, smooth and supple skin from top to toe.
Evening Primrose Age Revitalising Body Lotion (200ml)
A lightweight, fast-absorbing formula that works to nourish and hydrate without greasy residue. Fortified with Shea Butter and Organic Evening Primrose Oil, the skin-softening lotion conditions and replenishes, whilst enveloping the body with a precious fragrance of Magnolia, Cardamom and Sandalwood.
Jardin de Vie Onagre (50ml)
A precious fragrance inspired by the floral-fresh scent of blooming Evening Primrose Flowers. Notes of Magnolia are enhanced by Cardamom and soft Sandalwood accords to create a mysterious, powdery scent. Housed in a vibrant purple bottle. Suitable for vegans.

name: Baby Cow Frothy Hair And Body Wash (200ml)
product_description:
The Cowshed Baby Cow Organics range uses gentle formulas to care for your little bundle of joy and this Frothy Hair & Body Wash is no exception. With no nasties this pure soothing formula delicately cleanses baby’s hair and skin.
Containing meadowfoam oil, a gentle and effective moisturiser for baby’s delicate skin, Baby Cow Organics Frothy Hair & Body Wash makes bath time with baby a breeze. Meadowfoam oil is known to be one of the most stable vegetable oils, making it safe and long-lasting. Cowshed’s botanical formulations are naturally paraben, petrochemical and sulphate free, suitable for vegetarians and contain certified organic ingredients.
Directions of use:

name: Red Krill Oil (500mg) (30 Capsules)
product_description:
Bioglan Red Krill Oil (500mg) (30 Capsules) forms part of an unrivalled range of natural, innovative and effective vitamin supplements. GMP approved and formulated by qualified naturopaths, Red Krill Oil is the purest form of Omega-3 and boasts 80x more antioxidants than Cod Liver Oil.
Highly sustainable and sourced responsibly from the pristine waters of the Antarctic, the red krill capsules combine the goodness of omega 3 fish oil with the power of Krill Oil to help maintain heart and cardiovascular health, support brain function and eye health and fight free radicals.
Alongside excellent antioxidant properties, the krill capsules provide a rich source of fatty acids which are delivered to the body in phospholipid form (phospholipids are key components in cell membranes responsible for cellular transport and cell recognition). A rich source of Natural Astaxanthin with no fishy aftertaste*. - K.N.

name: Crushed Cabernet Scrub (150g)
product_description:
For those seeking a strong exfoliation coupled with a slimming action look no further than the Caudalie Crushed Cabernet Scrub, Vinotherapie Spa’s signature scrub. With an all natural formula this scrub smoothes out cellulite and has a draining effect.
Containing crushed grape-seeds mixed with brown sugar, pure gironde honey, and six organic essential oils the Caudalie Crushed Cabernet Scrub smoothes out cellulite and has a draining effect to leave your skin wonderfully smooth and nourished.
Directions of use:

name: BionNatural Skin Oil 60ml
product_description:
The award-winning BioNatural Skin Oil from Australian skincare brand Sukin is a lightweight oil to improve the appearance of ageing, scars and stretch marks.
Suitable for all skin types, its non-greasy formula is enriched with natural oils and essential vitamins, including tamanu oil to tone skin, antioxidant carrot seed oil to shield from environmental stresses and vitamin C which brightens the complexion.
Rosehip and avocado oils lock in moisture and deliver intense hydration so you can experience smoother, nourished and healthy-looking skin. Complete with a pump bottle for easy and mess-free application. E.N.

product_description:
Achieve a sun-kissed, streak-free glow with the Q10 Self Tan Mousse from Sienna X. Easy to apply, the weightless formula glides on effortlessly and delivers a guide colour that slowly intensifies to reveal a beautiful golden tan.
An innovative blend of Q10 and Vitamin E provide anti-ageing benefits, whilst natural Blackcurrant, Babassu and Pomegranate leave skin soft, smooth and deeply nourished. Can be used on the face and body for a natural-looking, long-lasting tan that fades slowly and evenly.

name: Arden Green Tea Nectarine Blossom Hand Cream 30ml
product_description:
Soften and nourish your skin with Elizabeth Arden Green Tea Nectarine Blossom Hand Cream, an ultra-hydrating hand treatment infused with a luxurious, refreshing fragrance.
Working to moisturise, condition and calm dry skin, the velvety cream expertly comforts hardworking hands, cocooning them in hydration whilst delivering a fragrance powered by a blend of real Honey, Green Tea and delectable Nectarine.
