product_description:
Soothe tired, dehydrated and dry skin with the Moisturizing Home Spa Salt Scrub from PUPA. Expertly formulated with a natural blend of White Salt and Water Lily Extract, the gentle exfoliator effortlessly buffs away dirt, dead cells and impurities for skin that feels smoother and replenished.  
Experience a subtle tingling sensation as the advanced formula releases Active Oxygen, optimising the delivery of essential nutrients for maximum benefits and alleviating the look of lumps and bumps for a supple, firming effect. Recreate a spa-like ritual from the comfort of your own home and achieve revitalised, hydrated and softened skin.

product_description:

Clear you mind and focus your thoughts with this relaxing bath oil. Just add a capful of Aromatherapy Associates De-Stress Mind Bath and Shower Oil to your bath and gently rebalance your body and soul for a total sense of wellbeing.
Aromatherapy Associates De-Stress Mind Bath and Shower Oil helps calm and reassure your thoughts and stop you feeling under pressure, especially if you're too tired to think straight. Take time out and come up for air, this blend is a like a filing cabinet, it gets your brain in order and refreshes the mind.
Lookfantastic notes:Not recommended for use during pregnancyStore this oil in the box or away from direct lightOnce opened, this product is best used within 6 months

It’s rich in organic Rosehip Oil, which is brimming with essential fatty acids, and Vitamin C, a natural antioxidant that helps reduce signs of premature ageing including discolouration and damaged pigmentation.
The concentrated formula quickly melts in, working to lock in hydration and stimulate natural collagen production, resulting in fine lines and wrinkles appearing visibly reduced. Suitable for all skin types, the natural serum unveils a revitalised and smoother looking complexion with a radiant glow.

product_description:

Boasting a vivid green natural colouring, the mild scrub has been formulated with Coconut Oil and extract of Matcha Green Tea for a potent dose of antioxidants and minerals. product_description:
The MICRO Pedi unit from Emjoi is a ground-breaking device that effectively buffs away dead, calloused skin on the feet with minimal effort. Achieve smooth, soft heels in a matter of seconds and enjoy a pedicure in the comfort of your own home.
Safer than metal scrapers that use blades to cut the skin, the device uses a unique micro-mineral roller that spins 360 degrees at an impressive 30 times per second to painlessly remove layers of hard skin. An effortless process, the roller does all the hard work so you can achieve the best results quickly and effectively, leaving your feet feeling soft and looking like you have just stepped out of a spa.
Complete with the NEW and improved anti-bacterial Flex+ rollers which contour easily around the foot. MICRO Pedi is gentle on soft and sensitive skin yet rough on tough feet, ensuring that you get the best treatment possible for your tootsies.

product_description:
Forming a rich lather to cleanse and refresh your skin, KORRES Santorini Vine Shower Gel will invigorate both your skin and your senses with a fresh and fruity scent. Ideal for everyday use, its wheat protein formula produces a protective film over the skin, maintaining levels of hydration to ensure that your skin doesn't dry out.
Rich in vitamin B2 to improve skin metabolism and aid the absorption of nutrients, as well as vitamin B5 which boosts skin cell regeneration to keep your skin looking youthful, this nourishing shower gel will soothe, moisturise and soften your skin from head to toe. Suitable for all skin types. - L.M.

product_description:

Developed specifically for sensitive teeth, the toothpaste seeks to decrease sensitivity to cold, heat, contact and acids to eliminate feelings of discomfort. The gentle formula is safe for daily use, thoroughly cleaning teeth with a combination of antibacterial agents. The toothpaste protects against tartar and calculus, whilst preventing plaque development.
The whitening toothpaste utilises a patented Bromaine Complex, which combines natural enzymes to visibly whiten teeth without using harsh abrasives. Ideal for those with surface staining or people desiring a brighter smile, the sensitive toothpaste leaves teeth and gums clean, comfortable and healthy, as well as visibly whiter.

A rich blend of macadamia nut oil and shea butter, this Somerset Meadow Hand Therapy works to deeply moisturise your hands to leave your skin silky soft. Formulated with antioxidant-rich vitamins C and E, this cream nourishes the skin and leaves your hands gorgeously fragranced.
Boasting an aroma that's reminiscent of a gorgeous spring day, this Somerset Meadow Bath and Shower Gel from Crabtree & Evelyn is the perfect feminine scent for the modern woman, with notes of ivy and water lily that captures the freshness of a fine spring's day.

product_description:

Harnessing the powers of Shea Butter, Rosehip Oil and antioxidant-rich Arctic Cloudberry, the luxurious moisturiser replenishes and rejuvenates, whilst nourishing and protecting for long-lasting comfort. Skin feels smooth, supple and hydrated with a delicate Rose fragrance. Housed in a convenient pump bottle for mess-free application.

A rich cream made with always reliable and precious shea butter, Crabtree & Evelyn Summer Hill Hand Therapy Cream helps to soothe and moisturise your dry hands. With a beautiful and familiar fresh scent of field lilies and wildflowers to calm and condition your hands, this hand cream will leave your skin feeling silky smoothed and well cared for.
Directions of use:

product_description:
Giving your hands the TLC they deserve with KORRES Almond Oil and Calendula Hand Cream, formulated to repair and nourish the skin on your hands with it’s unique blend of provitamin B5 ingredients.
Organic almond oil and calendula make up this non-oily, light textured formula that rejuvenates the skin on the most exposed part of our bodies. The KORRES Almond Oil and Calendula Hand Cream contains shea butter which improves both hydration and elasticity of the skin leaving them soft and youthful.
Directions of use:

name: Rose de Vigne Shower Gel
product_description: Fresh and striking, Caudalie’s Rose de Vigne shower gel evokes the fragrance of the Bordeaux vineyard roses and the sharpness of rhubarb. A luxurious soap free formula created from a 100% plant base. Suitable for all skin types including the most sensitive, this silky gel will leave skin gently cleansed, delicately fragranced and moisturised.

product_description:

With rapid absorption the Weleda Citrus Hydrating Body Lotion is perfect for day to day use. Combining organic aloe vera, coconut oil and sesame oil, this lotion will give you moisture for supple and beautiful looking skin. It’s gorgeous fragrance of sun-ripened lemons awakens the senses and invigorates the spirit.

product_description:
Designed to gently cleanse and nourish the skin, the Molton Brown Silverbirch Body Wash uses a unique blend of natural ingredients.
Containing French silver birch bark to deep-clean your skin, this body wash works up in to a rich lather which envelopes the skin in a zesty Bergamot and cedarwood scent for a long lasting refreshing smell. You'll be left with silky soft, cleansed skin. K.D.

name: 400+ Pure Manuka Honey Blend
product_description:
MGO™ 400+ Manuka Honey Blend is derived from Leptospermum Scoparium, a plant unique to New Zealand; its flowers are powerfully fragrant and full of nectar which attributes Manuka Honey with its rich, dark and full-bodied flavour.
MGO™ 400+ Manuka Honey is certified to contain a minimum of 250mg/kg methylgyoxal. Methylgyoxal is a naturally occurring compound in Manuka Honey that lends the substance its remarkable and unique properties. No other system of measurement gives such a clear and simple indication; the higher the MGO™ rating, the higher the Methylglyoxal content.

name: Vanilla, Freesia And Lychee Body Lotion 125ml
product_description: Rich in vitamins and trace elements, this Vanilla, Freesia and Lychee body lotion from KORRES releases a sweet and enchanting scent into your bathroom. Awakening senses with its sweet and seductive aroma.

product_description: Unwind from the stresses of everyday life with the help of this works Sleep Balm (10g ). The multi-purpose balm blends Lavender, Monoi and Coconut oils to create a range of aromatherapeutic benefits. The balm nurtures skin and calms senses to help you look fresh and revitalised whilst enjoying a better nights sleep. -SA

product_description:
You Go Girl is a unique blend of female friendly nutrients combined in one super supplement to help you get on the go each day and achieve your body goals.
You Go Girl provides a unique formula combining B vitamins with a thermogenic blend of nutrients. This all-in-one exclusive supplement contains the highly important mineral chromium. Chromium plays an role in many metabolic process within the body, contributing to the normal metabolism of macronutrients as well as effectively supporting normal blood glucose levels. The presence of B vitamins aids normal energy metabolism to reduce tiredness and fatigue giving you your mojo back!
You Go Girl can support females looking to maintain a healthy weight with a supplement that contributes to the normal metabolism of macronutrients. To be taken as part of a varied and balanced diet and a healthy lifestyle.

product_description:
Inner Me Daily 4 Me - The Younger Years is a supplement pack targeted at those in their teens and twenties, providing enough daily nutrients for added energy, good health and a healthy appearance.
During your 'younger years' you need as much energy and time as you can get to make the most of them. These supplement strips contain four capsules to give you that energy, whilst also supporting healthy skin, hair and nails so you have less time worrying about your appearance and more time having fun.
The 'inner you' has needs that change throughout various stages in life. With this in mind, Inner Me have created the Daily 4 Me supplement packs that are tailored to suit three defining age ranges. Whether you're a partying teen, a 30 something mum, or a middle aged housewife, there is a kit for you.

product_description:
Achieve a flawless, streak-free tan with the SKINNY TAN Mousse in Ultimate Dark; a convenient tanning foam that delivers long-lasting results. Working on both the face and body, the fluffy formula guarantees an enviable ultra-deep tan, without an unwanted orange-hued finish.
Enriched with two, certified natural tanning ingredients, the lightweight mousse quickly and effortlessly glides over skin, offering a dark sun-kissed glow that can last up to fourteen days. The self tan also boasts organic Aloe Vera and active Caffeine, which ensure skin is thoroughly and comfortably hydrated, whilst perfecting the face and body by reducing the appearance of blemishes and cellulite.
The tanner is intelligently created with a makeup guide colour, which allows you to see where the product has been applied to, and therefore produce more even results. Please bear in mind that the guide colour is designed to be darker that the tan developing underneath.
Finished with a fragrant dose of organic Coconut, the tanning mousse leaves skin beautifully bronzed and smelling delicious.

The world’s number one multivitamin is established through 30 years of scientific research and nutritional expertise, contributing to healthy skin, hair and nails as well as supporting sustained energy release and a normal immune system.
24 key vitamins and minerals work in tandem to boost vital resources, including Iron and Folic Acid, which sustain regular blood formation, while Biotin, Zinc and Selenium help revitalise hair and nails. Vitamins E, C and Copper seek to protect cell constituents from oxidative damage to delay deterioration. The daily food supplement is an easy, ideal solution for ongoing health maintenance.

Introduce yourself to FOREO’s innovative oral-care line with the FOREO ISSA Play Toothbrush; a revolutionary toothbrush that encourages healthy teeth and gums, whilst adding a playful pop of colour to the bathroom.
The ISSA Play utilises the same intelligent technology as the previous ISSA toothbrushes, yet arrives as a battery-powered model. The toothbrush combines sonic pulse technology with a unique, hybrid brush head, which is effective in eliminating plaque, preventing cavities and discouraging tartar build-up. Delivering 9000 high-intensity pulsations per minute, the toothbrush thoroughly cleans and visibly whitens teeth, whilst comfortably massaging gums to promote strong and healthy results.
The ISSA toothbrushes are safe and ultra-hygienic as they harbour considerably less bacteria than regular nylon brushes. The ISSA Play boasts a hybrid brush head, which is crafted using antibacterial silicone bristles to the outer and PBT polymer bristles to the centre. The silicone bristles gently massage gums to prevent damage, whilst the polymer ones provide a more vigorous clean.
Easy-to-use, the ergonomic toothbrush is ideal for daily use and the lightweight design ensures it is travel friendly. The Swedish-designed brush is completely waterproof, which allows for easy cleaning and even in-shower use, which is ideal for those with busy lifestyles. Cost-effective with no changeable brush heads, the ISSA Play is the perfect introduction into the ISSA range. Discover a new kind of clean.

name: Henriksen Rub 'n' Buff Salt Scrub (624g)
product_description:
Rub 'n' Buff Salt Scrub from Ole Henriksen delivers a therapeutic, spa experience from home. Enriched with sea salt, a natural exfoliator to deeply cleanse skin, removing dirt and impurities and revealing a brighter, healthy-looking appearance.
Suitable for all skin types, the energising scrub is infused with soothing lavender to repair and renew skin, whilst lemongrass relieves muscular tension and calms the senses. E.N.

name: Fab Girl Slim (170.5g)
product_description:
bliss present Fatgirlslim; a powerful formula that works to promote firmed, contoured and toned skin all-over the body.
Utilising innovative QuSome® encapsulated caffeine, the fast-absorbing cream penetrates deep into skin to help minimise the appearance of cellulite, whilst reducing excess fluid retention to reveal a smoothened, refined look from top to toe.
Results*:
87% saw a firming effect
85% felt a slimming effect
73% noticed a reduction in the appearance of cellulite

name: Men's Sage Deodorant 100ml
product_description:
If you’re looking for a natural deodorant look no further. The Weleda Sage Deodorant takes its strength from lemon juice and essential oils of sage, rosemary, pine, clary sage, eucalyptus, lavender, oakmoss, thyme, tea tree, peppermint and ylang-ylang. Suitable for vegans, it fights odours without hindering natural skin functions. It is aluminium salt free, dries quickly and leaves no sticky residue whilst containing biodynamic sage leaf oil which cleanses, purifies and deodorises naturally. LB
Directions for use: In the morning after washing or at any time of the day. For most people one application lasts all day. The natural formulation can be used when required, up to three times a day or use as a fragrant body mist. Do not spray in the direction of the eyes or mucus membranes.

name: Ultra Hydrating Body Oil 100ml
product_description:
Enriched with a luxurious blend of botanical natural oils, including skin-healing rose hip and hydrating marula seed oils, the Ultra Hydrating Body Oil by Sukin lovingly soothes the body and mind. Rose hip oil provides the skin with soothing, instant hydration, whilst antioxidant rich marula seed oils help to improve skin texture.
Also infused with Soybean oil, rich in essential fatty acids which is great for deep skin conditioning, along with calendula flower extract, which helps to regenerate damaged skin, this body oil leaves skin silky smooth. Ideal for massage or for use as a bath oil, this multi-use body oil can be used post shaving or waxing, and as a hand or foot treatment to soothe the skin, without leaving any oily residue. - R.H
Directions For Use: Add a few drops into palms and rub together to warm and massage into damp skin after a shower or bath. Ideal for use on face and body.

name: Skincare Atlantic Kelp and Magnesium Salt Anti-Fatigue Exfoliating Body Scrub 330ml
product_description:
Polish and perfect skin with the REN Skincare Atlantic Kelp and Magnesium Salt Anti-Fatigue Exfoliating Body Scrub; a luxurious body balm that works to smooth the skin.
Effortlessly massaging over the body, the Sea Salt infused scrub simultaneously sloughs away dead skin cells, promotes cell renewal and activates microcirculation, which in turn can relieve feelings of muscle fatigue. A hydrating blend of Atlantic Kelp Extract and Microalgae Oil helps to replenish comfortable moisture levels, whilst infusing skin with essential minerals.
Finished with a signature dose of REN’s anti-fatigue essential oil blend, the anti-fatigue exfoliator not only polishes and pampers skin, but has stress-alleviating effect on the mind. Expect a silky smooth body with skin boasting a healthy glow.

name: Jasmine Hand Cream (125ml)
product_description:
Rejuvenate dry, over-worked and rough hands with Jurlique's Jasmine Hand Cream; a rich, non-greasy moisturiser that works to restore velvety soft, supple skin whilst delivering a soothing jasmine fragrance.
Deeply nourishing and rebalancing, the fast-absorbing cream is infused with almond and safflower seed oils to soothe and calm skin, leaving hands comfortable with long-lasting hydration.
Packed with natural antioxidants and plant-based ingredients to protect from environmental aggressors, helping to maintain youthful-looking, silky smooth hands. Presented in a branded box, making the perfect treat for yourself or loved one. E.N.

name: Japanese Rose Showergel (250ml)
product_description:
Pamper your skin and turn your shower into a haven of relaxation with KORRES Japanese Rose Showergel. With a formula that creates a protective film around your skin to keep it soft and a rich fragrance that lingers on, you are definitely in for a treat.
KORRES Japanese Rose Showergel is a creamy foam body cleanser with a quantifiable, lasting moisturising effect. Wheat extracts form a protective film to maintain your skin’s natural moisture, whilst active aloe, vitamins C and E, zinc and antioxidant enzymes enhance the immune system of your skin. On top of all of that, this shower gel stimulates collagen, thus preventing the signs of ageing, which all in all make this the perfect shower partner.
Directions of use:

name: Skincare Workout Wonder Invigorating Muscle Gel (100ml)
product_description:
Boost skin pre-workout and cool down after with the Workout Wonder™ Invigorating Muscle Motivating Gel from Mio Skincare.
The soothing formula contains a revitalising cocktail of nutrients and botanic extracts, including an exclusive V-Tonic™ that delicately balances a clinically tested blend of Citrus, Lavender, Menthol and Spearmint essential oils to deliver rapid relief for muscles.
Rich in magenisum and moisture, it combines extracts of Horse Chesnut, Arnica Montana Flower and Shea Butter to intensively hydrate and replenish skin, working to alleviate aches and tension while stimulating the senses – ideal pre- or post- workout to motivate or recover.
Free from parabens, petrolatum, colourants, xenoestrogens, PEGs and phthalates.

name: Fatgirl Sixpack 150ml
product_description:
Say hello to a super-toned tummy with Bliss Fatgirl Sixpack. Formulated with an expert blend of caffeine, creatine, oat kernel extract, manilkara tree extract, menthol and a special botanical extract, it firms and tones your tummy, so you can activate those abs!
Easy to apply with the built-in nubbed applicator, it massages and targets your stomach muscles in the same way a professional spa technician would, helping to sculpt and define your midriff area. - L.M.
Please Note: Bliss Fatgirl Sixpack is to be combined with a healthy, balanced diet and regular exercise for optimum results.

Directions of Use

name: Fondant Firming Cream (200ml)
product_description:
Get firmer, smoother looking skin with NUXE Fondant Firming Cream. Enriched with natural ingredients that work to give skin a more youthful appearance and combat sagging, skin is left looking visibly firmer.
NUXE Fondant Firming Cream is formulated using jasmine flower extract and vitamin E to prevent premature ageing and enhance elasticity, and Brazilian mimosa to create a lifting and firming effect by reinforcing the skin’s mesh structure. Easily absorbed and non-greasy, this rich treatment will leave skin looking youthful and toned. Ideal for problem areas such as the thighs, stomach, chest and arms.
Directions of use:

name: Moroccan Rose Otto Sugar Body Polish (330ml)
product_description:
Some sugar from Paraguay, a hint of fair trade rose extract from Southern Morocco, add to it a cocktail of energising and invigorating bio actives and you have REN’s Morrocan Rose Otto Sugar Body Polish, the ideal recipe for perfect skin.
This gently exfoliating Moroccan Rose Otto Sugar Body Polish removes dead cells, leaving your skin silky smooth, energised and deliciously scented with a light, fresh, lingering rose fragrance. Made with fair trade rose extract from Southern Morocco, sugar from Paraguay and a cocktail of energising and invigorating bio actives, including kola nut and Paraguay tea extracts it stimulates circulation and nourishes the skin.
Directions of use:

name: Tweezer Classic Slanted
product_description: The Classic Slanted Rubis Tweezer has a slanted tip for precise plucking and brow shaping. Made of surgical steel, the high-quality tweezers are acid-proof, anti-magnetic and rustproof. Featuring tips that close perfectly, precise edges and an arm of tension that yields a lightly-resilient resistance, the reliable Rubis tweezers are handmade in Switzerland by skilled employees, using a 45-step process. - L.M.

name: Nourishing Hand Cream (75ml)
product_description:
Treat your hands to Embryolisse Nourishing Hand Cream, a nourishing formula dedicated to soothing the skin on dry, damaged hands.
Combining a natural blend of shea butter and emollient oils, the hand cream softens and repairs stressed skin whilst helping to prevent premature ageing. Deeply moisturising , the softening cream will leave you with smoother, plumper looking hands.
Your hands will be left looking youthful and feeling comfortable. - K.N.

name: Yoghurt Sunscreen Face and Body Emulsion SPF50 (150ml)
product_description:
Protect your skin from sun damage the natural way with KORRES Yoghurt Sunscreen Face and Body Emulsion SPF50. This water-resistant formula offers a high level of sun protection without any chemical nasties, making it ideal for all skin types.
KORRES Yoghurt Sunscreen Face and Body Emulsion contains yoghurt, a natural source of lactose, proteins, minerals and vitamins that works to increase the water content of the epidermis' top layers and refresh the skin, leaving you cool in any climate. Blended with organic aloe extract, this silicone and paraben free sunscreen offers UVA and UVB protection along with anti-ageing properties.

name: Boo Kind & Creamy Baby Lotion (100ml)
product_description:
Treat baby’s skin to a nourishing burst of moisture with Love Boo Kind & Creamy Baby Lotion. Made with natural ingredients, this hydrating formula is perfect for babies with dry skin.
Love Boo Kind & Creamy Baby Lotion is blended with Tiare blossoms to hydrate and protect, pomegranate extract to nourish and moisturise, and cotton seed oil to soothe. Non-greasy and easily absorbed, this is the perfect baby treat!
Directions of use:

name: Body Ultimate Blends Hydrating Lotion (400ml)
product_description:
Infuse skin with moisture and support with the Garnier Body Ultimate Blends Hydrating Lotion. Light and soft in texture, the diligent formula melts easily and naturally into the skin, providing fast-absorption with optimum effect.
Delicately embedded with nutritious Argan Oil, to aid cell replenishment, as well as Camellia Oil, to enhance suppleness, the sensitive, feminine notes lend a touch of elegance, whilst the refined essential oils ensure continuous benefits and effects.

name: Hauschka Lavender Sandalwood Calming Body Wash (200ml)
product_description: Gently cleanse skin from top to toe with the Lavender Sandalwood Calming Body Wash from Dr. Hauschka. Infused with quince seed extract and vegetable surfactants to effortlessly melt away dirt and impurities, whilst a deeply relaxing fragrance of lavender and Australian sandalwood envelops the body to create a cloud of pure tranquillity. A blend of sunflower and avocado oils prevent over-drying so you can experience clean, touchably soft skin, without stripping moisture. E.N.

name: Boo Silky Soft Body Wash (250ml)
product_description:
Nourish and cleanse your skin with Love Boo Silky Body Wash. Enriched with natural ingredients renowned for their hydrating properties, this luscious body wash leaves skin happy and silky soft!
Love Boo Silky Body Wash is packed with white water lily, chamomile and avocado oil to help replenish elasticity and keep skin soft and hydrated. Naturally fragranced, this wash gently cleanses and moisturises and is ideal for dry skin. The ginger fragrance also calms morning sickness.
Directions of use:

name: Hauschka Hydrating Foot Cream (75ml)
product_description: Dr. Hauschka's Hydrating Foot Cream refreshes and soothes feet for long-lasting comfort. Absorbing quickly to deliver moisture to dry feet, the non-greasy cream can be used as a daily treatment or invigorating foot massage. Infused with a rejuvenating blend of jojoba and olive oils to treat cracked, hard and rough skin, you can expect super soft, smooth feet that are perfectly pampered. E.N.

name: Hauschka Lavender Sandalwood Calming Body Cream (145ml)
product_description:
Perfectly pamper skin with the Lavender Sandalwood Calming Body Cream from Dr. Hauschka. Fast-absorbing and non-greasy, its nourishing formula is infused with extracts of lemon balm and wood sorrel to promote skin renewal and rebalance skin so you can achieve touchably soft, smooth skin.
A blend of macadamia nut, apricot kernel and avocado oils support the skin's protective barrier, whilst the warming scent of lavender and sandalwood comforts and calms the body and senses. Hydrates and soothes skin for long-lasting comfort. E.N.

name: Dark Lotion Absolute Luxe (236ml)
product_description:
Create an ultimate, long-lasting deep tan with Xen-Tan Dark Lotion Absolute Luxe. Four years in the making, Xen-Tan are proud to offer this exceptionally long-lasting self-tanner lotion; proven to last longer than any other fake-tan product.
Xen-Tan Dark Lotion Absolute Luxe includes more DHA active tanning agents than ever before to provide a natural-looking tan that lasts up to 10 days. A revolutionary new ingredient, Scent Secure, locks out chemical odours to avoid the traditional ‘fake tan smell’ while ginko biloba, green tea extract, aloe and shea butter leave your skin feeling wonderfully nourished and smooth. Easy to apply, it smoothes on evenly and fades evenly too, for beautifully even, olive-toned results every time.
Directions of use:

name: Citrus Limonum Prebiotic Hand Cream (300ml)
product_description:
Follow Citrus Limonum Hand Wash with this rich REN Citrus Limonum Prebiotic Hand Cream. With antibacterial properties, this lemon fragranced hand cream is easily absorbed and leaves your hands feeling incredibly fresh.
REN Citrus Limonum Prebiotic Hand Cream is a light, fresh and easily absorbed hand cream formulated with Sicilian lemon oil and prebiotic oligosaccharides to protect the hands and nails against bacteria while keeping hands hydrated and nourished.
Directions of use:

name: Naked Body Butter (200ml)
product_description:
bliss’ famous body butter formula now comes unscented so you can mix it with any fragrance you fancy. A few swipes of bliss naked body butter will drench your skin in moisture to reveal you as a ‘diamond in the buff’.
bliss naked body butter provides an instant burst of hydration to your skin, to leave even the driest skin feeling seriously soft. Vitamins A and E combat free-radicals whilst arnica montana extract promotes healing (perfect for use on sun exposed skin!). Enriched with antioxidant and skin conditioners, this body butter will deliver super-smooth, hydrated skin.
Directions of use:

name: Serenity Hand Lotion (300ml)
product_description:
Treat your hands to Rituals’ ‘Serenity’ Hand Lotion, a rich emulsion that supplements skin with added moisture and softness. Made with a velvety texture that absorbs efficiently into the skin, the gentle salve leaves hands feeling supple and resilient, with embedded maximum protection.
Infused with nourishing Sweet Almond and refining Allantoin, the dense, rich formula keeps hands feeling silky and smooth, whilst Indian Rose additives provide a light, floral fragrance for extra luxury and effect. C.R

name: Hauschka Rose Nurturing Bath Essence (100ml)
product_description: Deeply relax and harmonise the mind and body with the Rose Nurturing Bath Essence from Dr. Hauschka. When combined with warm, running water, the comforting bath soak delivers a luxurious fragrance of gentle rose that envelops the body to create a cloud of pure tranquillity. A nourishing, skin-softening blend of almond and jojoba oil prevents over-drying so you can experience subtly scented, perfectly pampered skin from top to toe. Suitable for small children. E.N.

name: Pure Plant Body Oil 110ml
product_description:
Treat your skin to the benefits of Trilogy's Pure Plant Body Oil; a reparative, nourishing formula infused with Rosehip, Sweet Almond and Apricot.
Suitable for sensitive skin and for the entire family, the luxurious, certified natural oil delivers long-lasting moisture and hydration, whilst soothing and rejuvenating skin without greasy residue. Housed in a pump bottle for mess-free application.

name: SD™ Hand Cream (60ml/2oz)
product_description:
StriVectin Volumizing Hand Treatment combats the five most prominent signs of ageing for skin on the hands, relieving you of tired, dry, thin and discoloured skin making it soft, supple and youthful again.
The skin on your hands is likely to be the most exposed and used, that’s why StriVectin Volumizing Hand Treatment combines with powerful skin volumisers and brighteners, plus ultra-moisturizing shea butter and oils to plump and re-firm the skin on the hands. NIA-114 actives help to re-build and strengthen the skin’s natural barrier, so that they can relax and rejuvenate.
Directions of use:

name: Body Buff Gloves
product_description:
These effective Body Buff Gloves are the perfect complement to MenScience Daily Body Wash and will leave your skin extra clean, soft, and healthy looking.
MenScience Body Buff Gloves help get rid of dull build-up and dead skin cells, which immediately improves your whole skin's appearance. By sloughing off dull build-up and dead skin cells, you will immediately notice the smoothing and renewing benefits of using these buffing gloves.
The deep cleansing effect removes impurities and clears pores, allowing your whole body to feel extra clean and invigorated, immediately resulting in a healthy-looking and balanced skin tone.
Directions of use:

name: Konjac Sponge Company 100% Pure Big Body Buffer Sponge
product_description: Exfoliate your body with The Big Buffer Sponge in White from The Konjac Sponge Company that has been made from 100% Konjac. Working to gently remove dead skin cells, the sponge helps you to enjoy a luxurious cleanse that will reduce blemishes and ingrown hair to help you restore smooth and supple skin. Designed with six waves, the ergonomically designed sponge is perfect for in the bath or shower. -SA

name: Home Spa Massage Cream - Anti-Fatigue 250ml
product_description:
Invigorate your senses and skin with the Anti-Fatigue Home Spa Massage Cream from PUPA. The velvet-smooth, emollient-rich formula effortlessly absorbs into skin, ideal for an indulgent massage with aromatherapy benefits.
Fortified with extract of Bamboo, the cream envelopes skin in a soothing veil of moisture and nutrients, leaving skin feeling toned and balanced. A harmonic blend of Orange Oil and Cedarwood create a revitalising fragrance that lingers. Skin feels supple and softened while your senses feel uplifted and recharged.

name: Sea Buckthorn Ribbon Box (Worth £35)
product_description:
Energise the mind and body with Weleda's Sea Buckthorn Ribbon Box; a refreshing body wash, fast-absorbing body lotion and characteristic fragrance leave you feeling revitalised from top to toe. Housed in a gift box.
Sea Buckthorn Body Wash (200ml)
Ideal for use in the morning or to regenerate after a hard day at work, the body wash gently cleanses skin, whilst imparting an invigorating fragrance of Orange, Mandarin and Grapefruit. Infused with Sea Buckthorn Oil, an ingredient rich in vitamins and antioxidants to protect against environmental stresses.
Sea Buckthorn Body Lotion (200ml)
A rich, rejuvenating formula that absorbs quickly into skin to nourish and hydrate without greasy residue. Harnessing the powers of Organic Sea Buckthorn Oil, Mallow Extract and Shea Butter, the lightweight lotion softens and conditions, whilst enveloping the body with a fresh, fruity fragrance from top to toe.
Jardin de Vie Agrume (50ml)
A fresh, energetic fragrance to uplift the mind. Opening with sparkling Grapefruit accords, the revitalising scent is enhanced by sweet, juicy Mandarin before settling on a soft, powdery Sandalwood base. Simply spritz onto skin to experience the characteristic fragrance. Suitable for vegans.

name: Home Spa Salt Scrub - Revitalizing 350g
product_description:
Indulge skin with the Revitalizing Home Spa Salt Scrub from PUPA. Harnessing the powers of Orange Salt extracted from Australia and extract of Coralline Alga, the natural exfoliator gently polishes away dirt and impurities, working to penetrate skin tissue for a firming effect, resulting in a smoother and more refined silhouette.
Experience a subtle tingling sensation as the advanced formula releases Active Oxygen, optimising the delivery of essential nutrients for maximum benefits. Recreate a spa-like ritual from the comfort of your own home and expect skin that feels softened, supple and toned.

name: Herzog Professional Cleansing Cream
product_description:
Experience the unrivalled effects of Karin Herzog's Professional Cleansing, a cleansing gel that performs a vacuum like effect to expertly draw away dirt, sebum and impurities from the skin.
Enriched with a host of nourishing essential oils, including Rose, Geranium and Glycerine, the gentle, waxy formula nourishes and hydrates whilst eliminating dirt and makeup (including waterproof eye makeup) without irritating or upsetting the skin's natural pH balance. Working to decongest skin and eliminate grime from pores, the best-selling cleansing gel leaves skin feeling fresh, bright and radiant.

name: Esthederm Pure Cleansing Foam 150ml
product_description:
The Institut Esthederm Pure Cleansing Foam removes all traces of make-up and impurities in one go while respecting the skin’s surface ecosystem. Its light and airy texture gives a true sensation of comfort and unparalleled softness.
Gentle, effective and suitable for all skin types, the foam will leave skin perfectly cleansed and purified. Re-balancing the skin's surface ecosystem, your skin will appear noticeably clearer and healthier, whilst leaving your complexion fresh and radiant.

name: Paris Sublime Bronze Gradual Tan - Medium (200ml)
product_description: L'Oréal Sublime Bronze Gradual Tan Medium is a natural-looking tan. Skin will look healthy, and beautiful as when you are on holiday. The L'Oréal Laboratories have developed a daily moisturising lotion which allows you to gradually build a natural-looking tan, as though you have just returned from holiday. L'Oréal Sublime Bronze Gradual Tan Medium is enriched with Hydralium, Sublime Bronze intensely nourishes the skin and leaves it moisturised for 24 hours, helping to protect it from drying out. The formula, with a light dose of Soft-Tan, a self-tan ingredient, allows you to progressively build a natural sun-kissed look, day after day. Directions for use:

name: Home Spa Scented Water - Rebalancing 150ml
product_description:
Envelope skin with freshness with the Rebalancing Home Spa Scented Water from PUPA; an ultra-fine mist that blends aromatherapy oils with precious botanical extracts for a multi-sensory experience.
Heart notes of essential citrus oils including Orange and Lime bring positivity and brightness, while extract of Tiarè Flower layers skin with a gentle caress of nutrients and moisture.
Balsamic hints of Mint and Eucalyptus invigorate the senses, while Lavender brings a touch of femininity. Skin feels refreshed, hydrated and balanced while the mind feels a sense of wellbeing and calm.

name: & Evelyn Pink Pineapple Luxury Duo
product_description:
Crabtree & Evelyn present the Pink Pineapple Luxury Duo; a shimmering dry oil and rich body cream perfumed with a blend of sparkling Pink Prosecco, precious Rose and succulent Pineapple. Presented in a floral gift box.
Rose Pineapple Shimmer Oil (100ml)
A luxuriously scented dry oil that can be used on the face, body and hair. Infused with moisturising Rice Bran, Apricot Kernel and Argan Oil, the lightweight, non-greasy formula softens and nourishes, whilst imparting a subtle golden shimmer.
Rose Pineapple Body Cream (200g)
A rich, ultra-nourishing formula to soften, hydrate and comfort skin without greasy or sticky residue. Fast-absorbing and lightweight, it envelops the body with notes of Pink Prosecco, juicy Pineapple and delicate Rose Petals. Skin is smooth and supple with an elegant fragrance.

name: Stress Free Herbal Mandarin and Orange Bath Oil (100ml)
product_description: For a luxurious bathing experience, treat your body to the Stress Free Herbal Mandarin and Orange Bath Oil from Kneipp. Fortified with natural essential oils of Mandarin and Orange, the refreshing formula soaks away all your cares and worries to encourage positivity and release tensions of everyday life. Skin is soft, supple and enveloped in a stimulating fragrance.

name: Enjoy Life Body Wash (200ml)
product_description:
Awaken and invigorate skin with the Kneipp Enjoy Life Body Wash; a soap-free, pH-balanced formula that works to refresh the body from top to toe.
Infused with natural essential oils of May Chang and Lemon, the shower gel eliminates dirt and impurities without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness, whilst its revitalising fragrance uplifts the mind and body to leave you feeling rejuvenated with every use.

name: Herbal Deodorant 50ml
product_description: MÁDARA's Herbal Deodorant delivers long-lasting protection against wetness, body odours and perspiration without leaving stains or marks. With a certified organic formula, the roll-on deodorant blends Northern Sage, Peppermint and Chamomile Extracts with natural minerals for ultimate freshness. Fast-drying.

name: Konjac Sponge Company 6 Wave Bath Sponge with Bamboo Charcoal
product_description:
The Konjac Sponge Company presents the 6 Wave Bath Sponge with Bamboo Charcoal, a 100% naturally sustainable product delicately handmade purely from moisture-rich Konjac plant fibres and Volcanic Water. Enriched with detoxifying Charcoal, it works to destroy blemish-causing bacteria and is an effective natural treatment for acne-prone, oily skin types.
The innovative biodegradable sponge has a unique net-like structure that turns silky soft when wet and works to deeply cleanse and gently exfoliate; eliminating impurities and blackheads whilst active minerals absorb excess oils. Konjac is a natural wonder – it’s been used in Southern Asia for over 1,500 years as a medicinal and beauty treatment, and it is alkaline based thus balances any acidity in skin and restores optimum pH levels.
Lasting for up to 3 months, the ergonomically designed sponge is suitable for use with or without a cleanser and is perfect for use in the shower or bath. Simply add water and experience an all-natural, rejuvenating cleanse that will leave skin feeling fresh, clean and clear.

name: Island Apothecary Les Petits Body Lotion (300ml)
product_description:
Formulated to deeply nourish and moisturise the skin, this luxurious Les Petits Body Lotion by Seascape Island Apothecary is a must have addition to your beauty regime. Containing 100% natural essential oils of Lavender and Chamomile that work to soothe and soften the skin whilst keeping it hydrated, you'll love this body lotion.
Free from paraben, silicone and petroleum, this lotion also contains Jersey Beeswax to lock in moisture and protect delicate skin, leaving you with kissable skin all over. K.D.

name: Nurture AromaBomb Duo Set
product_description: Soak away daily tension with the AromaWorks Nurture AromaBomb Duo Set. Fortified with detoxifying Himalayan Sea Salt and soothing Calamine, the luxurious bath bombs allow you to experience a therapeutic bathing ritual; helping you to de-stress and unwind after a long, tiring day. Expertly blended with pure essential oils, the AromaBombs release relaxing notes of May Chang, Roman Chamomile and Sandalwood to leave you feeling calmed, restored and rejuvenated. Individually wrapped and presented in a gift box.

name: Enjoy Fresh-On Time Sweet Honey Hand Cream 50ml
product_description: Pamper dry and wanting skin with Mizon’s Enjoy Fresh-On Time Sweet Honey Hand Cream. Based upon an emollient-rich Shea Butter formula, it seeks to replenish moisture levels and smooth the appearance of callouses and cracks with a layered infusion of Hyaluronic Acid and nourishing raw Honey. The lightweight treatment rapidly absorbs to leave skin feeling smooth, softened and protected.

name: Bees Nuts About Nature Gift Set
product_description:
Burt's Bees present the Nuts About Nature Gift Set; a trio of skincare treats that work to moisturise, condition and comfort from top to toe. Housed in a branded box, making it the perfect pampering gift for yourself or a loved one.
Almond and Milk Hand Cream (57g)
Rejuvenate tired hands with this non-greasy, luxurious cream. Enriched with sweet almond oil and vitamin E, its natural formula nourishes and moisturises dry hands, whilst conditioning nails. Beeswax replenishes skin, leaving hands soft and silky smooth.
Coconut Foot Cream (120g)
Transform tired feet with this luxurious foot cream. Enriched with coconut oil, an intensely moisturising ingredient to rejuvenate dry, cracked and hard skin, leaving feet smoother and hydrated. Refreshing peppermint oils and a hint of rosemary will soothe skin to deliver long-lasting comfort.
Coconut and Pear Lip Balm (4.25g)
A natural lip balm to hydrate lips so you can achieve the perfect pout. Specially formulated with coconut oil, pear extract and shea butter to restore moisture, the balm leaves lips soft and fragranced with a refreshing, tropical scent.

name: 'Bust' and 'Neck'-Cessity Firming Duo (Worth £70.50)
product_description:
Combat signs of ageing with the ‘Bust’ and ‘Neck’-Cessity Firming Duo from bliss. Complete with a branded wash bag, you can expect perky-looking breasts and a tighter, more toned chest no matter where you are.
bliss fabgirl™ leave it to cleavage™ Soufflé (100ml)
Enhance your bust and décolléte area. Fortified with light diffusers and adopofillin™, an active ingredient that works to firm and plump skin, the powerful bust cream creates a lifted effect, whilst a moisturising blend of Coconut Oil and Shea Butter smoothens and softens. Its pearlescent, whipped formula absorbs quickly into skin, helping to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles over time.
bliss thinny thin chin™ Neck Firming Cream (50ml)
Instantly tighten and improve the look of crepey skin with the innovative neck cream. Its Botanical Age Fighting Complex hydrates, smoothens and firms skin, whilst antioxidant Evening Primrose defends against free radical damage to reveal brighter, younger-looking skin. Combining a Dual-Action Tightener and pumpkin seed-derived Resilience Enhancer, the fast-absorbing formula protects collagen and elastin to leave skin smooth and supple.

name: Klein Down Town Body Lotion (200ml)
product_description: Replenish and hydrate skin after bathing with the Down Town Body Lotion from Calvin Klein. Perfectly complementing the brand's Down Town Eau de Parfum, the fast-absorbing moisturiser imparts a luxurious fragrance of neroli, gardenia, violet and cedarwood that stays on the body all day long. Skin is left conditioned, pampered and silky soft. E.N.

name: & Oil Nourish & Nurture Soap for All Skin Types 100g
product_description:
Pamper skin with the Nourish & Nurture Soap for All Skin Types from You & Oil. Perfect for daily use, the naturally-derived soap bar contains a delicate selection of luxurious yet nourishing essential oils that work in tandem to purify and hydrate.
Sunflower Seed Oil regulates moisture levels, while Marigold Oil soothes irritations. Transforming into a refreshing foam upon application, it sweeps away dirt and grime while protecting against environmental aggressors. Skin feels clean, soft and replenished.

name: Grape Seed Ultra Pure - 60 Capsules (200mg)
product_description:
Formulated with Ethanol extraction, which is more caring for both the body and the environment, the Beyond Grape Seed Ultra Pure Capsules provide superior antioxidant properties, whilst promoting healthy circulation.
Containing 200mg Pure Grape Seed Extract and a 95% concentration of Oligomeric Proanthocyanidins (OPCs), the supplements help to protect against environmental aggressors and disease. OPCs are a type of bioflavanoid that pass through the blood, binding to collagen and elastin fibres to support healthy ageing.

name: Ins-Tan-Taneous Non DHA Tanner
product_description:
Achieve a beautiful, bronzed look quickly with Xen-Tan Ins-Tan-Taneous Non DHA Tanner. Drying in just 60 seconds, the DHA-free colour stays on until you decide to wash it off, and you can even sleep in it as it won't transfer onto your clothes or sheets.
With a sheer brown colour, you can build it up to make it as dark as you like, giving you complete control over the intensity of your tan. There's no tell tale fake tan smell either, and it will leave your skin smelling delicious! - L.M.

name: Reve De Miel Creme Corps - Ultra Comfortable Body Cream (150ml)
product_description:
NUXE Corps Ultra Reconfortante Ultra Comfortable Body Cream is a lipid-replenishing, soothing and repairing cream for dry and sensitive skin. Thanks to its powerful nourishing action, dry and sensitive skins are soothed and regain elasticity and softness.
This paraben-free NUXE Ultra Comfortable Body Cream with its replenishing, repairing and smoothing properties acts as a cocoon on your skin, locking softness and moisture.
Soft and luscious, this cream is enriched with super soft vegetal extracts that provide your whole body with a sense of extreme comfort. It appeases and smoothes your skin whilst bestowing incredible softness upon it.
With wild fruit oils (blueberry, cranberry and raspberry), macadamia oil associated to honey liposomes replenish and soothe. To enhance their action, fir honey and chestnut extract repair skin barrier.
This body cream is suitable for dry and sensitive skins in your whole family, including children aged 36 months or over.
Directions of use:

name: Massage Miracle Muscle Serum 100ml
product_description:
Relieve aching muscles with FIT's Massage Miracle Muscle Serum, a formula created specially for men to help ease muscle tension and speed up recovery time post-workout.
Infused with menthyl, ginger and witch hazel to cool, comfort and combat inflammation, the serum encourages fast muscle recovery and its OXY-FIT-10 technology (a unique oxygen delivery system) helps boost cell regeneration so you feel relieved and revived. - K.N.

name: Soothing Aloe Vera Roll-On Deodorant (85g)
product_description:
Offering long lasting protection and soothing freshness, JASON Aloe Vera Roll On Deodorant is safe, mild and contains certified organic aloe vera gel, vitamin E, lavender oil, corn starch and chamomile to keep you protected and confident.
Stay fresh and confident throughout the day with JASON Aloe Vera Roll On Deodorant. Free from parabens, alcohol and aluminum chlorohydrate, this revitalising deodorant features an all-natural range of ingredients to keep you protected.
Directions of use:

name: Health Propolis and MGO 400 Manuka Honey Bee-Pops 100g
product_description:
The Manuka Health Propolis and MGO™ 400+ Manuka Honey Bee-Pops combine high grade MGO™ 400+ Manuka Honey with the goodness of BIO30™ New Zealand Propolis, resulting in delicious, lemon flavoured lollipops with numerous health benefits.
The Bee-Pops are ideal for providing sore throat relief or as a healthy treat. Not just for kids, the lollies are a fun and tasty way to support your immune system against winter colds and flu.

name: Day To Day Gradual Tan 200ml
product_description:
Build a light, bronzed glow with the He-Shi Day to Day Gradual Tan; a triple action lotion that is ideal for fair to medium skin types. Comprising 3% DHA, the formula can be used on both the face and body, and offers the lightest colour within the He-Shi range, ideal for a subtle glow or for fair-haired people.
Perfect for daily use, the effective lotion is easily absorbed into skin and works to even out natural skin tones or maintain an existing false tan. The formula utilises moisture-lock technology to ensure long lasting results, whilst combating visible signs of ageing.
With continued use, expect a youthful finish with an enviable glow.

name: Floss Action Brush Refill Heads (x4)
product_description:
The Oral-B Floss Action Brush Refill Heads feature Micropulse bristles that deeply penetrate teeth to remove plaque and food. Deliver a superior cleaning action to reach awkward areas for a floss-like finish, without the effort. E.N.
Please Note: Fits all rotating Oral-B rechargeable toothbrushes (except pulsonic). For best results, dentists recommend changing your brush every three months.

name: Pregnancy Body Oil 100ml
product_description:
Shiffa's Pregnancy Body Oil is an uplifting formula that helps to relieve itching tummies, soothe inflammation and minimise stress.
Expertly blended with nourishing oils of Mandarin Orange, Chamomile, Evening Primrose and Apricot Kernel, the lightweight, non-greasy formula combats feelings of tiredness and exhaustion to promote a restful night's sleep.
Ideal for the stomach, bust and hips, the multi-tasking body oil conditions and moisturises skin; helping to prevent the formation of stretch marks for a toned, firmed appearance. Calms and relaxes the mind whilst alleviating heavy legs and swollen ankles tin inspire a happy, comfortable pregnancy.

name: Hydra 24 Corps Hydrating Firming Treatment 400ml
product_description:
Treat your skin to the comforting properties of PAYOT Hydra 24 Corps Hydrating Firming Treatment, a rich, non-oily emulsion that works to provide long-lasting moisture whilst preserving youthful vitality.
Delivering a veil of comfort onto skin, the formula utilises a hydro-dermo-regulating complex that helps maintain moisture and promote firmness for a younger-looking body. Its moisturising and protective nature helps reinforce the skin's barrier, leaving it feeling soft and nourished with improved elasticity.
Experience long-lasting hydration and a comforted, youthful-feeling body.

name: Body Scrub for Energising and Detoxifying 250g
product_description:
Say hello to soft and smooth skin with Ila Spa Body Scrub for Energising and Detoxifying 250g. Perfect for when you're feeling tired or run down, this energising scrub will revitalise your skin, whilst alpine lavender with geranium and lemongrass stimulates the circulation and boosts your immune system.
Formulated with Himalayan salt crystals which exfoliate the skin to leave it feeling silky-soft, it also contains nourishing argan and rose hip oils, whilst juniper berry fights cellulite. Boasting a high mineral content to detoxify and stimulate your skin, it will leave both your skin and your senses feeling completely uplifted. - L.M.

name: Cow Pat - Moisturising Hand Cream (300ml)
product_description:
Cowshed Cow Pat Moisturising Hand Cream is a naturally nourishing essential for hard-working hands. Replenish precious moisture with a blend of chamomile and calendula and pure essential oils of lavender, grapefruit and cinnamon.
Cowshed Cow Pat Moisturising Hand Cream not only replenishes much needed moisture to your hard-working, sensitive hands, but is refreshingly scented and quickly absorbed.  It contains no parabens, SLS or petrochemicals.  It is 100% vegetarian and has not been tested on animals.
Directions of use:
Please note:

name: Botanicals Neroli Hydrating Body Oil 50ml
product_description:
The Neroli Hydrating Body Oil from Dr Botanicals is a delicate blend of essential oils brimming with minerals and vitamins, working to repair and pamper skin. Fast absorbing and non-greasy, the potent serum has a delicate fragrance and effortlessly melts in.
Created using only the finest natural extracts, the main ingredient of Neroli Oil aims to minimise the appearance of fine lines and imperfections, whilst antioxidant-rich Sweet Almond Oil helps balance tone and texture. Crambe Oil is a natural emollient, leaving skin feeling silky soft and nourished.

name: to Coconut Head to Toe Hydrating Balm
product_description:
Pamper dry, cracked and rough skin with the yes to Coconut Head to Toe Hydrating Balm; a rich, plant-based body butter that infuses skin with an ultra-moisturising blend of Coconut, Sweet Almond and Avocado Oils.
Enriched with natural emollients Shea Butter and Beeswax, it’s ideal for use on elbows, hands and knees or wherever you feel needs a little extra care.

name: Bronzing Glaze 150ml
product_description:
Achieve that holiday glow with the Vani-T Bronzing Glaze; an instant self tan gel suitable for both the body and face, based upon naturally sourced extracts and ingredients.
Designed to give you a deep, long lasting fake tan, the non-sticky formula delivers immediate colour coverage while the tan develops. Fortified with vitamin-rich Quandong and Australian Kakadu Plum extracts, it also helps moisturise and nourish skin, helping to minimise dry patches and ensure an even, streak-free coverage.
A delectable blend of essential oils provide free radical protection as well as odour prevention, leaving skin feeling soft, smooth and radiant with a gorgeous, healthy-looking tan.

name: Men 50 Plus Multivitamin Tablets - (30 Tablets)
product_description:
Centrum Men 50 Plus Multivitamin Tablets have been specifically developed to support the changing needs of men’s health and wellbeing over the age of 50+, delivering adjusted levels of vitamins and minerals for optimum efficacy and benefits.   
The world’s number one multivitamin is established through 30 years of scientific research and nutritional expertise, combining 24 key nutrients with all 13 essential vitamins to support vitality and immunity while contributing to normal vision and heart health.  
Vitamin B sustains normal energy release from food for an overall boost, while Vitamin C, Zinc, Copper and Selenium combine to support a normal functioning immune system. Vitamin A and Vitamin B2 promote eye health, with high levels of Vitamin B1 to support a normal heart function. Age doesn’t mean you have to slow down, and this daily food supplement provides all the resources to keep you feeling in your prime.

name: Hydrating Body Butter
product_description:
Prolong the life of your tan with the Sunescape Hydrating Body Butter; a rich, luxurious cream that utilises exotic nut oils, antioxidants and fruit extracts to moisturise and condition skin.
Harnessing the powers of Shea and Cocoa Butters, the fast-absorbing formula delivers intense nourishment to revive and repair skin, whilst Mango Fruit and Buriti Oil restore softness and suppleness from top to toe. The body is smooth, hydrated and scented with a delicious Coconut fragrance.

name: Ibrahimovic Suprême Homme Shower Gel 200ml
product_description: Awaken your senses with the Suprême Homme Shower Gel from Swedish professional footballer, Zlatan Ibrahimović. Working to cleanse from dirt and impurities, the lightweight, powerful formula creates a rich lather on the skin to refresh and revitalise without stripping moisture. Infuses the body with the signature Suprême fragrance of zesty Lemon, Ginger, invigorating Rosemary, Lavender and rich Cedarwood.

name: Citrus Hand Cream (40ml)
product_description:
Rejuvenate dry, over-worked and rough hands with Jurlique's Citrus Hand Cream; a rich, non-greasy moisturiser that works to restore velvety soft, supple skin whilst delivering an uplifting citrus fragrance.
Deeply nourishing and refreshing, the fast-absorbing cream is infused with almond and safflower seed oils to soothe and calm skin, leaving hands comfortable with long-lasting hydration.
Packed with natural antioxidants and plant-based ingredients to protect from environmental aggressors, helping to maintain youthful-looking, silky smooth hands. Presented in a branded box, making the perfect treat for yourself or loved one. E.N.

name: Home Spa Salt Scrub - Anti-Fatigue 350g
product_description:
Re-energise and lift tired, dull skin with the Anti-Fatigue Home Spa Salt Scrub from PUPA. Expertly formulated with a delicate blend of Hawaiian Green Salt and antioxidant-rich Bamboo Extract, the natural exfoliator gently buffs away dirt and impurities while delivering an anti-water action, which penetrates skin tissue for a firming effect, reducing the look of lumps and bumps.
Experience a subtle tingling sensation as the advanced formula releases Active Oxygen, optimising the delivery of essential nutrients for maximum benefits and effectively creating the appearance of a sculpted silhouette. Recreate a spa-like ritual from the comfort of your own home and achieve skin that feels sumptuously soft, toned and revitalised.

name: HD Combination Tweezer Set - Red
product_description:
The brushworks HD Combination Tweezer Set in 'Red' is a must-have collection for grooming and perfecting your eyebrows. A well groomed brow will expertly frame your face.
Handcrafted from high quality stainless steel, the tweezers have been perfectly aligned for performance and precision, and are durable and easy to clean. Each tweezer features a slanted, straight or pointed tip for targeting specific brow/skin concerns such as loose strays or painful splinters.
Slanted Tweezer - Perfect for tidying up stray hairs on larger areas.
Straight Tweezer - Perfect for holding false eyelashes in place and  applying delicate nail art.
Slanted Point Tweezer - A multi-purpose tweezer for tidying and grooming your arches.
Pointed Tweezer - A precision tweezer ideal for ingrown hairs and removing splinters.

name: Vitamin Edition Body Bar 6.3oz
product_description:
Cleanse and condition your skin with the Zirh Vitamin Edition Body Bar. Suitable for all skin types, the bar utilises an expert blend of vitamins and antioxidants to leave your skin smooth, youthful and protected.
Fortified with soothing Oat Straw and extracts of Orange, Chamomile and Cucumber, the refreshing soap effortlessly eliminates impurities, whilst delivering intense moisture and hydration. Skin is cleansed, energised and awakened.

name: Brown Rosa Absolute Body Lotion 300ml
product_description: Perfectly pamper skin with Molton Brown's Rosa Absolute Body Lotion; a fast-absorbing formula developed to nourish, comfort and hydrate from top to toe. Infused with Italian Rose Oil, the luxurious, lightweight lotion conditions and softens skin, whilst enveloping the body with a floral fragrance of Blackcurrant, Geranium and Patchouli. Housed in a pump bottle for mess-free application.

name: & Evelyn Summer Hill Scented Bath Soap (3X100g)
product_description:
Bring back summer for good with Crabtree & Evelyn Summer Hill Scented Bath Soap. With luxurious and natural ingredients to care for your skin, leaving it marvellously scented and soft, your shower moments will be unforgettable…
Made with a pure vegetable base and triple-milled to produce a rich, creamy lather, Crabtree & Evelyn Summer Hill Scented Bath Soap contains a blend of peach blossom, madonna lily and freesia with a medley of wildflowers and warm woods to help nourish and moisturise your skin. A nostalgic and warm ode to beautiful summer days, this soap will lighten your spirit while giving your skin the love and attention it needs.
Directions of use:

name: The Ritual of Dao - Calming Treat Small Gift Set
product_description:
Treat your skin to The Ritual of Dao - Calming Treat Small Gift Set from Rituals. Housed in luxurious packaging, the trio combines a refreshing spray, nourishing cream and gentle shower gel that promise to leave the body feeling cleansed, hydrated and cared for.
The Ritual of Dao Anti-Perspirant Spray (50ml)
With a powerful, fast-drying formula infused with organic White Lotus and Yi Yi Ren, the deodorant applies effortlessly to deliver 24 hour freshness, without leaving marks or stains. Skin is soothed, revitalised and comforted.
The Ritual of Dao Body Cream (70ml)
With a rich, creamy formula that absorbs quickly to soften and moisturise, the lightweight cream harnesses the nourishing properties of Yi Yi Ren to leave skin silky, supple and smooth. Delivers a gentle fragrance of organic White Lotus so you can experience a calmed, relaxed and restored body with a delicate scent.
The Ritual of Dao Foaming Shower Gel (50ml)
Transforming into a rich foam on contact with water, the refreshing shower gel delicately lifts away impurities whilst nourishing and moisturising the body. Enriched with organic Yi Yi Ren and White Lotus, skin feels revitalised, soft and supple with a subtle fragrance.

name: ISSA™ Brush Head - Colbalt Blue
product_description: The FOREO ISSA™ Brush Head in Cobalt Blue is made using premium grade silicone and without BPA and phthalates. Suitable for the ISSA™ toothbrush, the brush head discourages the formation of bacteria to leave your mouth feeling ultra clean. Boasting flexible bristles, the brush will give you a 3D clean and what’s more, it only has to be replaced once a year. – I.M

name: works Stress Check Breathe In 8ml
product_description:
Refresh and calm your senses with the this works Stress Check Breathe In; an aroma-therapeutic roller ball. Boasting a therapeutic blend, breathe in effortlessly delivers product to skin and can reduce feelings of stress by simply inhaling or massaging into pulse points.
The dreamy scent is enriched with Eucalyptus to counter physical and mental fatigue, whilst Frankincense essential oil delivers antiseptic benefits. Complete with Lavender oil, Stress Check helps those suffering from insomnia, nervous tension and hypertension. Expect to feel de-stressed and thoroughly relaxed.

name: Mio First Trimester Oil Bundle (Worth £74.50)
product_description:
Transform your skincare routine with the Mama Mio First Trimester Oil Bundle. Combining a trio of bestselling Mama Mio products, the bundle is designed to treat and nourish skin in order to cope with hormone changes that occur in the first trimester of pregnancy. Host to a moisturising body oil, luxurious body lotion and refreshing facial wash, each product within the bundle is suitable for use whilst pregnant and will leave skin thoroughly nourished.
The Tummy Rub Oil 120ml
Help protect your skin against pregnancy stretch marks with The Tummy Rub Oil. Enriched with Omega 3, 6 and 9 essential fatty acids, the oil is able to build the skin's strength and elasticity, helping to relieve itching tummies. Specially formulated with a blend of Organic Oils to lock in moisture and provide maximum protection to help reduce the appearance of stretch marks during and after pregnancy, the luxurious oil works to hydrate skin.
Megamama 150ml
Help nourish and replenish dry skin with Megamama, a super-rich omega body lotion. The luxurious cream contains Omega oils and powerful antioxidants to help strengthen and shield skin from free radical damage and environmental stresses. Enriched with Chia and Pumpkin seed, the cream leaves skin hydrated. Legs and arms can be particularly needy during pregnancy, causing skin to look tired and dull. Megamama allows you to experience a boost in radiance and reveal skin that is bursting with moisture. Suitable for use while pregnant and nursing to make skin feel moisturised and subtly fragranced for the whole day.
Gorgeous Glow Facial Wash 100ml
Gently cleanse skin with the foaming Gorgeous Glow Facial Wash. Specially formulated with Tea Tree oil and Green Tea Leaf, the wash helps keep skin hydrated and provides powerful antioxidants that shield skin from free radical damage and environmental stresses. The luxurious formula contains a blend of natural, Coconut-derived cleansers enriched with organic Omegas and Vitamins to nourish skin. Experience skin that is full of moisture with a boost in radiance for a brighter complexion.

name: Choice Infant's Blend Microbiotics - 75g
product_description: Udo's Choice Infant’s Blend Microbiotics provide an easy-to-consume powdered blend of ‘friendly’ bacteria (probiotic), specifically selected for children under 5 years old, to support the immune system functionality and encourage proper digestion. Microbiotics are the beneficial lacto and bifido bacteria that occur throughout the digestive tract and are essential in replenishing healthy gut flora, which helps to reduce gas, bloating and constipation.

name: Silk Eye Mask Slipper Gift Set - Rose (Various Sizes)
product_description:
Treat yourself or a loved one to the Eye Mask Slipper Gift Set from Holistic Silk. Housed in a luxurious organza bag, the collection includes a pair of massaging slippers and a sleep-inducing eye mask with limited edition print.
Holistic Silk Lavender Eye Mask
Crafted from Dupion silk, characterised by its luxurious sheen, the oversized mask features a super soft cotton velvet lining for ultimate comfort and a ribbon tie fastening to allow a custom fit. Filled with real Lavender for a relaxing, soothing fragrance, the sleep-inducing eye mask rests on the cheekbones and forehead to block out the light, allowing you to experience a moment of pure tranquillity. Ideal for home or travelling, you can wake up feeling restored and refreshed with reduced stress. Dimensions: 24cm x 12cm.
Holistic Silk Massaging Slippers
Featuring comfortable magnetic insoles with multiple perforated massage nodules, the slippers help to massage the reflex points in your feet, stimulating the nervous system and enhancing the body's metabolism. Ideal for yoga, travelling or even in the office, the cosy, lightweight slippers improve circulation, whilst gently soothing and relieving aching, heavy legs. Perfect for in-flight use to prevent swelling. Adorned with an elegant print and bow. Non-slip. Small: UK 3-4 / EU 36-37. Medium: UK 5-6 / EU 38-39. Large: UK 7-8 / EU 40-41.

name: Mio Superstar in a Jar - 15g
product_description:
Discover a multi-functional super balm with Mama Mio Superstar in a Jar; a versatile formula that works to hydrate, heal and protect dry skin. The creamy wax tackles an array of skincare issues that occur all over the body, ranging from the lips to heels and elbows to knees.
The hydrating balm blends into a luxurious, fragrance free oil, which is gentle yet effective on sensitive skin types and delicate pregnant noses. Fortified with Baobab Oil, the vitamin-rich oil envelops skin, hair and nails in an essential veil of nourishing moisture, which also boasts anti-ageing qualities.
A healthy dose of Beeswax and Almond Oil work in synergy to deliver anti-inflammatory and anti-oxidant benefits, as well as healing action to ensure skin is healthy and protected. Complete with a skin-loving blend of Camellia Seed oil and Olive oil, the lightweight balm leaves the body moisturised and rejuvenated. Expect Mama Mio’s Superstar in a Jar to become a household essential.

name: Ambre Solaire Clear Protect Sun Cream Spray SPF 50 200ml
product_description: Garnier Ambre Solaire Clear Protect Sun Cream Spray SPF 50 offers high protection in a transparent formulation and is non-greasy and non-sticky, leaving no white marks. Practical to use and ultra fresh to apply, the spray quickly absorbs into skin and designed to allow you to easily apply all over the body, even working upside down. Contains Mexoryl® XL, an advanced patented filter to protect from UVA and UVB rays and shield against sun induced skin damage. Prevents premature ageing of the skin caused by sun exposure. Its hydrating complex is enriched with Cactus Nutriflavones and Pure Vitamin E to hydrate the skin and retain moisture levels.

name: Krill Oil for Women - 60 Gel Capsules (600mg)
product_description:
Cleanmarine Krill Oil for Women gel capsules are an easy-to-consume food supplement to provide you with essential Omega 3 acids and vitamins to help regulate hormonal activity, reduce tiredness and alleviate the symptoms of PMS.
Each one contains Soy Isoflavones, which are similar to oestrogen on a cellular level, and Vitamin D3, known for sustaining life, building strong bones and modulating the immune system. Added Vitamins B1, B2 and B6 help to support a healthy nervous system and keep your energy levels in check. And of course, Krill Oil itself contributes to healthy heart, brain, eye and joint function as well as helping to enhance your mood and improve concentration.
Why choose Krill Oil over Fish Oil? Krill are shrimp-like crustaceans that provide a more sustainable and ethical source of Omega 3 with zero by-catch. The fatty acids within Krill Oil are bound to phospholipids, a major component of human cell membranes, thus are much more rapidly absorbed than the acids from fish oil supplements. Krill Oil is also rich in Astaxanthin, a natural antioxidant, plus there’s no fishy aftertaste.

name: Birthing Company Midwife in a Box Gift Set (Worth £57.96)
product_description:
Natural Birthing Company's Midwife in a Box Gift Set combines a host of natural oil formulas to help you look after yourself during pregnancy and after labour. The essential oil blends have been specially developed by caring midwives.
Bosom Buddies Oil (3 x 10ml):
"Ooh!" for Engorged Breasts - specially created to help relieve the discomfort of tender, swollen breasts. The oil blend combines Geranium with Peppermint, Cyprus and German Chamomile to help you feel more comfortable. Add a few drops to water and use a flannel for a relieving compress.
"Aah!" for Low Milk Supply - breastfeeding is a supply and demand process; the more you do it, the more milk you produce. Combining Fennel, Lemongrass and Mandarin, this special blend can be used in conjunction with offering your baby the breast more frequently to help enhance your milk supply.
"Ouch!" for Sore Nipples - a blend of Lavender, Neroli, Mandarin, Frankincense and Peppermint that works to relieve and moisturise sore, irritated nipples. Combined with correct positioning, it helps to promote a more enjoyable breastfeeding experience.
Pure Bliss Soothing Post-Natal Compress Solution (50ml):
A postnatal compress solution that works to calm and relieve feelings of discomfort in your intimate area after child birth. The award-winning blend of Hypericum and Calendula can be used straight after labour, and is suitable for use on stitches, tears, haemorrhoids and general intimate discomfort, including caesarean sections wounds. The calming formula promotes natural healing and helps to comfort your delicate area after birth.
Down Below Perineal Massage Oil (50ml):
A safe and 100% natural oil formula that can be used during perineal massage to help increase elasticity 'down below'. Perineal massage is recommended from 34 weeks of pregnancy to help prepare for labour; the massaging action helps to gently stretch skin and increase elasticity of perineal muscles to reduce the risk of tearing or episiotomy (needing a cut) during labour. Blending Rosehip, Apricot, Calendula and Evening Primrose Oils, the relaxing formula helps to prepare your intimate area for child birth, and also doubles as a body massage oil; it moisturises skin and may reduce the appearance of stretch marks during and after pregnancy.
Cool It Mama Body and Facial Spritz (100ml):
An uplifting aromatherapy spray that helps to combat feelings of tiredness, nausea and hot flushes during pregnancy. Promoting a happy, stress-free pregnancy, the light formula combines pure essential oils of Orange Blossom, Ylang Ylang, Bergamot and Grapefruit with a touch of Menthol to instantly cool and refresh your face and body. Whether you're having hot flushes or suffering from heavy legs and swollen ankles, the versatile mist works to revive the body and mind, revitalising your spirits to leave you feeling calm, cool and happy. Perfect for popping in your handbag, it's the safe and practical solution to some of pregnancy's wonderful side effects. Can even be used during labour to help keep you cool and inspire feelings of calm.

name: Karité Paris Shea Washing Cream - Lavender 500ml
product_description:
Treat your skin to a moisturising cleanse with Institut Karité Paris Shea Washing Cream in 'Lavender', a soap-free body wash with a rich and creamy texture.
Infused with 25% Shea Butter, a vitamin-rich ingredient that intensely nourishes and soothes skin, the body wash performs a gentle cleanse, lifting away dirt and impurities whilst moisturising, comforting and protecting skin. Rich and soothing, the formula delivers a cocoon of comfort and hydration that leaves the body feeling incredibly soft, supple and regenerated.
Enriched with the relaxing fragrance of Lavender.

name: Birthing Company Pure Bliss Soothing Postnatal Compress Solution 50ml
product_description:
Natural Birthing Company's Pure Bliss is a postnatal compress solution that works to calm and relieve feelings of discomfort in your intimate area after child birth.

The award-winning blend of Hypericum and Calendula can be used straight after labour, and is suitable for use on stitches, tears, haemorrhoids and general intimate discomfort, including caesarean section wounds. The calming formula promotes natural healing and helps to comfort your delicate area after birth.

name: Dante Dolce Vivere Venice Soap 250g
product_description:
Inspired by Italian beauty and lifestyle, the Dolce Vivere 'Venice' Soap from Nesti Dante utilises high quality, natural ingredients to leave you feeling perfectly pampered.
Crafted in Florence using the traditional saponification method, the vegetable-based soap bar gently cleanses and purifies without over-drying; it forms a creamy lather upon contact with water to restore soft, supple skin after every use. Beautifully wrapped in decorative paper, the soap imparts a luxurious fragrance of Red Geranium, Rice Cloud and Cotton Flower to relax the senses.

name: Spirited Body Oil 130ml
product_description:
Re-energise and strengthen the skin and mind with the Mauli Spirited Body Oil; an uplifting, multi-tasking treatment based upon Ayurvedic traditions to help balance Kapha energies that help bolster the immune system, helping to combat flu symptoms and feelings of lethargy.
Initially formulated as part of a luxurious spa treatment at the Bulgari Hotel, the oil contains a specific selection of essential oils that are renowned for healing properties both physically and mentally.
Enveloping skin in a conditioning veil of softness and nutrients, the aromatic blend contains stimulating heart notes of Eucalyptus, Juniper Berry and Giner, known for their restorative benefits. Revitalising accords of Peppermint, Cinnamon and Frankincense lift feelings of listlessness, while a base of Sweet Almond and Grapeseed works to boost a sluggish metabolism and alleviate blocked sinuses. Feel rejuvenated and inspired.

name: Liquid Gold Luxe Resurfacing Body Cloths
product_description:
Refresh and revitalise with the Alpha-H Liquid Gold Luxe Resurfacing Body Cloths; dual-purpose cleansing and exfoliating wipes that improve texture and tone.
Infused with Glycolic Acid and botanical ingredients, the towelettes feature a textured side to gently buff away dead skin cells and impurities, and a smooth surface that restores softness and suppleness.
Ideal for combating rough, dry and flaky areas, or preparing for self-tan application, the body is left feeling smooth, hydrated and refined. Housed in resealable packaging for use on-the-go.

name: Yoghurt Body Milk 200ml
product_description:
Nourish skin with the KORRES Yoghurt Body Milk; a hydrating formula that leaves the body smooth, refreshed and delicately scented.
The moisturising milk smoothes over skin, delivering a veil of essential and long-lasting moisture that eliminates areas of dryness. Enriched with Almond Oil, the luxurious solution delivers anti-inflammatory benefits and a comforting, soothing feel. A calming dose of Aloe Vera encourages cell regeneration and skin healing, whilst hydrating Shea Butter shields the body from UV aggression and therefore prevents wrinkle formation.
Providing a pampering, moisturising experience, the body milk leaves skin touchably soft and ultra-smooth, as well as thoroughly nourished and hydrated.

name: London Kukui Oil Wonder Balm (10ml)
product_description:
Give your skin a lovely little luxurious treat with Connock London Kukui Oil Wonder Balm, a nourishing, multi-tasking balm that can be used just about anywhere where skin needs a little extra loving care.
Containing a nourishing blend of kukui oil, monoi, cocoa butter, mango butter and beeswax, Connock London Kukui Oil Wonder Balm hydrates, soothes and deeply moisturises dry skin and is ideal for lips, cuticles, elbows, knees and heels. Relying on 100% natural ingredients and perfect for calming irritated skin, this balm will be your new best friend.
Directions of use:

name: Bath Oil Collection (6 x 20ml)
product_description:
Treat your mind and body to the Bath Oil Collection from Kneipp. Combining six of the brand's luxurious bath oils, the kit promotes a sense of well-being to leave you feeling restored and revitalised all year round.
Kneipp Herbal Bath Balancing Lavender (20ml)
Infused with soothing Lavender Essential Oil, the formula releases a cloud of pure tranquillity; helping to combat fatigue, melt away stress and tension, and leave you feeling rejuvenated after a busy day.
Kneipp Herbal Bath Stress Free Mandarin and Orange (20ml)
Fortified with natural essential oils of Mandarin and Orange, the refreshing formula soaks away all your cares and worries to encourage positivity and release tensions of everyday life.
Kneipp Herbal Bath Joint and Muscle Rescue Arnica (20ml)
Utilising Arnica Extract, an ingredient renowned for its revitalising benefits, the bath oil soothes and relaxes muscular strains, whilst Rosemary, Cabreuva and Pine Essential Oils warm and comfort the body after physical activity.
Kneipp Herbal Bath Sweet Dreams Valerian and Hops (20ml)

Marine Collagen Peptide aids and repairs skin structure, reducing wrinkles and binding moisture to ensure skin retains its elasticity.
