Clinical tests show a reduction in wrinkles and fine lines within 10-20 days and an improvement by 26% in 40 days. Skin radiance and overall vitality including hair, lips and nails is dramatically enhanced.

Foot File and Socks

product_description:
Improve the appearance of your skin with ALGENIST Firming and Lifting Neck Cream; a restructuring formula infused with a host of beneficial ingredients to deliver anti-ageing and skin-tightening properties.
Fortified with breakthrough ProPeptide3 and the brand's patented Alguronic Acid, the quick-absorbing cream helps to soften fine lines and wrinkles, whilst strengthening and toning the thin, delicate skin on the neck and décolleté.
During the ageing process, skin produces less collagen and elasticity becomes weakened. The innovative neck cream addresses slackening skin as it lifts and firms to reveal a visibly smoother, younger-looking appearance with refined texture and tone.

product_description:
Improve skin texture and elasticity with the Trilogy Firming Body Lotion; a lightweight, quick-absorbing formula that works to smoothen and refine without greasy residue.
Harnessing the powers of Certified Organic Rosehip Oil and Evening Primrose Oil, the luxurious lotion nourishes and protects skin, whilst its dose of Caffeine (derived from Green Coffee Extract) delivers firming properties to leave the body looking tight and toned from top to toe.
Skin is soft, moisturised and rejuvenated with the brand's signature fragrance of Lavender, Frankincense and Rose Geranium.

product_description:
Create smooth and beautiful feet with MICRO Pedi Power, an innovative addition to the MICRO Pedi range. First of its kind, the foot-smoothing device is electrically operated ensuring it is tough on skin but gentle on the rest of the feet.
Spinning 360° at an amazing 30 times per second, MICRO Pedi Power effortlessly buffs away hard skin on the soles to create gorgeous feet in seconds.
Complete with the NEW and improved anti-bacterial Flex+ pink rollers which contour easily around the foot, MICRO Pedi is gentle on sensitive skin yet rough on tough feet, ensuring that you get the best treatment possible for your tootsies.

product_description:
Regain confidence in your skin with Freezeframe's Stretch Mark Eraser, an innovative dry body oil that utilises Stem Technology to help visibly reduce the appearance of old and new stretch marks by more than half in as little as 2 weeks. Implementing technology that was first used to help heal third degree burns, the clinically proven formula expertly targets stretch marks to ease visible darkness, redness, length and width.
Utilising StemStim technology™ (created with the power of Adipose derived Stem Cells) and skin relaxing Peptides, the erasing oil glides effortlessly across skin without greasy residue and targets both new and old stretch marks, easing their appearance whilst reducing skin tension for smoother-looking effect.

The results? 
Clinical studies show that new stretch marks had a 92% reduction of visible redness after 12 weeks, and old, stubborn stretch marks up to 94% visible reduction.
Effectively minimising the severity of stretch mark appearance, the body oil also contains Glycoproteins and MMP inhibitors that may help to hinder the development of new stretch marks by strengthening skin and improving elasticity. Leaving no greasy after feel, the moisturising oil with Liquid Cocoa Butter will leave skin feeling smoother, more even in appearance and protected.

Also suitable for use by adults, this gorgeous cream bath helps to keep all skin smooth and supple whilst protecting from moisture loss. - E.D

Recognised for its low pollution levels and multiple benefits to health and well-being, the Dead Sea contains bromides to relax muscles and vitamin-rich Dunaliella Algae for antioxidant protection. Delivers intense moisture and hydration to leave skin soft, smooth and supple.

product_description:
Sonic Chic present the DELUXE Electric Toothbrush; a portable, rechargeable brush with a compact, lightweight design. Featuring a protective, ventilated cap for ultimate hygiene, the travel-friendly device is perfect for the gym, work or use on-the-move.
With a sonic-powered, dual speed function, the brush boasts two settings: Mode 1 for 28,000 strokes per minute and Mode 2 for 32,000 strokes per minute for a more intense clean, whilst its two minute Quadrant Timer indicates when to move to a different section of your mouth. Features a precision head to reach awkward areas and ultra-gentle bristles for a comfortable brushing experience every time.

name: London Kukui Oil Nourishing Collection (Worth £35)
product_description:
Perfectly pamper skin with the Kukui Oil Nourishing Collection from Connock London. Housed in a zipped wash bag, the kit includes three luxurious products infused with Kukui Oil, sourced from a small factory on the Hawaiian island of Oahu.
Kukui Oil Soap (100g)
Harnessing the powers of Kukui Oil and Shea Butter, the vegetable-based, creamy soap creates a rich lather to gently eliminate impurities without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness. Skin is soft, supple and delicately fragranced.
Nourishing Hand Cream (50ml)
A deeply moisturising hand cream that works to combat dry, rough skin whilst fighting visible signs of ageing. Infused with Kukui Oil, rich in essential fatty acids, the fast-absorbing, non-greasy formula delivers intense hydration, and its dose of antioxidant Vitamin E shields from environmental factors that can lead to fine lines, cracking and chapping.
Wonder Balm (10ml)
Infused with a unique blend of Kukui Oil, Monoi Cocoa Butter and Beeswax, the luxurious formula works to soothe and moisturise areas of dry skin. Ideal for lips, cuticles, elbows, knees and heels, the non-greasy balm is designed to calm irritated skin for long-lasting comfort.

name: Brown Rockrose & Pine Hand Wash
product_description:
Treat hardworking hands to Molton Brown Rockrose & Pine Hand Wash, a moisturising formula enriched with Sunflower extract to cleanse, comfort and nourish your skin.
Infused with a spicy fragrance powered by Mountain Pepper and Siberian Pine Oil, the hand wash gently cleanses hands whilst delivering much needed hydration. Skin feels soft, clean and pampered.

name: La Culture Body Milk 200ml
product_description:
Perfectly pamper the body from top to toe with the Gallinée La Culture Body Milk; a deeply nourishing, fast-absorbing formula that works to restore touchably soft, smooth skin.
Fortified with the brand's patented Triple Biotic Complex of Prebiotics, Probiotics and Lactic Acid, the replenishing milk delivers optimum hydration to leave skin intensely moisturised, whilst antioxidant Bogbean Extract firms and Sweet Almond Oil regenerates and renews. Your body is left supple and healthy-looking with a radiant glow.

name: Dante Il Frutteto Citron and Bergamot Soap 250g
product_description: Treat your skin and senses to the Il Frutteto Citron and Bergamot Soap from Nesti Dante. Crafted in Florence using traditional methods and natural ingredients, the vegetable-based soap gently cleanses and rejuvenates, whilst energising and refreshing to leave skin feeling soft and supple. Housed in decorative packaging, the soap bar makes an ideal gift for yourself or a loved one.

name: Transform Luxe Daily Self Tan (236ml)
product_description:
XEN-TAN’s bestselling Daily Self Tan, Transform Luxe is now available in the new and advanced Luxe range. Now in a new larger 236ml size you can enjoy it even more as it delivers the same, easy, smooth application it has become known for.
Developed specially for today’s growing gradual tan market, Transform Luxe gives the same delicious daily dose of moisture you’ve come to expect from XEN-TAN but with an extra boost of tanning ingredient to deliver a silky smooth olive glow. As with so many of their products it comes with a wonderful scent of fresh vanilla. Its advanced formula lets you apply just like an everyday moisturiser for sun-kissed skin that’s streak-free, sumptuously soft and never ever orange!
Directions of use:

name: Aid Beauty Cleansing Body Polish with Active Charcoal (170g)
product_description:
Achieve silky soft skin with First Aid Beauty's Cleansing Body Polish with Active Charcoal; a skin-refining formula developed to cleanse, exfoliate and smoothen the body from top to toe.
Fortified with Active Charcoal, its innovative formula forms a rich foam upon contact with water to gently buff the skin's surface, eliminating dirt, impurities and dryness without stripping moisture or uncomfortable tightness.
Deeply invigorating, its nourishing cocktail of Argan Oil, Honey and Liquorice Root Extract diminish dead, dull skin cells and roughness to reveal refreshed, revitalised skin with a healthy-looking glow. Safe for sensitive skin.

name: Cream Cleanser 100ml Tube
product_description:
The Trilogy Cream Cleanser is one of Trilogy's most praised and popular skincare products. With over half of the bottle containing organic rosehip oil, it does more than just remove impurities. Enriched with other skin nourishing ingredients such as primrose oil, almond, carrot and jojoba oil, your skin will be left feeling lusciously soft as well as thoroughly cleansed of dirt and makeup buildup. Formulated with orange blossom and free from harsh sulfates, it is gentle enough to make it your morning and evening daily cleanser.
Directions for use: Gently massage into damp skin on the face and neck. Take care around the eye area. Rinse with warm water and pat dry. Use a face cloth for extra help removing a build up of makeup.- K.R

name: Boo My Little Box Of Boo Boos (4 Products)
product_description:
Welcome your baby into the world in natural style with this delightful Love Boo My Little Box Of Love Boos gift set. This luxury set contains everything mothers need to create the perfect baby bath time.
The Love Boo My Little Box Of Love Boos gift set contains four natural products formulated to give baby the best bath time possible! Designed to work together to hydrate, nourish and calm little ones skin, this wonderful box of delights will make both mother and baby very happy!
This pack contains the following products:

name: Ingrown Eliminating Pads (50 Pads)
product_description:
bliss ingrown eliminating pads are soaked in exfoliating alpha and beta hydroxyl acid, along with botanical soothers to help prevent post waxing or shaving ingrown hairs. Used daily they’ll keep skin smooth, soothed and all-importantly lump-free.
Oat extract tackles skin irritation, redness and itching whilst soothing lavender oil works its healing magic on your skin. Witch hazel water dazzles your skin with its wound healing and anti-inflammatory properties whilst gycolic acid sloughs dead skin cells for a smoother skin surface. bliss ingrown eliminating pads are also perfect for men to use post-shave to prevent against beard bumps.
Directions of use:

name: Brown Ylang-Ylang Body Lotion 300ml
product_description: Perfectly pamper skin with Molton Brown's Ylang-Ylang Body Lotion; a fast-absorbing moisturiser developed to nourish, comfort and hydrate from top to toe. Blended with soothing and balancing plant extracts, the luxurious, lightweight lotion conditions and softens skin, whilst imparting a long-lasting fragrance of Madagascan Ylang-Ylang, Cardamom and Musk to relax the senses. Housed in a pump bottle for mess-free application.

name: Jasmine Body Butter (125ml)
product_description:
The KORRES Jasmine Body Butter has a sweet and floral scent that makes you smell divine! This smoothing and moisturising cream for all over the body has a beautifully vintage feel and is ideal for dry elbows, heels and knees.
KORRES Jasmine Body Butter uses shea butter in combination with sunflower, almond and avocado oils to nourish your dehydrated skin,  thus restoring its elasticity and smoothness, leaving you with soft and gorgeously fragrant skin.
Directions of use:

name: Maxiwhite Intensive Whitening Strips (14 Strips)
product_description:
Safely whiten teeth with the Janina Maxiwhite Intensive Whitening Strips; a convenient, at-home whitening treatment that produces results in just seven days.
Each treatment comprises a pair of strips, one for the upper row of teeth and one for the lower. Simply apply the strips to clean teeth and let them work for thirty minutes. The convenient whitening strips boast an innovative, enamel-friendly whitening ingredients that gently and effectively removes stains to reveal a brighter smile. After use, effortlessly rinse away the residue gel to leave teeth visibly clean and healthy, without causing unwanted sensitivity.
Without utilising hydrogen peroxide, the strips are able to reveal clean and visibly whiter teeth within a week.  The strips are ultra-convenient and mess-free, unlike trays.

name: Seaweed Bath Co. Fresh Whole Seaweed Detox Bath Soak 70g
product_description:
The Seaweed Bath Co. Fresh Whole Seaweed Detox Bath Soak works to rejuvenate the mind and body. Fortified with organic Bladderwrack Seaweed sustainably-harvested off the coast of Maine, the formula delivers 65+ vitamins, minerals and amino acids to replenish and hydrate from top to toe.
With high Iodine levels, Bladderwrack Seaweed helps to promote the skin's natural detoxification process, whilst its anti-inflammatory properties soothe redness and irritation for long-lasting comfort. Complete with a drawstring mesh bag, the bath soak will leave you feeling purified, revitalised and deeply restored.

name: Performance Multivitamin Tablets - (60 Tablets)
product_description:
Centrum Performance Multivitamin Tablets have been specifically developed for those with active and sporty lifestyles, delivering essential vitamins and minerals to supplement your nutritional needs and give extra support for energy release.   
The world’s number one multivitamin is established through 30 years of scientific research and nutritional expertise, combining 23 key nutrients to support physical endurance and energy release.
B Vitamins help to unlock energy reserves taken from food for an additional boost, while Iron, Ginkgo Biloba and Pantothenic Acid work in tandem to maintain a healthy and active mind for enhanced stamina and performance.  
Vitamin B1 supports the normal heart function, plus Vitamin C boosts antioxidant levels and contributes to support of the immune system. Ideal for those who regularly exercise and play sports, the daily supplement ensures you feel ready and at your best.

name: Daily Hand Repair (75ml)
product_description:
Rejuvenate and heal dry, over-worked hands with the Menage Daily Hand Repair; a fast-absorbing cream that works to regenerate, protect and restore comfort.
Its rich, non-greasy formula instantly forms a protective barrier upon application to defend against free radical damage, whilst delivering superior softness and improving suppleness. E.N.

name: and Tone Weekly Self-Tan Lotion Medium 200ml
product_description:
Achieve a long-lasting tan with the Weekly Self-Tan Lotion Medium from UTAN and Tone. The best-selling formula envelops skin in a refreshing scent, as well as delivering a golden tan for up to a week.
Ideal for fair to medium skin tones, the lotion is effortlessly applied and offers an instant bronzed-look and streak-free results. The tan is complete with UTAN and Tone’s Body Sculpting complex, which works to flush toxins from the skin and visibly tone and firm the surface. Skin is left supple and sun-kissed.

name: Black Pit Boss Antiperspirant & Deodorant (78g)
product_description:
Keep yourself smelling fresh with this antiperspirant and deodorant that's suitable for sensitive skin. It provides protection against odour and damp patches with a gentle formulation that doesn't irritate the skin. The deodorant won't stain clothes and is lightly fragranced.
Apply after shower to clean skin. Turn the base of the stick to raise the solid deodorant. Use sparingly (one stroke per armpit) to underarms only.

name: and Tone 4 Piece Discovery Set
product_description:
Experience a complete tanning routine with the 4 Piece Discovery Set from UTAN and Tone. Combining to deliver a streak-free, golden glow, the set contains a pre-tan body scrub, self-tan lotion, tan intensifier and a nourishing night crème. Skin will be supple, nourished and sun-kissed.
Body Smoothing Before Scrub 100ml
Prepare your skin for self-tan with the Body Smoothing Before Scrub. The scrub is designed to exfoliate the body, ridding skin of dead and dry skin cells, which will aid in achieving an even tan. Enriched with Olive Fruit and Sweet Orange essential oils, the scrub delivers luxurious hydration to skin, whilst Camomile offers a soothing feel. Expect thoroughly nourished skin that is ready for self-tanning products.
Firming Body Weekly Self-Tan Lotion 100ml
Achieve a long-lasting tan with the Firming Body Weekly Self-Tan Lotion. The best-selling formula envelops skin in a refreshing scent, as well as delivering a golden tan for up to a week. Ideal for fair to medium skin tones, the lotion is effortlessly applied and offers an instant bronzed-look and streak-free results. The tan utilises UTAN and Tone’s Body Sculpting complex to flush toxins from the skin, which visibly tones and firms the body.
Firming Body Everyday Lotion Gradual Glow 100ml
Top up your tan with the Gradual Lotion Medium. Ideal for medium to dark skin tones, the lotion is designed to be used to intensify and build on existing real or fake tans until the desired level of colour is achieved. Enriched with an organic tanner, the silky lotion can be used as a regular body lotion, yet delivers a streak-free, sun-kissed finish. The tan is complete with a Body Sculpting complex, which works to flush toxins from the skin and visibly tone and firm the surface. Skin is left supple and sun-kissed.
Nourishing Night Creme 25ml
Achieve a holiday glow with the Nourishing Night Creme. Offering nourishment whilst skin is most receptive to repair, the creme is designed to moisturise and care for skin, as well as delivering a gradual tan. Antioxidant rich, the formula is enriched with Vitamins C, B and K, alongside potent Hyaluronic Acid. The innovative Night Creme provides essential moisture to skin, whilst an organic tanner develops a gradual sun-kissed glow overnight. Used consecutively, the tan can be built up to deliver your desired colour and deepness.

name: Stock & Barrel Disorder Raw Earth (100g)
product_description:
Lock Stock & Barrel Grooming’s Disorder Raw Earth gives a gritty, gathered texture and strong hold with a matte finish for tousled dishevelled styles.
Raw Earth from Lock Stock & Barrel Grooming contains diatomaceous earth and bentonite for an unruly matte texture and hold and Silica and Pumice for a unique earthy gathered texture.
Directions of use:

name: & Evelyn La Source Body Lotion 500ml
product_description:
Feel perfectly pampered with the Crabtree & Evelyn La Source Body Lotion; a lightweight, quick-absorbing formula that delivers intense moisture and hydration without greasy residue.
Fortified with a Hydra Marine Blend of antioxidant-rich Green Seaweed and Blue Sea Kale, the luxurious lotion softens and conditions skin, whilst Shea Butter and Vitamin E nourish and protect. Expect soft, supple skin with a fresh sea breeze scent to rejuvenate the mind and body.

name: Cleansing Hand Wash (250ml)
product_description:
Sukin Cleansing Hand Wash is formulated with aromatic botanicals, softening jojoba and avocado oils with soothing aloe vera and hydrating rose hip oil to create a hand wash that cleanses and refreshes hands. The wash removes excess oil and dirt leaving hands luxuriously clean.
Sukin believe the most powerful and effective ingredients for your skin and hair care come from nature. Environmentally conscious, Sukin is a natural personal care company from Australia.
‘Skincare that doesn’t cost the earth™’ - Sukin’s commitment extends far beyond cosmetic. The 100% certified carbon neutral company aims to reduce the impact their business has on our increasingly fragile environment. -SA

name: Rêve de Miel® Body Cream for Dry Skin 400ml
product_description:
Treat dry, sensitive skin to the nourishing and reparative properties of NUXE Rêve de Miel® Body Cream, a rich, moisturising formula that cocoons skin in a veil of hydration and comfort.
Helping to relieve feelings of irritation and tightness in dry skin, the replenishing cream contains Honey and Sunflower and gently envelops the body to promote soft, supple results. It expertly restores and replenishes hydration whilst soothing to leave dry skin feeling comfortable and relieved. Infused with a comforting fragrance.

name: Pec & Ab Sculpting Serum 100ml
product_description:
Achieve the body you deserve with FIT's Pec & Ab Sculpting Serum, a formula designed specifically for men to help create the appearance of a more sculpted physique.
Enriched with bio-active, natural ingredients, including fat inhibiting caffeine and artichoke leaf extract, the serum targets fat beneath the surface to create the appearance of more defined, refined muscles. Its non-sticky texture absorbs quickly into skin, delivering a toning effect for smoother looking skin. Infused with OXY-FIT-10 technology to help boost cell regeneration. - K.N.

name: Associates Revive Morning Roller Ball 10ml
product_description:
Experience the powers of the Aromatherapy Associates Revive Morning Roller Ball; an intense pulse point therapy to energise the mind and body for a refreshing start to the day.
Expertly blended with invigorating Grapefruit, Rosemary and Juniper, the stimulating formula can be used throughout the day to boost your mood. Perfect for travelling or carrying in your handbag, the revitalising solution leaves you feeling awake and ready to face the busy day ahead.

name: Black Dragon Ice Relief & Recovery Balm 118ml
product_description:
This innovative, soothing, pain-relieving cream works deep down to ease  joint aches and strains, lessen discomfort from inflammation, and  relieve tension in sore muscles. Enriched with Menthol,  Dragon's Blood, MSM, Arnica and Willowherb, this healing formula  provides immediate and sustained relief. It can be used before and after a workout to enhance performance and speed up recovery.
Use before exercising to warm up muscles and to increase circulation.  Use after exercising to treat existing pains and to restore aching  muscles. Can be used anytime to relieve areas of tension and stress,  especially in the neck and shoulders.

name: Chapman Skinesis Overnight Body Treatment (120ml)
product_description:
Restore youthful-looking, firmer skin with the Skinesis Overnight Body Treatment from Sarah Chapman, a dry serum-oil to improve skin tone and texture. Its powerful formula combines vitamins A, C and E with a blend of oils, including argan, camellia flower and baobab so you can wake up to smoother, glowing skin.
Suitable for all skin types, the anti-ageing treatment is infused with highly concentrated Matrixyl® peptide and Collageneer® to boost elasticity and firmness, whilst stimulating drainage and eliminating toxins to reveal a plump, rejuvenated appearance. Subtly fragranced with the brand's signature flower essential oils to calm the body and senses. E.N.

name: Spa Factory Nectarine and Honey Blossom Body Salt Scrub
product_description:
Awaken your skin with the Nectarine and Honey Blossom Body Salt Scrub from Natural Spa Factory. The luxurious salt scrub boasts an oil-based formula that delivers intense hydration to the skin, alongside a soothing effect. The formula easily absorbs into the skin without leaving a greasy residue or clogging the pores, which can lead to blemishes.
Enriched with Apricot Kernel oil, rich in Vitamin A and E, the scrub works to renew skin cells and thoroughly nourish the skin, whilst also defending against free radicals. Suitable for even sensitive skin types, the formula contains Grape Seed oil that aims to visibly tighten skin and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, leaving the body younger looking and incredibly smooth.

name: works Sleep Plus Dream Body 75ml
product_description: This Works present the Sleep Plus Dream Body; a two-in-one formula that works to restore a youthful glow whilst helping you to achieve the perfect night's sleep. Synergising a blend of pure essential oils and potent actives including amino acids and retinol, the treatment allows you to wake up to velvety soft, smooth skin and revived radiance. E.N.

name: Grubby Cow Zesty Hand Wash (300ml)
product_description:
Wash those grubby mitts with Cowshed Grubby Cow Zesty Hand Wash. Infused with natural essential oils, this beautifully scented hand wash stimulates and rejuvenates hard-working hands.
Fresh from the Babington House Walled Garden, the newest member to the Cowshed hand care range is infused with natural peppermint oil, a cooling antiseptic and sweet organic oil, to cleanse and tone hands. Cowshed Grubby Cow Zesty Hand Wash kindly cleans hands and freshens without drying the skin out.
Directions of use:

name: Black Epic Moisture Extra Rich Body Hydrator (354ml)
product_description: This Epic Moisture Extra Rich Body Hydrator (354ml) by Jack Black is a rich body lotion that promises great results whilst still maintaining a lightweight texture. Formulated with a rich blend of shea and capuacu butter and without the use of parabens, sulfates or phthalates, this stunning moisturiser also utilises an advanced technology along with a complex of natural botanicals such as organic green tea and argan oil to deliver a sheer finish as well as long-lasting, rich hydration. - E.D

name: Dante Romantica Gillyflower and Fuchsia Soap 250g
product_description:
Energise skin with the Nesti Dante Romantica Gillyflower and Fuchsia Soap; a fragrant, vegetable soap bar that is hand-crafted in Italy using the saponification method. Arriving wrapped in thick textured paper finished with a decorative floral print, the soap is an ideal gift, or the perfect treat to yourself.
Traditionally made utilising natural, raw ingredients, the soap gently cleanses skin to eliminate traces of dirt and impurities, without stripping skin of essential moisture. Romancing the senses, the cleansing bar boasts a sensual scent of gillyflower and fuchsia, which work in synergy to deliver an uplifting fragrance that will invigorate the mind and body.

name: Hydrating Body Lotion (200ml)
product_description:
Hydrate, soften and nourish the skin whilst prolonging your tan with the Hydrating Body Lotion from TANWORX. It's formulated with Vitamin E to restore moisture whilst blackcurrant seed oil softens the skin whilst increasing its elasticity.
This unique soft focus technology works to keep your skin looking young and healthy, reducing the appearance of fine lines and giving a naturally radiant glow. Perfect for daily use, it promises to enhance your TANWORX tan to keep you looking and feeling amazing. K.D.

name: Karité Paris Shea Radiance Milk Cream Mask 50ml
product_description:
Treat your skin to the nourishing properties of Institut Karité Paris Shea Radiance Mask, a milky face mask that works to gently cleanse and exfoliate to reveal softer, brighter skin.
Infused with 20% Shea Butter, a vitamin-rich ingredient that intensely nourishes and soothes, the velvety formula delicately lifts away impurities and dulling dead skin cells to freshen the complexion and restore natural radiance. Suitable for sensitive skin, the comforting mask is best used once or twice a week to inspire soft, supple skin.

name: HD Combination Tweezer Set - Gold
product_description:
The brushworks HD Combination Tweezer Set in 'Gold' is a must-have collection for grooming and perfecting your eyebrows. A well groomed brow will expertly frame your face.
Handcrafted from high quality stainless steel, the tweezers have been perfectly aligned for performance and precision, and are durable and easy to clean. Each tweezer features a slanted, straight or pointed tip for targeting specific brow/skin concerns such as loose strays or painful splinters.
Slanted Tweezer - Perfect for tidying up stray hairs on larger areas.
Straight Tweezer - Perfect for holding false eyelashes in place and  applying delicate nail art.
Slanted Point Tweezer - A multi-purpose tweezer for tidying and grooming your arches.
Pointed Tweezer - A precision tweezer ideal for ingrown hairs and removing splinters.

name: works Sleep Plus Trouble Shooter 120ml
product_description: This Works present the Sleep Plus Trouble Shooter; a two-in-one formula that works to combat uneven, crepey skin whilst helping you achieve the perfect night's sleep. Synergising a blend of pure essential oils, multi-fruit acids, antioxidant vitamin E and ultra-hydrating hyaluronic acid, the treatment allows you to wake up to revitalised, healthy-looking skin with revived radiance. E.N.

name: Silk Eye Mask Slipper Gift Set - Tibetan Orange (Various Sizes)
product_description:
Treat yourself or a loved one to the Eye Mask Slipper Gift Set from Holistic Silk. Housed in a luxurious organza bag, the collection includes a pair of massaging slippers and a sleep-inducing eye mask with limited edition print.
Holistic Silk Lavender Eye Mask
Crafted from Dupion silk, characterised by its luxurious sheen, the oversized mask features a super soft cotton velvet lining for ultimate comfort and a ribbon tie fastening to allow a custom fit. Filled with real Lavender for a relaxing, soothing fragrance, the sleep-inducing eye mask rests on the cheekbones and forehead to block out the light, allowing you to experience a moment of pure tranquillity. Ideal for home or travelling, you can wake up feeling restored and refreshed with reduced stress. Dimensions: 24cm x 12cm.
Holistic Silk Massaging Slippers
Featuring comfortable magnetic insoles with multiple perforated massage nodules, the slippers help to massage the reflex points in your feet, stimulating the nervous system and enhancing the body's metabolism. Ideal for yoga, travelling or even in the office, the cosy, lightweight slippers improve circulation, whilst gently soothing and relieving aching, heavy legs. Perfect for in-flight use to prevent swelling. Adorned with an elegant print and bow. Non-slip. Small: UK 3-4 / EU 36-37. Medium: UK 5-6 / EU 38-39. Large: UK 7-8 / EU 40-41.

name: Island Apothecary Soothe Sleep Oil (8ml)
product_description: Seascape Island Apothecary Soothe Sleep Oil (8ml) is formulated with a blend of 100% natural oils that will help you to relax and unwind at the end of a stressful day. - L.M.

name: Handheld Shiatsu Massager
product_description:
Experience an intense yet comfortable massage with the HoMedics Handheld Shiatsu Massager; a convenient, handheld device from the leading innovators in home massage. Arriving with three, interchangeable massage heads, the massager is the perfect tool for relieving tension and soothing aching muscles.
The three massage heads help to vary the massage experience and target your needs. The Wave Head offers a smooth massage with minimal kneading, whilst the Arc Head delivers an invigorating massage for working into areas of muscle tension and the Roller Head provides a deep tissue massage to eliminate tight knots. The massager boasts an auto pulse programme that relaxes aches and pains as the device glides across the treatment area. Offering various speed options, the Shiatsu massager allows you to tailor your massage experience to your needs.
The lightweight massager is ergonomically designed with an easy-grip handle. This allows the device to reach all areas of need with minimal effort. Working on the entire body, including those hard-to-reach areas, the massager arrives with a soft mesh cover. This can be placed over the head for additional comfort when targeting sensitive areas of skin such as the face.
Compact yet powerful, the device is ideal for at-home use as well as for relieving pain on-the-go. Expect feelings of stress and anxiety to simply melt away, muscles will feel at ease.

name: Soothing Baby Oil (100ml)
product_description:
Developed specifically for your little one's delicate skin, the Soothing Baby Oil from NAÏF absorbs quickly to nourish, replenish and soften from top to toe.
Infused with natural Cottonseed Oil and Chamomile, the oil contains essential fatty acids to moisturise skin, leaving it feeling supple, smooth and velvety soft. Ideal for dry and sensitive skin, it restores long-lasting comfort without making the body greasy.

name: Gorgeous Cow Body Lotion
product_description:
Treat skin to a veil of hydration with the Cowshed Gorgeous Cow Body Lotion; a nourishing moisturiser with a delicate, feminine scent.
Combining Shea and Cocoa Butters, the body lotion envelops skin in long-lasting moisture, which is able to eliminate areas of dryness, whilst leaving the body enviably smooth. The hydrator also boasts a fragrant blend of calming Lavender, Ylang Ylang and Moroccan Rose Essential Oils, which lends skin a sweet and floral scent that seeks to boost your mood and soothe the mind.
Expect touchably soft skin, without an unwanted greasy residue.

name: Creating a Healthy Life Book
product_description: Be inspired with the Murad Creating a Healthy Life Book; an uplifting read written by Dr. Howard Murad. Containing Murad’s insights and art, the book was written to help people discover their passion in life. The content boasts personal insights and artistic talents, which show the reader how to live, look and feel better. Be inspired and discover your passion for living.

name: of New York Brow Shaper - Hot Pink (Set of 2)
product_description:
Preen and perfect your eyebrows with the Lilibeth of New York Brow Shaper; a high performance, pain-free hair removal tool to define the brow line without tweezing or waxing.
Suitable for men and women, the easy-to-use, award-winning tool features a durable stainless steel blade that effortlessly and comfortably removes even the shortest hairs, whilst its portable, fold-up design is ideal for grooming on-the-go. Can also be used on the upper lip, chin, bikini line, legs, arms, knuckles and fuzzy facial hair.
Not only great for hair removal, the Brow Shaper delivers dermaplaning benefits; it gently exfoliates the top layer of dead skin cells to allow better absorption of moisturisers and serums, whilst helping make-up to sit more evenly.

name: Denny Marvel Balm 30ml - Mint
product_description: Leighton Denny present the Mint Marvel Balm; a multi-beneficial formula that works to soften and replenish areas of dry skin. Enriched with a moisturising blend of Marula Oil, Vitamin E and Grapeseed Oil, the non-greasy balm hydrates, softens and restores long-lasting comfort. Ideal for nails, cuticles, lips, elbows and knees.

name: Tonic Gentle Body Wash (250ml)
product_description:
Suitable for all skin types, Gentlemen’s Tonic Gentle Body Wash cleans and energises while maintaining the skins natural moisture balance. Containing a high level of vegetable glycerine with honey and wheat extract it helps soften and condition tired skin.
Gentlemen’s Tonic Gentle Body Wash uses menthol to freshen, invigorate, cool and deodorise the skin while ginger extract acts as a strong anti-inflammatory agent and also helps to stimulate and energise the skin's surface.
The Gentlemen's Tonic range consists of naturally based plant-derived materials from sustained and renewable resources that are specifically formulated for men's skin and hair.
Directions of use:

name: Herzog Tonus B12 Body Cream
product_description:
Drain, tone and firm skin with Karin Herzog’s Tonus B12 Body Cream, an uplifting and powerful tonic that provides intense hydration and works to restore firmness and elasticity of skin and help combat cellulite production.
Infused with potent Vitamin B12 and organic green tea extracts, the detoxifying formula penetrates deep into the dermis and provides ultimate nourishment to soften and condition. It works to re-contour your body, stimulating the metabolism of fatty deposits and draining them to leave skin looking incredibly toned, moisturised and smooth.

name: Wild Flower Body Wash Infused Buffer - Coconut Verbena
product_description:
Experience an at-home pampering experience with the Coconut Verbena scented Wild Flower Body Wash Infused Buffer from Spongellé; a flower shaped sponge saturated with body wash.
Enriched with extracts of Yuzu, Edelweiss and Vetiver root, the multi-purpose buffing sponge is designed to cleanse, exfoliate, massage and hydrate the skin. Its unique surface transforms as you squeeze, changing from an exfoliating, massage texture to a smooth, cleansing sponge.
The innovative buffer is infused with Coconut Verbena fragranced body wash, which envelops the body in a Coconut Water, Lemon Verbena and Crisp Bamboo aroma. Creating a creamy lather for up to 14 showers, the sponge leaves skin thoroughly cleansed and feeling soft and silky.

name: Wild Flower Body Wash Infused Buffer - Papaya Yuzu
product_description:
Experience an at-home pampering experience with the Papaya Yuzu scented Wild Flower Body Wash Infused Buffer from Spongellé; a flower shaped sponge saturated with body wash.
Enriched with extracts of Yuzu, Edelweiss and Vetiver root, the multi-purpose buffing sponge is designed to cleanse, exfoliate, massage and hydrate the skin. Its unique surface transforms as you squeeze, changing from an exfoliating, massage texture to a smooth, cleansing sponge.
The innovative buffer is infused with Papaya Yuzu fragranced body wash, which envelops the body in a Yazu, Green Papaya and Muguet Petal aroma. Creating a creamy lather for up to 14 showers, the sponge leaves skin thoroughly cleansed and feeling soft and silky.

name: Holiday Ornament Body Wash Infused Buffer - Champagne
product_description:
Get into the festive spirit with the Champagne fragranced Holiday Ornament Body Wash Infused Buffer from Spongellé. The white, snowflake shaped sponge arrives with a useful hanging ribbon for when it is not in use, which can double up as a Christmas ornament. Ideal as a gift or indulgent treat for yourself.
Enriched with extracts of Yuzu, Edelweiss and Vetiver root, the multi-purpose buffing sponge is designed to cleanse, exfoliate, massage and hydrate the skin.  Its unique surface transforms as you squeeze, changing from an exfoliating, massage texture to a smooth, cleansing sponge.
The innovative buffer is infused with Champagne fragranced body wash, which envelops the body in a subtle and festive aroma. Creating a creamy lather for up to 5 showers, the sponge leaves skin thoroughly cleansed and feeling soft and silky.

name: Spongology Body Wash Infused Body Buffer - Milk & Honey
product_description:
Be mindful of the environment with the Milk & Honey fragranced ‘Spongology™’ Body Wash Infused Body Buffer from Spongellé. Catering to sustainable customers, the Spongology™ buffer is eco-friendly and delivers a subtle aroma to the body.
The multi-purpose buffing sponge is designed to cleanse, exfoliate, massage and hydrate the skin. Enriched with a skin-loving formula and an array of organic extracts, the buffer utilises extracts of Milk and Honey. The body wash infused sponge leaves skin touchably soft and smooth and is able to create a creamy, cleansing lather for 20+ showers

name: works Deep Sleep Bath Soak (200g)
product_description:
Designed to relax and rejuvenate after a stressful day, this Deep Sleep Bath Soak by this works is the ultimate alternative to bath salts. Boasting a rich formulation that instantly moisturises the pores whilst providing a theraputic setting for you to truly wind down.
With tranquil, sleep inducing Lavender and Camomile that work to ensure your body is prepared for a good night's sleep, this gorgeous Bath Soak will leave a soothing fragrance so you smell just as good as you feel. K.D.

name: & Fandango Men's Body Wash (200ml)
product_description:
Refresh and rejuvenate your skin with Scaramouche & Fandango Men's Body Wash (200ml). Forming a rich and luscious lather that gently cleanses away dirt and impurities from your skin, it's enriched with Brazilian papaya extract and vitamin E to nourish and condition your skin, keeping it touchably soft and supple. Free from oil, silicone and parabens, it's the perfect product when you want an invigorating shower. - L.M.

Directions of Use:

name: Infusion Vert Moisture Soap 300ml
product_description:
Infuse the hands and body in an aromatic scent using the Infusion Vert Moisture Soap from MÁDARA. Ideal for in the shower or as a hand wash, the formula is designed to cleanse, soften and hydrate the skin, whilst delivering an energising fragrance.
The wash boasts an uplifting and refreshing aroma, capturing the dewy freshness of Northern Meadows. The scent comprises essences of Thyme and Lemon Balm, blended with hues of Horsetail and soothing notes of Violet Flowers. Offering cleansing and moisturising properties, the cleansing formula leaves the hands and body clean, soft and aromatically fragranced.

name: Klein Euphoria for Men Deodorant Stick (75g)
product_description:
With lasting freshness and maximum protection, the Calvin Klein Euphoria for Men Deodorant Stick perfectly complements the oriental Euphoria fragrance. The gentle, comfortable deodorant stick is lightly scented with a Ginger Pepper, Black Basil, Suede and Patchouli blend.
Protecting your skin throughout the day, the deodorant smoothly releases a soft, refreshing lotion. – E.W.

name: Invigorating Cal-Metab Plus Body Enhancement Capsules
product_description:
Cal-Metab Plus are dietary supplements, perfect for part of a weight-loss regime.
The capsules help to cleanse your blood whilst restoring the body's natural and essential minerals and vitamins.
Formulated with a blend of natural herbal extracts such as Laminaria, Plantain and Algae Kelp to boost the body's natural metabolism.

name: Baby Cow Full Body Cream (50ml)
product_description:
The Cowshed Baby Cow Organics range uses gentle formulas to care for your little bundle of joy and this Full Body Cream is no exception. With no nasties it’s ideal for particularly dry patches to leave baby’s skin soft and smooth.
Containing meadowfoam oil, a gentle and effective moisturiser for baby’s delicate skin, Baby Cow Organics Full Body Cream is perfect for your precious one. Meadowfoam oil is known to be one of the most stable vegetable oils, making it safe and long-lasting. Cowshed’s botanical formulations are naturally paraben, petrochemical and sulphate free, suitable for vegetarians and contain certified organic ingredients.
Directions of use:

name: Silk Eye Mask Slipper Gift Set - Peacock (Various Sizes)
product_description:
Treat yourself or a loved one to the Eye Mask Slipper Gift Set from Holistic Silk. Housed in a luxurious organza bag, the collection includes a pair of massaging slippers and a sleep-inducing eye mask with limited edition print.
Holistic Silk Lavender Eye Mask
Crafted from Dupion silk, characterised by its luxurious sheen, the oversized mask features a super soft cotton velvet lining for ultimate comfort and a ribbon tie fastening to allow a custom fit. Filled with real Lavender for a relaxing, soothing fragrance, the sleep-inducing eye mask rests on the cheekbones and forehead to block out the light, allowing you to experience a moment of pure tranquillity. Ideal for home or travelling, you can wake up feeling restored and refreshed with reduced stress. Dimensions: 24cm x 12cm.
Holistic Silk Massaging Slippers
Featuring comfortable magnetic insoles with multiple perforated massage nodules, the slippers help to massage the reflex points in your feet, stimulating the nervous system and enhancing the body's metabolism. Ideal for yoga, travelling or even in the office, the cosy, lightweight slippers improve circulation, whilst gently soothing and relieving aching, heavy legs. Perfect for in-flight use to prevent swelling. Adorned with an elegant print and bow. Non-slip. Small: UK 3-4 / EU 36-37. Medium: UK 5-6 / EU 38-39. Large: UK 7-8 / EU 40-41.

name: Shimmer Body Wash Infused Buffer - Brilliant Tuberose
product_description:
Add a touch of sparkle to your bathing routine with the Shimmer Body Wash Infused Buffer from Spongellé; a multi-tasking, multi-use sponge that cleanses, exfoliates and pampers skin all-in-one.
Harnessing proprietary Infusion Technology, the body buffer creates an indulgent, time-released lather with a built-in, subtly iridescent body wash. Enriched with extracts of Yuzu, Edelweiss and Vetiver, it gently exfoliates the surface layer while infusing essential moisture and nutrients for a softened, smooth and supple texture. Complete with a delicate floral scent, skin feels polished and revitalised with a radiant glow.

name: of California Travel Kit and Dopp Bag
product_description: Perfect for when you're on-the-go, the Baxter of California Travel Kit and Dopp Bag contains a selection of miniature skin and hair care essentials that will allow you to maintain your personal grooming routine even when you're on your travels. It also comes with a waterproof Dopp wash bag which will allow for easy transportation of your products. - L.M.

name: and Tone Gradual Lotion Medium 200ml
product_description:
Top up your tan with the Gradual Lotion Medium from UTAN and Tone. Ideal for medium to dark skin tones, the lotion is designed to be used to intensify and build on existing real or fake tans until the desired level of colour is achieved.
Enriched with an organic tanner, the silky lotion can be used as a regular body lotion, yet delivers a streak-free, sun-kissed finish. The tan is complete with UTAN and Tone’s Body Sculpting complex, which works to flush toxins from the skin and visibly tone and firm the surface. Skin is left supple and sun-kissed.

name: & Evelyn La Source Body Wash 250ml
product_description:
Purify and pamper from top to toe with the Crabtree & Evelyn La Source Body Wash; a lightweight, pH balanced formula infused with mineral-rich Dead Sea Salts to cleanse skin without stripping moisture.
Infused with extracts of Brown Algae and antioxidant-rich Green Seaweed, the luxurious shower gel gently eliminates impurities whilst enveloping the body with a crisp, revitalising fragrance of fresh sea breeze and aquatic notes. Skin is soft, supple and hydrated after use.

name: Fico d'India Hand Cream (75ml)
product_description:
The perfect hand-loving treatment to pop into your handbag on the go, the Fico D'India Hand Cream by Ortigia leaves hands silky smooth and lusciously nourished. A thick, protective cream, infused with moisturising olive oil and healing lanolin, and blended with a fresh fig and cedar fragrance, this cream is a must have for hands in need of hydration. - R.H
Ortiga is a small Italian soap and scent company, which was founded in Sicily in 2006 by Sue Townsend. Using only natural products and inspired by the aesthetics, colours and scents of Sicily, the brand delivers a range of luxurious soaps, scents, creams, candles and lotions.

name: Black Intense Therapy Hand Cream (88ml)
product_description:
An intense formulation designed to repair and hydrate tired, dry hands. With a non-greasy finish, this cream softens even the toughest dry skin whilst nourishing your cuticles. Botanical extracts also provide protection from bacteria.
Directions of Use: Apply to hands daily to keep them nourished and moisturised.

name: Chic URBAN Electric Toothbrush - Blue Maze
product_description:
Sonic Chic present the URBAN Electric Toothbrush; a portable, stylish toothbrush with a compact, lightweight design. Featuring a protective, ventilated cap for ultimate hygiene, the travel-friendly device is perfect for the gym, work or use on-the-move.
Boasting 22,000 strokes per minute, the sonic powered brush features a precision head to reach awkward areas and ultra-gentle bristles for a comfortable experience every time. Complete with a replacement brush head and battery.

name: Serenity AromaBomb Duo Set
product_description: Unwind and de-stress with the AromaWorks Serenity AromaBomb Duo Set. Combining two luxurious bath bombs made from the finest salts and powders, the therapeutic bath bombs blend four pure essential oils with detoxifying Himalayan Sea Salt and calming Calamine to leave you feeling relaxed and at ease. Enjoy a Zen-like bathing experience and let your troubles melt away as the warm, citrus fragrance powered by Lemongrass and Neroli envelops your senses.

name: Brown Orange & Bergamot Hand Wash
product_description:
Treat hardworking hands to Molton Brown Orange & Bergamot Hand Wash, a moisturising formula enriched with aromatic scents to leave skin feeling soft and clean.
Infused with a zesty fragrance powered by Bergamot and Neroli, the hand wash transports you to orange groves of Seville whilst gently cleansing and refreshing your hands. Skin feels pampered and clean.

name: works Deep Sleep Night Oil (120ml)
product_description:
Giving the ultimate aromatherapy experience whilst giving deep moisturisation and a calming effect on the mind and body, this Deep Sleep Night Oil by this works boasts a non-greasy, easily absorbed formula. Infused with natural ingredients, it works to relieve tension in the body and prepare you for a peaceful, deep sleep.
Helping with hypertension, nervous tension and insomnia, this oil contains a blend of Provencal Lavender, antioxidant Grape oil, and soothing Camomile whilst exuding a soft, sweet floral scent that oozes tranquility. You'll be left feeling hydrated, relaxed and rejuvenated. K.D.

name: Liquid Sun Self Tan Mist 120ml
product_description:
Spritz on a gorgeous golden glow with the Vani-T Liquid Sun Self Tan Mist. A cult-favourite among celebrities, the ultra-lightweight, plant-based spray tan veils skin with a medium toned, natural looking colour that gradually develops.
Enriched with Marine Collagen and Phytolin™, the anti-ageing formula nourishes and hydrates skin while improving elasticity levels and evening skin tone, ensuring smooth and streak-free results without patches or fading.
An invigorating, aromatic blend of Orange, Lemon and Bergamot Oils cover that typical fake tan smell, plus a luxurious concoction of Argan, Macadamia and Coconut Oils impart moisture and leave skin feeling supple. Ideal for quick, effortless self-tanning and radiant, healthy looking skin.

name: Arden Green Tea Mimosa Shower Gel 500ml
product_description: Purify skin with the Elizabeth Arden Green Tea Mimosa Shower Gel. Bursting with a zesty citrus fragrance, the lightweight formula works to sweep away dirt and impurities for skin that feels soft, smooth and clean. An invigorating aroma of earthy Green Tea and Sicilian Lemon mingles with delicate Mimosa flower, transforming your showering experience into a moment of summertime radiance to transport the senses.

name: ISSA™ Brush Head - Cool Black
product_description: The FOREO ISSA™ Brush Head in Cool Black is made using premium grade silicone and without BPA and phthalates. Suitable for the ISSA™ toothbrush, the brush head discourages the formation of bacteria to leave your mouth feeling ultra clean. Boasting flexible bristles, the brush will give you a 3D clean and what’s more, it only has to be replaced once a year. – I.M

name: Neroli and Grapefruit Body Wash (500ml) (Worth £40)
product_description: Refresh skin from top to toe with the luxuriously fragranced Neroli and Grapefruit Body Wash from REN. Suitable for use in the bath or shower, its gentle formula is infused with cold-pressed grapefruit extract and neroli oil distilled from Tunisian orange blossom to tone and energise the body and senses, without stripping moisture. A dose of amino acids cleanse from impurities to leave you feeling revitalised and uplifted all day long. Housed in a pump bottle for easy dispensing. E.N.

name: Aid Beauty Ultra Repair Gentle Cleansing Bar (142g)
product_description:
Catering for all skin types and for all family members, the First Aid Beauty Ultra Repair® Gentle Cleansing Bar can be used in the bath or shower to deeply refresh from top to toe, without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness.
Infused with a nourishing blend of Shea Butter, Allantoin and Colloidal Oatmeal, the soap bar forms a creamy lather upon contact with water to eliminate excess oil, dirt and impurities from the body, whilst preserving the skin's natural moisture barrier and locking in hydration.
The brand's Antioxidant Booster is combined with Vitamin E to protect, repair and restore healthy-looking, revitalised skin all-over the body. Safe for sensitive skin, its formula is free from fragrance and skin-irritating ingredients.
Please Note: Formulated with Squalane that is plant derived.

name: ISSA™ - Cool Black
product_description:
Helping you to achieve the cleanest mouth you've ever had, FOREO ISSA™ presents the first beauty routine for your smile. Featuring soft and ultra-gentle silicone bristles to create the perfect friction, the lightweight and travel friendly, ergonomic brush has 3D flexibility and curves to the shape of your mouth to reach every crevice.
Working to ensure your mouth and gums are healthy and to help you achieve brighter and whiter teeth, the ISSA™ is electric and has a pulsating action that stimulates additional blood flow to achieve healthier gums and prevent gum disease.
With an 8-speed interface, the device allows you to chose your frequency of pulsations to suit your requirements. Every 30 seconds, the ISSA™ will pulse rapidly, indicating it is time to clean a different section of your mouth, and after 2 minutes it will pulse again to signify the end of the dental care routine. -SA
Please Note: A USB charger is included, and not a mains adapter. Also, the brush head only needs to be replaced once a year.

name: Tan Activator for Body SPF30 150ml
product_description:
Build an enviable tan with the Ultrasun Tan Activator for Body SPF30; a hydrating, water-resistant sun lotion that protects skin from harmful rays, whilst encouraging an even and golden tan.
Developed with broad spectrum SPF30, the effective sun cream shields the body from UVA and UVB damage, whilst an advanced active ingredients works to stimulate the production of melanin. This activates the tanning process and promotes a healthy glow. The hydrating formula delivers a veil of protective moisture to skin, which restores optimum levels during sun exposure when skin can become particularly dry.
The lightweight lotion effortlessly glides over the body, absorbing quickly without leaving behind an unwanted, greasy residue. Expect to achieve a safe and natural tan.

name: Tea Tree S.O.S Spray (60ml)
product_description:
A fantastic S.O.S spray that gives powerful relief from the pitfalls of summer, Elemis Tea Tree S.O.S Spray is an ideal travel companion and a great solution to insect bites, cuts and grazes and to refresh those tired, aching feet!
Tea tree is renowned as a highly effective natural antiseptic. Elemis Tea Tree S.O.S Spray contains deionised therapeutic herbal water providing the easiest and safest way to use nature’s own antiseptic on areas of problem skin.
Directions of use:

name: Bake Faux Glo (118ml)
product_description:
The first wash-off cosmetic tan for face and body, Fake Bake Faux Glo is the ultimate way to effortlessly create a temporary tanned look for a special occasion, perfect for women who want colour without the commitment.
The unique organic formula of Fake Bake Faux Glo creates the illusion of a beautiful, golden tan with an instant, flawless, non-sticky shimmer on the skin, which lasts all day and doesn't clog pores.  The transfer resistant tan can be washed off with soap and water, leaving no colour, making it ideal for a one-off special night out, or as part of a daily beauty regime.
Fake Bake Faux Glo is paraben free, suitable for all complexions and exceptionally good at covering irregular skin tones for a natural looking and streak-free tan.  The 360 degree nozzle gives a continuous spray that works at any angle (even upside down) and the super-fast drying aerosol is transfer resistant. Leaving your skin looking and feeling fantastic, Fake Bake Faux Glo really is the ultimate temporary tanning product.
Directions of use:

name: Invisiblur Perfecting Shield SPF30 (30ml)
product_description:
Treat, blur and protect with Murad Invisiblur Perfecting Shield SPF30, a multi-tasking formula that works to prime the skin, improve signs of ageing and protect from sun exposure.
Invisible on application, the formula combines mushroom peptides with a soft focus complex to diminish the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, aid natural collagen production and blur imperfections. The ultimate in anti-ageing technology, this broad spectrum moisturising blend will leave you with irresistibly soft, youthful looking skin. - K.N.

name: Hauschka Blackthorn Toning Body Oil (75ml)

Dr. Hauschka's Blackthorn Toning Body Oil works to boost elasticity and tone skin from top to toe. Ideal for maintaining suppleness and helping to prevent stretch marks throughout pregnancy, the oil is infused with a blend of blackthorn blossom, birch leaf extract, St. John's wort and jojoba oil to support the skin's natural renewal process.
Its unique formula is carefully blended with sunflower oil using innovative rhythmic processing methods, heating the mixture to body temperature 37°C to transfer skin nurturing properties into the oil. Expect soft, smooth and refined skin with a firmer appearance. E.N.

Infused with a zesty fragrance powered by fragrant Bergamot and subtle Neroli, the exotic emulsion melts effortlessly into skin and delivers a veil of hydrating comfort; its skin-enriching properties leave hands feeling soothed, pampered and comfortable.

product_description:
Want to whittle your wiggly waist, tone tummy podge and keep back fat at bay? Wage war on those not-so-hard 'core' areas with bliss love handler. Caffeine invigorates your skin whilst amino acids deliver targeted firming action to the mid-section!
Cooling mint oil and naturally-derived amino acid ingredients help stimulate circulation and boost cellular metabolism, so that lingering lipids depart on the double. Formulated for targeted mid-body blasting, bliss love handler releases caffeine via a light gel texture, which allows abdominals to look phenomenal in all types of weather.
Directions of use:

name: Bodycare Foot Treatment (100ml)
product_description: Treat dry, damaged skin to Australian Bodycare Foot Treatment, an intensive moisturising treatment infused with 5% tea tree oil. Working to keep your hands and feet sumptuously soft, the relieving formula combines antiseptic tea tree oil with arnica, yarrow and witch-hazel to cool, calm and nourish dry, cracked and chapped skin. - K.N.

name: to Grapefruit Rejuvenating Body Wash 500ml
product_description:
Revitalise the skin and senses with yes to's Grapefruit Rejuvenating Body Wash; an invigorating formula that can be used to shake up your shower or bath time ritual.
Infused with Grapefruit, rich in Vitamin C, the lightweight, citrus-scented wash whips up a luxurious lather to cleanse and condition skin from top to toe. The body is soft, smooth and energised.

product_description:
Repair and Protect Moisturizer from StriVectin is a lightweight, daily moisturiser with broad spectrum SPF 30 sunscreen to protect skin from free radical damage and harmful UV rays.
Its unique formula has been developed using the brand's patented NIA-114™ technology to reduce visible signs of ageing, including fine lines and wrinkles, revealing a brighter, youthful complexion. The nourishing cream improves skin texture and boosts elasticity by delivering intense hydration and locking in moisture so you can experience smooth, soft and healthy-looking skin that is bursting with raidance. E.N.

product_description:
Eliminate and prevent body odour with Polaar Mineral Deodorant, a high performance roll-on that works to neutralise perspiration.
Enriched with a potent blend of blue-black Wild Berry and Crowberries, the deodorant allows your underarms to breathe without leaving any traces on clothes. Suitable for all skin types, the roll-on ensures you feel confident and comfortable.

name: Hauschka Lemon Lemongrass Vitalising Bath Essence (100ml)
product_description: Invigorate the mind and body with Dr. Hauschka's Lemon Lemongrass Vitalising Bath Essence. When combined with warm, running water, the uplifting bath soak delivers a refreshing fragrance of exotic lemongrass and sun-ripened lemons that envelops the body to create a cloud of energy. Infused with sunflower oil to maintain moisture and stimulate skin, leaving you feeling rejuvenated and perfectly pampered from top to toe. E.N.

name: Fondant Body Scrub (200ml)
product_description:
Smooth and refine skin with NUXE Fondant Body Scrub. Formulated with 95% natural ingredients, this gentle exfoliator leaves skin feeling silky soft and looking as good as new.
NUXE Fondant Body Scrub is blended with almond, orange petal flowers and botanical exfoliants and eliminates impurities while refining the texture of the skin to leave it feeling cleansed, smooth and nourished.
Directions of use:

name: Laboratories Oligo.DX Cellulite Reducing Body Gel (150ml)
product_description:
This DS Laboratories Oligo DX is medicated treatment gel for cellulite, deeply penetrating your skin layers, dissolving the nodules of cellulite and located fat without the need for massage.
The DS Laboratories Oligo DX is a pleasant, fresh and highly efficient gel that visibly reduces your skin's fat deposits and uneven appearances. This will provide your skin with a smoother and healthier appearance.
Nanosomes are two hundred times smaller than your skin cells and have been developed to penetrate your skin to the desired depth, where they are digested by the enzymes, allowing gradual release of content and programmed effect.
Directions for use:
 
Please note: Do not use moisturisers or hydrating soaps during your treatment with the Oligo DX. Woman using this product might also experience increased urination during the treatment due to the drainage and removal of fat.

name: Associates Revive Morning Bath & Shower Oil (55ml)
product_description:
Detox, invigorate and energise your mind and body with just a capful of this luxury Aromatherapy Associates Revive Bath and Shower oil. It will revive your senses ready for the day ahead.
Use Aromatherapy Associates Revive Bath and Shower oil as a natural wake-up call or to cleanse and rejuvenate your body. It's great if you're on a detox programme,or after the overindulgence of the night before. You can also use this versatile oil after a long flight or when feeling generally sluggish. With key ingredients of pink grapefruit, rosemary, juniper berry, pine and coconut oil, this is the perfect pick-me-up blend.
Directions of Use:
Lookfantastic notes:Not recommended for use during pregnancyStore this oil in the box or away from direct lightOnce opened, this product is best used within 6 months

name: Body Deodorant (50ml)
product_description:
This Body Deodorant from Nuxe  is an alcohol free spray that gives you stain free, long lasting  protection that will keep you feeling and smelling fresh throughout the  day.
Boasting an energising scent, this deodorant works to  neutralise odours whilst smooth and softening the skin, leaving your  underarms wonderfully fresh.

name: The Ritual of Dao Shower Oil (200ml)
product_description:
Nurture your skin with Rituals The Ritual of Dao Shower Oil, a calming formula dedicated to comforting and hydrating the body.
Utilising an ancient Chinese philosophy that helps one achieve perfect harmony, the oil harnesses the organic power of Yi Yi Ren, an ingredient traditionally used in Chinese medicine, and White Lotus; it transforms into a luxurious, silky soft foam on contact with water to intensely nourish and soften. Expect incredibly supple skin infused with a relaxing fragrance.

name: SPF 30 Sports Gel (200ml)
product_description: Protect yourself from harmful UV rays with this Ultrasun SPF 30 Sports Gel; transparent sun protection gel. Fast-absorbing and water-resistant, the clear liquid gel smoothes onto your skin without leaving streaks like sun cream. Ideal for sports enthusiasts, the protecting gel is enriched with vitamin E for a super-hydrating formula. – E.W.

name: Probiotic Skincare Aromatic Repair & Brighten Hand Cream 75ml
product_description:
Treat your hands to the benefits of the Aromatic Repair & Brighten Hand Cream from Aurelia Probiotic Skincare. Fortified with hydrating Cassia Senna (an ingredient that mimics Hyaluronic Acid), the fast-absorbing formula leaves hands soft, smooth and supple, whilst the brand's advanced Sea Daffodil Complex diminishes signs of pigmentation for a brighter, younger-looking appearance.
Combining omega-rich Baobab and firming Kigelia Africana, the lightweight cream delivers high levels of essential fatty acids to nourish and firm hands, without leaving behind greasy or sticky residue. Envelops skin with a luxurious blend of Vetiver, Ylang-Ylang, Lavender and Patchouli Oils. Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive, you can expect deeply moisturised, rejuvenated hands and strengthened nails.

name: Plant Gel Toothpaste 75ml
product_description:
Take on a natural approach to oral care with the Weleda Plant Gel Toothpaste; a unique, plant-based formulation ideal for those prone to sensitive teeth.
Ultra-gentle, it contains Silica to gently clean without damaging enamel, while Peppermint and Spearmint essential oils ensure long lasting fresh breath. The addition of Chamomile helps soothe and prevent irritation and Ratanhia helps strengthen soft tissue to help tackle sensitivity. With regular use, the toothpaste prevents cavity formation and keeps teeth clean and polished.

name: Boo Luxury Mummy Spa Kit (3 Products)
product_description:
The perfect pampering treat for mothers of all ages and stages, the Love Boo Luxury Mummy Spa Kit contains everything you could possibly need to make mummy feel positively pampered.
The Love Boo Luxury Mummy Spa Kit offers natural, soothing and relaxing pampering, and makes the perfect baby shower gift, or can be given simply to say ‘thank you for being a great mum’. All of the products are free from parabens, sulphates and petrochemicals, and they’re safe to use throughout pregnancy and when nursing.
This pack contains the following products:

name: Brown Black Peppercorn Body Lotion 300ml
product_description:
The Molton Brown Black Peppercorn Body Lotion boasts a rich, creamy texture formulated with natural ingredients which work to deeply hydrate and nourish the skin from head to toe.
Blended with Madagascan black peppercorn oil, coriander oil and basil oil for antioxidant protection, the lotion exudes a luxurious spicy scent which envelops the skin for a long-lasting effect. You'll be left feeling silky soft and super fresh.

name: works Skin Deep Dry Leg Oil (120ml)
product_description:
Dare to bare your legs with the help of the the this works Skin Deep Dry Leg Oil. An award-winning, ultra-moisturising oil that softens your skin beautifully, this oil is a highly concentrated, 100% natural blend of pressed plant oils that even works well for sun lovers wishing to prolong their tan and prevent peeling. - E.D
Directions of use:
- Massage into skin after showering or bathing.

name: Adenogen Shampoo (220ml)
product_description: Inspire hair growth with the Shiseido Adenogen Shampoo. Innovative and refreshing, the expert formula works to actively improve the scalp's condition, optimising the environment and stimulating hair growth. Suitable for all hair types, the miracle shampoo will cleanse the hair whilst restoring vitality for healthy hair that just keeps growing. - K.N.

name: Powersmile Mouthwash
product_description:
Freshen breath and brighten smiles with the Powersmile® Mouthwash from JĀSÖN, an effective all-natural formula free from alcohol, irritating chemicals or harsh abrasives.
Peppermint Oil and Menthol provide a burst of freshness, whilst extracts of Grapefruit and Perilla Seed work to reduce tartar and plaque build-up. Aloe Vera Gel soothes inflammation of the gums, and it’s fortified with Calcium Ascorbate to help eliminate stains. Achieve an intensely clean mouth and polished, whiter-looking teeth.

name: Water Lily Shower Gel (250ml)
product_description:
Refresh and invigorate skin with the Water Lily Shower Gel from KORRES. The lightweight gel gently cleanses skin, removing dirt and impurities to leave you with a clear complexion. Its unique formula contains wheat proteins which form a protective layer on the skin to lock in moisture and maintain hydration levels. Experience supple, healthy-looking skin that is smooth and subtly scented with a fresh water fragrance. E.N.
Directions for use: Apply to wet skin and massage into a lather. Rinse thoroughly.

name: Detox Himalayan Salt Bath Soak
product_description:
Tone and smoothen the body with the Detox Himalayan Salt Bath Soak from Westlab; the UK’s leading bath salt experts. For a therapeutic bathing experience, its unique blend of pure essential oils and the brand's signature salts work to cleanse, detoxify and repair damaged skin.
Synergising Himalayan salt, lemongrass, grapefruit and rosemary, the invigorating formula helps to reduce water retention and stimulate circulation, whilst delivering an uplifting fragrance to leave you feeling refreshed, revitalised and deeply restored. E.N.

name: Gorgeous Cow Body Lotion
product_description:

this works Perfect Legs Gradual Tan can be used all over the body. Directions of use:

name: Laboratories Nirena Premium Feminine Cleanser (120ml)
product_description:
Care for your body's sensitive area with the Nirena Premium Feminine Cleanser from DS Laboratories, a gentle, organic gel cleanser uniquely designed to maintain optimum feminine hygiene and a healthy vaginal environment.
The vagina is a specialised mucous membrane which isn't protected by skin, it therefore requires specialised cleansing. This fast-acting, high-performance intimate hygiene gel doesn't contain any harsh chemicals or detergents which can upset the pH balance of your sensitive area, but in fact preserves the natural vaginal pH between 3.8 - 4.2 with its variety of unique compounds. Unlike soap, it rinses free of irritating residues that can cause dryness, and it effectively calms and moisturises to leave sensitive tissues soft and smooth.
Carefully tested on every batch to protect vaginal flora integrity, it contains high purity ingredients and exclusively natural compounds which are proven to deliver antibacterial, antifungal and anti-inflammatory properties, helping to prevent itching, odour and discharge that can result from infections.

product_description:

Delivering a light Lemongrass and Ginger fragrance, you can expect revitalised, deeply nourished skin from top to toe.

Directions for Use

name: 30+ Manuka Honey Blend
product_description:
MGO™ 30+ Manuka Honey Blend is derived from Leptospermum Scoparium, a plant unique to New Zealand; its flowers are powerfully fragrant and full of nectar which attributes Manuka Honey with its rich, dark and full-bodied flavour.
MGO™ 30+ Manuka Honey is certified to contain a minimum of 30mg/kg methylgyoxal. Methylgyoxal is a naturally occurring compound in Manuka Honey that lends the substance its remarkable and unique properties. No other system of measurement gives such a clear and simple indication; the higher the MGO™ rating, the higher the Methylglyoxal content.
All of our MGO™ Manuka Honey products are scientifically tested and verified to ensure you are getting consistent quality. Every batch is subjected to laboratory tests that measure various quality parameters including Dietary Methylglyoxal content. Great care is taken to ensure that the Methylglyoxal is maintained from the bee-hive to the finished product so you do not lose any of the valuable properties of this remarkable honey.

name: Vanilla and Bergamot Body Butter - 200ml
product_description: This tenderly blended aromatic moisture mix has amber, lemon, bergamot, myrrh and musk, putting the 'thrilla' back in vanilla. Repeated use will leave your skin silky soft, supple and mouth-wateringly moist.

bliss present Fatgirlscrub; a stimulating scrub infused with 60% Himalayan pink salt to slough away dead skin cells, revealing a smoother, softer texture.

Helping to fuel active lifestyles and support the immune system, the organic Spirulina formula is easily absorbed into the body and delivers full nutritional benefits.

Directions of use:

name: Guava Shower Gel (40ml)
product_description: This creamy shower gel takes you on a journey into the tropics. Exotic Guava makes KORRES Guava Showergel a moisturising and protecting treat for your skin. Containing wheat it gives you Vitamins B2, B3 and B5 for nutrition, healthy skin and regeneration whilst aloe vera heals, regenerates cells, softens, soothes and protects against free radicals. LB

name: Ionotox Serum Patch 8ml
product_description:
Discover next generation anti-ageing with the Ionotox Serum Patch from freezeframe, a non-invasive microcurrent patch that helps you achieve smoother, younger-looking skin.
Originally developed to deliver drugs into skin without needles, the patches are fitted with a paper thin battery that induces an electromotive force called 'Iontophoresis'. When paired with the Advanced Serum Repair (apply onto patch), Iontophoresis expertly 'pushes' anti-ageing actives from the serum (including: 30% Hyaluronic Acid, Neuropeptides and Vitamin C) deep into skin, through pores, sweat ducts and follicles for instant and lasting effects; wrinkles appear reduced and sagging and puffiness is eased.
The patches and serum work tandem to contract the skin whilst plumping and hydrating. After use, skin appears firmer, brighter and tighter looking.
'After 1 treatment, some women will look as much as 10 years younger. After 4 treatments every sign of ageing in the treatment area will be dramatically diminished, for anti-aging results that last a lifetime.'
Can be used around the eye contour or nose and mouth area.
Contains:
4 Microcurrent Patch Treatment Sets.
Advanced Serum Repair 8ml.

Ortiga is a small Italian soap and scent company, which was founded in Sicily in 2006 by Sue Townsend. Using only natural products and inspired by the aesthetics, colours and scents of Sicily, the brand delivers a range of luxurious soaps, scents, creams, candles and lotions.

name: Konjac Sponge Company 100% Pure Deluxe Travel Pack Duo
product_description:
The Konjac Sponge Company presents the 100% Pure Deluxe Travel Pack Duo, a pair of 100% naturally sustainable sponges delicately handmade purely from moisture-rich Konjac plant fibres and Volcanic Water. Presented in a soft travel bag with a mesh drying pouch included, you can sail through airport security with these in your hand luggage and keep refreshed and cleansed throughout your travels.
Suitable for all skin types, the innovative biodegradable sponge has a unique net-like structure that turns silky soft when wet and works to deeply cleanse and gently exfoliate; eliminating impurities and stimulating blood flow and cell renewal. Konjac is a natural wonder – it’s been used in Southern Asia for over 1,500 years as a medicinal and beauty treatment, and it is alkaline based thus balances any acidity in skin and restores optimum pH levels.
Lasting for up to 3 months, the sponges are suitable for use with or without a cleanser. Simply add water and experience an all-natural, rejuvenating cleanse that will leave skin feeling smooth, hydrated and restored.
The Duo Contains:
1 x Facial Puff Sponge
1 x 6 Wave Bath Sponge

name: Health Propolis and MGO 400+ Manuka Honey Suckles 100g
product_description:
Manuka Health Propolis and MGO™ 400+ Manuka Honey Suckles combine the natural goodness of pure New Zealand Propolis and high grade MGO™ 400+ Manuka Honey into a tasty lozenge. The Suckles are 100% natural and aim to contribute in maintaining a healthy immune system.
Concentrated with Propolis, an ingredient gathered by bees in New Zealand and used to protect their hives against infection, the lozenges work as ‘nature’s antibiotic’ due to the antioxidant and antiseptic properties of bioflavonoids. Ideal for soothing a sore throat.

name: Hand Repairing Gloves x 3 Sachets
product_description: The Hand Repairing Gloves from MAGICSTRIPES provide an anti-ageing and ultra moisturising hand treatment producing smooth and youthful looking skin. Formulated with a blend of Natural Extracts, Active Molecules, Shea Butter and Olive Oil, the gloves work to stimulate the skin’s natural renewal process, resulting in visibly firmer and softer skin that is thoroughly hydrated. The gloves also boast the ability to gently reduce the appearance of age spots, fine lines and wrinkles.

name: Hand Cream Ribbon Box (Worth £24.95)
product_description:
Treat hard-working hands to the Hand Cream Ribbon Box from Weleda. Combining three of the brand's favourite formulas, the collection works to soften, nourish and subtly fragrance hands without leaving them greasy or sticky. Presented in a gift box.
Sea Buckthorn Hand Cream (50ml)
A vitamin-rich hand cream that works to give rough, dry hands a boost in moisture. Enriched with a nourishing blend of sea buckthorn and sesame oils, the non-greasy formula repairs damaged skin and restores soft, supple smooth hands. Delivers a long-lasting fruity fragrance to uplift the skin and senses.
Pomegranate Regenerating Hand Cream (50ml)
Harnessing the powers of organic shea butter (rich in fatty acids), the lightweight formula replenishes and conditions skin, whilst natural plant extracts restore supple, youthful-looking hands. Combats dryness and roughness to leave hands soft, smooth and deeply restored.
Almond Sensitive Skin Hand Cream (50ml)
With a skin-renewing formula, the replenishing hand cream transforms dry, cracked and rough skin to leave it feeling silky soft. Fortified with organic almond oil to protect against moisture loss and environmental aggressors, you can expect supple, comfortable hands with a delicate fragrance.

name: Island Apothecary Les Petits Bubble Bath (300ml)
product_description:
Created with an innovative and unique formula that works to gently nourish and moisturise the skin, this Les Petits Bubble Bath by Seascape Island Apothecary gives you the most relaxing and rejuvenating bath time experience. Creating luscious bubbles, this bubble bath is mild enough for everyday use and is perfect for sensitive skin.
Enriched with Jersey Honey to protect and moisturise, and Chamomile and Lavender oils to deeply relax the mind and body, your skin will be left super smooth and silky to touch. Free from Paraben, Silicone and Petroleum. K.D.

name: Health MGO 600+ ManukaClear Intensive Clear Gel 30ml
product_description: Treat acne prone skin with the Manuka Health MGO 600+ ManukaClear Intensive Clear Gel. The breakthrough formula is developed to smooth skin texture and maintain visibly healthier skin. The gel does not contain water but instead has a base of MGO™ 600+ Manuka Honey with incredibly high levels of methylglyoxal. The natural formula works to restore a visibly healthy complexion and is ideal for sensitive, trouble prone skin.

name: & EVELYN POMEGRANATE, ARGAN & GRAPESEED BODY SCRUB (175G)
product_description:
Gently sweep away dead and dulling skin cells to reveal a healthy and radiant look with the Crabtree & Evelyn Pomegranate, Argan & Grapeseed Body Scrub.
