Crabtree & Evelyn Pomegranate, Argan & Grapeseed Body Scrub exfoliates with sunflower wax beads to reveal smoother skin. A blend of pomegranate, sunflower, jojoba, pumpkin, and sesame seed oils replenish and soften, while antioxidant-rich grapeseed extract helps condition the skin.
Directions of use:

name: Choice Super 5 Microbiotics - 60 Lozenges
product_description: Udo's Choice Super 5 Microbiotics provide easy-to-consume raspberry flavoured lozenges containing  5 specific strains of ‘friendly’ bacteria (probiotic) to support the immune system functionality and encourage proper digestion. Microbiotics are the beneficial lacto and bifido bacteria that occur throughout the digestive tract and are essential in replenishing healthy gut flora, which helps to reduce gas, bloating and constipation.

name: One Day Tan 150ml
product_description:
Discover a wash-off bronzer with the He-Shi One Day Tan; a tinted gel that works to enhance natural skin tones and deliver a flawless, golden glow. Ideal for a special occasion or as an essential to your regular beauty regime.
Suitable for all skin types, One Day Tan can be used on both the face and body, which ensures you radiate a bronzed tan from head to toe. Utilising moisture-lock technology, the hydrating bronzer offers results that last all day, as well as leaving skin smooth and touchably soft. The gel glides onto skin and is absorbed in an instant, allowing you to continue with your day whilst possessing an enviable glow.

name: Botanicals Advanced Ultra-Rejuvenating Body Wash (200ml)
product_description:
Renew your skin with this Advanced Ultra-Rejuvenating Body Wash from Dr Botanicals; a sulfate-free daily cleansing wash. With a rich, luxurious texture, the body cream leaves the skin ultra-hydrated and silky soft.
The body wash is enriched with a range of botanical extracts including: Green Tea, which contains Tannins that have anti-microbial, anti-inflammatory and radical scavenging characteristics for healthy, refreshed skin; Grapefruit Oil, which has gentle antiseptic and toning properties; and Rosemary Oil, which helps to increase circulation. – E.W.

name: of Old Bond Street Mr Taylor's Talcum Powder (100g)
product_description:
Boasting a crisp and spicy fragrance, the Taylor of Old Bond Street Mr Taylor's Talcum Powder (100g) is a luxury product that is designed for use on areas prone to dryness and soreness.
Combining a blend of tarragon, lavender and incense as well as hints of green galbanum and citrus, this masculine talcum powder is suitable for daily use and is ideal for areas that tend to chafe. - E.D

name: Bodycare Gentle Cleansing Milk (250ml)
product_description:
Gentle Cleansing Milk from Australian Bodycare gently cleanses skin to remove dirt and impurities for a brighter complexion. Specially formulated with natural Tea Tree oil, known for its anti-bacterial properties to leave skin clear and healthy. Suitable for all skin types, including oily, combination and dry skin. The handy pump action bottle allows easy and quick application. E.N.
Directions for use: Pump a small amount of product into your hands and apply to the face, then rinse with warm water. Use in the morning and night.

name: The Ritual of Sakura Body Scrub (375g)
product_description:
Refine and replenish your skin with Rituals The Ritual of Sakura Body Scrub, a gentle exfoliator that works to gently buff and soften skin.
Enriched with naturally nourishing Organic Rice Milk and Cherry Blossom, the scrub utilises organic sugar and softening oils to perform a delicate exfoliation; it buffs away dead skin cells to reveal softer, more radiant skin beneath. Skin is left soft, supple and replenished. Delicately fragranced.
Use the body scrub once or twice a week for a soft and glowing skin.

name: Hand-Absolute Cream 50ml
product_description:
Filorga present the Hand-Absolute Cream; a rejuvenating, anti-ageing hand and nail cream that works to repair damaged hands and nourish weak, brittle nails.
Harnessing the powers of Shea and Cocoa Butters, the regenerating, creamy formula absorbs quickly into skin to nourish and protect, whilst clarifying Sea Lily Extract combats dark spots and uneven tone without greasy residue. Infused with a blend of Hyaluronic Acid and Collagen, you can expect smooth, firm and youthful-looking hands and stronger, shinier nails.

name: Arden White Tea Hand Cream 30ml
product_description: Pamper dry hands with the Elizabeth Arden White Tea Hand Cream. Rich and creamy, the softening formula quickly absorbs into skin to help alleviate rough patches and callouses, while imbuing a tranquil scent that evokes a sense of familiarity and calm. Containing delicate accords of White Tea, Turkish Rose and Italian Mandarin, it seeks to sooth both the skin and senses.

name: & Disaster YLF Body Wash 500ml
product_description:
Experience a one-stop cleanse with Triumph & Disaster YLF Body Wash, an all-purpose formula that works to cleanse from head to toe; perfect for fast-paced lifestyles.
The ultimate multi-tasker, the wash is great for cleaning, shaving and shampooing; its nutrient-rich formulation utilises nourishing Argan Oil, antibacterial Rosewood and healing Kawakawa Leaf extract to gently cleanse whilst hydrating and protecting skin.
Sloughing away dirt and grime whilst respecting skin's natural moisture levels, the body wash leaves skin and hair feeling balanced, moisturised and delicately scented with a revitalising, slightly medicinal fragrance.

name: People Neutral/Scent Free Deodorant (75ml)
product_description:
Take care of your body with Green People's Neutral/Scent Free Deodorant, a natural, fragrance-free roll-on deodorant for sensitive skin.
Free from pore clogging and irritating ingredients, the 89% organic formula utilises Prebiotics to support the skin's good flora, plant actives such as Aloe Vera and Sunflower to soothe skin, and Alum to inhibit bacterial growth. Protecting your hygiene without preventing the essential process of perspiration, the deodorant will leave you feeling fresh, comfortable and ready for the day. - K.N.

name: Konjac Sponge Company 6 Wave 100% Pure Bath Sponge
product_description:
Konjac 6 Wave Body Sponge – 100% Pure Konjac 

The 6 Wave Konjac Body Sponge is designed to gently exfoliate the body and soothe and cleanse all over! Gently exfoliating and sloughing off tired dead skin cells and helping reduce blemishes, ingrown hairs and generally keeping the skin in tip top condition. Your skin will feel smooth, and supple after use. No tightness or dryness.

Konjac is reputed for its health giving properties & used by the Japanese for over 1500 years, having originally been used as a medicine in the sixth century and is packed full of skin goodies -   lipids, sodium, potassium, magnesium, iron, phosphorus, copper, zinc, vitamin A, vitamin E, vitamin D, vitamin B1, vitamin B2, vitamin B6, vitamin B12, vitamin C, pantothenate, niacin, fatty acid, folic acid and fibre.

After using the sponge it’s really important to gently squeeze the sponge out between your 2 flattened hands (never wring it!) and then allow it to dry in a well ventilated place (or even store it in the fridge!) Never leave your sponge where it remains too wet, such as in the shower! The more fresh dry atmosphere your sponge is stored in, the longer it will last! Change your sponge every few months or when it starts to break down!

•    100% Natural Sponge
•    Gentle exfoliation
•    100% Colouring Free
•    100% Additive Free
•    100% Biodegradable
•    Naturally Sustainable
•    Environmentally Safe

name: Single Serenity AromaBomb
product_description: Unwind and de-stress with the AromaWorks Serenity AromaBomb. Made from the finest salts and powders, the therapeutic bath bomb blends four pure essential oils with detoxifying Himalayan Sea Salt and calming Calamine to leave you feeling relaxed and at ease. Enjoy a Zen-like bathing experience and let your troubles melt away as the warm, citrus fragrance powered by Lemongrass and Neroli envelops your senses.

name: Cheerful Mind Body Wash (200ml)
product_description:
Awaken and invigorate skin with the Kneipp Cheerful Mind Body Wash; a soap-free, pH-balanced formula that works to refresh the body from top to toe.
Infused with natural Passion Fruit and Grapefruit Oils, the shower gel gently eliminates dirt and impurities without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness, whilst its revitalising fragrance uplifts the mind and body to leave you feeling rejuvenated with every use.

name: Pure Bliss Red Poppy and Hemp Body Wash (200ml)
product_description:
Soothe and comfort skin with Kneipp's Pure Bliss Red Poppy and Hemp Body Wash; a soap-free, pH-balanced formula that works to calm and relax the mind and body.
Infused with natural oils of Red Poppy Seed, Hemp, Sweet Almond and Bergamot, the shower gel gently eliminates impurities without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness, whilst its luxurious fragrance relieves stress and tension of everyday life. The body is soft, supple and deeply restored.

name: Lippmann Rich Girl Hand Cream (85g)
product_description:
Keep your hands soft and supple with the Deborah Lippmann Rich Girl Hand Cream. Infused with broad spectrum SPF 25 to protect your delicate skin from the sun's damaging rays, the cream will intensively nourish and condition your hands without making them feel greasy.
Formulated with an expert blend of shea butter, avocado and jojoba oil, it will protect your hands from harsh conditions, leaving them with a smooth and touchable texture. - L.M.

name: Heroes Ribbon Box (Worth £35)
product_description:
Feel perfectly pampered with the Weleda Heroes Ribbon Box; four of the brand's best-selling skincare treats that work to cleanse, hydrate and condition the hands and body. Presented in a gift box.
Citrus Creamy Body Wash (200ml)
An invigorating shower cream packed with essential oils of Lemon and Orange to stimulate the body and senses. For a truly awakening experience, the body wash is ideal for use in the morning or to regenerate after a hard day at work. Infused with Organic Sesame Oil, an ingredient rich in Vitamin E to deliver antioxidant protection against environmental aggressors.
Skin Food (75ml)
A replenishing, skin-repairing cream developed to combat dry, flaky skin in need of extra care. Ideal for use on the entire body, including hands, feet and elbows, its powerful formula is infused with Organic Sunflower Seed Oil and extracts of Wild Pansy, Chamomile and Rosemary to energise tired skin, leaving you feeling refreshed and revitalised. Deeply nourishing and protecting, the hydrating treatment shields against environmental aggressors to leave skin touchably soft and comfortable.
Sea Buckthorn Replenishing Body Lotion (200ml)
A rich, rejuvenating formula that absorbs quickly into skin to nourish and hydrate without greasy residue. Harnessing the powers of Organic Sea Buckthorn Oil, Mallow Extract and Shea Butter, the lightweight lotion softens and conditions, whilst enveloping the body with a fresh, fruity fragrance from top to toe.
Almond Sensitive Skin Hand Cream (50ml)
With a skin-renewing formula, the replenishing hand cream transforms dry, cracked and rough skin to leave it feeling silky soft. Fortified with Organic Almond Oil to protect against moisture loss and environmental aggressors, you can expect supple, comfortable hands with a delicate fragrance.

name: Body Cream for Vital Energy 200g
product_description: Ila Spa Body Cream for Vital Energy 200g will balance and revitalise your skin to leave it feeling supple and healthy. Rich in fatty acids, plant sterols and omegas, it provides powerful anti-ageing and antioxidant benefits to protect your skin and leave it looking youthful. Lightweight and non-greasy, this nourishing cream is infused with an expert blend of argan oil, shea butter and pure essential oils. - L.M.

name: de Provence My Beautiful Hand Kit: Cotton Flower Liquid Soap and Hand Cream 300ml
product_description:
Compagnie de Provence's 'My Beautiful Hand Kit' combines a luxurious liquid soap with a lightweight hand cream to transform wanting skin.
Cotton Flower Liquid Soap (300ml):
A luxurious soap dedicated to gently cleansing the hands and body. Crafted from vegetable oil in a cauldron according to authentic traditions, the delicate formula contains naturally foaming Coconut Oil and is free from colouring agents, animal fats and synthetic surfactants. Its fragrance, created in Grasse (the perfume capital of the world) is delicate and powdery, powered by Cotton Flower and White Musk. Housed in an unbreakable plastic bottle. Refillable with a pump dispenser. No added parabens, silicones, mineral oils, or sulphates. Dermatologist tested.
Cotton Flower Hand Cream (300ml):
A lightweight hand cream infused with Shea Butter and Almond Oil to leave hardworking hands feeling soft, moisturised and comfortable. Melting effortlessly into skin, the antioxidant-rich cream ensures hands are left protected, supple, hydrated and delicately scented with Cotton Flower and White Musk.

name: Renaissance Hand Cream (75ml)
product_description:
Treat your hands to the OSKIA Renaissance Hand Cream, a luxurious anti-ageing formula packed with powerful nutrients and bio-actives to soften, soothe and nourish the skin.     
Deliciously scented with rose and chamomile, the lightweight hand cream is easily absorbed and helps to deliver hydration, improve elasticity and brighten skin's tone.
Suitable for daily use on the hands, arms and legs, the unique formula will soothe and calm aggravated skin, and doubles as an effective overnight rejuvenator. - K.N.

name: Galvin Hand & Body Wash 300ml
product_description: This mild hand & body wash is sure to inspire your senses and soothe your skin. Combining with citrus notes of mandarin, grapefruit and lemon with floral and fruity oils of geranium and sweet orange it is both refreshing and calming. This hand & body wash moisturises the skin and leaves it super soft and hydrated whilst it is suitable for all skin types. LB

name: Blue Land Deodorant Stick (75ml)
product_description: Trussardi's Blue Land Deodorant Stick delivers long-lasting freshness and protection against body odours and perspiration. Infused with hyaluronic acid to hydrate skin, the fast-drying formula is fragranced with the brand's energising Blue Land scent of bitter orange, ginger, crisp green apple and fresh sea breeze accords. E.N.

name: Face and Body Tanning Gel 150ml
product_description:
Discover a moisturising self-tan with the He-Shi Face and Body Tanning Gel; a hydrating formula that works to provide a streak-free, golden glow for up to 10 days. Ideal for dry skin and suitable for both the body and face, the self-tan offers an instant, enviable glow from head to toe.
The lightweight gel formula glides onto skin and is easily absorbed, leaving you smooth and ultra-hydrated. Utilising moisture-lock technology, the hydrating tan creates long lasting results, as well as alleviating the visible signs of ageing to leave skin visibly rejuvenated.
The self-tan can be reapplied in several layers, allowing you to build your desired colour; ranging from a golden glow to a deeper tan. Due to its innovative formula, you can apply the tan in confidence, without worrying about streaks or unsightly patches. Expect an even colour that gives you long lasting glow.

name: Strengthening Moisturising Body Cream (150ml)
product_description:
Treat your skin to the Phytomer Strengthening Moisturising Body Cream; a fast-absorbing, lightweight formula that works to comfort all skin types.
Fortified with exclusive OLIGOMER®, a natural active ingredient to re-mineralise and strengthen skin, the luxurious cream protects, soothes and rejuvenates the body from top to toe. Synerigising Pheohydrane and Prebiotic Sugars to reinforce the skin's hydrolipidic film, whilst delivering intense moisture to leave skin hydrated, revitalised and delicately scented.

name: Bake Tanning Butter (113ml)
product_description:
Made with real SHEA BUTTER! Leaves your skin incredibly soft, silky and smooth as butter.
Fake Bake's incredible product not only adds long lasting moisture to hydrate your skin but they have added Vitamin A, Vitamin D3 and Vitamin E to benefit and nourish your skin. Use their fabulous body butter crème and make your skin feel like it has been pampered all day long.

name: Slim Serum 100ml
product_description:
Transform skin with the Talika Slim Serum; an advanced treatment inspired by Photo-Beauty Therapy® to alleviate the appearance of cellulite and ‘orange peel’.  
Developed around the concept of reconstructive technologies such as liposuction and ultrasounds, the innovative formula contains high performance active ingredients and age-defying plant extracts to trigger a unique mechanism within skin’s structure to convert released fat into cellular energy for an enhanced slimming process.
N-Lauroyl Proline (including Lauric Acid) and Sorbitan Laurate effectively reduce fat stores and slows down fat build up, while a Photo-Beauty Enzyme® recreates the effects of natural light on cellular activity to ensure long lasting results.
As a result, skin feels firmer and more toned with replenished hydration levels and a refined surface texture. The look of cellulite and dimples is visibly reduced and body contours appear sculpted and defined.

name: Relax Dead Sea Salt Bath Soak (500g)
product_description:
Achieve a peaceful night's sleep with the Relax Dead Sea Salt Bath Soak from Westlab; the UK’s leading bath salt experts. For a therapeutic bathing experience, its unique blend of pure essential oils and the brand's signature salts work to calm and soothe the mind and body.
Synergising Dead Sea salt and a sleep-inducing formula of frankincense, petitgrain, geranium and orange, the luxurious bath soak rebalances and rejuvenates, whilst relaxing the nervous system to leave you feeling rested. Delivers a tranquil fragrance to aid sleep. E.N.

name: VitaMint Lemon Tablets (28 Tablets)
product_description:
Boost your vitality with the Centrum VitaMint Lemon Tablets; an advanced multivitamin that you can enjoy like a mint with the added benefits of essential nutrients.
Non-chalky and with no aftertaste, the chewy supplements provide you with 100% or more of the daily recommended intake of Vitamins C, D, E and B6. Suitable for consumption without water, enjoy any time of day for the perfect healthy pick-me-up to support a normal functioning immune system, metabolism and energy levels.

name: Women 50 Plus Multivitamin Tablets - (30 Tablets)
product_description:
Centrum Women 50 Plus Multivitamin Tablets have been specifically developed to support the changing needs of women’s health and wellbeing over the age of 50+, delivering tailored levels of vitamins and minerals for optimum efficacy and benefits.   
The world’s number one multivitamin is established through 30 years of scientific research and nutritional expertise, combining 24 key nutrients with all 13 essential vitamins to support vitality and immunity while contributing to normal vision and heart health.  
Adjusted amounts of Iron and Vitamin D support changes in energy levels and environmental reactions over time, with Vitamin B6 helping to regulate hormonal activity post-menopause.  
B Vitamins help to release food-based energy for an overall boost, plus Vitamin C, Zinc, Copper and Selenium work in tandem to support the immune system. High levels of Calcium and Vitamin D maintain strong bones. Age gracefully with this daily food supplement that provides all the resources you need to keep you feeling in your prime.

name: F. Trumper Sandalwood Gift Box
product_description:
This Sandalwood Gift Box by Geo. F. Trumper is a set of sandalwood fragranced products, designed to treat your body to the warm and sensual woody aroma. Treat your skin to these rich and luxurious products, and let it lap up the delightful fragrance.
This Sandalwood Gift Box includes:

name: Ibrahimovic Zlatan Shower Gel 200ml
product_description: Revitalise the body from top to toe with the Zlatan Shower Gel from Internationally renowned footballer, Zlatan Ibrahimović. Working to eliminate dirt and impurities, the lightweight, energising formula creates a rich lather to instantly awaken the skin and senses. Imparts the signature masculine fragrance of juicy Bergamot and spicy Pepper, enhanced by Green Grass, Marine accords, Driftwood and striking Leather. The body is smooth, clean and refreshed.

name: Aka Shiso Reviving Mineral Shower (200ml)
product_description:
Zelens Aka Shiso Reviving Mineral Shower Gel is a refreshing treatment to revitalise and gently cleanse skin. Its formula contains five essential minerals, including magnesium to recover energy, zinc to defend the skin from free radical damage, copper to boost elastin production, silicon for collagen regeneration, and iron, an important carrier of oxygen. Enriched with Shiso oil, this lightweight gel replenishes skin and maintains its natural moisture levels to leave skin soft and subtly fragranced with a healthy complexion. E.N.
Directions for use: Gently massage over entire body and rinse thoroughly. Use morning and evening.

name: F. Trumper Travel Spanish Leather Hair and Body Wash 500ml
product_description:
This Spanish Leather Hair & Body Wash by Geo. F. Trumper is an ingenious product designed to clean and cleanse your hair and body, whilst also scenting it with the rich and heady fragrance of Spanish Leather, boasting top notes of Patchouli. Treat your scalp and skin to this rich and luxurious product, and enjoy the warm aroma of Spanish Leather cologne.
This Trumpers Spanish Leather Hair & Body Wash provides extra nourishment to the skin and scalp, lathering easily and enriching the skin. The sensual musk scents of Spanish Leather will help to soothe your senses and skin, making this hair & body wash the perfect addition to your bath time and shower ritual.

name: Bébé Wild Moss Rose Body Lotion 120ml
product_description:
Nourish your baby’s delicate skin with the Bébé Wild Moss Rose Body Lotion from Chantecaille; a plant-based, certified organic treatment that softens and smoothes without causing irritation.
Dermatologically tested and free from harmful chemicals, the ultra-mild formula is based upon Wild Moss Rose extract, with its gentle moisturising properties and proven ability to minimise the look of redness and alleviate itchiness.
A soothing blend of Orange Blossom, Roman Chamomile and Corn Flower Waters help refresh and calm, while Tamanu Oil is rich in essential lipids to restore hydration. Gentle enough for all ages.

name: Dante Dolce Vivere Sardinia Soap 250g
product_description:
Inspired by Italian beauty and lifestyle, the Dolce Vivere 'Sardinia' Soap from Nesti Dante utilises high quality, natural ingredients to leave you feeling perfectly pampered.
Crafted in Florence using the traditional saponification method, the vegetable-based soap bar gently cleanses and purifies without over-drying; it forms a creamy lather upon contact with water to restore soft, supple skin after every use. Beautifully wrapped in decorative paper, the soap imparts an invigorating fragrance of Myrtle Nectar, Lentiscus and Helycrisum Shrub to stimulate the senses.

name: Bake Perfection Wash off Instant Tan (170ml)
product_description: This easy to apply wash off tanning liquid from Fake Bake gives an instant rich bronze to all skin tones, givng you that evenly tanned look. Perfection is PH balanced to ensure the natural barrier of the skin is maintained whilst smooth silky natural silicones moisturise and leave skin with a beautiful sheer glow. Non-sticky and transfer resistant with a Vanilla fragrance.

name: SLENDER COW EXTRA FIRMING BODY BUTTER (200ML)
product_description:
Fight cellulite and condition the skin with Cowshed Slender Cow Extra Firming Body Butter. Step 3 in the Slender Cow regime, this hydrating skin lover works to leave your body toned and firm.
Cowshed Slender Cow Extra Firming Body Butter works alongside the rest of the Slender Cow trio to provide round the clock moisturisation, as well as to strengthen the skin and improve elasticity. Essential oils of sweet orange, grapefruit, ylang ylang and mandarin red stimulate tone and condition skin while carrot seed oil helps to break down toxins. The result? A bikini-ready body others will envy.
“Oh Slender Cow you are spoiling us. Sluggish thighs have absolutely no chance when pitted against a massage of such exuberance.” - Kelly Gilbert, Beauty & Health Editor, Vogue
Directions of use:

name: London Kukui Oil Award Winners Gift Set (Worth £60)
product_description:
Treat yourself or a loved one to the Kukui Oil Award Winners Gift Set from Connock London. Housed in a gift box, the duo includes two luxurious products infused with nourishing Kukui Oil, sourced from a small factory on the Hawaiian island of Oahu.
Kukui Oil Soothing Bath & Shower Oil (200ml)
A deeply nourishing formula that transforms into a luxurious milky white emulsion upon contact with water. Harnessing the powers of Tamanu, Macadamia and Kukui Oils, the cleansing oil comforts dry, sensitive skin, whilst infusing the body with a delicate fragrance to leave you feeling calm and restored. Can also be added to bath water for a relaxing soak.
Kukui Oil Hydrating Hand & Body Lotion (200ml)
Rejuvenate dry skin on the hands and body with the lightweight, fast-absorbing lotion. Fortified with a moisturising blend of Shea Butter, Kukui Oil and antioxidant Vitamin E, the hydrating formula softens and conditions, whilst defending against environmental aggressors. Skin is smooth, glowing and subtly fragranced.

name: Ibrahimovic Suprême Femme Shower Gel 250ml
product_description: Envelop the body with a fresh, feminine fragrance with the Suprême Femme Shower Gel from Swedish professional footballer, Zlatan Ibrahimović. Working to melt away impurities without stripping moisture, the lightweight formula delicately fragrances the body with fruity notes of Green Mandarin, Bergamot and juicy Pear, enhanced by White Peony, Pink Peppercorn and aromatic Vetiver. Experience a luxurious bathing ritual and skin that is cleansed, rejuvenated and subtly scented.

name: F. Trumper Travel Spanish Leather Hair and Body Wash 100ml
product_description:
This Spanish Leather Hair & Body Wash by Geo. F. Trumper is an ingenious product designed to clean and cleanse your hair and body, whilst also scenting it with the rich and heady fragrance of Spanish Leather, boasting top notes of Patchouli. Treat your scalp and skin to this rich and luxurious product, and enjoy the warm aroma of Spanish Leather cologne.
This Trumpers Spanish Leather Hair & Body Wash provides extra nourishment to the skin and scalp, lathering easily and enriching the skin. The sensual musk scents of Spanish Leather will help to soothe your senses and skin, making this hair & body wash the perfect addition to your bath time and shower ritual.

name: Skincare Liquid Yoga Bath Soak (200ml)
product_description:
Relax your body and ease your mind with the Mio Skincare Liquid Yoga Bath Soak, a lavish milky-formula brimming with essential oils, mineral salts and herbs designed to ease tired muscles – it’s practically a massage in a bottle! 
Fortified with an aromatic V-Tonic™ blend of Spearmint, Cypress, Lavender and Chamomile Oils, the sensual treatment features Magenisum-rich Epsom Salts and extract of Arnica, which both work to de-stress tight, tired muscles.
Naturally-soothing Andiroba Oil penetrates deep into skin tissue, whilst Murumuru Butter is bursting with nutritious omegas to moisturise and hydrate. Free from harsh chemicals and irritants, the indulgent bath soak is the perfect treat after a long day.
 All Mio formulas are now even cleaner with the evolved No Nasties policy. Liquid Yoga is totally free from parabens, petrolatum, colourants, xenoestrogens, PEGs, glycols and pthalates.

name: Me Super Moisurising Body Wash 280ml
product_description:
Experience a luxurious bathing ritual with Balance Me's Super Moisturising Body Wash; a gentle cleansing formula dedicated to clarifying and refreshing from top to toe.
Infused with a skin-softening blend of Benzoin, Yarrow and Shea Butter, the luxurious, ultra-hydrating shower gel effortlessly eliminates impurities without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness. Combats dry, flaky skin to leave it feeling smooth, supple and deeply moisturised.

name: Gradual Tan Extender
product_description:
Discover three uses in one with the Hydrating Gradual Tan Extender from Sunescape. Combining self-tanner, tan extender and moisturiser, the formula allows you to build and prolong a beautiful golden tan. Suitable for all skin tones but ideal for those with fair skin that want to build a tan slowly, the extender allows you to control the depth of tan you achieve.
Enriched with a blend of Coconut, Macadamia nut and Argan oil, the Extender delivers hydration to skin, leaving it rejuvenated.

name: Knackered Essentials Set
product_description:
Feel perfectly pampered with the Knackered Essentials Set from Cowshed. Housed in a floral print wash bag, the collection combines a rejuvenating shower gel, body lotion and lip balm to leave skin soft, smooth and restored.
Knackered Cow Relaxing Bath & Shower Gel (100ml)
Made in England using natural ingredients, the relaxing formula blends calming Lavender and Eucalyptus essential oils to soothe over-worked muscles, whilst cleansing and nourishing skin from top to toe. Can be used as a bath soak to prepare for a restful night's sleep.
Knackered Cow Relaxing Body Lotion (100ml)
A fast-absorbing formula that works to relax the mind and body. Enriched with Shea and Cocoa Butters, the nourishing lotion replenishes moisture and hydration, whilst essential oils of Lavender and Eucalyptus help you to unwind after a long, tiring day. Delivers a fresh, herbaceous fragrance.
Lippy Cow Natural Lip Balm
A naturally nourishing balm that works to soften, hydrate and condition lips for long-lasting comfort. Enriched with Linden Blossom, Rose Geranium and Ylang-Ylang Essential Oils, you can expect smooth, supple lips that are bursting with moisture.

name: Instant Whitening Spray 20ml
product_description:
Instantly brighten the smile with the Janina Instant Whitening Spray; a convenient solution that is ideal for on-the-go.
Perfect for travelling, the compact spray can be carried in handbags or gym bags for use anywhere, at any time. The spray effortlessly mists over teeth without the need for water or brushing. Formulated with an array of active ingredients including Papain, the instant spray is able to visibly whiten the smile without the use of harsh abrasives.
Complete with an effective dose of Sodium Chloride, the spray not only brightens teeth, but prevents caries and tooth decay. The spray is sure to become a travel essential, freshening breath and topping up whitening when required.

name: Relax Dead Sea Salt Body Scrub
product_description:
Gently exfoliate with the Relax Dead Sea Salt Body Scrub from Westlab. Infused with a powerful blend of essential oils, including relaxing frankincense, calming lavender, soothing geranium and uplifting bergamot, the luxurious formula effortlessly eliminates dead and dull skin cells to reveal a healthy-looking, smoother appearance.
Apricot, rice bran and antioxidant vitamin E work in unison to boost elasticity, protect and repair skin, and provide anti-inflammatory properties, whilst softening and regenerating the body. Delivers an uplifting fragrance to leave you feeling revitalised and deeply cleansed. E.N.

name: Surge Clove, Orange and Geranium Foaming Bath Foam (250ml)
product_description:
Experience a soothing cleanse with Organic Surge Clove, Orange and Geranium Foaming Bath Foam, a relaxing bath soak that works to de-stress your mind whilst softening and reviving your skin.
Infused with naturally calming Patchouli and muscle relaxing Spicy Clove-Bud essential oils, the fragrant bath foam expertly nourishes and hydrates the skin. Its blend of soothing Aloe Vera and moisture-binding Glycerine ensure skin is enriched with long-lasting moisture and comfort. Delicately scented with a natural fragrance.

name: Pedi Coarse Micro-Minerals Pink Replacement Rollers
product_description: Safely remove hard skin in seconds with MICRO Pedi Coarse Micro-Minerals Pink Replacement Rollers. Used by beauty professionals the coarse rollers will leave your feet feeling beautifully soft. -SA

name: Paris Men Expert Total Clean Shower Gel 300ml
product_description: Freshen up with the Men Expert Hydra Total Clean Shower Gel from L'Oréal Paris. The 5-in-1 wash is suitable for the face, hair and body, as well as during shaving and for moisturisation. Designed to remove impurities, the shower gel leaves skin feeling clean, refreshed and thoroughly hydrated. Bursting with a fresh and intense fragrance, the gel cleans and cleanses without leaving skin dry or tight.

name: Birthing Company Cool It Mama Cooling Body Spritz 100ml
product_description:
Natural Birthing Company's Cool It Mama Cooling Body Spritz is an uplifting aromatherapy spray that helps to combat feelings of tiredness, nausea and hot flushes during pregnancy.
Promoting a happy, stress-free pregnancy, the light formula combines pure essential oils of Orange Blossom, Ylang Ylang, Bergamot and Grapefruit with a touch of Menthol to instantly cool and refresh your face and body. Whether you're having hot flushes or suffering from heavy legs and swollen ankles, the versatile mist works to revive the body and mind, revitalising your spirits to leave you feeling calm, cool and happy.
Perfect for popping in your handbag, it's the safe and practical solution to some of pregnancy's side wonderful effects. Can even be used during labour to help keep you cool and inspire feelings of calm.

name: Baby's Calming Massage Oil 100ml
product_description: Hydrate Baby’s sensitive skin with Baby's Calming Massage Oil from Jurlique. The lightweight oil is enriched with natural botanicals designed to calm and deeply hydrate skin. Specially formulated for sensitive skin, perfect for babies.

name: Santorini Vine Body Oil 100ml
product_description:
Treat your skin to the KORRES Santorini Vine Body Oil; a 100% oil-based moisturiser infused with Shea Butter to condition, comfort and hydrate from top to toe.
Packed with natural oils of Almond and Apricot, the ultra-nourishing formula provides anti-ageing benefits, whilst delivering a fresh fruity fragrance of blossoming Greek vineyards.

name: & Evelyn Jojoba Oil Triple-Milled Soap Set (3X100g)
product_description:
Lather your body in luxury with Crabtree & Evelyn Jojoba Oil Triple-Milled Soap Set. This trio of treats is lovingly made with an ultra-moisturising blend of shea butter and golden jojoba oil, obtained from the first pressing of the oil-rich seed.
Triple-milled for an extraordinarily creamy lather, Crabtree & Evelyn Jojoba Oil Triple-Milled Soap Set will leave you feeling moisturised and smelling divine with a blend of lavender, green herbs and a hint of citrus.
Directions of use:

name: Aloe Vera and Grapefruit Soapy Suds
product_description: Scented with a blend of sweet pink grapefruit and fresh, crisp aloe, this Soapy Suds Body Wash from Bliss works to create a rich lather that washes away dirt and impurities. Blended with vitamin E to promote healthy skin, this body wash nourishes and conditions the skin with a scent that will invigorates your senses. - E.D

name: Softening Baby Body Lotion (200ml)
product_description:
Treat your little one's skin to the NAÏF Softening Baby Body Lotion; a fast-absorbing, ultra-gentle formula to moisturise, comfort and replenish from top to toe.
Using high quality natural ingredients that are kind to delicate, sensitive skin, the lotion blends Cottonseed, Sweet Almond, Avocado and Macadamia Oils to nourish and smoothen skin, leaving it super soft after every application. Suitable for everyday use.

name: Brown Pink Pepperpod Body Lotion 300ml
product_description: Perfectly pamper skin with Molton Brown's Pink Pepperpod Body Lotion; a fast-absorbing moisturiser developed to nourish, comfort and hydrate from top to toe. Blended with Pink Pepperpods and Patchouli Oil for superior antioxidant protection, the luxurious, lightweight lotion conditions and softens skin, whilst imparting a seductive fragrance of fiery Pink Pepper, Ginger and rich Patchouli. Housed in a pump bottle for mess-free application.

name: CREW Men's Shredding Oil (100ml)
product_description:
Define your physique with AB CREW Men's Shredding Oil, a unique formula that works to hydrate your skin and target fat beneath the surface to create the appearance of more defined, refined muscles.
Combining plant-based actives with an anti-ageing complex, the fat-fighting oil gets to work on fat below the skin whilst visibly targeting physical irregularities including stretch marks, scars and cellulite. Infused with a masculine scent of desert sand and black rock. - K.N.

name: Laszlo Firmarine Cleansing Bar (100g)
product_description:
Boost dull and sagging skin with the Erno Laszlo Firmarine Cleansing Bar, a concentrated dosage of natural extracts and potent antioxidants. Utilising advanced nano-encapsulation technology, the anti-ageing soap bar delivers time-released spheres that penetrate the skins surface and allow the active ingredients to have a longer lasting firming effect.
Enriched with Vitamins C and E, it gently eliminates oil and impurities whilst Spirulina Maxima, a marine algae extract, stimulates cell renewal and encourages skin elasticity to minimise the appearance of fine lines and droops. Lavish Shea Butter smoothes dry patches and enhances the absorption process. Mild yet powerful and ideal for mature skin, the cleansing bar leaves you with a firmer-looking and rejuvenated complexion.

name: Travel Kit
product_description:
Ideal for use on-the-go, the NAÏF Travel Kit combines everything you need for a stress-free holiday. Housed in a zipped pouch, the collection combines a gentle shampoo, body lotion, baby wash, nourishing cream and a handy dummy cloth.
NAÏF Softening Body Lotion (15ml)
A fast-absorbing, ultra-gentle formula to moisturise, comfort and replenish from top to toe. Using high quality natural ingredients that are kind to delicate, sensitive skin, the lotion blends Cottonseed, Sweet Almond, Avocado and Macadamia Oils to nourish and smoothen skin, leaving it super soft after every application. Suitable for everyday use.
NAÏF Nourishing Shampoo (15ml)
A soap-free, mild formula made from natural ingredients for an ultra-gentle, tear-free cleanse. Enriched with Cottonseed Extract and gluten-free Wheat Protein Powder, the delicate shampoo takes care of your baby's hair and scalp, eliminating impurities and leaving hair touchably soft without irritation or stinging eyes.
NAÏF Cleansing Wash Gel (15ml)
Enriched with natural ingredients, including Cottonseed Extract and gluten-free Wheat Protein Powder, the mild formula gently eliminates impurities whilst preserving the skin's hydrolipidic film to leave skin feeling soft, smooth and comfortable. Soap-free, it minimises irritation and stinging for a tearless cleansing experience.
NAÏF Nurturing Cream (15ml)
Using high quality natural ingredients that are kind to delicate, sensitive skin on the face and body, the cream blends Cottonseed, Sweet Almond, Avocado and Macadamia Oils with Chamomile to repair and protect irritated skin, leaving it calm and comfortable. Ideal for nappy rash.
Imps & Elfs: Dummy Cloth
Crafted from organic cotton, your baby's dummy can be attached to the soft cloth so you don't have to worry about losing it.

name: Enjoy Fresh-On Time Revital Lime Hand Cream 50ml
product_description: Pamper dry and wanting skin with Mizon’s Enjoy Fresh-On Time Revital Lime Hand Cream. Based upon an emollient-rich Shea Butter formula, it seeks to replenish moisture levels and smooth the appearance of callouses and cracks with a layered infusion of Hyaluronic Acid and nourishing raw Lime. The lightweight treatment rapidly absorbs to leave skin feeling smooth, softened and protected.

name: Photo Pure Scrub 50ml
product_description:
Purify skin with the Talika Photo Pure Scrub; a gentle exfoliant that helps eliminate toxins and restore radiance. Ideal for sensitive skin, the non-grainy formula has been inspired by Photo-Beauty Therapy® to deeply cleanse and detoxify while optimising hydration levels.
Kaolin helps absorb impurities and unclog pores, while extract of Wild Chamomile Flower delivers anti-inflammatory properties to alleviate redness and discomfort. Suitable for daily use or as an intensive face mask, the face scrub leaves your complexion feeling refreshed and clarified with a healthy looking glow.

name: & Evelyn La Source Hand Therapy 250g
product_description:
Replenish dry, over-worked hands with the Crabtree & Evelyn La Source Hand Therapy; an ultra-hydrating treatment that works to restore softness and suppleness for long-lasting comfort.
Infused with a Hydra Marine Blend of Green Seaweed and Red Algae, the intensive hand cream soothes and nourishes hands, whilst antioxidant Vitamin E protects against environmental aggressors and supports the skin's natural moisture barrier.
Its dose of Myrrh Extract helps to condition nails and cuticles as Shea Butter and Macadamia Nut Oil pamper and regenerate. Expect smooth, rejuvenated hands with a crisp, clean scent of refreshing aquatic notes, musk and shoreline breezes.

name: Grumpy Cow - Uplifting Body Lotion (300ml)
product_description:
Hydrate your skin with this energising Cowshed Grumpy Cow Uplifting Body Lotion.  A citrus blend of essential oils of mandarin red to invigorate the senses, petitgrain to cleanse and purify, and grapefruit to stimulate circulation. 
Cowshed Grumpy Cow Uplifting Body Lotion is enriched with naturally moisturising cocoa butter and vitamin E, an antioxidant that helps protect the skin from signs of premature ageing caused by free radicals, leaving you and your skin feeling energised.
Directions of use:

name: Purifying Tea Tree Roll-On Deodorant (85g)
product_description:
Combining age-old botanical secrets for long lasting protection, JASON Tea Tree Roll On Deodorant is enriched with organic aloe vera gel, tea tree oil and corn starch and will deliver energising freshness to your body all day long.
Staying fresh and confident is made simple with JASON Tea Tree Roll On Deodorant. Composed of a delectable host of natural ingredients, this roll on makes freshness achievable in one stroke.
Directions of use:

name: Dante Emozioni in Toscana Villages and Monasteries Soap 250g
product_description:
Pamper skin with the Nesti Dante ‘Emozioni in Toscana’ Villages and Monasteries Soap. Expertly hand-crafted in Italy using the artisan saponification method, the soap bar has been traditionally made with natural, raw ingredients and oils that seek to sweep away daily dirt and impurities without stripping away moisture to leave skin feeling soft and supple.
Transforming into a rich lather upon application, it releases a warm, woody scent that relaxes the mind and transports the senses to the idyllic Italian countryside. Wrapped in lavish textured paper, the soap makes a wonderful gift.

name: Bees Lemon & Vitamin E Bath & Body Oil (4 fl oz / 115ml)
product_description:
This lemon and vitamin E bath and body oil from Burt's Bee will feed your skin with the fruits of nature.
Nourish your skin with this indulgent bath oil made from pure, concentrated plant-based essential oils and vitamins like lemon, sweet almond and vitamin E for intense moisture and suppleness leaving you with soft, beautiful skin, naturally.
 
Add one or two tablespoons of the oil to warm bath water, or apply directly to damp skin to moisturise after showering.

name: Be Bella Bronzed Shimmering Dry Body Oil 50ml
product_description:
Illuminate skin with the Be Bella Bronzed Shimmering Dry Body Oil from Bellamianta. Blending an array of precious oils, the luxurious formula is designed to nourish skin, leaving it softened with a sun-kissed glow.
Enriched with Lecithin, the dry body oil is extremely hydrating and helps to reduce the appearance of cellulite by stimulating natural production of collagen. The oil also boasts a skin-loving blend of Avocado oil, Vitamin E and Sea Buckthorn, which work in synergy to visibly bright skin. Leaving you with ultra-soft, shimmering skin; expect to feel rejuvenated.

name: Konjac Sponge Company Angel Cloth
product_description:
The Konjac Sponge Company presents the Angel Cloth, a 100% naturally sustainable product delicately handmade purely from moisture-rich Konjac plant fibres and Volcanic Water – perfect for sensitive skin prone to irritation.
Shaped like an angel, the innovative biodegradable cloth has a unique net-like structure that turns silky soft when wet and works to deeply cleanse and gently exfoliate; eliminating impurities and stimulating blood flow and cell renewal. It’s kinder to skin than a muslin or flannel, which often too harsh and over exfoliate.
Konjac is a natural wonder – it’s been used in Southern Asia for over 1,500 years as a medicinal and beauty treatment, and it is alkaline based thus balances any acidity in skin and restores optimum pH levels.
Lasting for up to 3 months, the cloth is suitable for use with hot and cold cleansing regimes or perfect for removing makeup or a face mask. Simply add water and experience an all-natural, rejuvenating cleanse that will leave skin looking refined and feeling refreshed.

name: Konjac Sponge Company 6 Wave Bath Sponge with Red Clay
product_description:
Konjac 6 Wave Body Sponge with Red French Clay

A generous scoop of French Red Clay is added into the sponge for a soothing and extra mineral rich red clay is added for care of the dry and more mature skin types.

Red clay cleans out the skin from the layers of dead keratinized cells and it accelerates the regeneration process. It is said to improve blood circulation and makes the skin look radiant, and hydrated, reducing the appearance of wrinkles and broken capillaries. So it is perfect for drier or mature skin that needs rejuvenating.

The 6 Wave Konjac Body Sponge is designed to gently exfoliate the body and soothe and cleanse all over! Gently exfoliating and sloughing off tired dead skin cells and helping reduce blemishes, ingrown hairs and generally keeping the skin in tip top condition. Your skin will feel smooth, and supple after use. No tightness or dryness.

Konjac is reputed for its health giving properties & used by the Japanese for over 1500 years, having originally been used as a medicine in the sixth century and is packed full of skin goodies -   lipids, sodium, potassium, magnesium, iron, phosphorus, copper, zinc, vitamin A, vitamin E, vitamin D, vitamin B1, vitamin B2, vitamin B6, vitamin B12, vitamin C, pantothenate, niacin, fatty acid, folic acid and fibre.

After using the sponge it’s really important to gently squeeze the sponge out between your 2 flattened hands (never wring it!) and then allow it to dry in a well ventilated place (or even store it in the fridge!) Never leave your sponge where it remains too wet, such as in the shower! The more fresh dry atmosphere your sponge is stored in, the longer it will last! Change your sponge every few months or when it starts to break down!

•    100% Natural Sponge
•    Gentle exfoliation
•    100% Colouring Free
•    100% Additive Free
•    100% Biodegradable
•    Naturally Sustainable
•    Environmentally Safe

name: Foot Crystals (500g)
product_description:
Perfectly pamper feet with the Kneipp Foot Crystals; a revitalising formula with Thermal Spring Salt to cleanse, exfoliate and renew dry, rough skin.
Fortified with natural Calendula Extract, the treatment soothes and conditions hard skin, whilst natural Rosemary Essential Oil rejuvenates tired feet, minimising burning sensations and stimulating restless legs. Expect super soft, deodorised feet that are comfortable all day long.

name: works Perfect Cleavage Firming Lotion 60ml
product_description:
The Perfect Cleavage Firming Lotion from this works has been reformulated to deliver unparalleled anti-ageing results to the delicate exposed skin around the neck, bust and décolleté.  
Harnessing the powers of bioactive natural ingredients and essential oils, the fluid formula delivers targeted lifting action with Marine-based Algae and extracts of Larch, Comfrey Root and Rose essence working to stimulate cellular renewal for a tightening effect, while Hyaluronic Acid provides intensive moisture.
Brightening Vitamin C helps prevent further damage and deterioration through activating enhanced collagen production, leaving skin feeling plumper and refined with a more even tone. Suitable for even the most sensitive skin, the gentle yet effective cream leaves skin looking supple, smooth and healthy with vivisbly reduced wrinkles and crêpey textures.

name: De-Stress Massage Oil (100ml)
product_description:
Receiving a massage is a voyage of discovery, so be transported to a haven of relaxation and tranquillity with Elemis De-Stress Massage Oil; the pure touch of this deeply relaxing synergy soothes the mind, melts tension and harmonises the body.
Carefully formulated with hand selected pure essential oils including rosewood, melissa, marjoram, geranium, rosemary, lavender and chamomile, Elemis De-Stress Massage Oil is perfect for those occasions when you’re feeling stressed or exhausted. Use it after indulging on a long soothing bath or after gentle exercise for an amazing and relaxing experience.
Directions of use:

name: Cow Pit Spray Deodorant
product_description:
Feel confident with the Cowshed Cow Pit Spray Deodorant; a herbal spray that soothes and conditions skin, whilst lending the underarms a refreshing scent.
Utilising a skin-loving blend of Organic Aloe Vera and Shea Butter, the spray not only helps you to feel dry and confident, but works to condition the underarms to ensure skin is calm, comfortable and healthy. Peppermint, Spearmint and Lemongrass Essential Oils work in synergy to envelop skin in a refreshing scent, whilst offering antimicrobial and antiseptic properties.
Expect to feel comfortable and fresh all day.

name: Self Tan Mousse 120ml
product_description:
Reveal bronzed skin with the Self Tan Mousse from the world’s first and only Eco-certified self-tanning brand, TanOrganic. Whilst delivering a sun-kissed glow, the tanning mousse hydrates the skin to produce optimum results. Formulated without synthetic ingredients, dyes or colours, the hydrating tan is suitable for all skin types, including those with sensitive skin.
The mousse formula glides effortlessly over the body to offer an even, streak-free tan. Enriched with 80% Organic Aloe Vera juice and Hyaluronic aicd, the tan delivers a hydrating veil to the body, ensuring skin doesn’t dry out and cause unwanted patchiness.
Utilising only natural and organic ingredients, the tanning mousse will leave skin comfortably hydrated, whilst boasting a golden glow.

name: Me Super Toning Body Polish 150ml
product_description:
Improve skin texture and tone with Balance Me's Super Toning Body Polish; a skin-refining formula that combines naturally active botanicals to help combat common concerns.
Utilising ground Walnut Shells, the gentle exfoliator expertly buffs away dead, dull skin cells, whilst toning and purifying the body from top to toe. An antioxidant-rich blend of Juniper, Geranium and Bergamot Essential Oils encourage circulation to help minimise the appearance of cellulite, diminish dimples and tone problem areas. Skin feels smoother, softer and more refined after use.

name: Lavender Hand Cream (125ml)
product_description:
Rejuvenate dry, over-worked and rough hands with Jurlique's Lavender Hand Cream; a rich, non-greasy moisturiser that works to restore velvety soft, supple skin whilst delivering a relaxing lavender fragrance.
Deeply nourishing and rebalancing, the fast-absorbing cream is infused with almond and safflower seed oils to soothe and calm skin, leaving hands comfortable with long-lasting hydration.
Packed with natural antioxidants and plant-based ingredients to protect from environmental aggressors, helping to maintain youthful-looking, silky smooth hands. Presented in a branded box, making the perfect treat for yourself or loved one. E.N.

name: Associates Revive Body Lotion 200ml
product_description:
Revitalise skin from top to toe with the Aromatherapy Associates Revive Body Lotion; a lightweight, fast-absorbing moisturiser that works to replenish and hydrate the entire body.
Rich in omega fatty acids, its nourishing formula combines Sodium Hyaluronate with an energising blend of Grapefruit, Rosemary and Juniper Essential Oils to invigorate and stimulate the mind and body, delivering a caffeine-free boost with every use. You can expect soft, smooth and plump skin with a healthy glow.

name: Red Grape Sunscreen Body Oil SPF20 100ml
product_description:
Nourish and protect skin with the KORRES Red Grape Sunscreen Body Oil SPF20; a rich, naturally-derived treatment that offers moderate protection and helps combat signs of premature ageing.
The velvet-smooth formula glides onto skin and is rapidly absorbed without feeling greasy, based upon a combination of Red Grape Oil and Alaria Esculenta extract to provide a rich source of fatty acids and Linoelic Acid to replenish elasticity levels and neutralise free radical damage.
A delicate blend of Walnut, Sunflower, Coconut and Sweet Almond Oils work in tandem to keep skin feeling smooth and supple, imparting a sumptuously soft texture and more even tone. Brimming with antioxidants and vitamins, the lightweight spray shields against sun damage and leaves skin feeling firmer and replenished.

name: Lavender Creamy Body Wash (200ml)
product_description:
The award winning Weleda Lavender Creamy Body Wash relaxes and cleanses the skin whilst gently calming the senses with the soothing and aromatherapeutic benefits of pure lavender essential oil.
Made from organic lavender and precious organic sesame seed oil the Weleda Lavender Creamy Body Wash provides protective anti-oxidants, plus skin-friendly natural cleansers. This soothing and harmonising body wash will relax your body and keep your skin feeling clean and fresh. Suitable for vegans.
Directions of use:

name: Magic Cream Duo
product_description:
This magic cream duo will hydrate the body, face and hair without clogging the pores. This cream can also be used as hot-oil treatment on the hair to achieve healthy, shiny hair. Now in a duo bundle, boasting amazing value.
“The skin cream used by most of the make-up artists during London's Fashion Week comes with a mysterious name. It's called Egyptian Magic Cream, and many of the top make-up artists have found it so effective, they don't want to let it go. They depend on it during fashion shows because they can use it in so many ways....Madonna and Kate Hudson love it.” Elle Magazine

name: Japanese Rose Shower Gel 40ml
product_description:
Envelop the body in fragrant moisture with the KORRES Japanese Rose Shower Gel; a creamy body wash that cleanses the body, whilst offering a long-lasting moisturising effect. Effortlessly lathering over skin, the delicately scented soap gently and effectively cleanses away daily dirt, oil and impurities.
The refreshing shower gel is enriched with multiple Wheat Proteins, which form a protective film over skin to help the body to maintain healthy hydration levels. Alongside offering a veil of rich moisture, the foaming shower gel is enriched with Active Aloe® to combat loss of elasticity and stimulate collagen synthesis. This helps to reduce visible signs of ageing.
Expect the body to feel refreshed, rejuvenated and comfortably hydrated.

name: & Evelyn Citron, Honey and Coriander Conditioning Hand Wash (250ml)
product_description: Gentle enough for every day use, this Crabtree & Evelyn Citron, Honey and Coriander Conditioning Hand Wash is a rich-lathering, pH-balanced hand wash. Featuring skin-softening botanical extracts and a soap-free formula, this hand wash is less drying than some other traditional cleansers and helps to properly condition the skin. - E.D

name: Hand & Nail Cream (125ml)
product_description:
Give hard working hands the TLC they deserve with Sukin Hand & Nail Cream. The non-greasy, lightweight formula combines hydrolysed soy protein to strengthen nails and cuticles with aloe vera and vitamin E to soothe, soften and protect hands.
Sukin believe the most powerful and effective ingredients for your  skin and hair care come from nature. Environmentally conscious, Sukin is  a natural personal care company from Australia.
‘Skincare that  doesn’t cost the earth™’ - Sukin’s commitment extends far beyond  cosmetic. The 100% certified carbon neutral company aims to reduce the  impact their business has on our increasingly fragile environment. -SA

name: Associates De-Stress Body Wash (200ml)
product_description:
Clear your head and release everyday tension with this stress relieving Aromatherapy Associates De-stress Body Wash. It contains a blend of natural seaweed extracts and refreshing essential oils and can also be used as a foam bath.
This De-stress Body Wash from Aromatherapy Associates is perfect for when feel tired in your body and mind. It will help those nasty muscular aches in your joints after a hard day’s physical activity.
Directions of Use:

name: Boo Congratulations Mummy Kit (3 Products)
product_description:
Say ‘Congratulations!’ in style with the Love Boo Congratulations Mummy Kit. Containing all the essentials a new mum or mum-to-be needs, the set provides the ultimate pampering tools to leave her feeling great!
The Love Boo Congratulations Mummy Kit is a beautiful gift box that offers all of the essentials for a well-deserved, natural pampering session. All of the products are free from parabens, sulphates and petrochemicals, and they’re safe to use throughout pregnancy and when nursing.
This pack contains the following products:

name: CREW Men's Hair Minimizing Body Hydrator (90ml)
product_description:
Maintain silky, hair-free skin with AB CREW Men's Hair Minimizing Body Hydrator, a unique emulsion that works to reduce and minimise the appearance of hair regrowth for a body that looks smooth and more defined.
Combining mushroom derivative with a plant proline complex, the formula delivers lasting hydration deep down and works on the surface to inhibit unwanted stubble growth. Infused with a subtle, masculine scent of young vetiver and forest woods. - K.N.

name: Choice Digestive Enzyme Blend
product_description:
Udo's Choice Digestive Enzyme Blend is a carefully selected cocktail of 7 plant based digestive enzymes that have been encapsulated in an easy-to-swallow capsule to help aid healthy digestion and nutrient absorption.
Digestive enzymes are important because they break down the foods we eat for our bodies to then absorb. All too often, naturally occurring enzymes are lost during the preparation and cooking process, which can be detrimental to our health. To help combat this, the capsules combine a carefully balanced selection of digestive enzymes to help replace lost enzymes and aid full digestion of fats, carbohydrates, protein and fibre. Helping to reduce bloating and digestive complaints, the capsules expertly break down and metabolise every food type to ensure your insides feels happy and comfortable.
175 mg of pure vegetable source enzyme blend with the following guaranteed activity:

name: Citrus 24 Hour Roll On Deodorant 50ml
product_description: Keep fresh naturally with the Citrus 24 Hour Roll On Deodorant from holistic brand Weleda. Free from aluminium salts and synthetic preservatives that can cause irritation and block pores, the all-natural formula helps promote a refreshing sensation with Lemon and Litsea Cubeba to help neutralise odours. Delivers long-lasting coverage in a convenient roll-on form for ease-of-use and on-the-go.

name: Klein Obsession for Men Deodorant Stick (75g)
product_description: Calvin Klein's Obsession for Men Deodorant Stick delivers long-lasting freshness and protection against wetness and body odours, without leaving marks or stains. Ideal for all skin types, the fast-drying formula gently glides onto skin to leave the brand's masculine fragrance of fruity tangerine, bergamot and lime, blended with notes of patchouli, spicy cinnamon and coriander. E.N.

name: Sugar Scrub Body Polish- Blood Orange & White Pepper (330g)
product_description:
Polish your skin to perfection with bliss sugar scrub body polish – blood orange & white pepper. This exfoliating sugar scrub will leave your skin smooth and supple and with an a-‘peeling’ zesty fragrance.
Exfoliate your skin with bliss sugar scrub body polish - blood orange & white pepper. Sucrose granules gently smooth your skin whilst antioxidants protect against ageing free radical damage. Sunflower oil leaves skin super-soft and silky while the burst of orange and pepper delivers a warm, clean, invigorating ‘scent’-sensation.
Directions of use:

name: Life Elixirs Calm and Fortitude Wellbeing Duo 20ml
product_description:
Settle the mind and find inner resolve with the Elemis Life Elixirs Calm and Fortitude Wellbeing Duo; two miniature bath and shower oils that leave skin nourished and delicately scented. Simply apply to running bath water, or to the body whilst showering and each silky oil will deliver a different effect, from relaxing the mind to encouraging feelings of confidence.
Calm Bath & Shower Elixir (10ml)
Soothe the mind, body and soul with the Calm Bath and Shower Elixir; a luxurious bath and shower oil that conditions and fragrances skin, whilst encouraging feelings of relaxation. Blending 15 essential oils, including Clary Sage, Lavandin and Rosewood, the calming fragrance seeks to create an oasis of calm and tranquillity to provide sanctuary for the mind.
Fortitude Bath & Shower Elixir (10ml)
Empower the spirit with the Fortitude Bath and Shower Elixir; a luxurious bath and shower oil that conditions and fragrances skin, whilst encouraging feelings of confidence. Intelligently combining 19 essential oils, including Geranium, Cedarwood and Ylang Ylang, the sensuous fragrance seeks to promote strength and determination.

name: Lavender & Geranium Body Moist (200ml)
product_description:
Deeply moisturising and super skin comforting, A’kin Lavender & Geranium Body Moist infuses a natural synergy of Australian cold pressed jojoba and certified organic avocado to leave even the driest skin silky soft and comfortably nourished. Now with a free Hand & Nail Cuticle Créme!
Soothing the skin with a relaxing lavender scent, A’kin Lavender & Geranium Body Mist is the perfect relief for dry itchy skin. Now comes with a free Hand & Nail Cuticle Créme!
Directions of use:

name: ISSA Play Toothbrush - Summer Sky
product_description:
Introduce yourself to FOREO’s innovative oral-care line with the FOREO ISSA Play Toothbrush; a revolutionary toothbrush that encourages healthy teeth and gums, whilst adding a playful pop of colour to the bathroom.
The ISSA Play utilises the same intelligent technology as the previous ISSA toothbrushes, yet arrives as a battery-powered model. The toothbrush combines sonic pulse technology with a unique, hybrid brush head, which is effective in eliminating plaque, preventing cavities and discouraging tartar build-up. Delivering 9000 high-intensity pulsations per minute, the toothbrush thoroughly cleans and visibly whitens teeth, whilst comfortably massaging gums to promote strong and healthy results.
The ISSA toothbrushes are safe and ultra-hygienic as they harbour considerably less bacteria than regular nylon brushes. The ISSA Play boasts a hybrid brush head, which is crafted using antibacterial silicone bristles to the outer and PBT polymer bristles to the centre. The silicone bristles gently massage gums to prevent damage, whilst the polymer ones provide a more vigorous clean.
Easy-to-use, the ergonomic toothbrush is ideal for daily use and the lightweight design ensures it is travel friendly. The Swedish-designed brush is completely waterproof, which allows for easy cleaning and even in-shower use, which is ideal for those with busy lifestyles. Cost-effective with no changeable brush heads, the ISSA Play is the perfect introduction into the ISSA range. Discover a new kind of clean.

name: & Evelyn Jojoba Oil Moisturising Body Wash (250ml)
product_description:
Lather your body in luxury with the Crabtree & Evelyn Jojoba Oil Moisturising Body Wash. Contains golden jojoba oil for moisturising, vitamin e to act as an antioxidant and amino acids for soothing and conditioning.
Crabtree & Evelyn Jojoba Oil Moisturising Body Wash is a gentle pH-balanced body wash that soothes and moisturises skin with a blend of oat amino acids and golden jojoba oil obtained from the first pressing of the oil-rich seed. Scented with a blend of lavender and green herbs with a hint of citrus, not only will you have heavenly healthy skin but you’ll smell amazing too!  
Directions of use:

name: Real Body Cream - Classic
product_description: Restore moisture and obtain soft skin with this easy to spread Musgo Real Body Cream. Glycerin, olive and almond oil extracts blended with shea butter make the perfect hydrating formula for tired or tight, dry skin. Together with the classic, masculine fragrance of vetiver and patchouli, it will keep your skin feeling nourished. E.N.

name: Chic DELUXE Electric Toothbrush - Gold
product_description:
Sonic Chic present the DELUXE Electric Toothbrush; a portable, rechargeable brush with a compact, lightweight design. Featuring a protective, ventilated cap for ultimate hygiene, the travel-friendly device is perfect for the gym, work or use on-the-move.
With a sonic-powered, dual speed function, the brush boasts two settings: Mode 1 for 28,000 strokes per minute and Mode 2 for 32,000 strokes per minute for a more intense clean, whilst its two minute Quadrant Timer indicates when to move to a different section of your mouth. Features a precision head to reach awkward areas and ultra-gentle bristles for a comfortable brushing experience every time.

name: Dante Emozioni in Toscana Blooming Gardens Soap 250g
product_description:
Pamper skin with the Nesti Dante ‘Emozioni in Toscana’ Blooming Gardens Soap. Expertly hand-crafted in Italy using the artisan saponification method, the soap bar has been traditionally made with natural, raw ingredients and oils that seek to sweep away daily dirt and impurities without stripping away moisture to leave skin feeling soft and supple.
Transforming into a rich lather upon application, it releases a captivating floral scent that soothes the mind and transports the senses to a springtime garden in full blossom. Wrapped in lavish textured paper, the soap makes a wonderful gift.

name: Softening Mango Body Wash 887ml
product_description:
JÁSÖN Softening Mango Body Wash Pump (900ml) is a body cleanser that leaves skin feeling hydrated and rejuvenated as well as thoroughly clean. Natural mango, papaya extracts and sunflower oil provide a hydrating and brightening formula whilst exfoliating dead skin cells.
Vitamin E and Pro-Vitamin B5 have been added to the natural blend for brighter protected skin from head to toe. - K.R

name: First Hand Cream 50ml
product_description:
Keep hands looking youthful with the SAMPAR First Hand Cream; an advanced alternative to cosmetic procedures that delivers age-defying results.
The rich yet lightweight formula veils hands with a host of naturally active ingredients, including Bdellium extract that delivers a plumping, ‘liporepair’ effect to restore skin density and stimulate subcutaneous fatty tissue synthesis, filling the appearance of wrinkles.
Encapsulated Hyaluronic Acid ensures deep hydration for smooth texture and long term wrinkle prevention, while an exclusive Urban Advance Complex creates an antioxidant shield with Shea Butter Serum, Mint Endorphins and Probiotic Sugar working in tandem to reinforce skin defence against pollutants and free radicals.  
Skin feels firm, replenished and supple with a lifted appearance, boasting visibly less wrinkles and age spots for a youthful looking vitality.

name: 24 Hour Radiance Collection (Worth £42.00)
product_description:
Treat your skin to A'kin's 24 Hour Radiance Collection. Combining an organic facial oil with a night cream, the duo work in tandem to reveal a naturally radiant, younger-looking complexion.
Pure Radiance Rosehip Oil (23ml):
An organic facial oil infused with active botanicals including certified organic Rosehip oil. Rich in vitamins, omegas and fatty acids, the oil works to intensely hydrate your skin whilst smoothing and softening the complexion, and reducing signs of ageing. Its comforting properties inspire natural radiance and luminosity.
Lavender & Rose Repairing Antioxidant Night Cream (50ml):
A replenishing night-time moisturiser that works to hydrate and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles while you sleep. Infused with a cocktail of pure botanical actives, including Vitamins A, E, B5 and C, and Omegas 9, 3 and 6, the fatty acid-rich formula melts quickly into skin, delivering intense moisture whilst addressing signs of ageing to leave skin with a softer, younger-looking appearance.

name: & Oil Nourish & Balance Anti Cellulite Body Oil 100ml
product_description:
Achieve smooth, supple skin with the Nourish & Balance Anti Cellulite Body Oil from You & Oil. Utilising the natural rejuvenating properties of citrus fruits and essential oils, the luxurious oil melts into skin without feeling greasy or sticky.  
Stimulating the epidermal layer, Grapefruit Oil instantly refreshes skin, while Orange and Sweet Almond Oils moisturise dry patches and improve hydration levels. The addition of Atlas Cedar Oil works to eliminate toxins and effectively drain lipid fat stores that cause cellulite, resulting in a more even and smooth surface texture.

name: Devils Mint Body Scrub (150ml)
product_description:
A revitalising body scrub that gently cleanses and smoothes the body whilst removing tired skin cells, Elemis Devils Mint Body Scrub leaves the skin satin soft and more receptive to moisturising for the ultimate softening sensation.
Containing silicon-rich seaplant particles, devil’s apron seaweed and peppermint essential oil, Elemis Devils Mint Body Scrub is perfect as part of a programme of dry daily body brushing, or weekly exfoliation to help shed dead skin cells and release toxins. After a few uses, your skin will have a radiant and healthy glow.
Directions of use:

name: to Cucumbers Soothing Body Wash 280ml
product_description:
Nourish your skin with the yes to Cucumbers Soothing Body Wash.
Infused with antioxidant Green Tea and cooling organic Cucumbers, the calming formula delivers a veil of protection onto sensitive skin, gently lifting away impurities whilst rejuvenating and protecting to leave the body feeling fresh, soft, supple and smooth.

name: Me Rose Otto Body Wash 280ml
product_description:
Clarify and refresh from top to toe with Balance Me's Rose Otto Body Wash; a gentle formula that naturally cleanses and hydrates skin, whilst calming and relaxing the mind.
Infused with a luxurious blend of Rose Otto, Rose Geranium and Palma Rosa Essential Oils, the delicately scented shower gel eliminates impurities as it soothes and rebalances for long-lasting comfort. Skin will feel pampered, rejuvenated and restored with a floral fragrance.

name: Me Super Moisturising Hand Cream 100ml
product_description:
Replenish dry, over-worked hands with the Balance Me Super Moisturising Hand Cream; a 99% natural formula that absorbs quickly into skin to soften and nourish without greasy residue.
Infused with a host of beneficial ingredients, including renowned ancient skin conditioners Benzoin and Yarrow Essential Oils, the fast-absorbing cream strengthens and repairs delicate skin, whilst defending against the damaging effects of changing weather conditions for long-lasting comfort. Shea Butter and Kukui Seed Oil leaves hands feeling smooth, supple and rejuvenated.

name: Biotic Balance ChocBalls for Kids - Milk (30 Balls)
product_description:
Bioglan Biotic Balance ChocBalls for Kids (30 Balls) in milk chocolate form part of an unrivalled range of natural, innovative and effective vitamin supplements. GMP approved and formulated by qualified naturopaths, these are a tasty way to ensure the whole family gets live bacteria into their everyday diet.
Made from real milk chocolate, each ChocBall is packed with 1 billion live bacteria, including proprietary cultures Lactobacillus Rosell, Bifodobacterium Rosell and inulin. A great source of fibre and calcium with the added bonus of 'Fridge Free Technology'; simply keep in the cupboard or in your bag on the go. - K.N.

name: Advance 50 Plus Multivitamin Tablets - (60 Tablets)
product_description:
Centrum Advance 50 Plus Multivitamin Tablets have been specifically developed to support the changing needs of your health and wellbeing over the age of 50+, delivering tailored levels of vitamins and minerals for optimum efficacy and benefits.   
The world’s number one multivitamin is established through 30 years of scientific research and nutritional expertise, combining 25 key nutrients with all 13 essential vitamins to support vitality and immunity while contributing to normal vision and heart health.  .  
B Vitamins help to release food-based energy for an overall boost, plus Vitamin C, Zinc, Copper and Selenium work in tandem to support the immune system and increase antioxidants. High levels of Calcium and Vitamin D maintain strong bones, while Vitamin A and Riboflavin sustain normal vision. Age is just a number with this daily food supplement that provides all the resources you need to keep you feeling in your prime.

name: Hydrolat Toner for Hydrating the Skin 200ml
product_description: The Ila Spa Hydrolat Toner for Hydrating the Skin is made of 100% pure and natural rose hydrolat, making it one of the purest toners around. Consisting of distilled water from rose damascene petals, it refreshes your skin whilst helping to heal the damaged that's caused by daily pollutants. Meanwhile, the naturally-occurring alcohol from rose essential oil won't leave your skin feeling dehydrated. - L.M.

name: Bodycare Body Lotion (100ml)
product_description:
The Body Lotion from Australian Bodycare is a gentle antiseptic to rehydrate skin. Specially formulated with tea tree oil, this lightweight lotion provides nourishing ingredients which work to revive dry skin and retain the skin's natural moisture levels. Experience soft and supple skin that is comfortable. The handy pump action bottle allows easy application and the lotion absorbs quickly into skin. E.N.
Directions for use: Apply to skin using the palms of your hands and massage in sweeping circular movements.

name: Botanicals Moroccan Rose Concentrated Body Oil 50ml
product_description:
The Moroccan Rose Concentrated Body Oil from Dr Botanicals is a delicate blend of essential oils brimming with minerals and vitamins, working to repair and pamper skin. Fast absorbing and non-greasy, the potent serum has a delicate fragrance and effortlessly melts in.  
Created using only the finest natural extracts, the main ingredient of Moroccan Rose Oil boasts high levels of Vitamin C to minimise the appearance of fine lines and imperfections, whilst antioxidant-rich Sweet Almond Oil helps balance tone and ease irritations. Olive Oil adds an intense dosage of hydration, leaving skin protected and restored.

name: Velocity Rapid 1hr Self Tan Mist 120ml
product_description:
Get that sun-kissed glow fast with the Vani-T Velocity Rapid 1hr Self Tan Mist. Fortified with Quad Bronzing Technology and Transdermal Delivery for even coverage, the exclusive, high performance formula creates a dark, long lasting tan with colour payoff results in as little as one hour.
Plant-based extracts of Australian Kakadu Plum, Quandong and Aloe Vera help to optimise hydration levels and minimise patchiness, while Vitamin C and Marine Collagen work to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles for a smooth, even surface.  The spray tan leaves skin feeling firmer and revitalised with a gorgeous, natural looking tan in an instant.

name: Self Tanning Mousse 180ml - Month in Maui (Dark)
product_description:
Achieve a deep and natural tan with the Month in Maui Self Tanning Mousse from Sunescape. Instantly transforming skin, the mousse delivers a radiant bronzed tan in a matter of minutes, as well as visibly smoothing the skin tone and helping to conceal cellulite and stretch marks.
Enriched with Macadamia nut, Coconut extract and Avocado oils, the formula provides hydration to skin, whilst antioxidants Green Tea, Vitamin E and Grape Seed extract nourish and protect against ageing. Without damaging skin with harmful UV rays, the lightweight tan leaves skin with a natural, streak-free colour and boasting a delicious coconut scent

name: The Ritual of Ayurveda - Balancing Treat Small Gift Set
product_description:
Feel perfectly pampered with The Ritual of Ayurveda - Balancing Treat Small Gift Set from Rituals. Housed in luxurious packaging, the collection combines four of the brand's best-sellers to leave you feeling cleansed, nourished and refreshed from head to toe.
Brilliant Bliss Shampoo (70ml)
A nourishing shampoo that harnesses the shine-boosting powers of Indian Rose and Shikakai, known as the 'fruit for hair'. Working to cleanse and condition your hair, the shampoo intensely nourishes whilst lifting away impurities and delivering mirror-like shine. Hair feels soft and manageable. Ideal for daily use and protects colour vibrancy.
Honey Touch Body Cream (70ml)
A luxurious body cream that works to soften, nourish and comfort the skin. Enriched with Himalayan Honey and relaxing Indian Rose, the formula delivers a veil of moisture onto skin to leave it feeling silky soft and supple. Leaves the body and mind feeling relaxed.
Ayurveda Scrub (70ml)
A purifying body scrub enriched with exfoliating micro beads to leave skin soft, fresh and clarified. Harnessing the sweet fragance of Indian Rose and utilising mineral-rich Multani Clay, the luxurious formula gently sloughs away rough skin and helps stimulate the body's energy flow. Accelerate the process by enjoying a warm bath after use. Skin feels supple and replenished.
Yogi Flow Foaming Shower Gel (50ml)
A foaming shower gel enriched with ancient Ayurvedic ingredients, Sweet Almond Oil and Indian Rose. Working into a rich foam on contact with water, the luxurious wash effortlessly cleanses skin whilst nurturing and comforting. Skin feels fresh, revitalised and supple.

name: Ibrahimovic Suprême Homme Deodorant Stick 75ml
product_description: Developed by professional footballer, Zlatan Ibrahimovic, the Suprême Homme Deodorant Stick delivers long-lasting freshness around the clock. Gliding effortlessly across the skin, the fast-drying, alcohol-free formula eliminates body odours and delivers the brand's energising Suprême Homme fragrance of zesty Lemon, Ginger, invigorating Rosemary, Lavender and rich Cedarwood.

name: Aromatherapy Body Wash - Sandalwood
product_description:
Experience a refreshing cleanse with A'kin Aromatherapy Body Wash in Sandalwood, a calming cleansing formula that works to lift away impurities whilst inspiring the mind.
