Infused with the sweet and spicy aroma of Australian Sandalwood essential oil, the revitalising wash utilises 100% Plant Glycerine and Coconut derived cleansers to perform a gentle cleanse, purifying and softening the skin to leave it feeling fresh, invigorated and delicately scented.

name: Hair Removal Laser Precision
product_description:
Achieve soft, smooth skin with Tria Hair Removal Laser Precision, a clinically-proven hair removal device that works to reduce up to 70% of unwanted hair after just 2 treatments in as few as 3 months. Its slim, lightweight and ergonomic shape is designed to target smaller, more sensitive areas such as the underarms and bikini line.
Dermatologist recommended, the ultra-slim device safely and effectively removes hair with FDA-cleared laser technology; it utilises the same diode laser technology preferred by dermatologists to target and permanently disable the hair follicle for permanent results*, and has 3 times more hair eliminating energy than any other at home device.
Effective on several skin and hair shades, the professional device is convenient and easy to use; its 3 treatment levels allows you to customise your experience, and its 15 minute battery life makes it ideal for quick sessions in small areas. Expect soft, smooth skin with long term results.
After 2-3 months of treatment, hair growth will appear lighter and finer. After 3 months of treatment, hair follicles that have been deactivated will no longer grow hair. Continue to use as necessary for touch-ups.
Product Features:
Safe and easy hair removal.
Compact and lightweight.
Slim and ergonomic.
Permanent results.
Clinically-proven.
FDA-cleared laser technology.
Ventilated to keep device cool.
Cordless.
15 minute battery life.
Easy grip handle.

name: Ibrahimovic Parfums Myth Wood Deodorant Stick 75ml
product_description:
Keep skin feeling fresh, comfortable and odour-free. Developed by internationally renowned footballer, Zlatan Ibrahimović, the Myth Wood Deodorant Stick delivers long-lasting protection against perspiration and body odours.
Gliding on effortlessly for ultimate freshness, the alcohol-free antiperspirant infuses skin with a masculine fragrance powered by Grapefruit, Sage, Pine and Lavender.

name: Red Grape After-Sun Body Emulsion 125ml
product_description:
Replenish and protect skin with the KORRES Red Grape After-Sun Body Emulsion; a soothing, plant-based treatment ideal for use after sunbathing.
The refreshingly lightweight formula quickly absorbs into skin, combining a fatty acid-rich blend of Red Grape Oil and Alaria Esculenta, which work to improve natural elasticity levels and combat moisture loss with essential antioxidants helping neutralise environmental aggressors and combat premature skin ageing.
Provitamin B5 and Avocado Butter intensively nourish, alleviating feelings of tightness and discomfort common after sun exposure, with Panthenol and Aloe Vera helping to soothe inflammation with anti-inflammatory properties.
The hydrating moisturiser leaves skin feeling soft and supple, with enhanced protection against UV stress and improved regeneration capabilities.

name: Seaweed Bath Co. Body Cream 177ml - Detox Cellulite
product_description:
Achieve smoother, tighter-looking skin with The Seaweed Bath Co. Detox Cellulite Body Cream; a fast-absorbing, deeply hydrating formula that works to combat uneven tone and texture.
Harnessing the powers of Coconut Oil and organic, sustainably-harvested Bladderwrack Seaweed (rich in vitamins, minerals and amino acids), the luxurious body cream penetrates deep into skin to nourish and condition. Antioxidant Green Coffee Bean Extract repairs and protects, whilst Shea Butter, Hyaluronic Acid and Hawaiian Kukui Oil deliver intense moisture. Skin appears firmed, refined and toned.

name: Unscented Replenishing Body Moist (200ml)
product_description:
Deeply calming and ultra moisturising, A’kin Unscented Replenishing Body Moist is ideal for sensitive skin. Infusing moisturising shea butter and essential fatty acids, this rich cream leaves skin soft and silky.
 
Soothe dry, fragile skin with the gentle A’kin Unscented Replenishing Body Moist - the perfect relief for dry itchy skin.
Directions of use:

name: ISSA™ Cobalt Blue Tongue Cleaner Attachment Head
product_description:
The FOREO Tongue Cleaner Attachment Head in 'Cobalt Blue' is suitable for any ISSA™ device and brings a finishing touch of hygiene to your everyday, oral care routine.
Crafted from non-porous silicone and curved to adapt to the shape of your tongue, the tongue cleaner delivers a deep and gentle cleanse, sweeping away bacteria with a non-abrasive action.  
Helping you achieve a healthier mouth and super-fresh breath, the attachment head resists bacteria build-up and only needs replacing once a year. Its flexibility prevents the application of too much pressure during use, and its innovative design inhibits the 'gag' effect.

name: Jojoba Company 100% Natural Australian Jojoba Oil 85ml
product_description:
Address a range of skincare concerns and needs with 100% Natural Australian Jojoba Oil from The Jojoba Company, from extreme dryness to redness and inflammation.
Suitable for all skin types, the versatile treatment is the perfect base for any home remedy kit, working to produce a wax that is similar to skin’s natural sebum for deep penetration and maximum efficacy.
Brimming with antioxidants, essential fatty acids and vitamins, the lightweight formula quickly penetrates skin without feeling greasy – as it isn’t actually an oil – and works to soothe, nourish and intensively moisturise. Ideal for chapped lips, rough cuticles, stretch marks and dry patches anywhere on the body, it keeps skin feeling smooth, plump and hydrated with long lasting results.

name: La Vie est Belle Perfume Body Cream 200ml
product_description:
Pamper skin with the Lancôme La Vie est Belle Perfume Body Cream; a luxurious hydrator inspired by the French expression meaning ‘Life is Beautiful’.
Comfortably massaging over the body, the fragrant cream envelops skin a veil of long-lasting moisture. Not only restoring healthy levels of moisture and eliminates areas of dryness, the formula imparts a delicate, feminine scent. Expect smooth and comfortable skin that is beautifully fragranced and illuminated.

name: Denny Time Repair Nail Elixir 12ml
product_description:
Achieve healthy-looking nails with the Leighton Denny Time Repair Nail Elixir; a fast-drying formula that works to replenish ridged, ageing nails.
Fortified with Collagen and Chrono-Peptide, the treatment strengthens and hydrates nails, whilst Linden Extract and Citric Acid combat discolouration. Nails are smoother, whiter and younger-looking. Can also be used as a base coat to extend the wear of your manicure.

name: Fico d'India Bath Salts (500g)
product_description:
Are you suffering from tired limbs and tender skin? Look no further than the Fico D'india Bath Salts from Ortigia. Just a handful of these bath salts is all you need for the making of a soothing tub time session. The Fico D'india salts dissolve in the bath, making the water incredibly soft and enriched with a beautifully fresh fragrance of fig and cedar. And relax! - R.H
Directions For Use: Simply pour a handful of the Fico D'india Bath Salts into a warm bath and let them work their magic.
Ortiga is a small Italian soap and scent company, which was founded in Sicily in 2006 by Sue Townsend. Using only natural products and inspired by the aesthetics, colours and scents of Sicily, the brand delivers a range of luxurious soaps, scents, creams, candles and lotions.

name: & Evelyn La Source Soap Trio Set
product_description:
Enjoy a spa-like bathing experience with the Crabtree & Evelyn La Source Soap Trio Set; three triple-milled soap bars that work to cleanse, soften and moisturise from top to toe.
Infused with a nourishing blend of Shea Butter, Brown Algae and antioxidant-rich Green Seaweed, the soap creates a luxurious lather to purify and refresh skin, whilst soothing the mind with its crisp, clean scent of musk and aquatic notes.

name: ISSA™ - Lavender
product_description:
Helping you to achieve the cleanest mouth you've ever had, FOREO ISSA™ presents the first beauty routine for your smile. Featuring soft and ultra-gentle silicone bristles to create the perfect friction, the lightweight and travel friendly, ergonomic brush has 3D flexibility and curves to the shape of your mouth to reach every crevice.
Working to ensure your mouth and gums are healthy and to help you achieve brighter and whiter teeth, the ISSA™ is electric and has a pulsating action that stimulates additional blood flow to achieve healthier gums and prevent gum disease.
With an 8-speed interface, the device allows you to chose your frequency of pulsations to suit your requirements. Every 30 seconds, the ISSA™ will pulse rapidly, indicating it is time to clean a different section of your mouth, and after 2 minutes it will pulse again to signify the end of the dental care routine. -SA
Please Note: A USB charger is included, and not a mains adapter. Also, the brush head only needs to be replaced once a year.

name: Zen for Men After Shave Lotion (100ml)
product_description: Soothe and cool post-shave skin with the Shiseido 'Zen' after shave lotion for men. Moisturising and soothing, the refreshing lotion will leave your skin feeling smooth and comfortable after a shave whilst preventing razor burn and inspiring vibrancy and tone. The fresh 'Zen' scent will empower and invigorate with its blend of spices, fruits and musk. - K.N.

name: Perineum Massage Oil 50ml
product_description: The Weleda Perineum Massage Oil is a natural treatment specifically developed for expectant mothers, working to promote stronger and more elasticised skin in the birthing area to help avoid cuts and tears. Enriched with Sweet Almond and Wheatgerm Oil, it is brimming with vitamins and moisture, specially formulated for use during massages to prepare for childbirth from 34 weeks. Suitable for all skin types.

name: & Speake Oxford & Cambridge Hydrating Body Wash
product_description:
Experience a moisturising cleanse with Czech & Speake Oxford & Cambridge Hydrating Body Wash, a rich body wash that works to cleanse and smooth skin.
Enriched with the brand's countryside-inspired 'Oxford and Cambridge' fragrance, the foaming body wash delivers notes of Lavender, Peppermint, Rosemary and Bergamot to leave the skin delicately scented, and the senses uplifted. Skin feels hydrated, fresh and clean.

name: & Evelyn La Source Foot & Leg Therapy 100g
product_description:
Revive tired legs with the Crabtree & Evelyn La Source Foot and Leg Therapy invigorates and refreshes for a spa-like experience.
Harnessing the powers of Red Sea Algae and sustainably harvested Green Seaweed, the luxurious treatment softens and nourishes skin, whilst protecting against dryness and environmental aggressors for long-lasting comfort.
Eliminates dry, callused skin and enhances the appearance of feet and legs to leave them feeling perfectly pampered with a crisp, clean fragrance of aquatic notes, musk and shoreline breezes.

name: Black Dry Down Friction-Free Powder 170g
product_description:
An innovative, talc-free powder that keeps skin silky, smooth and dry. This ultra-fine powder helps to prevent friction for ultimate comfort. The refreshing formula has anti-inflammatory, anti-bacterial and anti-itching properties as well as helping to soothe and the calm the skin.
Use before a workout or sporting activity to enhance comfort and protect the body's sensitive areas from chafing and irritation. Use any time for natural protection, all-day dryness and long-lasting freshness.

name: works Bedtime Story
product_description:
Experience the best night's sleep with this works' Bedtime Story. Combining a relaxing pillow spray with therapeutic bath salts, the duo work in unison to promote a calm and restful slumber.
deep sleep pillow spray (75ml):
A best-selling natural sleep aid that inspires feelings of calm. Designed to inspire a rejuvenating and deep sleep, the pillow spray is formulated with 100% pure essential oils of Lavender, Vetivert and Wild Chamomile; it releases relaxing vibes so you inhale calm and exhale any nerves and worries. Spray onto your pillow before bedtime; feel your troubles melt away and enjoy a peaceful slumber.
deep sleep bath soak (200g):
Relaxing and therapeutic bath salts infused with sleep-inducing Lavender, Vetivert and Wild Chamomile natural essential oils. Helping to pamper the body and mind, the calming formula with award-winning fragrance inspires feelings of serenity whilst moisturising and perfuming the skin ready for deep, rejuvenating sleep.

name: Concentrated Eau de Bouche Mouthwash (120ml)
product_description:
Energise and cleanse your entire mouth with Marvis Concentrated Eau de Bouche Mouthwash. The concentrated mouthwash has a sparkling peppermint sensation that is kind to both your teeth and gums.
Featuring an alcohol free formula with natural extracts of Xylitol and Propolis, the mouthwash helps you to attain good oral hygiene and fresh breath for longer. -SA
Directions for use:Dilute with water before use

name: Spa Factory Illuminate Dry Body Oil
product_description:
Enrich your skin with Natural Spa Factory's Illuminate Dry Body Oil, a non-greasy dry oil that effectively nourished and softens skin.
The non-greasy formula is dry to the touch and delivers a veil of moisture onto skin; its dose of Rice Bran Oil and subtle Vanilla and White Flower fragrance help to lighten the appearance of blemishes and age spots whilst uplifting the senses. The oil's refining and balancing properties will leave skin looking smoother and radiant with less visible pores.

name: Spa Factory Wild Lavender, Comfrey and Aloe Body Lotion
product_description:
Help skin to feel refreshed and soothed with the Wild Lavender, Comfrey and Aloe Body Lotion from Natural Spa Factory. Packed with a blend of soothing, nourishing and cleansing ingredients, the lotion is both gentle and intensely nourishing, leaving skin with a clean Lavender aroma.
Enriched with Jojoba Oil, bursting with Vitamin A and E, the lotion absorbs quickly and delivers moisture to the skin, whilst holding importance for cell regeneration. The potent antioxidant Almond oil is ideal to deliver nourishment to even the most sensitive of skin types.

name: Doctor ApiNourish Foot & Heel Cream 75ml
product_description:
Soothe and refresh aching feet with the ApiNourish Foot & Heel Cream from Manuka Doctor. A divinely rich formula, the moisturiser cools and calms, serving as a lovely treat at the end of a busy day. 
Super absorbent, the hydrating treatment is enriched with manuka honey and shea butter, which work to pamper cracked heels and seal in moisture. Avocado oil and Peppermint extracts revitalise and invigorate, perfect for calming swollen feet.

name: Mio Second Trimester Oil Bundle (Worth £79.50)
product_description:
Achieve that ‘pregnancy glow’ with the Mama Mio Second Trimester Oil Bundle. Combining a trio of bestselling Mama Mio products, the bundle is designed to treat and nourish skin during the second trimester of pregnancy, when hormones can cause skin to become prone to sensitivity and dryness. Host to a moisturising body oil, soothing breast cream and a refreshing facial wash, each product within the bundle is suitable for use whilst pregnant and will leave skin thoroughly nourished.
The Tummy Rub Oil 120ml
Help protect your skin against pregnancy stretch marks with The Tummy Rub Oil. Enriched with Omega 3, 6 and 9 essential fatty acids, the oil is able to build the skin's strength and elasticity, helping to relieve itching tummies. Specially formulated with a blend of Organic Oils to lock in moisture and provide maximum protection to help reduce the appearance of stretch marks during and after pregnancy, the luxurious oil works to hydrate skin.
Pregnancy Boob Tube 100ml
The Pregnancy Boob Tube bust cream soothes skin to leave it with a healthy glow. Enriched with organic Omega oils, Boob Tube hydrates by providing antioxidants to strengthen and help reduce the appearance of wrinkles. Specially formulated with unique Green Cabbage Leaf extract, its new and improved formula makes it pregnancy and breastfeeding safe.
Gorgeous Glow Facial Wash 100ml
Gently cleanse skin with the foaming Gorgeous Glow Facial Wash. Specially formulated with Tea Tree oil and Green Tea Leaf, the wash helps keep skin hydrated and provides powerful antioxidants that shield skin from free radical damage and environmental stresses. The luxurious formula contains a blend of natural, Coconut-derived cleansers enriched with organic Omegas and Vitamins to nourish skin. Experience skin that is full of moisture with a boost in radiance for a brighter complexion.

name: Tweezer Classic Red Slant
product_description: The Classic Red Slant Rubis Tweezer features a slanted tip for precise plucking and brow shaping. Made of coated surgical steel, the high-quality tweezers are acid-proof, anti-magnetic and rustproof. Featuring tips that close perfectly, precise edges and an arm of tension that yields a lightly-resilient resistance, the reliable Rubis tweezers are handmade in Switzerland by skilled employees, using a 45-step process. - L.M.

name: Skin Nourishing Milk Bath (400 ml)
product_description:
This award winning Elemis Skin Nourishing Milk Bath captures the essence of Cleopatra’s bathing ritual. The milk protein base is rich in nourishing vitamins, amino acids and minerals to feed, heal and harmonise your skin.
Japanese camellia oil and oat extract soothe and nourish dry and sensitive areas. This treatment is excellent for dry skin, skin allergies, acne, dermatitis, eczema, psoriasis and sunburn or for anyone as an immediate skin softening treatment, even mother to be’s bump!
This Elemis Skin Nourishing Milk Bath reinforces the skin's acid mantle and moisture balance; it is highly nutritive and will improve the skins health and suppleness, it is a complete food for skin. This gentle milk is excellent to use on babies and children, or on your scalp.
Directions of Use:

name: Cellulite Smoothing Set
product_description:
Combat stubborn and unwanted cellulite with the Mio Skincare Cellulite Smoothing Set. The set boasts a duo of carefully selected products, including an innovative cellulite smoother with an exfoliating body brush. Combined, the products work harmoniously to reduce the appearance of cellulite, alongside rough and uneven skin.
Shrink To Fit Cellulite Smoother 100ml
Target areas of concern with the Shrink To Fit Cellulite Smoother; an innovative formula that works to minimise the appearance of cellulite and uneven, bumpy skin. Harnessing the powers of Rosemary Extract, Green Tea and Caffeine, the antioxidant-rich cream can be massaged into the hips, thighs and arms to help diminish appearance of dimples and 'orange peel' skin, whilst toning to reveal a more refined body contour. Perfect for day or night use, the moisturising cream will leave skin feeling soft and looking firm.
Body Brush
Look after the largest organ you have; your skin. The convenient Body Brush comprises natural boar bristles and massage nodules, which exfoliate skin. The exfoliation helps to move redundant skin cells and dirt that can clog the surface of skin. Ensure you polish and massage all over to stimulate circulation, eliminate layers of dead skin and improve its overall appearance. Expect smooth and radiant skin.

name: Krill Oil for Men - 60 Gel Capsules (600mg)
product_description:
Cleanmarine Krill Oil for Men gel capsules are an easy-to-consume food supplement specially formulated to provide men with essential Omega 3 acids, vitamins and nutrients needed on a daily basis. They’re the perfect solution for men with busy lifestyles!  
Each one contains Co-Enzyme 10 which plays a vital role in the transfer of energy at cellular level, whilst Thiamine fuels the heart and regulates a healthy central nervous system. Zinc aids growth and repair, as well as working to boost testosterone levels and fertility, and Vitamin B6 works to naturally balance sex hormones and energy levels.
And of course, Krill Oil itself contributes to healthy heart, brain, eye and joint function. Why choose Krill Oil over Fish Oil? Krill are shrimp-like crustaceans that provide a more sustainable and ethical source of Omega 3 with zero by-catch. The fatty acids within Krill Oil are bound to phospholipids, a major component of human cell membranes, thus are much more rapidly absorbed than the acids from fish oil supplements. Krill Oil is also rich in Astaxanthin, a natural antioxidant, plus there’s no fishy aftertaste.

name: Innovative Tweezers - Purple
product_description:
Preen and perfect brows with the Rubis Innovative Tweezers. Designed by Fides Baldesberger (President of Rubis), the lightweight, aluminium tweezers feature slanted tips for precise touch-ups at home or on-the-go.
Crafted with superior calibrated tension and perfectly aligned tips that close evenly and firmly for advanced pulling power, you can grip even the smallest of hairs for a professional, airbrushed finish. Acid and rustproof.

name: Illuminated Magnifying Cosmetic Mirror
product_description:
Keep make-up and skin in close check with the Rio Illuminated Cosmetic Mirror. The battery-operated illumination provides an apt setting for application of cosmetics, whilst the hinge design allows the mirror to be swivelled and tilted to a suitable angle. Double-sided, with 1x and 5x magnification, this accessory makes application easy and straightforward by allowing focus on certain areas.
Built on a firm, secure base with 360° swivel design, the notable circular design of this mirror enables close-up scrutiny of skin areas, as well as a full, facial observation. C.R

name: Black Turbo Body Bar
product_description:
Cleanse away impurities with the Jack Black Turbo Body Bar. The deep cleansing and exfoliating action works to remove dirt and other impurities, leaving you with smooth, supple and healthy skin. Enriched with murumuru and shea butters, it intensely nourishes your skin, whilst natural lava rock gently buffs away dead skin cells and helps to boost your circulation.
The invigorating scent of eucalyptus, ginkgo biloba and blue lotus reduces fatigue and stimulates your senses, leaving your mind and body completely refreshed.

name: Citrus Refreshing Bath Milk (200ml)
product_description:
Boasting a tangy blend of essential oil and citrus fruits, the Weleda Citrus Refreshing Bath Milk (200ml) is a refreshing pick me up that is particularly good for use after physical exertion. Working to revitalise and enliven the senses, this bath milk is suitable for vegans and can even be used in the shower too. - E.D
- Shake the bottle before use.
- Pour 2 - 3 capfuls into running water.
- Do not bathe in for longer than 20 minutes.

name: Claw/Tong Tweezers - Deluxe
product_description: Preen and perfect your brows with the Mavala Claw/Tong Tweezers. With a gold-plated design and tips that close evenly and firmly for advanced pulling power, the tweezers allow you to grip even the smallest of hairs without slipping or breaking for a professional finish.

name: Spa Factory Peppermint Body Salt Scrub
product_description:
Refresh your skin with the Peppermint Body Salt Scrub from Natural Spa Factory. The luxurious salt scrub boasts an oil-based formula that delivers intense hydration to the skin, alongside a cooling effect. The formula easily absorbs into the skin without leaving a greasy residue or clogging the pores, which can lead to blemishes.
Enriched with Peppermint oil, the scrub works on a fatigued body by alleviating stresses and pains through increasing the blood circulation. The scrub also contains Fucus Vesiculosus, which is rich in trace elements, nutrients and proteins, whilst also being high in antioxidant activity and Iodine. Iodine is popular for reducing the appearance of cellulite through stimulating skin’s metabolism.
Suitable for even sensitive skin types, the formula contains Grape Seed oil that aims to visibly tighten skin and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, leaving the body younger looking and incredibly smooth.

name: Brown Ultra Light Bai Ji Hydrator
product_description:

Infused with Bai Ji and Lentil Seed extracts to help reduce that unwanted oily sheen, the face cream expertly moisturises the complexion whilst imparting a lively fragrance powered by zesty Fruits, cooling Peppermint and Musk.

product_description:

The LED lights can be adjusted to suit your needs, with a rotating dimmer switch for variable light intensity, and the mirror can be flipped for 7x magnification. Offering glare- and shadow-free  reflection, the battery-powered, freestanding mirror is a must-have addition for your home.

product_description:
Helping children to find brushing teeth a fun activity, FOREO ISSA™ mini is a silicone brush to protect gums and leave your child's mouth thoroughly clean. Featuring parental controls to ensure twice daily brushing, the sad face will appear if teeth have not been brushed for over 12 hours, whilst the happy face will light up when teeth have been brushed for 2 minutes. The brush has 2 speeds and will last up to 200 uses before losing its charge.
Features soft and gentle silicone bristles to create just the right amount of friction and 3D flexibility that helps the brush to reach awkward areas of the mouth. The brush has a pulsing action that will inform you when it's time to polish another quadrant of the mouth for thorough cleaning. -SA
Please Note: A USB charger is included, and not a mains adapter. Also, the brush head only needs to be replaced once a year.

product_description:
Boost and fuel your body with Power Greens Organic, a vegetarian capsule containing concentrated green food nutrition, including Spirulina, Wheatgrass, Brassicas and Kale.

The green ingredients have been carefully dried out to increase nutrient density, and formed into an easily accessible tablet that's perfect for modern lifestyles.
The concentrated blend will help you to perform at your best, everyday.

name: Bloom Body Lotion (200ml)
product_description: Deeply moisturise skin with the Ever Bloom Body Lotion from Shiseido. Replenishing and indulgent, you can expect hydrated, supple skin with a long-lasting, floral fragrance. E.N.

Apply to clean skin morning and evening underneath a moisturiser.

Harnessing the powers of ultra-fine Pumice, the body polish gently buffs away dead skin cells, whilst its nourishing blend of Shea Butter and Sweet Almond Oil leave skin smooth, soft and ready for self tan. Delivers a rejuvenating fragrance of Lemongrass and Ginger.

name: Konjac Sponge Company Baby Bath Sponge
product_description:
The purest softest 100% Konjac Sponge for baby and child. (also found to be fantastic for make-up application and is already a frim favourite with make up artists!)

Ideal for every new baby and every child. No nasty chemicals or toxins for delicate porous baby skin. Gently cleans without damage.

Perfect for children with sensitive skin or eczema. In fact, the sponge was originally created for babies!

PH balanced, means it is ideal on delicate baby skin. A new baby has still not have all the protection he or she needs yet, and a baby's skin can absorb 5 times more chemicals and pollutants than ours, as adults.

Its extra gentle texture is perfect for cleansing, so you won't have to use baby detergents that may contain unsafe chemicals. However, if you do choose to still use baby wash, then please note, you will need to use far less - again much better for baby's delicate skin, and better for the environment, as well as your pocket!

Hair washing also becomes so easy with the sponge. As the sponge can hold 10 times its weight in water, so filling the sponge and gently squeezing over baby's hair will make for a gentle, peaceful and delicate hair shampoo.

product_description:
No wetness, no embarrassing odour; no sweat! This Natio For Men Antiperspirant Deodorant provides long lasting odour protection with a light and fresh fragrance. Helping to control odour and wetness, this deodorant works with your body to keep you fresh.
This Natio For Men Antiperspirant Deodorant provides long-lasting odour protection with a light and fresh fragrance. Antiperspirant helps stop odour and wetness, while the quick-drying formula ensures you can walk out of the door feeling confident and fresh.

name: Bees Hand Salve (85g)
product_description:
Burt’s Bees Hand Salve is their most intensive hand treatment yet. This all purpose protective balm is made with botanical oils, herbs and beeswax, specially formulated to deeply penetrate dry, chapped hands and other areas that need extra moisturising.
Dry and rough hands find salvation in Burt’s Bees Hand Salve. As almond oil moisturises, rosemary stimulates your circulation and lavender helps prevent scarring making this Hand Salve ideal for use after gardening and other outdoor activities.

name: Orange Pack (Mega Pack 24 Servings)
product_description:
The Emergen-C Orange Pack contains sachets of the original formula Emergen-C fizzy drink. Containing 1000mg of vitamin C and other immunity-supporting antioxidants, the supplement also has seven different B vitamins which naturally enhance your energy levels, whilst electrolytes replenish your system after a tough workout!
Specially formulated for adults, the drinkable supplement also contains real fruit extracts for added nutrients. Perfect for energy release and immunity support, Emergen-C complements an active lifestyle and a balanced diet. - L.M.

name: Anti-Cellulite Active Concentrate Treatment (250ml)
product_description:
PUPA Anti-Cellulite Active Concentrate Treatment provides rapid anti-cellulite effects by breaking down fats within adipose tissues and promoting the drainage of excess liquid within the skin.
The treatment contains Escine, which promotes normal microcirculatory function and the drainage of excess fluids from skin. It is also concentrated with Hyaluronic Acid which penetrates the skin, regulating the balance of liquids producing a visible firming and invigorating effect.

name: Laszlo White Marble Cream 1.7oz
product_description:
Dynamically improve skin’s radiance with the Erno Laszlo White Marble Cream, designed to create a surface level appearance of preferred hydration and luminosity. Working on a cellular level, this condensed salve helps prevent oxidation, diminishing dark spots and defying environmental stressors.
The Active Bright Complex defends against melanin production, preventing future discoloration, whilst Chinese Plum Extract nurtures and repairs the skin’s vital moisture barrier, allowing pores to look visibly perfected and skin tones to appear balanced. C.R

name: Arden Green Tea Mimosa Body Cream 500ml
product_description:
Envelope skin with the Elizabeth Arden Green Tea Mimosa Body Cream for an uplifting, revitalising experience.
Vibrant yet graceful, the sumptuous formula melts into skin, working to soften and hydrate while layering an effervescent citrus. Opening with notes of earthy Green Tea and zingy Sicilian Lemon, the rich body cream unfolds into a delicate heart of summertime Mimosa flower and White Violet for a lingering floral scent.

name: ISSA Play Toothbrush - Cobalt Blue
product_description:
Introduce yourself to FOREO’s innovative oral-care line with the FOREO ISSA Play Toothbrush; a revolutionary toothbrush that encourages healthy teeth and gums, whilst adding a playful pop of colour to the bathroom.
The ISSA Play utilises the same intelligent technology as the previous ISSA toothbrushes, yet arrives as a battery-powered model. The toothbrush combines sonic pulse technology with a unique, hybrid brush head, which is effective in eliminating plaque, preventing cavities and discouraging tartar build-up. Delivering 9000 high-intensity pulsations per minute, the toothbrush thoroughly cleans and visibly whitens teeth, whilst comfortably massaging gums to promote strong and healthy results.
The ISSA toothbrushes are safe and ultra-hygienic as they harbour considerably less bacteria than regular nylon brushes. The ISSA Play boasts a hybrid brush head, which is crafted using antibacterial silicone bristles to the outer and PBT polymer bristles to the centre. The silicone bristles gently massage gums to prevent damage, whilst the polymer ones provide a more vigorous clean.
Easy-to-use, the ergonomic toothbrush is ideal for daily use and the lightweight design ensures it is travel friendly. The Swedish-designed brush is completely waterproof, which allows for easy cleaning and even in-shower use, which is ideal for those with busy lifestyles. Cost-effective with no changeable brush heads, the ISSA Play is the perfect introduction into the ISSA range. Discover a new kind of clean.

name: Sea Spa Magik Body Lotion 350ml
product_description:
Treat your skin to the Dead Sea Spa Magik Body Lotion; a fast-absorbing, non-greasy formula that works to moisturise, hydrate and soften the entire body.
Utilising mud, salt and mineral extracts from the Dead Sea to soothe and revitalise from top to toe, the lightweight lotion provides UVB protection, whilst preventing dryness for long-lasting comfort. Skin is left soft and smooth with increased suppleness.

name: TAN Wash Off Tanner 125ml
product_description:
Achieve an instant, sun-kissed glow with the SKINNY TAN Wash Off Tanner; a fragrant bronzing gloss that offers immediate tanning results, whilst enveloping skin in a tropical scent.
Effortlessly gliding over the face and body body, the fast-absorbing formula melts into skin, offering a veil of essential moisture, whilst providing a streak-free glow that can be rinsed away at the end of the day. The tanner is ideal as a quick-fix for a special occasion, night out or those with a busy lifestyle.
Finished with a firming dose of Guarana Berries, the wash-off tanner seeks to visibly perfect skin by concealing and reducing the appearance of imperfections, including blemishes and cellulite. Expect a beautifully bronzed body.

name: Firm & Tone Serum (200ml)
product_description:
Murad Firm and Tone Serum minimises imperfections and reduces the visible appearance of cellulite and stretch marks. This formula refines uneven skin texture and improves skin firmness and elasticity to leave you with skin you'll be proud to show off.
A study undertaken by Murad claims that the Firm and Tone Serum will improve the overall appearance of skin by 80% when used for 8 weeks. The skin’s firmness and elasticity will be strengthened, masking imperfections and reducing the appearance of cellulite.
Directions of use:

name: works Energy Bank™ Shower Gel
product_description:
Awaken your senses with the this works Energy Bank™ Shower Gel. The mix of essential oils boast a number of benefits; geranium helps to maintain the skin’s balance, ylang ylang keeps the skin looking healthy, rosemary boosts energy whilst sandalwood helps to keep the mind alert.  The shower gel does not contain sulphates therefore it leaves your skin feeling refreshed, revitalised and re-energised. 
The energy bank™ range from this works has been put together to give you a mental and physical boost in the morning. The collection features a variety of natural face, body and bath products. A.B.

name: Soothing Deodorant 50ml
product_description: Delivering natural, all day protection, MÁDARA's Soothing Deodorant will leave you feeling fresh and confident around the clock. Fortified with soothing Northern Peony Flower Extract, recognised for its moisturising, conditioning and antioxidant benefits, the roll-on deodorant eliminates odours whilst calming dry and sensitised underarm skin for long-lasting comfort.

name: Choice Ultimate Oil Blend (1000mg)
product_description:
Fuel your body with Udo's Choice Ultimate Oil Blend Capsules (1000mg), an unrefined and sustainable blend of seed oils, including Flax, Sesame and Sunflower.
In today's society, diets often lack the essential fatty acids and omegas required for a healthy lifestyle. Udo's Choice Ultimate Oil Blend gelatin capsules combine carefully selected oils to help supply the ideal Essential Fatty Acid (EFA) ratio of 2:1:1 omega 3, 6 and 9.
As the body cannot naturally produce EFAs, it is important we obtain these vital nutrients elsewhere; most omega oils are received through our diets, but food processing and exposure to light, heat and oxygen can degrade the nutritional value of Omega 3 and 6. To help combat this, these capsules provide a premium source of undamaged Omega 3 and 6 in a perfect ratio that supports optimum health.
Fuelling your body with essential fatty acids can help improve the condition of skin, hair and nails; improve recovery after training; and maintain a healthy heart.

name: Blue Sea Kelp Body Scrub 355ml
product_description:
Eliminate dead skin cells with Anthony Blue Sea Kelp Body Scrub. The treatment boasts Sea Kelp Extract which helps to nourish skin, whilst the Aloe Vera Gel soothes inflammation and the Nutmeg extract tones to protect the skin.
Helping to remove impurities, the scrub works to give a thorough exfoliation to the skin

name: & Evelyn Rosewater Hand Therapy (100ml)
product_description:
Immerse your hands in a bowl of rose petals with Crabtree & Evelyn Rosewater Hand Therapy. With a blend of classic and natural ingredients to care for your hands, it will leave them marvellously scented and soft, turning an ordinary moment into bliss…
A rich, indulgent hand cream for every day use, Crabtree & Evelyn Rosewater Hand Therapy is formulated with precious shea butter for extra moisture, and rosewater to help nourish and moisturise your skin while leaving it with a wonderful, familiar scent. Maintaining softness and leaving a delicate rose bouquet scent with fresh leafy green top notes, your hands will thank you for this luxurious treat.
Directions of use:

name: Natty Shipwreck Shower Wash 250ml
product_description:
Feel cleansed and rejuvenated with Mr Natty's Shipwreck Shower Wash, a hair and body wash inspired by the brand's Shipwreck Soap.
Infused with a shot of caffeine and a warming woody scent, the shower gel transforms into an energising lather, sweeping away impurities from the hair and body to leave you feeling fresh, clean and wide awake.

name: Tropez Sunshine Ready Kit
product_description:
Achieve a sun-kissed glow with the Sunshine Ready Kit from St. Tropez. Complete with an applicator mitt and a zipped cosmetic bag, the collection combines everything you need to achieve a gorgeous golden glow.
Tanning Mitt
The super soft mitt is the perfect accessory for your St. Tropez self tan. Helping to evenly spread tan into the skin, the mitt will give you streak-free results and spare you from unsightly tan-hands.
Gradual Tan In Shower Lotion - Medium (50ml)
An innovative self-tan with super-fast application. The formula delivers a natural-looking, sun-kissed glow that builds within three minutes, whilst providing long-lasting hydration and softening skin. Streak-free, the rinse-off lotion glides onto skin to form a luxurious lather as a guide, and can be applied daily to create a healthy, radiant tan with intensified colour.
Gradual Tan Tinted Everyday Body Lotion (50ml)
Easy to apply, the lightweight lotion delivers an instant hint of bronze with a streak-free finish, whilst slowly intensifying to leave the body with healthy-looking, golden colour. Suitable for all skin tones, its non-sticky formula blurs the appearance of imperfections and dries quickly so you don't have to worry about dressing. Formulated with the brand's mood-boosting fragrance to eliminate the self-tan smell, you can build your desired depth of colour with a long-lasting, even result.
Self Tan Classic Bronzing Mousse (120ml)
An ultra-lightweight self tan that delivers natural-looking, long-lasting colour with a streak-free finish. Infused with conditioning Vitamin E to keep skin hydrated and protected, the quick-drying, velvety mousse develops over 4-12 hours to leave you with a non-sticky, transfer resistant tan that fades evenly and slowly. Easy to apply with its guide colour, its innovative Aromaguard™ Fragrance Technology banishes the unpleasant fake tan smell.

name: Bees Body Lotion - Fragrance Free (170g)
product_description:
Perfectly pamper even sensitive skin with the Burt's Bees Fragrance Free Body Lotion; a lightweight, fast-absorbing formula that works to replenish and rejuvenate from top to toe.
Enriched with soothing extracts of Chamomile, Calendula and St. John's Wort, the non-greasy lotion has been scientifically proven to moisturise skin for up to 24 hours. A blend of Shea Butter and Vitamin E delivers long-lasting hydration to leave the body soft, smooth and comfortable around the clock.

name: Point Tweezer - Steel
product_description:
Tweezerman Point Tweezers are famous for their precision using ultra-sharp pointed tips that grab the smallest and finest hairs with ease. These are great for eyebrows, ingrown hairs and splinters.
Tweezerman Point Tweezers feature perfectly aligned hand-finished pointed tips for those tricky, hard to get hairs that sometimes lie under the skin, especially great for guy’s stubble.

product_description:
Experience a refreshing cleanse with Molton Brown Samphire Body Wash, an energising bath and shower gel infused with Samphire extracts to cleanse and refresh skin.
Gently lifting away dirt and impurities, the skin-enriching formula cleanses skin whilst imparting an oceanic fragrance powered by marine aromas and Seaweed. Skin is left feeling pure, fresh and invigorated.

name: Brown Comice Pear & Wild Honey Fine Liquid Hand Wash
product_description:
Gently cleanse hands with the Comice Pear & Wild Honey Fine Liquid Hand Wash from Molton Brown. Transporting your senses to a sun-drenched English meadow, the luxurious formula gently eliminates impurities as it softens and hydrates for long-lasting comfort.
Expertly blended with notes of Gardenia, Pear and Gloucestershire Honey, you can expect smooth, supple hands with a sweet, succulent fragrance. Housed in a convenient pump bottle decorated with a grosgrain bow.

name: Horny Cow - Seductive Body Lotion (300ml)
product_description:
Hydrate your skin with Cowshed’s Horny Cow Seductive Body Lotion.  This sensual lotion has a floral, spicy blend with rose absolute to heighten romance and essential oils of patchouli to arouse desire and cinnamon to stimulate and warm. 
Cowshed Horny Cow Seductive Body lotion is enriched with naturally moisturising cocoa butter and vitamin E, an antioxidant that helps protect the skin from signs of premature ageing caused by free radicals. 
Evoke your sensuality and passion with this seductive lotion, it contains no parabens, no petrochemicals and is free from sulphates, artificial fragrances and colours and is suitable for vegetarians and has not been tested on animals.
Directions of use:

name: Tanning Mitt
product_description:
Flawlessly apply self-tan with the He-Shi Tanning Mitt; a flocked foam glove that assists in ensuring you have an even, streak-free tan.
The smooth foam allows tan to glide comfortably and flawlessly onto skin, creating a professional-looking false tan. The patented applicator is complete with a lotion-proof barrier, which ensures hands remain stain free. Enjoy a flawless tan without the mess or fuss.

name: Grumpy Cow Uplifting Bath & Shower Gel
product_description:
Revive your mood with the Cowshed Grumpy Cow Uplifting Bath & Shower Gel; a refreshing 2-in-1 bath soak and shower gel that works to cleanse skin, whilst imparting an invigorating fragrance.
Ideal for those under stress or feeling irritable, the formula can be poured under running water to create an energising soak, or can be massaged directly into skin for a gentle yet effective cleanse. The shower gel combines Mandarin Red and Grapefruit Essential Oils to invigorate the mind and body, whilst a calming addition of Bitter Orange naturally cleanses the skin, without stripping essential oils and moisture.
Expect clean, comfortable and ultra-soft skin that is enhanced with an uplifting fragrance.

name: Body Exfoliating Gel (300ml)
product_description:
The radiance revealing Jurlique Body Exfoliating Gel will become a firm favourite with soft skin junkies! The skin smoothing exfoliating gel is great for the body as it uncovers gorgeously glowing, soft and supple skin!
Jurlique values life, energy and beauty, all of which can be found in the Body Exfoliating Gel. Rich in herbal antioxidants and gentle walnut shell it lifts away dead skin cells and impurities to leave you with nothing but radiant skin from head to toe!

name: Herbology Detox Botanical Bathing Infusion 150ml
product_description:
Uplift your senses with Elemental Herbology Detox Botanical Bathing Infusion. Formulated with beautiful flower extracts, this healing blend will leave you feeling cleansed and revitalised.
Elemental Herbology Detox Botanical Bathing Infusion contains wonderful juniper berry, rosemary and geranium which works in synergy with your body and environment to reduce fluid retention, invigorate circulation and eliminate toxins that can form as cellulite. You’ll be left feeling positively energised and revived whilst softening and nourishing the skin.
