name: ISSA™ Mint Tongue Cleaner Attachment Head
product_description:
The FOREO Tongue Cleaner Attachment Head in 'Mint' is suitable for any ISSA™ device and brings a finishing touch of hygiene to your everyday, oral care routine.
Crafted from non-porous silicone and curved to adapt to the shape of your tongue, the tongue cleaner delivers a deep and gentle cleanse, sweeping away bacteria with a non-abrasive action.  
Helping you achieve a healthier mouth and super-fresh breath, the attachment head resists bacteria build-up and only needs replacing once a year. Its flexibility prevents the application of too much pressure during use, and its innovative design inhibits the 'gag' effect.

name: Lavender Relaxing Bath Milk (200ml)
product_description:
Designed for use with a long fragrant soak in the evening, before bed, the Weleda Lavender Relaxing Bath Milk (200ml) is the ideal therapy for over-stimulation, restlessness and mental exhaustion. Working to harmonise and soothe your senses, this bath milk will reduce any tension in your joints and help to promote a peaceful night’s sleep. - E.D
- Shake the bottle before use.
- Pour 2 - 3 capfuls into running water.

name: Health MGO 250+ Manuka Honey Plus Aloe Vera 250g
product_description:
Manuka Health MGO™ 250+ Manuka Honey Plus Aloe Vera is a unique blend of two trusted, natural ingredients designed to maintain digestive health and support wound healing and healthy skin.
Formulated with MGO™ 250+ Manuka Honey, the creamy formula is 100% natural and has effective and reliable antibacterial properties due to the naturally occurring, active compound Methylglyoxal. The honey contains a concentration of ACTIValoe™ Gel equivalent to one litre of Premium Aloe Vera juice and has an unlimited shelf life with no preservatives.

name: Skin Nourishing Milk Bath (400ml)
product_description:
With a unique balancing formula that leaves the skin feeling intensely nourished, Elemis Skin Nourishing Milk Bath has special milk protein base and is rich in vitamins to make your skin satin soft and in perfect harmony.
Give your skin the royal treatment with Elemis Skin Nourishing Milk Bath. Blended with amino acids, minerals, japanese camellia oil and oat extract for a decadent skin pampering experience, this wonderful milk bath will deeply moisturise and envelop your body in sheer moisture.
Directions of use:

name: Aid Beauty Skin Rescue Body Bar (150g)
product_description:
Catering specifically for acne-prone or oily skin, the First Aid Beauty Skin Rescue Body Bar eliminates impurities from top to toe without over-drying or irritation.
Fortified with purifying Red Clay, the body bar creates a luxurious lather upon contact with water to banish dirt, oil and pore-clogging debris, whilst Rosemary Leaf Oil delivers astringent properties to minimise body breakouts. Moisturising Glycerin provides superior hydration so you can experience refreshed, revitalised skin with an invigorating herbal fragrance.

name: Spa Factory Fig and Vanilla Body Wash
product_description: Refresh and cleanse skin with the Fig and Vanilla Body Wash from Natural Spa Factory. Combining the alluring earthy tones of Fig with the delectable sweetness of Vanilla, the sulphate-free body wash is formulated with naturally-extracted Coco Glucoside for an indulgent creamy lather and Vitamin-E rich Tocopherol for powerful antioxidant protection. Suitable for daily use, skin is left feeling moisturised, softened and purified.

name: Spa Factory Wild Lavender, Comfrey and Aloe Body Wash
product_description:
Help skin to feel refreshed and soothed with the Wild Lavender, Comfrey and Aloe Body Wash from Natural Spa Factory. Packed with a blend of soothing, nourishing and cleansing ingredients, the wash is both gentle and intensely nourishing, leaving skin with a clean Lavender aroma.
Enriched with Comfrey oil, the formula boasts high levels of Allantoin, described as a healing substance that encourages cell growth. The body wash also contains Aloe Vera, renowned for its nourishing properties. The wash will leave the body feeling cleansed and refreshed.

name: Black All Over Wash 975ml - Super Size
product_description: A multi-purpose mild wash that works to get rid of dirt and sweat without over stripping the skin and hair of essential natural oils. This all-in-one body wash, facial cleanser and conditioning hair shampoo creates a thick, rich lather while Botanicals give a fresh scent without being too fragranced or heavy.

name: & Oil Nourish & Nurture Eye Make Up Remover 50ml
product_description: Cleanse and refresh the delicate eye area with the Nourish & Nurture Eye Make Up Remover from You & Oil. Harnessing the powers of Apricot, Castor and Rice Kernel Oils, the lightweight formula gently dissolves all traces of make up without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness. Promotes strong, healthy lashes, whilst purifying and softening sensitive skin around the eyes.

name: Dennis Gross Alpha Beta Glow Lotion for Body (5oz)
product_description:
Achieve a subtle, sunkissed glow with Dr Dennis Gross Alpha Beta Glow Lotion for Body, a self-tanning moisturiser that delivers natural-looking colour with a host of anti-ageing and hydrating ingredients.
Developing within 1-3 hours of application, the lightweight lotion (rich in antioxidants and exfoliants) utilises encapsulated tanning agents that penetrate the skin's surface to create a subtle 'candlelit' glow that withstands fading. Its dose of Caffeine and Soy Protein work in tandem to perform a firming effect whilst enhancing luminosity, and CapisloTM minimises hair texture, length and growth to help reduce shaving frequency. Skin appears tanned, toned and youthfully radiant.

name: Enamel Serum Refill 32ml
product_description:
Increase the effectiveness of the Advanced Toothpaste with the Enamel Serum from Regenerate. One step in the Enamel Science Boosting Serum Kit, the Enamel Serum Refill is designed to replace the Boosting Serum once finished, in order to continue use with the kit.
The exclusive Boosting Serum maximises the power of Enamel Mineral Regeneration, even in interdental spaces that are hard to reach. Utilising NR-5™ technology and fluoride, the Boosting Serum helps provide focused protection for teeth against the unwanted effects of early enamel erosion and acid attacks.
When combined with the Activator Gel, the next step within the kit, the serum unleashes a concentrated boost of the formula, helping to visibly reverse the early enamel erosion process.

name: Ultimate Foam Collection - Fair/Medium
product_description:
Give the gift of a long-lasting, sun-kissed tan with this gift set from MONU. Whether you want to treat a friend, family member or yourself, the TANWORX Ultimate Self Tanning Collection Light is the ideal package to create a flawless, yet even tan. - K.R
TANWORX Exfoliating Cream
Prep your skin for an even tan with this gentle yet effective exfoliating cream. It instantly boost skin tone and texture, removing dead skin cells to reveal a smooth canvas ready to apply your TANWORX Self Tanning Foam.
TANWORX Self Tanning Foam - Light
The lightweight tinted foam glides onto skin, giving an instant bronzed glow so you can see where to apply the product. The tan develops and darkens over the course of 3 hours, leaving you with a light sunkissed, natural looking tan. The no-drip formula provides a streak-free tan that quickly dries, allowing you to get on with your day as the tan develops. *Wait 8 hours after application before showering or bathing. 
TANWORX Tan Maintainer
A fresh and hydrating moisturiser, it slows down the natural exfoliating process but restoring hydration, meaning a prolonged tan. Apply the same as your usual moisturiser to enhance and maintain your tan.
TANWORX Tanning Mitt
Apply your tanning products quickly and easily without worrying about staining your hands. The tanning mitt has been made with a special formula-resistant barrier, protecting hands and wrists from staining. The soft mitt provides an even, streak-free tan with every product, which can then be put into the washing machine to clean when you're done.

name: Fico d'India Single Soap (40g)
product_description:
Classically luxurious and lusciously nourishing, the Fico D'india Olive Oil Single Soap by Ortigia is the perfect addition for bath time bliss. Enriched with a blend of moisturising almond oil and milk proteins, this soap will leave you squeaky clean and smooth. - R.H
Ortiga is a small Italian soap and scent company, which was founded in Sicily in 2006 by Sue Townsend. Using only natural products and inspired by the aesthetics, colours and scents of Sicily, the brand delivers a range of luxurious soaps, scents, creams, candles and lotions.

name: Dailycare Deodorant Spray Effective 24H (60ml)
product_description:
BAKEL stands for ethical, high quality skincare products. Cruelty free and vegan, the products are suitable for all skin types and are clinically proven as well.
The Dailycare deodorant works for 24 hours so you can count on safety from odours and sweat all day and night. It works in harmony with the sensible armpit area and therefore does not disturb natural gland processes. Very sensitive skin benefits from the alcohol, fragrance and aluminium free formula while natural antibacterial agents effectively fight unpleasant body odours. Peppermint and eucalyptus oils give the product a refreshing quality. LB

name: Pointer Tweezers
product_description:
Preen and perfect brows with the Rubis Pointer Tweezers. Handmade in Switzerland from surgical stainless steel, the high-quality tweezers feature precision tips that expertly remove anything embedded underneath the skin, such as splinters and ingrown hairs.
Crafted with superior calibrated tension and perfectly aligned tips that close evenly and firmly for advanced pulling power, you can grip even the smallest of hairs for a professional, airbrushed finish. Acid-proof, anti-magnetic and rustproof. Sterilisable for ultimate hygiene.

name: Heavenly Body Oil
product_description: Indulge in ultimate relaxation with Antipodes Heavenly Body Oil.  Including a mix of lavender, rosewood, ylang ylang and jasmine, the light, organic oil will rejuvenate your skin's apperance and gently moisturise your skin. -SA

name: Hydrabody Hydrating and Soothing Body Cream (200ml)
product_description:
BAKEL stands for ethical, high quality skincare products. Cruelty free and vegan, the products are suitable for all skin types and are clinically proven as well.
This moisturising and calming body cream contains all natural ingredients such as soothing Aloe Vera juice as well as oils and butters including Murumuru and Tacuma butter to provide softening, nourishing and energising effects. It absorbs immediately for highly hydrated, supple and elastic skin. Ingredients such as Trelahose give a refreshing effect and free radicals are being targeted by vitamin E, a natural antioxidant. Additionally the vitamin strengthens the cell membrane whilst the cream is free from colorants, artificial fragrances, alcohol, sulphates, silicones and preservatives.
Directions for Use:  Apply Hydrabody all over the body gently massaging it in until completely absorbed, one or more times a day.

name: Associates Support Equilibrium Bath & Shower Oil (55ml)
product_description:
Balance your emotions and lift your spirits with this special Aromatherapy Associates Support Equilibrium Bath & Shower Oil blend. Just add a capful to your bath or apply to your body and rejoice in your sense of peacefulness.
If you're taking too much of the rough with the smooth, then this is a hug in a bottle to balance those mood swings and low days and bring on the happy hormones! Aromatherapy Associates Support Equilibrium Bath & Shower Oil contains geranium, rose, frankincense, pink grapefruit, bergamot and coconut oil to bring you back to your senses!
Directions of Use:
Lookfantastic notes:Not recommended for use during pregnancyStore this oil in the box or away from direct lightOnce opened, this product is best used within 6 months

name: Denny Time Repair Anti-Ageing Hand Therapy 75ml
product_description:
Treat hands and cuticles to the Leighton Denny Time Repair Anti-Ageing Hand Therapy; a deeply nourishing formula that works to soften, condition and protect skin.
Harnessing the moisturising powers of Shea Butter, Hyaluronic Acid and an innovative Timecode™ Complex, the fast-absorbing cream helps to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, whilst defending against sun damage and improving elasticity. A blend of Sweet Almond, Plum and Avocado Oils leave hands soft, supple and youthful-looking.

name: Sun Protect Serum 100ml
product_description:
Shield skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays with the men's FIT Sun Protect Serum SPF 50; a water-resistant, non-greasy formula that creates a breathable, protective layer on the face to prevent damage.
Powered by OXY-FIT-10 (the brand's innovative oxygen delivery system), the fast-absorbing sunscreen promotes cell regeneration, whilst anti-inflammatory Calendula Extract and Hyaluronic Acid are combined to soothe and hydrate skin for long-lasting comfort.
An effective blend of Zinc Oxide, antioxidant Vitamin E and encapsulated Titanium Dioxide reflect the sun's rays and pollution, allowing you to experience the ultimate in sun protection without white marks or sticky residue. Skin is fresh, energised and healthy-looking with even coverage.

name: Brown Extra Rich Bai Ji Hydrator
product_description:
Quench dry skin with Molton Brown Extra-rich Bai Ji Hydrator, a decadent moisturiser for men that works to intensely hydrate skin.
Infused with Bai Ji extract and Macadamia Seed oil, the face cream expertly moisturises the complexion whilst imparting a lively fragrance powered by zesty Fruits, cooling Peppermint and Musk.

name: ISSA™ mini - Mango Tango
product_description:
Helping children to find brushing teeth a fun activity, FOREO ISSA™ mini is a silicone brush to protect gums and leave your child's mouth thoroughly clean. Featuring parental controls to ensure twice daily brushing, the sad face will appear if teeth have not been brushed for over 12 hours, whilst the happy face will light up when teeth have been brushed for 2 minutes. The brush has 2 speeds and will last up to 200 uses before losing its charge.
Features soft and gentle silicone bristles to create just the right amount of friction and 3D flexibility that helps the brush to reach awkward areas of the mouth. The brush has a pulsing action that will inform you when it's time to polish another quadrant of the mouth for thorough cleaning. -SA
Please Note: A USB charger is included, and not a mains adapter. Also, the brush head only needs to be replaced once a year.

name: Organic (500mg)
product_description:
Fuel your body with Spirulina Organic, a protein-packed source of daily energy that helps to combat fatigue and support a healthy immune system.
Widely known as a 'superfood', Spriulina is a micro-algae with powerful antioxidant, omega and protective properties that helps to maintain healthy skin and immune
functions. Rich in Vitamin B12 and A, the greens have been carefully dried out to increase nutrient density, and formed into a vegetarian capsule to make it easily accessible for a modern diet. Helping to fuel active lifestyles and support the immune system, the organic Spirulina formula is easily absorbed into the body and delivers full nutritional benefits.

name: Neck and Shoulder Massager with Heat - Black
product_description:
Ease aches and tension with the HoMedics Neck and Shoulder Massager with Heat; a powerful, transportable device that utilises a vibration massage technique.
The padded massager has been designed with comfort in mind, fitting snugly around the contours of your neck with looped handles either side to adjust the intensity on a certain spot for targeted treatment.
Two speed settings customise the experience, with a low, soft vibration for dull aches and an increased strength alternative running across the length and width of the cushion, with an additional heat function to soothe and comfort.     
Boasting integrated controls for ease of use, the convenient massager is ideal for use at home or on the go to alleviate muscle pain and stiffness with the option to use with mains operation or batteries.

name: Boxed Body Wash Infused Buffer Duo - Bourbon Vanilla
product_description:
Experience a massaging cleanse with the Spongellé Body Wash Infused Buffer Duo in 'Bourbon Vanilla', two cleansing sponges enriched with an age-defying, antioxidant-rich, time-released body wash.
Utilising Moisturising Oil Proprietary Infusion Technology that offers a guaranteed number of washes (over 30), each saturated buffer expertly cleanses, moisturises and boosts circulation; extracts of Yuzu, Edelweiss and Vetiver work in synergy to lift away impurities whilst softening and hydrating from head to toe. The unique surface changes as you squeeze, from a gentle exfoliator to a soft, silky sponge with rich and creamy lather that leaves skin feeling smooth, purified and revitalised with restored elasticity. Infused with a velvety vanilla fragrance. Housed in a gift box.

name: Body Contouring Infused Buffer - Beach Grass
product_description:
Target cellulite with the Spongellé Body Contouring Infused Buffer; a dual-sided exfoliating sponge with a built-in cleanser that polishes, massages and detoxifies for skin that feels firmer and revitalised.
Rich in vitamins and antioxidants, the buffer has been fortified with Green Coffee extract – widely considered to be one of the most powerful ingredients in alleviating the look of cellulite and dimpled skin. Delivering high levels of Chlorgenic Acid and Caffeine, it stimulates cell renewal and effectively helps prevent fat accumulation for a lifting effect.
Complete with the addition of marine-extracted Sea Kelp, skin is shielded from ageing free radical damage and UV radiation. Imbuing skin with a delicate ‘Beach Grass’ scent of sun-kissed Oranges, invigorating Ocean Breeze and delicate Water Lily, achieve cleansed, softened and toned skin with a renewed youthful vitality.

name: Shimmer Body Wash Infused Buffer - Pearl Blossom
product_description:
Add a touch of sparkle to your bathing routine with the Shimmer Body Wash Infused Buffer from Spongellé; a multi-tasking, multi-use sponge that cleanses, exfoliates and pampers skin all-in-one.
Harnessing proprietary Infusion Technology, the body buffer creates an indulgent, time-released lather with a built-in, subtly iridescent body wash. Enriched with extracts of Yuzu, Edelweiss and Vetiver, it gently exfoliates the surface layer while infusing essential moisture and nutrients for a softened, smooth and supple texture. Complete with a delicate Pearl-based scent, skin feels polished and revitalised with a radiant glow.

name: Artisan Tweezer - Slant Silver
product_description:
The Artisan Slant Tip Tweezer in Silver from Japonesque is the professional choice for eliminating stray hairs and is precision crafted for perfect balance and alignment.
The brushed stainless steel tool is finished with a deep, rich enamel coating for a great in-hand feel. Constructed with a hand-filed precision tip, this tweezer is designed for flawless extraction and expert hair removal.
Use tweezer point for smaller and slanted side for general tweezing.

name: Real Body Cream - Orange Amber
product_description: Restore moisture and obtain soft skin with this easy to spread Musgo Real Body Cream. Glycerin, olive and almond oil extracts blended with shea butter make the perfect hydrating formula for tired or tight, dry skin. Together with the distinctive, masculine fragrance of orange amber, it will keep your skin feeling nourished. E.N.

name: Men's Shower Gel 200ml
product_description:
Get off to a fresh start with the Men Active Shower Gel, an energising, all-natural body wash from holistic cosmetic brand Weleda.
Ideal first thing in the morning or after sports activities, the invigorating formula combines natural cleansing agents with essential oils, working to slough away daily dirt and odour without stripping away moisture. Rosemary, Lemon and Vetiver imbue a unique masculine fragrance, leaving skin feeling clean, revitalised and balanced.

name: Moroccan Rose Otto Bath Oil (110ml)
product_description:
Bring the luxury of the Queen of Flower Oils to your bath with REN Moroccan Rose Otto Bath Oil. Containing one of the world’s most expensive and revered oils, its exquisite, sensual scent will uplift your mood while relieving stress.
Using only 100% natural fragrances and being free from harsh sulphates and synthetic colours, the REN Moroccan Rose Otto Bath Oil soothes and relaxes you while caring for your skin simultaneously.
REN products are also free from many artificial ingredients such as petrochemicals, sulfates, parabens, synthetic fragrance, synthetic colours, T.E.A, D.E.A, glycols silicones and pegs.
Directions of use:

name: Liberata Trystal Pressed Self Tanning Bronzing Minerals - Bronze
product_description:
Achieve glowing perfection with the Vita Liberata Trystal Pressed Self Tanning Bronzing Minerals; a long-wearing bronzing powder with a natural-looking, matte finish.
Infused with organic DHA actives and innovative Trystal3™ technology, the pressed powder glides effortlessly over the skin to define your favourite facial features whilst enhancing natural radiance to reveal a luminous glow. Can be applied over moisturiser and foundation for an all-over flush of colour.

name: Life Elixirs Clarity and Sleep Wellbeing Duo 20ml
product_description:
Improve concentration and encourage deep sleep with the Elemis Life Elixirs Clarity and Sleep Wellbeing Duo; two miniature bath and shower oils that leave skin nourished and delicately scented. Simply apply to running bath water, or to the body whilst showering and each silky oil will deliver a different effect, from clearing the mind to delivering a sense of calm.
Clarity Bath & Shower Elixir (10ml)
Clear your mind with the Bath and Shower Clarity Elixir; an energising bath and shower oil that conditions and fragrances skin, whilst allowing you to invigorate your sense of self. Combining Bitter Orange, Cardamom and Ginger, the refreshing yet warming fragrance seeks to sharpen concentration and prepare you for the day or evening ahead.
Sleep Bath & Shower Elixir (10ml)
Experience a deeply relaxing soak with the Sleep Bath and Shower Elixir; a luxurious bath and shower oil that conditions and fragrances skin, whilst helping you to feel well rested. Utilising 13 pure essential oils, including Elemi and Palmarosa in a skin-conditioning base of Amaranth and Bacuri Oil, the soothing fragrance envelops the body in a veil of calm, which promote a good night’s sleep.

name: Moist Foaming Soap 160g
product_description:
Refresh and cleanse with the RMK Moist Foaming Soap. Transforming into a rejuvenating lather upon application, the carbonated-foam formula sweeps away dirt, oil and impurities while helping boost blood circulation for polished and refined skin.
Enriched with moisturising extracts from Japanese Sake and Rooibos, it delivers a cocktail of beneficial nutrients and antioxidants as well as an uplifting fruity scent. Skin is left feeling soft, smooth and hydrated with a healthy looking vitality.

name: Ferragamo Signorina Body Lotion 200ml
product_description:
This body lotion from Salvatore Ferragamo is a luxurious and rich texture that moistures the skin with the irresistible and sensually cheeky scent of "Signorina"
"Signorina" celebrates the finesse of Italian elegance and sophistication. It uses an uplifting blend of floral and fruity notes and will delight your day with an air of sweetness and joy. - N.P.

name: Evening Primrose Body Oil (100ml)
product_description:
The Evening Primrose range by Weleda is an award winning skincare series for women aged 56+. Instead of providing an anti-ageing effect, these products make mature skin look alive, a process Weleda calls “Age Revitalising”. With Evening Primrose they tone and hydrate the skin whilst boosting its radiance and metabolism.
Try for yourself and discover the Evening Primrose Body Oil’s smoothing, moisturising and truly rejuvenating effects. Ingredients such as Jojoba Oil and Wheat Germ Oil give mature skin elasticity and help it to retain more moisture resulting in smoother, more supple skin. LB
Suitable for vegans.

name: She Wood (Hydration)² Body Wash (200ml)
product_description:
DSquared<sup>2</sup> SHE WOOD Body Wash is not sweet and girly but modern and feminine. A body wash that hydrates and softens to evoke sensuality and passion, nature, freedom, and life.
Dsquared<sup>2</sup> SHE WOOD Body Wash is directed toward a woman that is vibrant and vivacious, delicate, nature loving, at times quite distant, and someone who loves to cast her own light, dreaming of losing herself there as she seeks freedom and new emotions.
Directions of use:

name: Paris Men Expert Deodorant 50ml Invincible 96 Hours
product_description:
Get extreme protection that lasts with the L’Oréal Men Expert Invincible 96 Hour Deodorant Roll On. With an ultra fresh and invigorating fragrance, this extra large roll on delivers active ingredients directly to the skin to keep you protected against odour.
L’Oréal Men Expert Invincible 96 Hour Deodorant Roll On uses high performance technology for anti-odour protection that lasts for up to 96 hours! Whatever your lifestyle, and whatever your challenge, stay protected against wetness and odour for longer with L’Oréal Men Expert.

name: Hand Repairing Gloves (1 Mask)
product_description:
Care for hardworking hands with the MAGICSTRIPES Hand Repairing Gloves; a pair of moisturising gloves that repair and nourish skin in just 20-30 minutes.
Formulated with a blend of Natural Extracts, Active Molecules, Shea Butter and Olive Oil, the gloves envelop skin in essential moisture, whilst working to stimulate the skin’s natural renewal process, and reveal visibly firmer and softer skin. The gloves also boast anti-ageing benefits due to Hydrolysed Collagen, which has ability to gently reduce the appearance of age spots, fine lines and wrinkles.
Expect comfortably hydrated hands that are soft, smooth and refreshed.

name: Moisturising Lotion 150ml
product_description: Catering specifically for normal to dry skin, the MÁDARA Moisturising Lotion works to replenish, hydrate and protect the body. Infused with Chamomile, Calendula and Plantain Extracts, the fast-absorbing, certified organic body lotion deeply moisturises and conditions skin, whilst improving suppleness to leave the body feeling soft, smooth and comfortable.

name: Bees Almond & Milk Hand Cream 57g
product_description:
Rejuvenate tired hands with the Burt's Bees Almond & Milk Hand Cream; a super rich formula that works to hydrate, soften and shield skin.
Enriched with a nourishing blend of Sweet Almond Oil, Beeswax and Vitamin E, the 99.9% natural cream absorbs quickly into skin to condition and replenish moisture, whilst delivering a luxurious, nutty scent. Ideal for dry elbows, knees and feet.

name: Life Elixirs Calm Bath and Shower Elixir 100ml
product_description:
Soothe the mind, body and soul with the Elemis Life Elixirs Calm Bath and Shower Elixir; a luxurious bath and shower oil that conditions and fragrances skin, whilst encouraging feelings of relaxation.
Blending 15 essential oils, including Clary Sage, Lavandin and Rosewood, the calming fragrance seeks to create an oasis of calm and tranquillity to provide sanctuary for the mind. Simply apply to running bath water, or to the body whilst showering and the silky oil will deliver a soothing effect.
Skin is nourished, moisturised and delicately scented.

name: The Ritual of Sakura Hand Wash (300ml)
product_description: Gently cleanse hands with The Ritual of Sakura Hand Wash from Rituals. Infused with nourishing and natural Rice milk, its soap-free formula effortlessly eliminates impurities without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness. Complete with a pump bottle for mess-free application, hands are left fresh, supple and subtly fragranced with relaxing notes of Cherry Blossom.

name: Wellness Body Lotion (240ml)
product_description:
The Natio Wellness Body Lotion is a gorgeous light and silky lotion that heals skin and restores moisture to leave skin looking luminous.
Made using pomegranate, aloe vera and vitamin E the Natio Wellness Body Lotion promotes healthy, soft and smooth complexion.
Directions of use:

name: Instant Tan Self-Tan Lotion Dark 170ml
product_description:
Achieve a deep, sun-kissed glow with the Instant Tan Self-Tan Lotion Dark from ModelCo. Ideal for those seeking a dark and intense self-tan, the formula guarantees an instant and hydrating golden glow. Suitable for sensitive skin types.
Enriched with a skin-loving blend of antioxidants, including Argan oil, Aloe Vera and Coconut oil, the formula delivers hydration to skin, alongside a bronzed glow. The tan is both lightweight and non-greasy, gliding effortlessly over skin to deliver instant, long-lasting and streak-free results. As well as providing instant colour, the lotion boasts a developer that deepens the glow over the first 4-6 hours after application.
Utilising innovative fragrance technology, ‘Instant Tan Self-Tan Lotion’ offers a refreshing scent of Cocoa Butter, instead of the usual tell-tale tanning aroma. The tan is compete with Shea butter, Vitamin E and Cocoa butter, which work in synergy to moisturise and nourish skin, leaving the face and body healthy-looking and golden.

name: Jacobs Daisy Eau So Fresh Body Lotion (150ml)
product_description: Moisturise your skin with this Marc Jacobs Daisy Eau So Fresh Body Lotion; a hydrating body lotion lightly scented with the fruity, floral Daisy Eau So Fresh fragrance. The creamy, scented lotion leaves skin feeling soft, supple and moisturised, and faintly fragranced with the scent of Raspberry, Grapefruit, Rose and Plum. – E.W.

name: Rich Cream Milk for the Body (200ml)
product_description:
Achieve soft, supple skin with Embryolisse Rich Cream Milk for the Body, a dual-action formula that works to nourish and repair dry to very dry skin.
Deeply moisturising, the milk combines natural origin ingredients, including shea butter, beeswax and sandalwood and barley oil to alleviate discomfort and leave the skin feeling smooth, soothed and toned. Upon application, your skin will feel softer and healthier.  - K.N.

name: Earth's Best Diaper Relief Ointment (113g)
product_description:
Hypo-allergenic and fragrance free, JASON Earth’s Best Baby Care Diaper Relief Ointment provides a moisture barrier between baby’s skin and wetness to prevent irritation and chaffing whilst soothing their delicate skin.
JASON Earth’s Best Baby Care helps to heal nappy rash quicker and prevents outbreaks of nappy rash in the first place. Containing soothing aloe vera and vitamin E, this ointment works to comfort your baby’s delicate skin.
Directions of use:

name: pH Powder - 150g
product_description:
Developed for those wishing to follow a low acid diet, the Ocean pH Powder forms a very high 10.5 pH alkaline when added to a small glass of water.
Synergising a blend of natural minerals, including Calcium, Magnesium, Iron, Zinc, Selenium and Iodine, the supplement helps to reduce muscle tension and cramps, whilst Red Marine Algae (ethically harvested from the ocean floor at the end of its life cycle) is particularly beneficial for the build-up of Lactic Acid in muscles. Ideal for heartburn, acid reflux and post-exercise.

name: Exfoliating Hand Treatment 100ml
product_description:
Deeply cleanse and protect hands with the Exfoliating Hand Treatment from Jurlique. The two in one formula works as both a mask and a scrub for beautifully soft and smooth hands.
Formulated with a blend of White and Red Clay which work harmoniously to absorb impurities and leave behind visibly clear skin. The Hand Treatment contains Jojoba beads which gently and effectively exfoliate hands, eliminating any rough patches and a rich combination of Shea Butter and Calendula Extract nourish and protect the skin. Resulting in beautifully conditioned hands.

name: - Plumping Lip Balm (15ml)
product_description: The ARK Plumping Lip Balm (15ml) is more than your every day lip balm. Containing allantoin to heal and soothe chapped lips, macadamia wax to lock in moisture, and plumping peptides to increase lip volume, the Plumping Lip Balm gives your lips a natural makeover. - K.R

name: Flaw-Less Blemish Repair Serum 100ml
product_description:
Show your skin who's boss with FIT's Flaw-Less Blemish Repair Serum, a fast-acting formula that works to combat the look of scars, blemishes and stretch marks on the skin.
Created specially for men, the serum is enriched with moisturising essential oils and soothing botanical extracts and melts quickly into skin, delivering reparative properties to leave skin with a more even tone. Utilising OXY-FIT-10 technology, the lightweight serum helps boost cell regeneration so your skin feels fresh and renewed. - K.N.

name: Dante Paradiso Tropicale Tahitian Lime and Mosambi Peel Soap 250g
product_description:
Drift away to a tranquil, sandy beach with Nesti Dante Paradiso Tropicale Tahitian Lime and Mosambi Peel Soap, a perfumed cleansing bar that has been crafted using the old craft saponification method of boiling in a cauldron.
Developed in Florence with high quality ingredients, the natural, vegetable-based soap gently cleanses and purifies your skin to leave the body feeling soft and supple; it transforms into a rich lather that eliminates impurities whilst imparting an energising and tropical Citrus fragrance. The triple milled soap is embossed and wrapped in elegant, decorative paper.

name: Dante Il Frutteto Black Cherry and Red Berries Soap 250g
product_description: Treat your skin and senses to the Il Frutteto Black Cherry and Red Berries Soap from Nesti Dante. Crafted in Florence using traditional methods and natural ingredients, the vegetable-based soap gently cleanses and rejuvenates, whilst moisturising and providing antioxidant protection to leave skin feeling soft and supple. Housed in decorative packaging, the soap bar makes an ideal gift for yourself or a loved one.

name: Konjac Sponge Company Deluxe Travel Pack Duo with French Pink Clay
product_description:
The Konjac Sponge Company presents the 100% Pure Deluxe Travel Pack Duo, a pair of 100% naturally sustainable sponges delicately handmade purely from moisture-rich Konjac plant fibres and Volcanic Water. Presented in a soft travel bag with a mesh drying pouch included, you can sail through airport security with these in your hand luggage and keep refreshed and cleansed throughout your travels.
Enriched with soothing French Pink Clay, they’re perfect for dry, sensitive skin and helps to soothe irritations and add a burst of moisture. The innovative biodegradable sponge has a unique net-like structure that turns silky soft when wet and works to deeply cleanse and gently exfoliate; eliminating impurities and stimulating blood flow and cell renewal.
Konjac is a natural wonder – it’s been used in Southern Asia for over 1,500 years as a medicinal and beauty treatment, and it is alkaline based thus balances any acidity in skin and restores optimum pH levels.
Lasting for up to 3 months, the sponges are suitable for use with or without a cleanser. Simply add water and experience an all-natural, rejuvenating cleanse that will leave skin feeling smooth, hydrated and restored.
The Duo Contains:
1 x Facial Puff Sponge with French Pink Clay
1 x 6 Wave Bath Sponge with French Pink Clay

name: Supersalt Himalayan Body Cleanse
product_description: Westlab's Supersalt Himalayan Body Cleanse detoxifies, revitalises and rebalances the mind and body. Originating from the Himalayan Mountains millions of years ago, the mineral-rich bath salts leave skin feeling toned and radiant, whilst a therapeutic blend of Seaweed, Rose and Lemon promote a sense of well-being. Simply dissolve the salts in a warm bath and enjoy a relaxing, restorative soak.

name: Home Spa Massage Cream - Moisturizing 250ml
product_description:
Nourish skin with the Moisturizing Home Spa Massage Cream from PUPA. The rich, velvet-smooth formula effortlessly melts into skin, perfect for an indulgent massage with aromatherapy benefits.
Infused with emollient-rich White Lily extract, it cocoons skin in a soft veil of familiarity and comfort, imbued with the subtly spiced note of Natural Clove Oil. Skin feels hydrated, smooth and sumptuously supple while the mind succumbs to a sense of wellbeing and relaxation.

name: Island Apothecary Unwind Bath Foam (300ml)
product_description:
The perfect treat at the end of a stressful day, Seascape Island Apothecary Unwind Bath Foam (300ml) will help you to unwind. Formulated with an expert blend of 100% natural essential oils, it contains soothing lavender, as well as ylang ylang which balances your mind and eases tension.
Suitable for use whilst pregnant, the bath foam is free from parabens, silicones and artificial colours and fragrances. Ideal for evening use, the aromatic blend of oils can also help to promote restful sleep. - L.M.
Directions of Use:  Pour a small amount under running water.

name: Choice Digestive Enzyme Blend Travel Pack - 21 Caps
product_description:
Udo's Choice Digestive Enzyme Blend Travel Pack is a carefully selected cocktail of 7 plant based digestive enzymes that have been encapsulated in an easy-to-swallow capsule to help aid healthy digestion and nutrient absorption.
Digestive enzymes are important because they break down the foods we eat for our bodies to then absorb. All too often, naturally occurring enzymes are lost during the preparation and cooking process, which can be detrimental to our health. To help combat this, the capsules combine a carefully balanced selection of digestive enzymes to help replace lost enzymes and aid full digestion of fats, carbohydrates, protein and fibre. Helping to reduce bloating and digestive complaints, the capsules expertly break down and metabolise every food type to ensure your insides feels happy and comfortable.
175 mg of pure vegetable source enzyme blend with the following guaranteed activity:

name: Wild Cow - Invigorating Body Lotion (300ml)
product_description:
Cowshed’s Wild Cow Invigorating Body Lotion will hydrate your skin and leave it feeling totally revitalised. Enriched with naturally moisturising cocoa butter and vitamin E, an antioxidant that helps protect the skin from signs of premature ageing.
The Wild Cow Invigorating Body Lotion from Cowshed is a fresh blend of essential oils to leave you revitalised. Lemongrass refreshes and cleanses, ginger improves vitality, and rosemary sharpens the mind. Suitable for men and women, it contains no parabens, no petrochemicals and is free from sulphates, artificial fragrances and colours. It is suitable for vegetarians and has not been tested on animals.
Directions of use:

name: Wild Rose Ribbon Box (Worth £35)
product_description:
Treat yourself or a loved one to Weleda's Wild Rose Ribbon Box. Combines a creamy body wash, skin-softening body lotion and floral fragrance spray, all wrapped in a branded gift box.
Wild Rose Creamy Body Wash (200ml)
A luxurious body wash developed to calm and restore skin for long-lasting comfort. Gently cleanses skin to eliminate dirt and impurities, whilst imparting a delicate, uplifting fragrance that stays on the skin for hours. Enriched with nourishing Rosehip Oil and Damask Rose Organic Essential Oil, you can expect perfectly pampered, silky soft skin that is protected from moisture loss.
Wild Rose Pampering Body Lotion (200ml)
Suitable for normal to dry skin types, the lightweight lotion absorbs quickly into the body to encourage the skin's natural regenerative process. A nourishing blend of Organic Wild Rose Oil, Jojoba Oil and Witch Hazel smoothens and softens the skin, whilst maintaining elasticity and replenishing moisture for skin that is comfortable all day long.
Jardin de Vie Rose (50ml)
A floral fragrance inspired by romance and poetry. Opening with notes of Rose and Geranium, the scent is enhanced by exotic Ylang- Ylang and balanced by powdery, spicy accords. Housed in a vibrant pink bottle, simply spritz onto skin to experience the harmonising, flowery fragrance.

name: Home Spa Scented Water - Invigorating 150ml
product_description:
Indulge the senses with the Invigorating Home Spa Scented Water from PUPA; a lightly scented, water-based spray with a fresh, citrus fragrance.
A harmonic blend of Orange, Bergamot and Neroil aromatherapy oils instil vigour and vitality, while Mint and Eucalyptus bring a refreshing burst. Notes of balasamic, wood and citrus oils are delicately layered for a unisex scent that creates a sense of wellbeing and lightness.

name: Choice Limited Edition Twin Pack Featuring Clean Eating Alice
product_description:
Udo’s Choice have teamed up with best-selling nutritional author Clean Eating Alice to bring you a Limited Edition Twin Pack combining two of your favourite supplements – the Super 8 Microbiotics and Digestive Enzymes Blend. Along with fitness tips and an at-home training plan, the set helps support and inspire your healthy lifestyle.
Super 8 Microbiotics (30 Capsules)
Super 8 Microbiotics are vegetarian capsules containing 8 strains of friendly bacteria to help counteract serious flora imbalance and promote good upper bowel health. Helping to replenish healthy gut flora and reduce painful gas, bloating and constipation, Super 8 Microbiotics contain 42 billion active bacteria per capsule and are beneficial for healthy digestion and immune function.
Gluten free.
Digestive Enzymes Blend (60 Capsules)
Digestive Enzyme Blend is a carefully selected cocktail of 7 plant based digestive enzymes that have been encapsulated in an easy-to-swallow capsule to help aid healthy digestion and nutrient absorption. The 100% plant based capsules combine a carefully balanced selection of digestive enzymes to help replace lost enzymes and aid full digestion of fats, carbohydrates, protein and fibre. Helping to reduce bloating and digestive complaints, the capsules expertly break down and metabolise every food type to ensure your insides feels happy and comfortable.
Gluten and dairy free.

name: Body Lotion Dry Skin (200ml)
product_description:
This Body Lotion for  Dry Skin from Nuxe works to deeply hydrate and nourish the skin.  Especially formulated for dry skin, this lotion is absorbed instantly  without leaving a greasy effect.
Restoring suppleness and silky soft texture, this lotion gives long lasting moisturisation, perfect for the whole body.

name: Samurai Shower Foam (200ml)
product_description:
Experience an invigorating cleanse with Rituals Samurai Shower Foam, a gel-to-foam formula dedicated to cleansing and nourishing the skin.
Inspired by Japanese warriors who took pride in their appearance to build power and confidence, the ultra-soft body wash blends Organic Bamboo with Cedar Wood to effectively cleanse away impurities whilst delivering a fresh fragrance. Specially developed to refresh and replenish the modern man.

name: Style+ Black Pepper & Bergamot Shower Gel 100ml - Define & Shine
product_description:
Show your skin and hair who's boss with the men-ü Style+ Black Pepper & Bergamot Shower Gel and Define & Shine. The pair work in synergy to leave your skin clean and fresh, and your hair styled to perfection.
Black Pepper & Bergamot Shower Gel (100ml):
An invigorating shower gel enriched with a host of active ingredients and moisturising agents to leave skin clean and refreshed. Transforming into a rich lather, the concentrated formula delivers Pro Vitamin B5 and Vitamin E to keep skin soft and protected. Infused with a spicy, fruity scent to energise the senses.
Define & Shine (100ml):
A unique hair pomade with medium hold and high shine. Perfect for fine and thin hair, the flexi-hold formula is smooth and lightweight, and holds your hair in place with a pliable feel. It also helps tone down the appearance of grey hairs. Suitable for all hair types and styles.

name: DIY Mani-Pedi Picks (Worth £84.50)
product_description:
Perfectly pamper your hands, body and feet with the DIY Mani-Pedi Picks from bliss. Housed in a blue branded bag, the trio combines a pair of skin-softening gloves and socks with a luxurious body butter.
bliss Glamour Gloves (One Pair)
Rejuvenate dry, over-worked hands with the super soft nylon gloves. Featuring a moisturising gel lining with olive and grapeseed oils, the treatment hydrates, replenishes and deeply moisturise hands to leave them smooth, supple and comfortable. Last up to fifty uses.
bliss Softening Socks (One Pair)
A twenty minute treatment for a professional at-home pedicure. With a hydrating gel lining infused with olive and grapeseed oils, the socks immediately soften tired feet, eliminating dryness, roughness and hard skin. Last up to fifty uses.
bliss Blood Orange and White Pepper Body Butter (50ml)
Developed to energise and replenish skin, this weightless butter hydrates the entire body from top to toe. Formulated with firming algae extract and arnica montana flower extract to support the skin's natural healing ability, whilst nourishing soybean smoothens and softens skin to leave it healthy-looking.

name: Island Apothecary Soothe Body Butter (175ml)
product_description:
Designed to relax and calm the skin, this Soothe Body Butter by Seascape Island Apothecary is a deeply moisturising butter containing unique and innovative ingredients that really work. Formulated with Jersey Beeswax, Shea Butter, Rosehip Seed Oil and Sweet Almond Oil, this body butter is rich in Omega 3, 6 and vitamin E to ensure your skin is left silky soft and supple.
Also working to reduce stretch marks and repair damaged skin, this Soothe Body Butter is pregnancy-safe and rich in essential oils that deeply nourish and moisturise the skin. Free from parabens, SLS and artificial colourings, your skin will be left healthy and supple. K.D.

name: Gentle Dermatological Cleansing Bar (100g)
product_description: Experience a luxurious lather with Embryolisse Gentle Dermatological Cleansing Bar, a soap-free formula that works to gently cleanse and enrich the skin. Ideal for those with dry or sensitive skin, the cleansing bar lathers into a rich foam and its emollient, softening agents help to smooth and soften the skin whilst cleansing the surface of grime and impurities. Expect soft, supple, comfortable skin. - K.N.

name: Citrus Limonum Hand Wash (300ml)
product_description:
Treat your hands to the luxurious REN Citrus Limonum Hand Wash. This sulphate-free, antibacterial hand wash gently cleanses your hands leaving a fresh, uplifting fragrance.
REN Citrus Limonum Hand Wash is formulated with organic Sicilian lemon oil known for its antibacterial properties and its fresh, uplifting fragrance. Gentle cleansing agents derived from corn, coconut and oat respect the skin and help prevent dryness.
Directions of use:

name: Bees Milk & Honey Body Lotion
product_description:
Perfectly pamper skin with the Burt's Bees Milk & Honey Body Lotion; a fast-absorbing, ultra-moisturising formula to replenish and rejuvenate from top to toe.
Infused with Coconut and Grape Seed Oils, the lightweight lotion softens and conditions normal to dry skin, whilst Milk, Honey and Vitamin E leave the body protected and naturally nourished. Expect smooth, subtly scented skin with no greasy or sticky residue.

name: Ultra-Rapid Cellulite White Mud Treatment (400g)
product_description:
PUPA Ultra-Rapid Cellulite White Mud Treatment aims to reduce the appearance of cellulite, the orange peel effect and water retention.
The treatment contains caffeine which favours the discharge of fats in adipose cells, helping to combat the unaesthetic effects of cellulite. The treatment also features Escine, which aims to help reduce the appearance of water retention therefore generating a progressive reduction in swelling. The natural Centella Asiatica extract stimulates the formation of new collagen, for more compact and toned looking skin.

name: Tropez Dark Bronzing Lotion (200ml)
product_description:
Experience St. Tropez's deepest tan with the Dark Bronzing Lotion, a quick-drying self-tan that adapts to your individual skin tone to create a natural-looking, intense, golden tan.
Easy to apply, the super-absorbent formula utilises revolutionary Melanin Technology to expertly tailor the results to your skin tone, and its dose of nourishing conditioners and antioxidants keep skin hydrated and protected, so your tan is prolonged and fades slowly and evenly. Helping you to achieve an even, streak-free glow, the rich yet lightweight lotion glides effortlessly across skin and develops into a deep, natural-looking tan with long-lasting finish; all this without that unmistakable fake tan smell thanks to Aromaguard™ Fragrance Technology. – K.N.

name: Skincare Strong Is The New Skinny Kit
product_description:
The Strong is the New Skinny Set by Mio Skincare will make your skin look as strong as you always wanted it to be. Mio Skincare stand for face quality ingredients in their body products so you will always receive the highest quality. With The Activist™, Double Buff™ and Future Proof™ this set will leave your skin looking smooth, glowing, even and strong.
The Activist™  Active Body Oil (30ml)
When we get older, our skin can lose some of its built-in ability to produce oil. The result is super dry skin. The Activist Active Body Oil contains nutrients which help to nourish your skin. Rich in antioxidants the oil can help to make your skin look more resilient. Of course it’s also suitable for super young, super dry skin.
Double Buff™ Dual Action Enzyme Exfoliator (50ml)
This Double Buff Enzyme Exfoliator polishes your skin without the use of any rough beads; Pumice, Lava and Bamboo blended with Papaya and Pineapple enzymes do all the work efficiently and gently. It evens out the appearance of your skin tone and helps to reveal a new, soft layer of skin that is ready to glow! Also suitable for use on your face and perfect for priming your skin before applying self-tan.
Future Proof™  Active Body Butter (50ml)
If you’re a butter lover, Future Proof is the product for you. Super nourishing for dry skin, it leaves your skin feeling supple with a radiant glow. Packed with antioxidants as well as vitamins, it’s a gift to your skin that just keeps on giving.

name: Choice Super 8 Microbiotics
product_description:
Udo's Choice Super 8 Microbiotics are vegetarian capsules containing 8 strains of friendly bacteria to help counteract serious flora imbalance and promote good upper bowel health.
Microbiotics are friendly bacteria that occur throughout the digestive tract, they are essential for proper digestion, a strong immune system and overall general health. Helping to replenish healthy gut flora and reduce painful gas, bloating and constipation, Super 8 Microbiotics contain 42 billion active bacteria per capsule and are beneficial for healthy digestion and immune function.
Bad eating habits, stress and antibiotics can affect good bacteria in a negative way; taken once a day, these powerful probiotic capsules can help restore healthy digestion for a happier bowel.

name: Spa Factory Fig and Vanilla Body Lotion
product_description: Pamper skin with the Fig and Vanilla Body Lotion from Natural Spa Factory. Combining the alluring earthy tones of Fig with the delectable sweetness of Vanilla, the creamy lotion is formulated with Sweet Almond Oil, brimming with vitamins to intensively nourish skin. It effortlessly melts into skin with Jojoba Oil helping to rebalance natural oil levels and antioxidant-rich Tocopherol working to combat free radical damage. Non-irritating and anti-inflammatory, skin feels silky smooth and rejuvenated.

name: Paris Men Expert Cool Power 48 Hour Anti-Perspirant 250ml
product_description: Designed with long-lasting reactivating freshness, the Cool Power 48 Hour Anti-Perspirant from L'Oréal Paris Men Expert contains cooling agents, which automatically reactivate when you most need it. The deodorant spray helps to combat bad odours and control perspiration, anti-wetness.  The cleansing anti-perspirant provides an ultra-fresh woody-mint fragrance. – E.W.

name: MySpa Luxury Foldaway Foot Spa
product_description:
Soothe aching soles with the HoMedics MySpa Luxury Foldaway Foot Spa; a compact unit from the leading innovators in home massage. Transforming spare time into at-home spa time, the foot spa helps you unwind, relieve common ailments and eliminate feelings of stress and anxiety, without paying for costly treatments.
The spa offers a vibration massage, which ripples the surface of the water and creates a calming sensation. The device is crafted with an array of stimulating acu-nodes (the small bumps of the floor of the unit), which works in synergy with the vibration massage to target the acupressure points on the soles of feet. To intensify the treatment, slowly move feet over the nodes.
The luxurious foot treatment is suitable for all ages and fits feet up to a size 12, perfect for pamper evenings with friends and family. After use, simply fold the foot spa flat to store away neatly.

name: Arden Eight Hour Cream Intensive Moisturising Hand Treatment (75ml)
product_description:
The perfect companion to the original classic for your face, Elizabeth Arden Eight Hour Cream Intensive Moisturising Hand Treatment is a fast-absorbing gel cream that contains soothing emollients to smooth and soften rough, weather-exposed skin.
This luxurious Elizabeth Arden Eight Hour Intensive Moisturising Hand Treatment will fight signs of dryness and cracking, so hands look and feel soft and touchable. The feeling will of course last for up to eight hours!
Directions of use:

name: Rosemary Invigorating Bath Milk (200ml)
product_description:
Boasting a warming blend of leaf oils and sun-soaked rosemary scents, the Weleda Rosemary Invigorating Bath Milk (200ml) is a refreshing pick me up that works to stimulate circulation and drive away any feeling of tiredness. Working to invigorate and liven the senses, this bath milk is suitable for vegans and can even be used in the shower too. - E.D
- Shake the bottle before use.
- Pour 2 - 3 capfuls into running water.
- Do not bathe in for longer than 20 minutes.

name: ISSA™ mini - Summer Sky
product_description:
Helping children to find brushing teeth a fun activity, FOREO ISSA™ mini is a silicone brush to protect gums and leave your child's mouth thoroughly clean. Featuring parental controls to ensure twice daily brushing, the sad face will appear if teeth have not been brushed for over 12 hours, whilst the happy face will light up when teeth have been brushed for 2 minutes. The brush has 2 speeds and will last up to 200 uses before losing its charge.
Features soft and gentle silicone bristles to create just the right amount of friction and 3D flexibility that helps the brush to reach awkward areas of the mouth. The brush has a pulsing action that will inform you when it's time to polish another quadrant of the mouth for thorough cleaning. -SA
Please Note: A USB charger is included, and not a mains adapter. Also, the brush head only needs to be replaced once a year.

name: Brown Oudh Accord and Gold Body Lotion (300ml)
product_description: Explore the deep, rich aromas of the Oudh Accord and Gold Body Lotion from Molton Brown. Inspired by the depths of a spiced forest, the indulgent lotion is infused with droplets of real gold for a truly magical moisturising experience, whilst its luxurious texture absorbs quickly into skin to leave you feeling replenished and rejuvenated. Its delicate fragrance opens with cinnamon leaf oil and an aromatic heart of spicy elemi oil, which unfolds to natural leathery notes of oudh accord, sourced in Assam, India.

name: ISSA™ - Mint
product_description:
Helping you to achieve the cleanest mouth you've ever had, FOREO ISSA™ presents the first beauty routine for your smile. Featuring soft and ultra-gentle silicone bristles to create the perfect friction, the lightweight and travel friendly, ergonomic brush has 3D flexibility and curves to the shape of your mouth to reach every crevice.
Working to ensure your mouth and gums are healthy and to help you achieve brighter and whiter teeth, the ISSA™ is electric and has a pulsating action that stimulates additional blood flow to achieve healthier gums and prevent gum disease.
With an 8-speed interface, the device allows you to chose your frequency of pulsations to suit your requirements. Every 30 seconds, the ISSA™ will pulse rapidly, indicating it is time to clean a different section of your mouth, and after 2 minutes it will pulse again to signify the end of the dental care routine. -SA
Please Note: A USB charger is included, and not a mains adapter. Also, the brush head only needs to be replaced once a year.

name: Rose Hand Cream -75ml
product_description:
Replenish and rejuvenate with Trilogy's Rose Hand Cream; a lightweight, delicately scented formula dedicated to moisturising, hydrating and repairing.
Infused with Marshmallow, Aloe Vera Leaf Extract and Certified Organic Rosehip Oil, the fast-absorbing cream softens and conditions hands, whilst soothing cuticles and promoting stronger, healthier nails. Hands are smooth, comfortable and infused with a soft sweet Rose fragrance.

name: Spongology Body Wash Infused Back Buffer - Milk & Honey
product_description:
Experience a revolutionary cleanse with the Spongellé Spongology Body Wash Infused Back Buffer in 'Milk & Honey' from the brand's Shower with Nature Collection. The eco-friendly back buffer has been designed to easily cleanse those hard to reach areas with its time-released body wash.
Utilising Proprietary Infusion Technology that offers a guaranteed number of washes (over 30), the saturated buffer expertly cleanses, exfoliates and massages skin; it combines organic extracts to expertly lift away impurities whilst softening and hydrating. Its unique surface changes as you squeeze, from a gentle exfoliator to a soft, silky texture with rich and creamy lather that leaves skin feeling smooth, purified and revitalised.

name: Advanced Body Lotion (226g)
product_description:
MenScience Advanced Body Lotion is an ultra-light, oil-free lotion that dramatically increases moisture levels and softens skin. Absorbing immediately it leaves the skin soft and supple without any sticky or greasy residue.
Dramatically increase moisture levels and restore your skin’s natural suppleness with MenScience Advanced Body Lotion. Nurturing and protecting from environmental aggressions that can cause the skin to look dull and devitalised, it restores your skin’s healthy appearance with a no shine, matte finish.
Directions of use:

name: Purely Age-Defying Hand Treatment (100ml)
product_description:
This award-winning product from Jurlique is effective at combating the signs of skin aging; Jurlique Purely Age-Defying Hand Treatment will also help you fight against skin discoloration and even out the tone of your skin. After use, the skin on your hands will look younger, more elastic, and healthier.
The cream provides instant hydration for your hands. Furthermore, the dark circles on your skin will become less visible. Apart from all of this, it's also an excellent antioxidant protector.
Efficient and reliable, the skin on your hands will look as young and unused as it can be, thanks to this innovative cream from Jurlique.

name: Holiday Ornament Body Wash Infused Buffer - Sugar Plum
product_description:
Get into the festive spirit with the Sugar Plum fragranced Holiday Ornament Body Wash Infused Buffer from Spongellé. The white, snowflake shaped sponge arrives with a useful hanging ribbon for when it is not in use, which can double up as a Christmas ornament. Ideal as a gift or indulgent treat for yourself.
Enriched with extracts of Yuzu, Edelweiss and Vetiver root, the multi-purpose buffing sponge is designed to cleanse, exfoliate, massage and hydrate the skin.  Its unique surface transforms as you squeeze, changing from an exfoliating, massage texture to a smooth, cleansing sponge.
The innovative buffer is infused with Sugar Plum fragranced body wash, which envelops the body in a sweet, festive aroma. Creating a creamy lather for up to 5 showers, the sponge leaves skin thoroughly cleansed and feeling soft and silky.

name: Spongette Travel Size Body Wash Infused Sponge - Pink Tiare
product_description:
Pamper skin on-the-go with the Spongetté Travel Size Body Wash Infused Sponge from Spongellé. Perfectly sized (and airport approved) for taking with you on business trips and vacations, the multi-tasking, multi-use sponge harnesses proprietary infusion technology to deliver an indulgent, time-released lather with a built-in body wash formula.
Enriched with extracts of Yuzu, Edelweiss and Vetiver, its silky smooth surface sweeps away dirt and impurities while the exfoliating side buffs away dulling dead cells. Complete with the delicate floral scent of Pink Tiare, the sponge lasts for up to five washes, leaving skin feeling refreshed and sumptuously softened.

name: & Evelyn La Source Body Cream 250g
product_description:
Perfectly pamper skin from top to toe with the Crabtree & Evelyn La Source Body Cream; a lightweight, quick-absorbing formula dedicated to nourishing and moisturising without greasy residue.
Fortified with the brand's Hydra Marine Blend of Green Seaweed and Red Algae Extracts, the luxurious cream infuses skin with long-lasting hydration, whilst Shea Butter and antioxidant Vitamin E protect against environmental aggressors. Soothes and softens dry skin to leave it smooth, supple and comfortable with the signature 'La Source' fragrance of azure-blue oceans.

name: Sunshimmer Gradual Tan & Tone Lotion 125ml
product_description:
Keep skin soft and hydrated with the added benefit of a subtle, sunkissed glow. Rimmel's Sunshimmer Gradual Tan & Tone Lotion is an everyday moisturiser with 4-in-1 benefits: develops over time to create a gradual glow; tones skin; smoothens skin, and provides up to 24 hours of hydration.
Enriched with hydrating argan oil, the softening formula leaves skin soft, supple and radiant. Develops a natural glow for sunkissed skin. - K.N.

name: Mint Absinthe Moisture Soap 300ml
product_description:
Enliven your senses with the Mint Absinthe Moisture Soap from MÁDARA. Suitable for the hands and body, the cleansing formula works to clean, hydrate and soften skin.
Infusing skin in a bitter absinthe and refreshing, cool mint aroma, the wash awakes the senses. The soap boasts cleansing and moisturising properties, leaving the hands and body clean, soft and smelling refreshed.

name: Baby Cow Buttery Bottom Balm (75ml)
product_description:
The Cowshed Baby Cow Organics range uses gentle formulas to care for your little bundle of joy and this Buttery Bottom Balm is no exception. With no nasties it acts as a barrier to protect baby’s bottom from the dampness that can lead to nappy rash.
Containing meadowfoam oil, a gentle and effective moisturiser for baby’s delicate skin, Baby Cow Organics Buttery Bottom Balm is perfect for protecting baby against nappy rash. Meadowfoam oil is known to be one of the most stable vegetable oils, making it safe and long-lasting. Cowshed’s botanical formulations are naturally paraben, petrochemical and sulphate free, suitable for vegetarians and contain certified organic ingredients.
Directions of use:

name: Body Ultimate Blends Nourishing Lotion (400ml)
product_description:
Help skin to feel revived and lifted with the Garnier Body Ultimate Blends Nourishing Lotion. Light in texture, the smooth, gentle cream blends easily and diligently into the skin, easing the application process and inputting softening notes of calmness and relaxation. C.R

Cowshed’s botanical formulations are naturally paraben, petrochemical and sulphate free, suitable for vegetarians and contain certified organic ingredients.

Catering for babies and infants, Uriage's Soap-Free Cleansing Cream gently refreshes your little one's face, body and scalp to eliminate impurities whilst restoring long-lasting comfort.
Its deeply nourishing formula is enriched with a moisturising blend of Glycerin, Illipe Butter Extract and the brand's soothing Thermal Water; an ingredient that strengthens the skin's barrier and conditions skin from head to toe.

product_description:

bliss diamancel the classic big foot buffer is made from nickel-coated flexible fiberglass files, electroplated with industrial grade diamond chips, so they rarely (if ever) wear out. Infused with quince seed extract and vegetable surfactants to effortlessly melt away dirt and impurities, the creamy foam delivers a harmonising fragrance of rose that envelops the body to create a cloud of pure tranquillity. A blend of sunflower and avocado oils prevent over-drying so you can experience clean, calm and touchably soft skin, without stripping moisture. E.N.

product_description: Deeply nourish dry, rough and hard-working hands with the Dr. Hauschka Hydrating Hand Cream. product_description: Based on sports therapy, this body cleanser awakens the mind and helps to revitalise the skin and hair. Combining Rosemary and Eucalyptus to naturally support the immune system by reducing bacteria on the skin's surface, whilst the energising aroma helps to clear the head. Let yourself be completely invigorated.

product_description:
Ole Henriksen Body Sleek Lotion is a protective daily moisturiser that’s got a lightweight, non-greasy texture that even the driest skin will love. It is an absolute must-have moisturiser for soft, smooth skin with a fresh scent and non-irritating formula.

Protecting and moisturising your skin with the best ingredients nature has to offer, Ole Henriksen uses almond oil, rich in oxygenating essential fatty acids; moisturising, calming and healing aloe vera gel; lightweight apricot oil, with its re-texturising benefits; deeply penetrating avocado oil, rich in vitamins and nutrients; sunflower seed oil, rich in skin nutrients; and anti-oxidant and regenerating vitamin A, and vitamin D, a necessary nutrient for resiliency.

Composed of a delectable cocktail of essential oils and natural ingredients, this Natio Antioxidant Hand & Nail Cream helps build stronger nails, softer cuticles, and preserves youthful looking hands. This Hand & Nail Cream is suitable for use on all skin types.

With each high quality cap lined with soft, eco-friendly waterproof PEVA material, keeping your hair perfectly secure and dry in the bath or shower, Hydrea London Eco Friendly Shower Cap in Leopard is also perfect for use during hair treatments. They work wonders for intensifying that conditioning!

product_description:
Discover a Life Elixir for all of your needs with the Elemis Life Elixirs Mindful Collection; a five-piece set of miniature bath and shower oils that leave skin nourished and delicately scented. Simply apply to running bath water, or to the body whilst showering and each silky oil will deliver a different effect, including promoting a good night’s sleep, evoking a sense of confidence and enveloping the mind and body in feelings of calm.
Embrace Bath & Shower Elixir (6ml)
Experience an exhilarating soak with the Embrace Bath and Shower Elixir; an uplifting bath and shower oil that boasts a sensual blend of heady aromatics that condition and fragrance skin. Combining 11 pure essential oils, including Vetiver and Rose Pepper blended with Amaranth and Bacuri Oil, the stimulating fragrance encourages you to fall in love with the sense of liberation.
Sleep Bath & Shower Elixir (6ml)

Utilising 13 pure essential oils, including Elemi and Palmarosa in a skin-conditioning base of Amaranth and Bacuri Oil, the soothing fragrance envelops the body in a veil of calm, which promote a good night’s sleep.

Empower the spirit with the Fortitude Bath and Shower Elixir; a luxurious bath and shower oil that conditions and fragrances skin, whilst encouraging feelings of confidence. Intelligently combining 19 essential oils, including Geranium, Cedarwood and Ylang Ylang, the sensuous fragrance seeks to promote strength and determination.
Calm Bath & Shower Elixir (6ml)
Soothe the mind, body and soul with the Calm Bath and Shower Elixir; a luxurious bath and shower oil that conditions and fragrances skin, whilst encouraging feelings of relaxation. Blending 15 essential oils, including Clary Sage, Lavandin and Rosewood, the calming fragrance seeks to create an oasis of calm and tranquillity to provide sanctuary for the mind.
Clarity Bath & Shower Elixir (6ml)
Clear your mind with the Bath and Shower Clarity Elixir; an energising bath and shower oil that conditions and fragrances skin, whilst allowing you to invigorate your sense of self. Combining Bitter Orange, Cardamom and Ginger, the refreshing yet warming fragrance seeks to sharpen concentration and prepare you for the day or evening ahead.

name: Men Multivitamin Tablets - (30 Tablets)
product_description:
Centrum Men Multivitamin Tablets have been specifically developed to support men’s health and wellbeing, delivering adjusted levels of vitamins and minerals for optimum efficacy and benefits.
The world’s number one multivitamin is established through 30 years of scientific research and nutritional expertise, contributing to muscle and heart health as well as supporting sustained energy release and a normal immune system.
24 key vitamins and minerals work in tandem to boost vital resources, including Zinc, which helps contribute to normal fertility, while Calcium and Vitamin D3 sustain normal muscle function. Folic Acid contributes to blood formulation, with high levels of Vitamin B and Iron boosting energy metabolism. The daily food supplement is an easy, ideal solution for ongoing health maintenance.

product_description:
Discover a soothing bath time experience with the Soulful AromaBomb Duo Set from AromaWorks. The pair of lilac bath bombs infuse the water with essential oils and combat feelings of anxiety and stress to leave you feeling truly relaxed.
A luxurious blend of Himalayan Sea Salt and Calamine combine to deliver a therapeutic bathing experience. The AromaBomb envelops the body in scents of purity, with notes of juniper Berry, Patchouli and Bergamot combining to create a warm, spicy fragrance and a comforting aroma.

product_description:
Experience an indulgent bathing experience with the Spa Magik Organiks Moisture Therapy Creme Coconut Oil Body Wash; a creamy shower gel that pampers skin from head to toe.
Upon contact with water, the body wash transforms into a creamy lather that envelops skin in a rich coconut aroma. Utilising organic Essential Oils, the creamy formula gently and effectively cleanses the skin, eliminates impurities and delivers a veil of rich moisture. The wash ensures the body will be silky smooth and touchably soft.

name: Dante Il Frutteto Pomegranate and Blackcurrant Soap 250g
product_description: Treat your skin and senses to the Il Frutteto Pomegranate and Blackcurrant Soap from Nesti Dante. Crafted in Florence using traditional methods and natural ingredients, the vegetable-based soap gently cleanses and rejuvenates, whilst nourishing and toning to leave skin feeling soft and supple. Housed in decorative packaging, the soap bar makes an ideal gift for yourself or a loved one.

name: Max - 60 Capsules (392mg)
product_description:
The P-4 Max Capsules have been measured by the ABEL®-RAC scale (Relative Antioxidant Capacity Scale); the most accurate way to compare a product's ability to neutralise free radicals and highly reactive oxidants.
Synergising Polyphenols and four powerful antioxidants: Grape Seed, Green Tea, Pine Bark and Pomegranate, the maximum strength capsules have been measured at 256,000 ABEL®-RAC/mg. Developed to complement an active lifestyle.

name: Glucosamine Plus (30 Tablets)
product_description:
The Bioglan Glucosamine Plus Tablets provide 1500mg of Glucosamine Hydrochloride, supported by Chondroitin & MSM. Each of these three components are crucial building blocks of Glycosaminoglycans, which are the key structural component of cartilage and connective tissues.
With age, the body's ability to produce and store these nutrients reduces, so this health supplement helps to replenish levels within the body, helping you to stay active. - L.M.

name: Choice Adult 50+ Blend Microbiotics - 30 Vegecaps
product_description: Udo's Choice Adult 50+ Blend Microbiotics provide an easy-to-consume daily blend of ‘friendly’ bacteria (probiotic), specifically selected for over 50’s, to support the immune system functionality and encourage proper digestion. Microbiotics are the beneficial lacto and bifido bacteria that occur throughout the digestive tract and are essential in replenishing healthy gut flora, which helps to reduce gas, bloating and constipation.

name: Extra Defence (120ml)
product_description:
Sambucol Extra Defence is a health supplement that helps to support the immune system. With an AntiVirin® action, it's rich in extra-strength vitamin C, zinc, antioxidants and minerals, which can help to boost your body's natural defences. Featuring a delicious black elderberry flavour, the non-drowsy supplement is free from alcohol, gluten and artificial colours and flavours. Suitable for ages 12+. - L.M.
Recommended Daily Dose: Adults and children aged 12+: 10-15ml.
Winter Dose: Adults and children aged 12+: 10-15ml four times daily.

name: Health Manuka Honey Suckles with Lemon MGO 400+ 100g
product_description:
Manuka Health Manuka Honey Suckles with Lemon MGO™ 400+ are high grade MGO™ 400+ Manuka Honey into a tasty, lemon flavoured lozenge.
Blended with MGO™400+ Manuka Honey, renowned for its unique activity and antibacterial properties, the Suckles are 100% natural and aim to contribute in maintaining a healthy immune system, digestive health and healthy skin.

name: Krill Oil for Kids - 60 Gel Capsules (200mg)
product_description:
Cleanmarine Krill Oil for Kids provide all the benefits of Krill Oil in a smaller 200mg softgel capsule specifically for children.
It can be a challenge making sure your child has a balanced diet and so these easy-to-consume supplements provide the perfect dose of Omega 3 fatty acids, which contribute to healthy heart, brain, eye and joint function as well as helping to enhance moods and improve concentration.
Why choose Krill Oil over Fish Oil? Krill are shrimp-like crustaceans that provide a more sustainable and ethical source of Omega 3 with zero by-catch. The fatty acids within Krill Oil are bound to phospholipids, a major component of human cell membranes, thus are much more rapidly absorbed than the acids from fish oil supplements. Krill Oil is also rich in Astaxanthin, a natural antioxidant, plus there’s no fishy aftertaste.

name: Botanicals Moroccan Rose & Shea Butter Body Repairing Cream 100ml
product_description:
The Moroccan Rose & Shea Butter Body Repairing Cream from Dr Botanicals has been expertly formulated with essential oils, vitamins and minerals to reveal radiant, healthier-looking skin.
Lightweight and non-greasy, the cream effortlessly melts in, with the main active ingredient of Moroccan Rose Oil containing Omegas 3 and 6 that help repair and restore skin with a firming effect. Shea Butter is brimming with vitamins, aiming to combat environmental aggressors and soften skin with intense moisture, whilst Apricot Kernel Oil intensely nourishes and boosts fatty acid levels. Skin appears revitalised and nourished with a soft glow.

name: Dante Il Frutteto Mint and Quince Pear Soap 250g
product_description: Treat your skin and senses to the Il Frutteto Mint and Quince Pear Soap from Nesti Dante. Crafted in Florence using traditional methods and natural ingredients, the vegetable-based soap gently cleanses and rejuvenates, whilst detoxifying and purifying to leave skin feeling soft and supple. Housed in decorative packaging, the soap bar makes an ideal gift for yourself or a loved one.

Enriched with soothing extract of Water Lily and White Crystal Salt sourced from Bali, it softens and hydrates to leave skin feeling smooth, refreshed and purified.

Precious aromatherapy oils of Orange, Lemon and Cardamom imbue the cream with a fresh, positive fragrance that lingers.
