name: de Provence Body Lotion - Mint Tea (300ml)
product_description:
A luxurious blend of shea butter, almond and olive oils, vitamin E and aloe vera, Compagnie de Provence Body Lotion works to nourish and soften the skin to leave it healthy, hydrated and supple. Its rapidly-absorbed fluid texture prevents dryness whilst providing the skin with antioxidants such as vitamin E.
Presented in luxurious a glass pump bottle for ease of use, this lotion is adorned with the refreshing and awakening scent of mint tea to wrap the skin in a rejuvenating blanket of calm and tranquillity. K.D.

name: Cloudberry & Oat Milk Hand & Body Soap 150g
product_description:
Treat your skin to the caring properties of MÁDARA Cloudberry & Oat Milk Hand & Body Soap, a botanical soap formula that works to cleanse, calm and comfort skin.
Formulated on a botanical base, the hand and body soap is infused with Oat Milk Proteins and vitamin-rich Northern Cloudberry to gently cleanse skin of impurities. Its synergy of Jojoba Oil and hydrating Plant Sugars nourish and care for skin.

name: Thomas Roth Mega Rich Conditioning Cleanser (250ml)
product_description:
The Mega Rich Conditioning Cleanser from Peter Thomas Roth is a body wash that gently cleanses skin of dirt and impurities to leave you feeling refreshed and nourished. Its unique formula contains effective moisturising beads and is rich in vitamins A, C and E to revitalise and protect skin from free radicals.
Suitable for all skin types, this luxurious liquid can be used in the bath or shower to hydrate skin and give a silky smooth texture with a subtle fragrance. E.N.
Directions for use: Apply a small amount onto wet skin and massage into a lather. Rinse thoroughly.

name: Konjac Sponge Company Doggy Tear Drop Sponge
product_description:
The Konjac Sponge Company presents the Doggy Tear Drop Sponge, a 100% naturally sustainable sponge specially designed to keep your beloved pets pampered and clean. Expertly handmade purely from moisture-rich Konjac plant fibres and Volcanic Water, the sponge is ideal for gently cleaning tear ducts with a shaped end perfect for reaching those difficult nooks and crevices.
The innovative biodegradable sponge has a unique net-like structure that turns silky soft when wet and works to deeply cleanse without any harmful chemicals or additives. Lasting for up to 3 months, the sponge is suitable for wiping and cleaning both cats and dogs. Simply add water!

name: Nourishing Cream 150ml
product_description: Catering specifically for dry and very dry skin, the MÁDARA Nourishing Cream works to replenish, hydrate and protect the body. Infused with Sea Buckthorn, Calendula and Chamomile Extracts, the fast-absorbing, certified organic body lotion deeply moisturises and conditions skin, whilst improving suppleness to leave the body feeling soft, smooth and comfortable. Ideal for elbows and heels in need of extra care.

name: Spa Factory Wild Lavender, Comfrey and Aloe Hand Cream
product_description:
Help skin to feel refreshed and soothed with the Wild Lavender, Comfrey and Aloe Hand Cream from Natural Spa Factory. Packed with a blend of soothing, nourishing and cleansing ingredients, the hand cream is both gentle and intensely nourishing, leaving skin with a clean Lavender aroma.
Enriched with Jojoba Oil, bursting with Vitamin A and E, the hand cream absorbs quickly and delivers hydration to the skin, leaving hands moisturised, balanced and visibly healed. The cream also boasts the antibacterial and antiviral qualities of Lavender essential oil and antioxidant properties of Almond oil, ideal for providing nourishment to even the most sensitive skin types.

name: The Ritual of Dao Hand Scrub (200ml)
product_description:
Rituals The Ritual of Dao Hand Scrub is a luxurious hand exfoliator that works to deeply cleanse and soften hard working hands.
Utilising an ancient Chinese philosophy that helps one achieve perfect harmony, the hand scrub combines the nourishing properties of Yi Yi Ren with a gentle White Lotus fragrance to leave skin feeling silky, supple and delicately scented. Its blend of nourishing oils melt effortlessly into skin to restore moisture levels and suppleness. Suitable for daily use.

name: 'Fuzz' Off Foam (155ml)
product_description: This “Fuzz” Off Foam by bliss is the ultimate no mess solution to a fuzzy face or body. In as little as 5 minutes it removes unwanted hair with potent yet gentle agents that dissolve the hair from the root. At the same time it inhibits future hair growth, making this foam a unique product on the market. While removing the hair, it also nourishes with marine extract and a double butter complex, leaving your skin silky smooth. One easy step does the job perfectly, the spray system keeping your hands dry and enabling a precise application. Get rid of your fuzz almost in an instant and keep it that way for longer! This product is suitable for legs, arms, underarms and bikini lines only. LB

name: People Organic Homme No. 5 Cool Style Shower Wash (125ml)
product_description:
Experience a calming yet invigorating wash with Green People's Organic Homme No. 5 Cool Style Shower Wash, a certified organic and natural hair and body wash.
Utilising plant actives for a soothing and refreshing experience, including Pineapple, Peppermint and Marshmallow Root, the formula lathers into a rich foam on the skin, cleansing away dirt and impurities whilst gently sloughing away flaky patches from the body and scalp. Your body and hair feel ultimately cooled, refreshed and cleansed. Infused with a fresh, uplifting scent. - K.N.

name: Soothing 84% Aloe Vera Hand and Body Lotion (227g)
product_description:
Soothe and protect your skin with JASON Aloe Vera 84% Hand & Body Lotion. Enriched with herbal extracts and vitamins A, C & E this non-greasy and UV protective formula tones and protects the skin.
Composed of aloe vera leaf gel, sunflower seed oil, sweet almond oil and a whole range of wholesome vitamins, JASON Aloe Vera 84% Hand & Body Lotion will keep your entire body protected whilst leaving it hydrated.
Directions of use:

name: Evening Primrose Hand Cream (50ml)
product_description:
The Evening Primrose range by Weleda is an award winning skincare series for women aged 56+. Instead of providing an anti-ageing effect, these products make mature skin look alive, a process Weleda calls “Age Revitalising”. With Evening Primrose they tone and hydrate the skin whilst boosting its radiance and metabolism.
Try for yourself and discover the Evening Primrose Hand Cream’s nourishing, moisturising and truly rejuvenating effects. Ingredients such as Centella Asiastica extract smooth dry hands and act as a shield against free radical damage. Wrinkles will diminish, skin will even out and your hands will become velvety smooth. Easily absorbed, this wonder cream regenerates cracked, dehydrated hands in an instant! LB
Suitable for vegans.

name: Herzog Oxygen Hand & Nail Cream (50ml)
product_description:
Karin Herzog Hand and Nail Cream offers advanced anti-ageing for the hands as well as an unparalleled stimulant and accelerator for strong healthy nail growth.
2% Oxygen, a cocktail of multi vitamins, lipids and essential fatty acids give this cream the edge over other traditional hand creams.
Stimulating, detoxifying, cleansing, softening, conditioning, hydrating, anti-ageing.....and that’s just for your skin, it goes on to accelerate nail re-growth, disinfect against many nail infections that prevent growth, whiten the free nail and generally promote stronger, healthier nails with rapid growth.
Highly recommended for those who want to treat and condition dry or mature hands. Essential for those who suffer from nail imperfections or disorders and an absolute must have for anyone with nail extensions of any kind.
Directions of Use:

name: Tanning Essentials Duo - Dark
product_description:
Give the gift of a long-lasting sunkissed tan with this duo from TANWORX. Whether you want to treat a friend, family member or yourself, the TANWORX Self Tanning Essentials Duo Dark is the ideal package to create a flawless, even yet natural looking tan. - K.R
The TANWORX Self Tanning Essentials Duo Dark contains:
Hydrating Body LotionUltra moisturising, this lotion is designed to deeply hydrate and smooth the skin in preparation for your tan. Providing a soft and non-sticky canvas, your tan can glide on easily without sticking to dry areas or becoming patchy. Use 10 minutes before self tanning for an easy application and a perfect finish that lasts.
Self Tanning Lotion - DarkGiving you an instant glow allowing you to see where to apply your self-tan, the lightweight tanning lotion develops and darkens over the course of 3 hours, leaving you with a deep, dark yet natural looking tan. The formula glides on easily, leaving an even streak-free glow.
Tanning MittApply your tanning products quickly and easily without worrying about staining your hands. The tanning mitt has been made with a special formula-resistant barrier, protecting hands and wrists from staining. The soft mitt provides an even, streak-free tan with every product, which can then be put into the washing machine to clean when you're done.

name: Nurture Bath Oil 100ml
product_description:
Relax and unwind with the AromaWorks Nurture Bath Oil, a calming blend of natural essential oils to soothe both the body and mind.
Offering a sensual uplifting aroma, the oil combines a harmonic blend of crisp May Chang, sweet Roman Chamomile and delicate Sandalwood with Organic Coconut Oil to leave skin feeling intensively nourished and soothed. Add a splash to your bath and release the stresses of the day to discover a sense of calm wellbeing.

name: Daily Defence Moisturiser SPF 15
product_description:
Everything you need from your daily moisturiser: Trilogy Daily Defence Moisturiser SPF 15 hydrates skin whilst providing effective UV protection from the sun's harsh rays. Mattifying and evening the skin tone, this daily moisturiser also doubles as the perfect makeup base for a flawless looking complexion.
Its lightweight formula offers long-lasting hydration for soft, supple skin. Vitamins E, A and C combined with Hyaluronic Acid ensure skin feels moisturised and protected.
Please note: This product is not water resistant.

name: Island Apothecary Unwind Festive Gift Set
product_description: Fragranced with 'pregnancy-safe' essential oils, Seascape Island Apothecary Unwind Festive Gift Set, contains a body wash (300ml) and body lotion (300ml) that combine to help you unwind after a stressful day. Perfect as a gift for a loved one, the bath wash and lotion will nourish and soothe your skin to leave you with skin that is protected and feeling wonderful. -SA

name: Pearl Polish Dual Action Body Oil
product_description: Pearl Polish Dual Action Body Oil from Shaveworks. Its gentle, yet powerful formula transforms into a milky foam when mixed with water to remove dirt and grime and leave behind a refreshing fragrance of ginger, lavender and vanilla. The versatile oil can be used as pre-shave oil to allow effortless gliding of the razor for a smoother, closer shave. Experience conditioned and hydrated skin with a silky-soft touch. E.N.

name: Dante Emozioni in Toscana Golden Countryside Soap 250g
product_description:
Pamper skin with the Nesti Dante ‘Emozioni in Toscana’ Golden Countryside Soap. Expertly hand-crafted in Italy using the artisan saponification method, the soap bar has been traditionally made with natural, raw ingredients and oils that seek to sweep away daily dirt and impurities without stripping away moisture to leave skin feeling soft and supple.
Transforming into a rich lather upon application, it releases a subtle floral scent that relaxes the mind and transports the senses to the undulating Tuscan countryside. Wrapped in lavish textured paper, the soap makes a wonderful gift.

name: Me Revitalising Hand and Body Wash 280ml
product_description:
Combining naturally active botanicals with hi-tech natural formulations, the Balance Me Revitalising Hand and Body Wash promises to cleanse, soothe and hydrate your skin.
Fortified with 99% natural ingredients, its blend of organic surfactants gently cleanse the skin without stripping or drying, whilst a revitalising aroma of Sweet Orange, Grapefruit and Bergamot Essential Oils rejuvenate the senses. Skin feels smooth, balanced and refreshed after use.

name: Juice Powder - 100g
product_description:
Developed for those wishing to follow a low acid diet, the Wheatgrass Juice Powder is an organic, dissolvable powder that blends easily with liquids and smoothies.
The 100% pure, naturally alkaline Juice Powder combines antioxidants, Chlorophyll and Carbohydrates (Mucopolysaccharides) to support all body tissues, including the heart and arteries, whilst helping to minimise inflammation and rebalance pH levels.

name: Island Apothecary Refresh Festive Gift Set
product_description:
Put together to help you achieve beautifully cleansed and supple hands, Seascape Island Apothecary Refresh Festive Gift Set is the perfect Christmas gift for a loved one.
The products have been specifically formulated to cleanse, soothe and protect the hands and nails using 100% natural essential oils. -SA
The set contains:Refresh Hand Wash 300mlCleanse your hands with this beautifully scented hand wash which combines Jersey Lavender, Lemon grass and Geranium to balance, tone and refresh your skin.
Refresh Hand Lotion 300mlWorking to soothe and calm your hands, the hand lotion combines Jersey Lavender, Lemon grass, Geranium and Shea Butter that combine to cleanse, nourish and protect the hands.

name: Japanese Rose Body Butter (125ml)

Shea butter works in delicate harmony with sunflower, almond and avocado oils to nourish your skin, restoring its elasticity and smoothness.

product_description:
Stimulate, refresh, tone and smooth your skin texture with Aromatherapy Associates Revive Body Gel. This energising oil is particularly effective for cellulite and can be massaged into other areas such as your hips, thighs, stomach and feet.
This Aromatherapy Associates Revive Body Gel contains Pink Grapefruit, Rosemary, Juniperberry, Pine & Damask Rose Water. It is perfect for when you feel a bit tired, you are concerned about cellulite or you want to increase circulation.

product_description:

Leaving your skin feeling and looking firmer and more taut, this Firming Creme Riche will have you boasting a dewy smooth and super soft complexion in no time. K.D.

product_description:
Cheer up with this energising oil from Cowshed.  Grump Cow Uplpifting Bath & Massage Oil is a citrus blend with essential oils of mandarin red to invigorate the senses, petitgrain to cleanse and purify, and grapefruit to stimulate circulation.

name: Style+ Black Pepper & Bergamot Shower Gel 100ml - Muscle Fibre
product_description:
Show your skin and hair who's boss with the men-ü Style+ Black Pepper & Bergamot Shower Gel and Muscle Fibre. The pair work in synergy to leave your skin clean and fresh, and your hair styled to perfection.
Black Pepper & Bergamot Shower Gel (100ml):
An invigorating shower gel enriched with a host of active ingredients and moisturising agents to leave skin clean and refreshed. Transforming into a rich lather, the concentrated formula delivers Pro Vitamin B5 and Vitamin E to keep skin soft and protected. Infused with a spicy, fruity scent to energise the senses.
Muscle Fibre (100ml):
A strong yet flexible hold hair paste with matt finish. Perfect for creating both well-groomed styles or dishevelled looks, the styling paste is infused with lightweight microfibres that bind to hair to enhance pliability, thickness and volume. Hair has brilliant hold and separation.

name: Women's Wild Rose Deodorant 100ml
product_description:
An all-natural product, this Weleda Wild Rose Deodorant contains herbal extracts that fight bacteria and keep you smelling fresh as a rose. Suitable for vegans, it fights odours without hindering natural skin functions. It is aluminium salt free, dries quickly and leaves no sticky residue whilst containing wild rose leaf extract with revitalising and astringent effects. LB
Directions for use: In the morning after washing or at any time of the day. For most people one application lasts all day. The natural formulation can be used when required, up to three times a day or use as a fragrant body mist. Do not spray in the direction of the eyes or mucus membranes.

name: 1er Change Nappy Rash Lotion (100ml)
product_description:
Catering for babies and children, Uriage's 1er Change Nappy Rash Lotion is an ultra-gentle daily treatment that works to protect, soften and moisturise your little one's delicate skin.
Developed with a patented Poly-2P complex, the fast-absorbing lotion repairs damaged skin and prevents future aggressions, whilst the brand's unique Thermal Water soothes redness and relieves discomfort.

name: Home Spa Salt Scrub - Reshaping 350g
product_description:
Pamper skin with the Reshaping Home Spa Salt Scrub from PUPA. Containing a delicate blend of Pink Himalayan Salt and Brown Algae Extract, the natural exfoliator gently buffs away dirt and impurities while delivering an anti-water action, which penetrates skin tissue to emphasise body contours and have a firming, re-sculpting effect.
Experience a subtle tingling sensation as the advanced formula releases Active Oxygen, optimising the delivery of essential nutrients for maximum benefits. Recreate a spa-like ritual from the comfort of your own home and achieve skin that feels silky soft, ultra-smooth and redefined.

name: Home Spa Scented Water - Anti-Stress 150ml
product_description:
Relax and unwind with the Anti-Stress Home Spa Scented Water from PUPA; a delicately fragranced, ultra-fine mist that calms the senses with an aromatic blend of flowers, spices and precious woods.
Enriched with youthful Pearl Powder, the intense fragrance opens with a rich bouquet of oriental spices, with Patchouli oil penetrating the scent for an invigorating, warm aroma. Skin feels softened and replenished while the mind is put at ease with an aromatherapy experience.

name: & Evelyn Rosewater Hand Therapy (250g)
product_description: Give your hands the attention they need with this Crabtree & Evelyn Rosewater Hand Therapy which nourishes skin so it’s noticeably smoother after each application. Infused with macadamia nut oil, shea butter and rosa centifolia extract, this intensive cream is formulated without mineral oil, parabens, phthalates or propylene glycol meaning it offers soft and gentle protection. - E.D

name: de Provence Extra Pur My Travel Essentials - Olive and Lavender
product_description:
My Travel Essentials from Compagnie de Provence includes everything you need to cleanse, hydrate and nourish your hands and body on-the-go. The travel-sized treats will be sure to leave you feeling perfectly pampered. E.N.
Shower Gel (50ml)
Invigorate your senses with the Extra Pur Shower Gel, created in Grasse, a town at the heart of the French perfume industry. Its lightweight gel texture transforms in to a creamy lather upon contact with water and delicately fragrances skin with a calming and relaxing scent of olive and lavender. Gently cleanses skin and preserves its natural balance to leave the body feeling soft and silky smooth.
Body Lotion (30ml)
Deeply moisturise skin with the Extra Pur Body Lotion, a fast-absorbing cream enriched with olive and sweet almond oils to nourish and soften skin. Its lightweight formula with aloe vera and shea butter prevents dryness, whilst antioxidant vitamin E protects skin from environmental stresses. Delivers a subtle scent of calming lavender essential oil.
Hand Cream (30ml)
Infuse your hands with French luxury. The Extra Pur Hand Cream in Olive and Lavender is a smooth and lightweight hand cream enriched with luxurious shea butter. Dedicated to softening and comforting your hands, its quick absorbing formula is delicate on the skin and imparts a calming and relaxing lavender fragrance.

name: Pomegranate Wash Bag Gift 2016 (Worth £22.5)
product_description:
Treat your skin to the Pomegranate Wash Bag Gift 2016 from Weleda. Housed in an eco-friendly drawstring wash bag, the kit combines a luxurious body wash, lightweight body lotion and recycled mesh bath scrunchie to leave you feeling perfectly pampered from top to toe.
Pomegranate Creamy Body Wash (200ml)
Harnessing the powers of Organic Pomegranate Seed Oil, the luxurious body wash gently cleanses from top to toe to leave you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated. A warming blend of Sandalwood, Davana and Neroli Essential Oils invigorates skin and stimulates the senses to rebalance your body and mind. With regular use, skin will feel soft, smooth and pampered.
Pomegranate Body Lotion (200ml)
Specifically formulated for maturing skin, the body lotion absorbs quickly into skin to prevent premature signs of ageing. Enriched with Pomegranate Seed Oil, Apricot Kernel Oil and moisturising Shea Butter to soften and condition, whilst protecting against external aggressors so you can experience smooth, comfortable skin. with a youthful glow.

name: Hydraboost Gel Gift Set
product_description:
Perfect for the chap who likes to look and feel his best, Polaar present the Hydraboost Gel Gift Set. Housed in a rounded box, the duo includes a replenishing moisturiser and refreshing hair and shower gel that are handy for the gym, travelling or home. E.N.
Hydraboost Gel Moisturiser (50ml)
Intensively nourish and condition your complexion, without making it feel greasy or oily. Specially designed to care for male skin, the fast-absorbing gel is enriched with an expert blend of Siberian ginseng and olive extract to provide intensive hydration and reinforce the skin's natural barrier. Antioxidant vitamin E protects against free radical damage and environmental stresses to leave you feeling revitalised and refreshed.
Shower Gel (50ml)
Invigorate your senses with the revitalising shower gel. Enriched with Icelandic Lichen, the lightweight shower gel creates a rich lather to detoxify the skin, scalp and hair, removing excess oil, dirt and impurities to leave you feeling clean and refreshed. With natural Polysaccharides to tone and firm the entire body, you can expect soft, supple skin and healthy-looking hair.

name: Probiotic Skincare Firm and Revitalise Dry Body Oil 100ml
product_description:
Treat dry, wanting skin to Aurelia Probiotic Skincare Firm and Revitalise Dry Body Oil, a luxurious dry oil formula that works to firm and deeply hydrate lacklustre skin.
Delicate yet intensely nourishing, the moisture-boosting formula utilises a host of sumptuous ingredients to promote hydrated, healthy skin. Its signature essential oil blend of Neroli, Lavender, Rose and Mandarin fuses with antioxidant-rich BioOrganic botanicals to revitalise the skin whilst calming the senses to ease feelings of stress.
Melting effortlessly into skin thanks to lightweight Kalahari oil, the formula's cocktail of precious oils (Macadamia, Borage, Mongongo and Kukui) deliver essential fatty acids and antioxidants whilst hydrating and repairing. Skin is experiences restored hydration and is beautifully scented.

name: MYNY Body Wash 150ml
product_description:
Cleanse and fragrance your skin with DKNY MYNY Body Wash (150ml). Suitable for all skin types, the shower gel contains cleansing agents and skin-nourishing ingredients that work to eliminate impurities to leave your skin soft, smooth and feeling fresh.
The shower gel features a cocktail of Raspberries, Galbanum, Pink Pepper, Jasmine, Vanilla and Musk to create this beautiful scent. -SA

name: London Kukui Oil Nourishing Hand Cream (50ml)
product_description:
A fast-absorbing, non-greasy cream that provides intense moisture and nourishment to dry hands and nails, this Connock London Kukui Oil Nourishing Hand Cream leaves your hands looking and feeling silky smooth, supple and exceptionally soft.
The unique blend of essential fatty acids in this Connock London Kukui Oil Nourishing Hand Cream seals in elevated levels of moisture while reinforcing the skin’s natural barrier. This gorgeous cream renews the appearance of skin showing signs of ageing and environmental stress such as dryness, fine lines and chapping.

name: & EVELYN POMEGRANATE, ARGAN & GRAPESEED BATH & SHOWER GEL (250ML)
product_description:
Wash away your stresses and strains with the Crabtree & Evelyn Pomegranate, Argan & Grapeseed Bath & Shower Gel. This luxuriously lathering formula leaves skin refreshed and revitalised.
Crabtree & Evelyn Pomegranate, Argan & Grapeseed Bath & Shower Gel contains a conditioning blend of antioxidant rich pomegranate and grapeseed extracts, along with nourishing argan, which replenishes the skin for a smooth and supple finish.

name: Spa Factory Illuminate Body Scrub
product_description:
Brighten and refine your skin with Natural Spa Factory Illuminate Body Scrub, a creamy exfoliator that gently buffs away dead cells to reveal smoother, more radiant skin.
Infused with micro particles of rice, the scrub delicately sloughs away dulling dead skin cells and performs a firming and smoothing effect to promote a younger-looking body. Its balancing and refining properties visibly diminish the look of pores, blemishes and age spots. Skin is left smooth, radiant and renewed. Infused with a Vanilla and White Flower fragrance.

name: Konjac Sponge Company 6 Wave Bath Sponge with Pink Clay
product_description:
Konjac 6 Wave Body Sponge with Pink French Clay

This Konjac Body Sponge with the benefits of French Pink Clay ( Like Calamine) for soothing irritated skin and treating it to a wash full of minerals whilst gently exfoliating and soothing tired, damaged and devitalized skin types.

Pink clay is a mix of red and white clay Pink clay is soft, it is recommended for tired, sensitive & dehydrated skins. It helps to turn rough and hardened skin into soft and radiant skin, rejuvenating and plumping and helping return the skins natural elasticity . Excellent for skin that has had lots of sun exposure or other skin damage.

The 6 Wave Konjac Body Sponge is designed to gently exfoliate the body and soothe and cleanse all over! Gently exfoliating and sloughing off tired dead skin cells and helping reduce blemishes, ingrown hairs and generally keeping the skin in tip top condition. Your skin will feel smooth, and supple after use. No tightness or dryness.

Konjac is reputed for its health giving properties & used by the Japanese for over 1500 years, having originally been used as a medicine in the sixth century and is packed full of skin goodies -   lipids, sodium, potassium, magnesium, iron, phosphorus, copper, zinc, vitamin A, vitamin E, vitamin D, vitamin B1, vitamin B2, vitamin B6, vitamin B12, vitamin C, pantothenate, niacin, fatty acid, folic acid and fibre.

After using the sponge it’s really important to gently squeeze the sponge out between your 2 flattened hands (never wring it!) and then allow it to dry in a well ventilated place (or even store it in the fridge!) Never leave your sponge where it remains too wet, such as in the shower! The more fresh dry atmosphere your sponge is stored in, the longer it will last! Change your sponge every few months or when it starts to break down!

•    100% Natural Sponge
•    Gentle exfoliation
•    100% Colouring Free
•    100% Additive Free
•    100% Biodegradable
•    Naturally Sustainable
•    Environmentally Safe

name: Baby Calendula Bath (200ml)
product_description:
The Weleda Calendula Bath is a gentle bath product that is free of synthetic preservatives, fragrances and colourants. Developed by doctors and pharmacists, Weleda Calendula Bath is perfect for using just before bedtime as it promotes a peaceful night's sleep and helps to care for baby and infant skin.

Guaranteeing total comfort and care for your child's skin, this gentle product is made up of 100% natural ingredients, 88% of which are organic. - E.D

name: Joint and Muscle Herbal Arnica Bath Oil (100ml)

product_description: These I Gels from DuWop conform to the shape of the eye, bathing the entire area in soothing botanical extracts, as well as targeting specific issues. Just sit back and relax. Each pouch contains 3 pairs of igels, one of each color, that are reusable for up to 4 times if resealed in their airtight pouch.

product_description:
For a luxurious evening ritual, the Kneipp Sweet Dreams Valerian and Hops Bath Salts utilise pure and natural Thermal Spring Salt sourced from Saline Luisenhall, Europe's last remaining salt works.
Blending Valerian Essential Oil and Hops Extract, the relaxing bath salts soothe and calm the mind and body, whilst soaking away all your cares and worries to help you unwind after a busy, stressful day. Enjoy a peaceful moment and prepare for a perfect night's sleep.

product_description:

name: 100+ Pure Manuka Honey Blend
product_description:
MGO™ 100+ Manuka Honey Blend is derived from Leptospermum Scoparium, a plant unique to New Zealand; its flowers are powerfully fragrant and full of nectar which attributes Manuka Honey with its rich, dark and full-bodied flavour.
MGO™ 100+ Manuka Honey is certified to contain a minimum of 100mg/kg methylgyoxal. Methylgyoxal is a naturally occurring compound in Manuka Honey that lends the substance its remarkable and unique properties. No other system of measurement gives such a clear and simple indication; the higher the MGO™ rating, the higher the Methylglyoxal content.
All of our MGO™ Manuka Honey products are scientifically tested and verified to ensure you are getting consistent quality. Every batch is subjected to laboratory tests that measure various quality parameters including Dietary Methylglyoxal content. Great care is taken to ensure that the Methylglyoxal is maintained from the bee-hive to the finished product so you do not lose any of the valuable properties of this remarkable honey.

product_description: Enjoy a spa-inspired experience from home with the MONUspa Warming Ginger Body Oil; a luxurious formula that works to nourish, pamper and soften skin from top to toe. Infused with Jojoba Seed Oil, Calendula and Vitamins A and E, the lightweight oil transforms into a cleansing milk that melts onto the body to reveal smooth and supple skin. An invigorating blend of Ginger, Lemongrass and Orange Essential Oils awaken the mind and body, stimulating tired, aching muscles and leaving you feeling energised.

name: Black Turbo Wash (975ml)
product_description: Jump start your body with Jack Black Turbo Wash (975ml). The post-workout recovery treatment helps to detox the body by combining the sweet aromas of rosemary and eucalyptus. The wash helps reduce bacteria on skins surface whilst clearing nasal passages creating a revitalised feel to your body. -SA

name: Hauschka Almond Soothing Body Wash (200ml)
product_description: Gently cleanse skin from top to toe with the Almond Soothing Body Wash from Dr. Hauschka. Infused with quince seed extract and vegetable surfactants to effortlessly melt away dirt and impurities, the creamy foam delivers a deeply relaxing fragrance of pink almond petals to create a cloud of pure tranquillity. A blend of sunflower and avocado oils prevent over-drying so you can experience clean, touchably soft skin, without stripping moisture. E.N.

name: Block of Alum
product_description: The original aftershave. Alum is a natural mineral stone that has exceptional soothing and astringent properties – just what is needed after a close shave.Dampen the block and stroke it gently over the skin after shaving for a soothing effect. Minor nicks and cuts are targeted and irritation is calmed. This is an essential shaving tool no man should be without.

name: Pedi Man
product_description:
Gently yet effectively remove dry skin on your feet with the MICRO Pedi Man. Perfect for use on the soles and heels, it features a unique micro-mineral roller which spins 360 degrees, 30 times per second to buff away the hard skin that can become uncomfortable.
Safe and easy to use, the MICRO Pedi Man has an ergonomically designed handle with a rubberised grip that is comfortable to hold and manoeuvre, as well as being compact for  easy storage when not in use. - L.M.

Directions for Use:

Gently glide the MICRO Pedi over the soles of your feet.

name: Reflection Hand Wash (300ml)
product_description: Gently cleanse hands with the Reflection Hand Wash from Rituals. Infused with a nourishing blend of organic Eucalyptus and invigorating Rosemary, its soap-free formula eliminates impurities without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness. Hands will be left refreshed, hydrated and subtly fragranced. E.N.

name: Hauschka Birch Arnica Energising Body Oil (75ml)
product_description:
Rejuvenate tired, aching muscles with the Birch Arnica Energising Body Oil from Dr. Hauschka. Delivering a refreshing scent to uplift the mind and body, the oil is infused with nourishing arnica, burdock root, nettle and jojoba oil to relieve stiff, sore limbs for long-lasting comfort.
Its unique formula is carefully blended with sunflower oil using innovative rhythmic processing methods, heating the mixture to body temperature 37°C to transfer skin nurturing properties into the oil. Ideal as a post-exercise massage oil, you can expect soft, supple skin from top to toe. E.N.

name: de Provence My Beautiful Hand Kit: Mint Tea Liquid Soap and Hand Cream 300ml
product_description:
Compagnie de Provence's 'My Beautiful Hand Kit' combines a luxurious liquid soap with a lightweight hand cream to transform wanting skin.

The Set Contains:

Mint Tea Liquid Soap (300ml):
A luxurious soap dedicated to gently cleansing the hands and body. Crafted from vegetable oil in a cauldron according to authentic traditions, the delicate formula contains naturally foaming Coconut Oil and is free from colouring agents, animal fats and synthetic surfactants. Its fragrance, created in Grasse (the perfume capital of the world) is aromatic and revitalising, powered by Mint Tea and Lemon. Housed in an unbreakable plastic bottle. Refillable with a pump dispenser. No added parabens, silicones, mineral oils, or sulphates. Dermatologist tested.

Mint Tea Hand Cream (300ml):
A lightweight hand cream infused with Shea Butter and Almond Oil to leave hardworking hands feeling soft, moisturised and comfortable. Melting effortlessly into skin, the antioxidant-rich cream ensures hands are left protected, supple, hydrated and delicately scented with Mint Tea and Lemon.

name: Dante Romantica Rose and Peony Soap 250g
product_description:
Energise skin with the Nesti Dante Romantica Rose and Peony Soap; a fragrant, vegetable soap bar that is hand-crafted in Italy using the saponification method. Arriving wrapped in thick textured paper finished with a decorative floral print, the soap is an ideal gift, or the perfect treat to yourself.
Traditionally made utilising natural, raw ingredients, the soap gently cleanses skin to eliminate traces of dirt and impurities, without stripping skin of essential moisture. Romancing the senses, the cleansing bar boasts a refreshingly vibrant scent of Florentine rose and peony, which work in synergy to deliver a delicate fragrance that will invigorate the mind and body.

name: Back Comfort Devil's Claw Massage Oil (100ml)
product_description:
Enjoy a spa-inspired experience from home with the Kneipp Back Comfort Devil's Claw Massage Oil; a comforting treatment oil that works to soothe and release tension in the back and neck area.
Fortified with natural Cajeput Essential Oil and Devil's Claw Extract; a herbal ingredient renowned for its joint and muscle benefits, the high quality formula warms muscles and relieves aching limbs, whilst a nourishing blend of Sunflower and Almond Oils leave skin touchably soft. Ideal after workouts or sport activities.

name: Island Apothecary Uplift Festive Gift Set
product_description: The perfect Christmas gift for someone you love, Seascape Island Apothecary Uplift Festive Gift Set contains 100% natural essential oils including: Jersey Eucalyptus that stimulates circulation, Lime to energise the body and Lavender to refresh the senses. Ideal to kick start your day, the duo will start off your day the right way. -SA

name: & Evelyn Freesia Body Care Duo 300ml
product_description:
Crabtree & Evelyn's Freesia Body Care Duo is a limited edition pairing that has been carefully curated to cleanse and moisturise your skin whilst imparting a delectable fragrance. Utilising the brand's exclusive Triple Oil Blend, the duo work in synergy to leave the skin and senses feeling revived and replenished.
Florentine Freesia Indulgent Bath and Shower Gel (300ml)
A luxurious body wash that works into a rich lather to gently cleanse and moisturise the skin whilst uplifting the senses. Formulated with the brand's exclusive Triple Oil Blend of Moringa, Evening Primrose and Rosehip, it gently eliminates impurities and delivers antioxidant and anti-ageing properties to leave skin feeling soft and supple with a more youthful appearance. Fragrance: Italian Freesia, Cyclamen, Sweet Orange, Pear and Amber.
Florentine Freesia Luxurious Hydrating Body Lotion (300ml)
A lightweight yet intensely hydrating lotion that nourishes and moisturises from head to toe. Infused with a Triple Oil Blend comprising Moringa, Evening Primrose and Rosehip Oils, the formula melts effortlessly into skin, delivering omega fatty acids, vitamins and antioxidants to leave the body feeling replenished, nourished and silky soft. Fragrance: Italian Freesia, Orange, Pear and Amber. Free from colour and phthalates.

name: Bees Mama Bee Gift Collection
product_description:
Give the gift of gorgeous skin with Burt's Bees Mama Bee Gift Collection; a selection of indulgent skincare treats, perfect for mums and mums-to-‘bee’. Utilising natures finest ingredients, the products work in tandem to deliver ultimate nourishment and hydration, pampering from head-to-toe. Housed in branded gift box.
Mama Bee Leg and Foot Cream (95ml)
Can’t stand it? Get a leg up on aching muscles with Burt’s Bees Mama Bee Leg and Foot Créme. This rich cream is specially formulated with peppermint oil and rosemary extract to relax and soothe sore, tired muscles, legs and feet. Your legs will thank you for this special treatment during your pregnancy. Peppermint oil relaxes, soothes and conditions while rosemary leaf extract encourages healthy circulation bringing relief to sore, tired and stressed legs and feet.
Honey & Grapeseed Hand Cream (73.7g)
This ultra-rich hand cream is enriched with three exotic butters - jojoba, cupuacu and macadamia to pamper hands that are dry from everyday routines. It effortlessly melts into skin to moisturise and soften without a greasy after-feel. Antioxidant-rich grape seed and sunflower oils nourish for soft beautiful hands, naturally. Skin feels sumptuously soft and moisturised.
Ultimate Care Body Lotion (170g)
Treat extremely dry skin to the Ultimate Care Body Lotion; a fast-absorbing, ultra-moisturising formula that works to nourish and hydrate from top to toe. Harnessing the powers of Baobab Oil and nutrient-rich Pumpkin Seed, the lightweight lotion softens and conditions skin, whilst delivering a refreshing fragrance of Green Tea Extract. Expect smooth, supple and comfortable skin after use.
Beeswax Lip Balm with Vitamin E & Peppermint (4.25g)
Nourish and condition sore, cracked lips with this indulgent natural lip balm, bursting with Coconut and Sunflower Oils as well as essential fatty acids and vitamins. Whilst Beeswax seals in hydration, extract of Peppermint adds a refreshing tingle. Expect a softened and hydrated pout with this best-selling balm.
Tinted Lip Balm - Hibiscus (4.25g)
Moisturise whilst leaving a sheer tint on lips with the Burt's Bees Tinted Lip Balm. Formulated with popular nourishing ingredients such as shea butter, olive and coconut oils, it is made up from 100% natural ingredients. The tinted lip balm softens lips whilst leaving a pop of sheer colour and a soothing sweet taste.
Facial Towelettes with White Tea (30 Pack)
With natural cloth from FSC certified wood cellulose, the face wipes gently remove excess oil, dirt and make-up to leave skin refreshed and purified. Specially formulated with antioxidant white tea to protect skin from environmental aggressors and minimise damage caused by free radicals. A combination of botanical extracts, including cucumber and aloe leaf juice soothe and calm skin.

name: Nurture Hand Wash 200ml
product_description:
Indulge your hands with the Nurture Hand Wash from AromaWorks. The wash is designed to cleanse the hands without depriving them of essential moisture which can lead to dry skin and even irritation.
Enriched with a blend of Aloe Vera, Castor Seed Oil and Roman Camomile, the luxurious hand wash cleanses whilst delivering moisture to the skin, providing a soothing feel. The wash also boasts the ability to visibly reduce any discolouration, psoriasis and eczema due to May Chang, Bergamot and Rose Geranium. Hands are left clean, refreshed and ultra-smooth.

name: Skincare Atlantic Kelp and Magnesium Salt Anti-Fatigue Exfoliating Body Scrub 150ml
product_description:
Polish and perfect skin with the REN Skincare Atlantic Kelp and Magnesium Salt Anti-Fatigue Exfoliating Body Scrub; a luxurious body balm that works to smooth the skin.
Effortlessly massaging over the body, the Sea Salt infused scrub simultaneously sloughs away dead skin cells, promotes cell renewal and activates microcirculation, which in turn can relieve feelings of muscle fatigue. A hydrating blend of Atlantic Kelp Extract and Microalgae Oil helps to replenish comfortable moisture levels, whilst infusing skin with essential minerals.
Finished with a signature dose of REN’s anti-fatigue essential oil blend, the anti-fatigue exfoliator not only polishes and pampers skin, but has stress-alleviating effect on the mind. Expect a silky smooth body with skin boasting a healthy glow.

name: Hauschka Rose Nurturing Body Cream (145ml)
product_description: Dr. Hauschka's Rose Nurturing Body Cream is a fast-absorbing, harmonising moisturiser dedicated to comfort, nourish and protect skin from top to toe. Infused with rose essential oils and rose wax to deeply hydrate the skin and prevent dryness, whilst a blend of organic shea butter, almond oil and jojoba oil leaves skin touchably soft. Delivers a delicate fragrance of rose and supports the skin's natural barrier function to restore comfortable, silky smooth skin all-over the body. E.N.

name: ISSA™ Lavender Tongue Cleaner Attachment Head
product_description:
The FOREO Tongue Cleaner Attachment Head in 'Lavender' is suitable for any ISSA™ device and brings a finishing touch of hygiene to your everyday, oral care routine.
Crafted from non-porous silicone and curved to adapt to the shape of your tongue, the tongue cleaner delivers a deep and gentle cleanse, sweeping away bacteria with a non-abrasive action.  
Helping you achieve a healthier mouth and super-fresh breath, the attachment head resists bacteria build-up and only needs replacing once a year. Its flexibility prevents the application of too much pressure during use, and its innovative design inhibits the 'gag' effect.

name: Associates Renew Rose Body Wash (200ml)
product_description:
Pamper your skin with this luxurious Aromatherapy Associates Renew Rose Body Wash. This foaming body wash will gently cleanse your body, leaving your skin glowing, soft and silky smooth. Rose is renowned for its beautifying effects on the skin.
The Aromatherapy Associates Renew Rose Body Wash is suitable for normal skin and contains rose, roman camomile, sandalwood and aloe vera juice, making your skin soft and silky smooth.
Directions of Use:
Lookfantastic Notes:For adults only and keep out of reach of childrenOnce opened, this product is best used within 6 months

name: Pomegranate Creamy Body Wash (200ml)
product_description:
Weleda Pomegranate Creamy Body Wash invigorates your body with cleansing moisture to reveal nurtured skin that is soft to the touch. Infused with pure essential oils to stimulate senses this luxurious body wash will bring balance to your body and soul.
Using a delicate blend of pure essential oils of sandalwood davana and neroli the Weleda Pomegranate Creamy Body Wash gently refreshes and revitalises your skin. Eco-friendly and pH balanced, allow Weleda to pamper your skin to leave it feeling smooth and fresh.
Directions of use:

name: Baby's Nurturing Moisturising Cream 100ml
product_description: Look after Baby’s skin with Baby’s Nurturing Moisturising Cream from Jurlique. The formula is both gentle and non-greasy, designed for delicate and sensitive skin, perfect for babies. The plant based formula is enriched with naturally derived moisturising botanical oils that work to gently hydrate skin, leaving it smooth and calmed.

name: Bake 5 Minute Mousse (207ml)
product_description:
With the popular success of their 60 Minute Tan, Fake Bake have formulated an even quicker way to tan with their Fake Bake 5 Minute Mousse (207ml). The light-weight mousse glides on easily with its whipped texture and 'shows where it goes' colouring for a streak-free and even finish.
Transfer-resistant, the tanning mousse allows you to get dressed even sooner after application without staining your outfit. Step out in your ready-to-wear tan in just 5 minutes, and leave the formula to continue developing while you enjoy yourself. - K.R

name: Skincare Atlantic Kelp and Microalgae Anti-Fatigue Bath Oil 110ml
product_description:
Treat skin to ultimate nourishment with the REN Skincare Atlantic Kelp and Microalgae Anti-Fatigue Bath Oil; a luxurious formula that refreshes skin, whilst encouraging relaxation.
Simply add a small amount to a full bath, then lay back, take a deep breath and relax. The silky oil is enriched with Atlantic Kelp Extract, which ensures skin is comfortably hydrated and ultra-smooth, whilst a blend of Plankton Extract and Microalgae Oil energises the body. Cell renewal is encouraged and stress damage is reduced.
Finished with a signature dose of REN’s anti-fatigue essential oil blend, the anti-fatigue bath oil not only hydrates and pampers skin, but has stress-alleviating effect on the mind.

name: Body Ultimate Blends Restoring Butter (200ml)
product_description:
Treat skin to a full refreshment process with the Garnier Body Ultimate Blends Restoring Butter. Thick in texture with a wide range of essential Shea additives and supplements, the body lotion’s dense, creamy formula works closely on the skin to deliver heightened hydration, enabling faster revival and restoration.
Part of the Garnier Ultimate Blends range, the Restoring alternative caters especially to skin in need of renewal, providing ample levels of moisture, elasticity and suppleness. C.R

name: Ibrahimovic Zlatan Deodorant Stick 75ml
product_description: Developed by internationally renowned footballer, Zlatan Ibrahimović, the Zlatan Deodorant Stick delivers long-lasting protection against perspiration and body odours. Gliding on effortlessly for ultimate freshness, the fast-drying, alcohol-free formula infuses skin with a masculine scent of juicy Bergamot, spicy Pepper and freshly cut Grass, enhanced by Marine accords, Driftwood and striking Leather.

name: & Evelyn Tarocco Orange, Eucalyptus & Sage Bath & Shower Gel (250ml)
product_description:
A modern interpretation of a classic style of scent, Crabtree & Evelyn Tarocco Orange, Eucalyptus and Sage Bath and Shower Gel is inspired by the European tradition of citrus colognes that are ubiquitously used to fragrance the body from top to toe and even spritzed liberally throughout the home. The addition of Eucalyptus and Sage adds a bright, herbaceous twist that brings a contemporary edge. The blend of sparkling citrus with leafy green herbs is given just a touch of forest freshness with a hint of cedarwood and crushed patchouli leaves, wrapping the zesty herbaceous fruits in a sensuous embrace. The result is a clean, invigorating scent with universal appeal that subtly scents the skin and encourages an uplifting feeling of well-being.
Crabtree & Evelyn Tarocco Orange, Eucalyptus & Sage Bath & Shower Gel (250ml) - Gently invigorates, refreshes, and conditions, while leaving the skin deeply cleansed. Best used by pouring into warm, running water for a refreshing foam bath, or smoothed over wet skin and massage into a fresh-scented lather.

name: Immuno Forte (120ml)
product_description: Sambucol Immuno Forte is a health supplement that helps to support the immune system. With an AntiVirin® action, it's rich in vitamin C, zinc and antioxidants which can help to boost your body's natural defences. Featuring a delicious black elderberry flavour, the non-drowsy supplement is free from alcohol and gluten. Suitable for ages 3+. - L.M.

name: Skincare Workout Wonder Ball 30ml
product_description:
The perfect companion for your post-workout recovery, Mio Skincare's Workout Wonder Ball delivers a cooling sensation to ease tense, tight muscles after exercise.
Fortified with V-Tonic™; an innovative cocktail of Citrus, Lavender, Menthol, Cypress and Spearmint Essential Oils, the refreshing gel formula leaves you feeling invigorated and refreshed with restored comfort. Use on legs, neck, shoulders and arms.
A blend of Arnica-rich Horsetail, Pomegranate and Frankincense Extracts works to soothe sore, stressed and tired muscles from top to toe, whilst its rollerball applicator gently massages the body to loosen knots and kinks. Simply use the Wonder Ball after every workout to prepare for your next gym, yoga or fitness class.

name: Pro Collagen Lifting Treatment For Neck & Bust
product_description:
The Elemis Pro-Collagen Lifting Treatment for Neck And Bust is a revolutionary anti-ageing treatment that is clinically proven to reduce skin crêpiness by up to 33% and increase skin firmness by 17%.
A powerful Elemis solution for slackening skin, Pro-Collagen Lifting Treatment for Neck And Bust minimises the signs of ageing for a smoother, firmer, more youthful-looking neck and bust.
Padina pavonica, seabuckthorn, royal jelly and propolis have been carefully blended with aromatic waters of European samphire and cistacea to create a beautiful synergy of powerful age-defying actives.
Directions of use:

name: Bodycare Body Lotion (250ml)
product_description: The Body Lotion from Australian Bodycare is a gentle antiseptic to rehydrate skin. Specially formulated with tea tree oil, this lightweight lotion provides nourishing ingredients which work to revive dry skin and retain the skin's natural moisture levels. The handy pump action bottle allows easy application and the lotion absorbs quickly into skin so you can experience soft and supple skin that is comfortable for hours. E.N. Directions for use: Apply to skin using the palms of your hands and massage in sweeping circular movements.

name: Holiday Ornament Body Wash Infused Buffer - Peppermint
product_description:
Get into the festive spirit with the Peppermint fragranced Holiday Ornament Body Wash Infused Buffer from Spongellé. The white, snowflake shaped sponge arrives with a useful hanging ribbon for when it is not in use, which can double up as a Christmas ornament. Ideal as a gift or indulgent treat for yourself.
Enriched with extracts of Yuzu, Edelweiss and Vetiver root, the multi-purpose buffing sponge is designed to cleanse, exfoliate, massage and hydrate the skin.  Its unique surface transforms as you squeeze, changing from an exfoliating, massage texture to a smooth, cleansing sponge.
The innovative buffer is infused with Peppermint fragranced body wash, which envelops the body in a refreshing, mint aroma. Creating a creamy lather for up to 5 showers, the sponge leaves skin thoroughly cleansed and feeling soft and silky.

name: Citrus Hand Cream (125ml)
product_description:
Rejuvenate dry, over-worked and rough hands with Jurlique's Citrus Hand Cream; a rich, non-greasy moisturiser that works to restore velvety soft, supple skin whilst delivering an uplifting citrus fragrance.
Deeply nourishing and refreshing, the fast-absorbing cream is infused with almond and safflower seed oils to soothe and calm skin, leaving hands comfortable with long-lasting hydration.
Packed with natural antioxidants and plant-based ingredients to protect from environmental aggressors, helping to maintain youthful-looking, silky smooth hands. Presented in a branded box, making the perfect treat for yourself or loved one. E.N.

name: Brown Mulberry & Thyme Hand Lotion
product_description:
Care for your hands with Molton Brown Mulberry & Thyme Enriching Hand Lotion, a moisturising formula infused with Mulberry extract to comfort and protect your skin.
Infused with a French mountain-inspired, herby fragrance of Basil, Mimosa and Thyme, the aromatic emulsion melts effortlessly into skin and delivers a veil of hydrating comfort; its skin-enriching properties leave hands feeling soothed, pampered and comfortable.

name: Wild Cow Invigorating Body Lotion
product_description:
Instantly energise skin with the Cowshed Wild Cow Invigorating Body Lotion; an invigorating moisturiser that eliminates dry skin, whilst enveloping the body in a delicate fragrance.
Enriched with a skin-loving blend of premium Shea and Cocoa Butters, the body lotion delivers long-lasting moisture, which leaves the body enviably smooth and silky. The hydrator also boasts a boosting blend of Lemongrass, Ginger and Rosemary Essential Oils, which lends skin a light and oriental scent.
Expect touchably soft skin, without an unwanted greasy residue.

name: Rejuvenating Rose Indulgence Gift Set
product_description:
Perfectly pamper skin with the Rejuvenating Rose Indulgence Gift Set from AromaWorks. Combining a luxurious candle, face serum and eye serum, the kit works to reignite a youthful glow, whilst calming and relaxing the senses. Complete with a soft embroidered headband.
Rejuvenate Face Serum Oil (30ml)
A gentle formula infused with essential oils and BioActive ingredients to calm and smoothen the appearance of skin. Targeting signs of ageing and loss of elasticity, the serum oil delivers a host of vitamins and antioxidants to help comfort and tone the skin, whilst reducing visible signs of ageing. Infused with an aromatic fragrance powered by sweet Carrot, Bergamot and floral Rose.
Absolute Eye Serum Oil (20ml)
A fast-absorbing, anti-ageing formula that works to smoothen and moisturise skin. Fortified with BioActive ingredients, the powerful serum works to minimise the appearance of dark circles and wrinkles, whilst Hyaluronic Acid delivers superior hydration to reveal a brighter, more refined eye contour. Imparts a luxurious fragrance blended from Sweet Carrot, Bergamot, Rose and Frankincense to uplift the skin and senses. Can be used as an eye mask for an intense overnight treatment.
'Essential Rose' Candle (10cl)
Infuse an fruity, floral fragrance into your abode with the Essential Rose Candle; expertly crafted from the finest Soy and Beeswax. Blending pure essential oils of Moroccan Rose, Violet Leaf, Mandarin and Patchouli, the luxurious candle creates a cloud of pure tranquillity to relax the mind and body, whilst releasing tension and fatigue.

name: 24Hr High Performance Deodorant Stick (75g)
product_description:
An intensive "reactivating" Deodorant Stick, Aramis 24hr High Performance provides continuous long-term odour and wetness protection with an invigorating and masculine scent that gives the wearer a richly sophisticated edge.
Keep wetness and odour at bay with the Aramis 24hr High Performance Deodorant Stick. This long lasting deodorant works as hard as you do, ensuring you remain composed, dry and smelling great throughout the day. Notes of bergamot, cumin and jasmine express confidence and refined character with a distinctive, sensitive style.
Aramis embodies male strength and virility and is one of the few current fragrance lines for men with a strong, recognisably leathery scent boasting rice spices, leather, moss and clove blended with notes of patchouli, amber and musk.

name: Health Propolis and MGO 400 Manuka Honey Throat Spray 30ml
product_description:
The Manuka Health Propolis and MGO 500 Manuka Honey Throat Spray is a powerful combination of Propolis, MGO™400+ Manuka honey and essential oils including Myrrh, Peppermint and Aniseed for instant soothing of the mouth and throat. Alongside soothing sore throats, the spray helps to maintain oral health, boost the immune system and even freshen breath.
Blended with MGO™400+ Manuka Honey, renowned for its unique activity and antibacterial properties, the spray helps to combat a sore throat by halting the growth of Strep bacteria. The spray is also concentrated with Propolis, an ingredient gathered by bees in New Zealand and used to protect their hives against infection. Propolis within the spray works as ‘nature’s antibiotic’ due to the antioxidant and antiseptic properties of bioflavonoids.

name: Read Coconut Melting Tanning Balm Face & Body 150ml
product_description:
Achieve a natural-looking, golden tan with the James Read Coconut Melting Tanning Balm Face & Body; a unique formula that effortlessly melts upon contact with skin, developing into an enviable bronzed glow.
Enriched with 100% Organic Coconut Oil and subtle yet effective tanning agents, the rich balm deeply nourishes skin by enveloping the face and body in a veil of moisture. The hydrating formula utilises James Read’s Tantone Technology™, which tailors the tanning result to your natural skin tone in order to deliver the most natural-looking result.
The balm smoothes effortlessly over skin and can be applied in layers in order to build the desired colour and depth of tan. Expect a beautiful bronzed glow to appear gradually and last up to five days.

name: Organics Real Luxury Body Scrub
product_description:
Reveal smooth, radiant skin with the NEOM Organics Real Luxury Body Scrub. Boasting an organic sugar base which gently sloughs away dirt and dead skin cells, the scrub is enriched with safflower and jojoba oils and vitamin E to nourish and soften your skin.
With a comforting fragrance of lavender, jasmine and Brazilian rosewood that will relax and calm your senses, this indulgent scrub will leave you feeling revitalised both in body and mind. It's also made with 97% organic ingredients, so you can be sure your skin is getting the best possible care. - L.M.

name: Laser Eraser Cellulite Intelligent Solution (120ml)
product_description: Boasting a totally detoxifying formula to improve microcirculation, the Body Care Laser Eraser Cellulite Intelligent Solution from Nubo utilises the latest in Thermogenesis technology, helping to tone and tighten the skin, revealing a dimple-free physique. Combining artichoke and quinoa extracts with methylxanthines to suppress the activity of fat-storing cells, this intelligent body-contouring solution helps to shift stubborn cellulite, whether it is caused by ageing, weight fluctuation or hormones, as this unique combination prevents the future storage of fat while stimulating the body’s innate ability to release existing fat. - E.D

name: Home Spa Scented Water - Revitalizing 150ml
product_description:
Invigorate skin with the Revitalizing Home Spa Scented Water from PUPA; a delicately fragranced, ultra-fine mist that transports the senses with a zingy citrus scent.
Aromatic notes of Orange, Lemon and Yellow Tangerine are expertly layered with Cardamom and Mate Oils to create a positive, effervescently sunny fragrance with an instantly uplifting effect and sense of wellbeing. Extract of Coralline Alga delivers essential amino acids and mineral salts to give skin a boost of energy.

name: Tweezer Pointer Swiss Cross
product_description: The Pointer Swiss Cross Rubis Tweezer features a pointed tip which allows for precise plucking and helps with the removal of ingrown hairs and splinters. Made of epoxy-coated surgical steel, the high-quality tweezers are acid-proof, anti-magnetic and rustproof. Featuring tips that close perfectly, precise edges and an arm of tension that yields a lightly-resilient resistance, the reliable Rubis tweezers are handmade in Switzerland by skilled employees, using a 45-step process. - L.M.

name: Jojoba Company 100% Natural Jojoba and Rosehip Oil 30ml
product_description:
Treat dry and wanting skin with 100% Natural Jojoba and Rosehip Oil from The Jojoba Company. Suitable for all skin types, the multi-tasking treatment combines the deeply penetrating powers of Jojoba with intensively nourishing Rosehip for measurable results.
Brimming with antioxidants, essential fatty acids and vitamins, the lightweight formula rapidly absorbs into skin without feeling greasy, helping to optimise hydration levels and address uneven skin tones. Ideal for alleviating the look of stretch marks and scars, it leaves skin feeling smooth and supple with a more balanced and refined tone.

name: Magik Organiks Sleep Therapy Deep Sleep Lavender Bath Salts
product_description:
Encourage a good night’s sleep with the Spa Magik Organiks Sleep Therapy Deep Sleep Lavender Bath Salts; ideal for soaking away the days worry and stress.
Allowing you to thoroughly unwind, the salts are packed with a relaxing cocktail of Dead Sea Salt, Bromide and Magesium, which also work in synergy to combat insomnia. Alongside providing superior relaxation, the salts are enriched with Jojoba and Cactus oils, which offer nourishment and skin softening benefits.
Complete with a delicate and harmonising Lavender aroma, the salts seek to improve the length and quality of sleep.

name: Tanning Essentials Duo - Fair/Medium
product_description:
Give the gift of a long-lasting sunkissed tan with this duo from TANWORX. Whether you want to treat a friend, family member or yourself, the TANWORX Self Tanning Essentials Duo Light is the ideal package to create a flawless, even yet natural looking tan. - K.R
The TANWORX Self Tanning Essentials Duo Light contains:
Hydrating Body LotionUltra moisturising, this lotion is designed to deeply hydrate and smooth the skin in preparation for your tan. Providing a soft and non-sticky canvas, your tan can glide on easily without sticking to dry areas or becoming patchy. Use 10 minutes before self tanning for an easy application and a perfect finish that lasts.
Self Tanning Lotion - LightGiving you an instant glow allowing you to see where to apply your self-tan, the lightweight tanning lotion develops and darkens over the course of 3 hours, leaving you with a natural looking, lightly sunkissed tan. The formula glides on easily, leaving an even streak-free glow.
Tanning MittApply your tanning products quickly and easily without worrying about staining your hands. The tanning mitt has been made with a special formula-resistant barrier, protecting hands and wrists from staining. The soft mitt provides an even, streak-free tan with every product, which can then be put into the washing machine to clean when you're done.

name: F. Trumper Travel Limes Body Scrub 200ml
product_description:
This Limes Body Scrub by Geo. F. Trumper is a zesty and exhilarating body scrub that is designed to exfoliate the skin and awaken the senses, lightly perfuming your skin with the scent of a delicious and incredibly zingy bouquet of citrus. This scrub boasts a vibrant and powerful fresh scent, and will help to revitalise your skin.
This Trumpers Limes Body Scrub is perfect for the whole body, and is comprised of the heavenly juices of freshly squeezed West Indian limes, allowing you to smell exotic and tropical with every use. Awaken your body, mind and soul with this incredibly sharp and tangy scrub, and let your skin step into smooth and supple tropical paradise.

product_description:
Take an aromatic journey through the hills of Florentine with Nesti Dante's Dei Colli Fiorentini Poppy Soap, a perfumed cleansing bar that has been crafted using the old craft saponification method of boiling in a cauldron.
Developed in Florence with high quality ingredients, the natural, vegetable-based soap gently cleanses and purifies your skin to leave the body feeling soft and supple; it transforms into a rich lather that eliminates impurities whilst imparting the intoxicating scent of Poppy. The soap is embossed and wrapped in elegant, decorative paper.

product_description: The FOREO ISSA™ mini Brush Head in Mango Tango is made using premium grade silicone and without BPA and phthalates. Suitable for the ISSA™ toothbrush, the brush head discourages the formation of bacteria to leave your mouth feeling ultra clean. Boasting flexible bristles, the brush will give you a 3D clean and what’s more, it only has to be replaced once a year. – I.M

name: Orange Blossom Shower Gel 250ml
product_description: Wonderfully vibrant, the Orange Blossom Shower Gel is made with natural vegetable bases, an Olive Oil base, without parabens. Infused with scent of the essential oil from the flower of the Orange Tree, infused with Neroli Pettigrain, with wood based tones, the Ortigia Orange Blossom Shower Gel will infuse your bathroom with a delightful Mediterranean fragrance.

name: Klein One Body Moisturiser (250ml)
product_description: Replenish and hydrate skin after bathing or showering with the Calvin Klein One Body Moisturiser. Perfectly complementing the brand's signature CK One fragrance, the fast-absorbing, creamy formula leaves skin smooth, soft and infused with a fresh scent of Bergamot, Pineapple, Papaya, Green Tea and Cardamom. Housed in a pump bottle for mess-free application.

name: British Botanicals Shower Cream 200ml
product_description:
Delve into a wonderfully British shower experience with the British Botanical Shower Cream by Elemis. Featuring a beautiful limited edition floral design by Amanda Ross, this cream contains home-grown botanicals, organic oats and essential oils of Lavender, Chamomile, Geranium and Palmarosa to moisturise your skin and to leave it healthy as well as glowing. The scent is both invigorating and calming which makes the cream suitable for use in the morning and in the evening. LB
Directions for use:
Squeeze a small amount of shower cream into wet palms, massage over body and rinse off. Avoid direct contact with eyes, should contact occur, rinse thoroughly with water.

name: & Evelyn Gardeners Hand Scrub With Pumice (195g)
product_description:
Perfect for very dry and work-roughened hands, Crabtree & Evelyn Gardeners Hand Scrub With Pumice (195g) is rich in shea butter to provide intense nourishment.
Enriched with fragrant fresh green clover, lavender, sage, rosemary and thyme, it works in three ways to exfoliate, moisturise and condition your skin, instantly restoring suppleness and softness. Delivering quick results, it leaves your hands noticeably smooth and soft, as well as helping them to feel more comfortable. Directions of Use:

name: Skincare Quickstart Exhilarating Shower Gel (200ml)
product_description:
Kick-start your day with the Mio Skincare Quickstart Exhilarating Shower Gel; an energising cleanser that gently and effectively cleans and nourishes skin, whilst enveloping the body in an uplifting fragrance.
Utilising natural, Coconut derived cleansers, the shower gel effortlessly lathers over the body, eliminating daily dirt, oils and impurities without stripping the skin of essential moisture and vital oils. The cleanser also works to protect skin from free radical damage, due its antioxidant-rich formula comprising Spearmint and Witch Hazel.
The shower gel not only cleanses and nourishes skin, but visibly brightens the body for a refreshed and healthy-looking appearance. Complete with an awakening dose of Caffeine derived from Guarana, the multi-tasking shower gel helps to prepare you for the day ahead.

name: Spa Factory Wild Rose Body Salt Scrub
product_description:
Indulge your skin with the Wild Rose Body Salt Scrub from Natural Spa Factory. The luxurious salt scrub boasts an oil-based formula that delivers intense hydration to the skin, alongside a delicate aroma. The formula easily absorbs into the skin without leaving a greasy residue or clogging the pores, which can lead to blemishes.
Enriched with Peach Kernel oil, the scrub boasts essential Linoleic and Oleic fatty acids which give the formula a unique affinity to the skin and protects the body by supporting its barrier function. Containing Rose Petals, the treatment boasts compounds to improve the skin’s metabolism and clear toxins from the body, whilst also popular to relieve feelings of stress.
Suitable for even sensitive skin types, the formula contains Grape Seed oil that aims to visibly tighten skin and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, leaving the body younger looking and incredibly smooth.

name: Spa Factory Geranium and Grapefruit Body Scrub
product_description:
Perfectly pamper skin from top to toe with the Natural Spa Factory Geranium and Grapefruit Body Scrub; a rejuvenating formula that works to exfoliate, refresh and refine the body.
Fortified with Sea Salt, Peach Kernel Oil and Grape Seed Oil, the luxurious treatment gently buffs away dirt and impurities, whilst providing antioxidant protection and leaving skin with a tighter, firmer appearance. Envelops the body in an uplifting fragrance of Grapefruit and Geranium.

name: to Tomatoes Detoxifying Charcoal Skin Care Kit
product_description:
Say yes to the Tomatoes Detoxifying Charcoal Skincare Kit; a powerful trio of plant-based treatments that seek draw out impurities, combat acne breakouts and reveal a brighter, refined complexion. Ideal for oily and combination skin types.
Tomatoes Detoxifying Charcoal Cleanser (147ml)
Containing active ingredient Salicylic Acid, the natural cleanser works to unclog pores and regulate excess sebum production, with eco-friendly Jojoba Spheres for gentle exfoliation. Charcoal draws out impurities without stripping away essential moisture, while antioxidant-rich Tomato extract delivers essential free radical protection. Skin feels clean, balanced and refreshed.
Tomatoes Detoxifying Charcoal Mud Mask (93g)
Lavishly rich and creamy, the indulgent face mask contains a detoxifying blend of Salicylic Acid and Charcoal powder, working to dissolve dirt, excess oil and impurities. Enriched with a natural blend of Tomato, Aloe and Watermelon extracts, it infuses skin with moisture and antioxidants to reveal a clear and softened complexion.
Tomatoes Detoxifying Charcoal Bar Soap (195g)
Suitable for face and body use, the nourishing soap bar eliminates dirt and impurities, harnessing the natural abilities of Charcoal to absorb toxins and oil. Botanical extracts of Tomato, Sunflower Seed Oil and Willow Bark deliver essential nutrients and antioxidants for skin that feels smooth, refreshed and nourished.

name: 400+ Manuka Honey with CycloPower
product_description:
Experience the benefits of Manuka Honey in an even more powerful form. MGO™ 400+ Manuka Honey with CycloPower™ is a chewable tablet form of MGO™ 400 Manuka Honey; one tablet contains 3 teaspoons of MGO 400™ Manuka Honey and offers up to 50 times the effect of MGO™ 400 alone thanks to increased bioavailability.
CYCLOPOWER™ is the most active form of Manuka Honey available; encapsulating MGO™ 400 Manuka Honey in a cyclodextrin molecule increases the powerful benefits, and is perfect for those who do not enjoy the taste of honey (the tablets have a mild honey flavour). Each chewable tablet is convenient, easy to swallow and low GI.

name: Men's Indulgence Gift Set
product_description:
AromaWorks' Indulgence Gift Set for Men combines a hydrating aftershave lotion with a calming body wash to leave skin feeling cleansed and cooled. Complete with a flannel and scented candle for a truly therapeutic experience.
Calming Aftershave Lotion (100ml):
Infused with 13 BioActive ingredients including Mandarin and Bergamot essential oils, the hydrating formula expertly cools and calms skin; it conditions and invigorates to leave the face and neck feeling cool and looking radiant after shaving. Infused with a handsome fragrance powered by Mandarin, Bay and Cedarwood.
Calming Body Wash (300ml):
A hydrating blend of essential oils that work in synergy to help clean and refresh your skin. Infused with 10 BioActive ingredients and a citrusy, spicy scent powered by Mandarin and Bay, the body wash gently cleanses away impurities whilst conditioning and invigorating the body. Skin feels fresh and smells decadent.
Yang Candle (10cl):
Nutmeg, Ho Leaf and Mandarin.

name: Matt Refresh and Moisturise Set - 15ml (3 Products)
product_description:
Treat your skin to the men-ü Matt Refresh and Moisturise Set, a three piece kit that promises to cleanse, refresh and moisturise your skin. Combining a face wash, gel and moisturiser, expect oil-free, recharged, healthy looking skin. - K.N.
1 x healthy facial wash 15ml:
Soap free and Ph. balanced, this deep cleansing facial wash is ideal for pre and post shave when your skin is most vulnerable. Fortified with antiseptic tea tree oil, witch hazel and aloe vera, the refreshing blend helps to protect from spots and shaving irritation, whilst soothing and controlling excess grease. Working into a discreet lather, the face wash will leave your face highly moisturised and free from irritation.
1 x matt ‘skin refresh’ gel 15ml:
Fragrance free, this facial gel works to cleanse the complexion, removing and controlling excess oil with its anti-shine properties. Fortified with salicylic acid, witch hazel and willow bark, the gel helps to rid pores of impurities, in turn preventing breakouts and clogged pores, whilst toning and tightening the skin. Perfect for using post shave, the formula helps to overcome ingrown hairs. Your face will be left feeling deeply cleansed, unclogged and noticeably soothed.  
1 x matt moisturiser 15ml:
Oil and fragrance free, this daily moisturiser works to deeply hydrate the skin whilst combating excess grease and sebum; the main offender for spots and breakouts. Containing sebum absorbers to fight greasy areas on the face, including the infamous T-zone, the formula simultaneously fights excess oil whilst deeply hydrating, leaving your skin with a healthy, matt finish. Also contains vitamin E which helps tackle ageing free radicals. Can be used day or night.

name: Purify Body Oil 100ml
product_description:
Treat skin to luxury with the Purify Body Oil from AromaWorks. The pregnancy-friendly elixir is ideal for dry, stressed and fatigued skin, whilst also boasting benefits such as reducing the appearance of cellulite.
Enriched with Coconut Oil, Vitamin E and Organic Pumpkin Seed Oil, the oil delivers hydration to the body and promotes an enviably smooth finish. The oil also provides a soothing feel to aching muscles and calms the senses with its decadent herbal scent.

name: Sun Silhouette Refining Protective Emulsion SPF 15 (125ml)
product_description:
Protect and sculpt your body with Phytomer’s multi-tasking Sun Silhouette Refining Protective Emulsion with SPF 15. The innovative 2-in-1 sun cream utilises advanced technologies to offer protection from harmful rays whilst helping to tone and firm your figure.
Enriched with Original Seawater, the formula utilises the slimming properties of an ancient alga to help eliminate excess fat, whilst Halopteris Scoparia and Palmaria Palmata stimulate the reproduction of collagen and blood circulation to encourage fat draining. Lightweight and non-greasy, the sun screen offers a sweet summer scent and light-reflecting particles that enhance a natural tan.

name: Fango Deep Hydration Finishing Treatment (248ml)
product_description:
Intensely moisturise your skin with the Borghese Fango Deep Hydration Finishing Treatment, a dry oil spray that deeply hydrates and calms skin.
Supporting the skin's natural moisture barrier, the treatment combines emollient Jojoba and Safflower Seed Oils with Bisabolol and Aloe to deliver deep down hydration whilst softening, calming and relieving skin. The complexion is left feeling silky and moisturised with enhanced radiance.

product_description: Hydrate and condition hard-working hands with Molton Brown's Gingerlily Hand Lotion; a fast-absorbing formula that works to restore soft, supple skin for long-lasting comfort. A nourishing blend of white lily extract and Polynesian tamanu nut oil moisturise and rejuvenate, whilst warming ginger and cardamom impart an exotic fragrance to uplift the skin and senses. Complete with a pump bottle for mess-free application.

product_description:
The perfect pick-me-up for tired skin, Cowshed Grumpy Cow Uplifting Shower Scrub will refresh your body and mind. Ground bamboo and cherry stone particles gently exfoliate, sloughing away dead cells to leave your skin looking refined and radiant.
Meanwhile, an invigorating blend of grape seed, grapefruit and mandarin essential oils help to uplift your mood, whilst hydrating and nourishing your skin so that you feel completely energised. - L.M.Directions of Use:

product_description:
Treat hands and cuticles to Leighton Denny's Time Repair Anti-Ageing Miracle Oil; a fast-absorbing formula that works to nourish, hydrate and soften skin.
Harnessing the moisturising powers of Rosehip Oil, Vitamin A and an innovative Timecode™ Complex, the non-greasy oil helps to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, whilst delivering long-lasting hydration to leave hands comfortable around the clock. A dose of Tea Tree Oil soothes and replenishes to reveal touchably soft, smooth and youthful-looking hands.

product_description:

Crafted from Dupion silk, characterised by its luxurious sheen, the oversized mask features a super soft cotton velvet lining for ultimate comfort and a ribbon tie fastening to allow a custom fit. Featuring comfortable magnetic insoles with multiple perforated massage nodules, the slippers help to massage the reflex points in your feet, stimulating the nervous system and enhancing the body's metabolism. Ideal for yoga, travelling or even in the office, the cosy, lightweight slippers improve circulation, whilst gently soothing and relieving aching, heavy legs. Perfect for in-flight use to prevent swelling. Adorned with an elegant print and bow. Non-slip. Small: UK 3-4 / EU 36-37. Medium: UK 5-6 / EU 38-39. Large: UK 7-8 / EU 40-41.

name: Birthing Company Bosom Buddies Breastfeeding Oils 3 x 10ml
product_description:
Natural Birthing Company's Bosom Buddies Breastfeeding Oils are a must-have for all mums embarking on breastfeeding journeys. The oil blends work to help ease and relieve feelings of discomfort commonly known during breastfeeding, such as swollen breasts or tender nipples. Simply add a few drops to water, soak a flannel and enjoy a relaxing compress. Their therapeutic scents will also help to uplift your senses.
"Ooh!" for Engorged Breasts (10ml):
Specially created to help relieve the discomfort of tender, swollen breasts. The oil blend combines Geranium with Peppermint, Cyprus and German Chamomile to help you feel more comfortable. Add a few drops to water and use a flannel for a relieving compress.
"Aah!" for Low Milk Supply (10ml):
Breastfeeding is a supply and demand process; the more you do it, the more milk you produce. Combining Fennel, Lemongrass and Mandarin, this special blend can be used in conjunction with offering your baby the breast more frequently to help enhance your milk supply.
"Ouch!" for Sore Nipples (10ml):
A blend of Lavender, Neroli, Mandarin, Frankincense and Peppermint that works to relieve and moisturise sore, irritated nipples. Combined with correct positioning, it helps to promote a more enjoyable breastfeeding experience.

product_description:
