Enriched with Raspberry extracts and Cocoa Butter, it effortlessly melts into skin to instantly alleviate soreness and rough patches, with an Omega-rich blend of Grapeseed, Avocado, Kiwi and Blackcurrant helping to repair skin’s natural lipid barrier for long lasting results.
The addition of Keratin Amino Acid encourages strong, healthy-looking nails while anti-ageing Red Algae minimises the look of discolouration caused by sun damage. Skin feels refreshed and replenished, imbued with a natural fragrance of crisp Palmarosa and delicate Ylang Ylang.

Infused with three natural oils (Jojoba, Apricot Kernel and Sweet Almond) and vitamin-rich Caviar, the dry body oil expertly moisturises and softens skin, leaving a shimmering, radiant finish in its wake. Suitable for the body, face and hair, it delivers antioxidant action to slow down the ageing process, and enhances your skin’s tone to highlight the décolleté, arms and legs. Hair and skin is left feeling soft, glowing and enriched with a subtle amber scent. Non-sticky.

product_description:
Douse your skin in luxurious comfort with Thalgo's Silky Smooth Cream, a nourishing body cream infused with a host of active ingredients to expertly soften and protect skin.
Melting effortlessly into skin, the cream cocoons the body in a veil of softness, working to smoothen and nourish with a blend of Shea Butter and Rice Germ Oil, and protect with extract of Brown Algae. Skin feels silky smooth and intensely nourished. Notes of Iris and Jasmine.

The energy bank™ range from this works has been put together to give you a mental and physical boost in the morning. The collection features a variety of natural face, body and bath products. A.B.

product_description: Murad make sure that each and every one of their products meets their high standards. LB

product_description:
Discover a multi-purpose hydrator with the Verdure Moisturising Oil from Malée Natural Science. The lightweight formula is both nourishing and luxurious, transforming the condition of dry skin, hair and nails. Ultra-versatile, the oil can be used inside a bath or directly onto skin and hair.
Inspired by Africa’s wetlands, the oil envelops skin and hair in a fresh forest green fragrance that guarantees to uplift and revitalise with warm and earthy notes of Citrus, Mint and Patchouli.
Boasting a potent blend of natural Sweet Almond, Coconut and Argan oil, the moisturising oil is rich in vitamins, fatty acids and essential moisture. The oil absorbs effortlessly and is able to penetrate and strengthen hair, skin and nails. Without leaving behind an oily or greasy residue, the treatment delivers intense hydration, leaving all areas of the body nourished and cared for.

Chromium is a trace mineral that is essential to health and can be naturally found in wholegrain foods, eggs and meat.
This effective pill contains 200µg of the trace mineral chromium. Chromium contributes to normal macronutrient metabolism and the maintenance of normal blood glucose levels making this a perfect dietary additional to help support body goals and regulate blood sugar levels, this may be beneficial for individuals with diabetes.
Chromium is recommended for anyone wanting to enhance glucose metabolism, making this supplement ideal for weight management programmes, exercise and management of diabetes. To be taken as part of a varied and balanced diet and a healthy lifestyle.

name: Renaissance Hand and Body Cream (150ml)
product_description:
OSKIA Renaissance Hand and Body Cream is a luxurious anti-ageing treatment for both the hands and body. Delicately scented with nurturing rose and chamomile, the luxurious and effective moisturiser leaves skin visibly softer, smoother and rejuvenated.
The nourishing cream balances bio-available vitamins, fermented minerals and effective bio-actives, which stimulate cell-renewal for anti-ageing benefits. Use of Swiss Garden Cress reduces the appearance of pigmentation, age spots and uneven skin tone in order to improve the skin’s overall radiance and create a youthful glow. The cream contains natural fruit acids that gently exfoliate the skin, hydrating and gently removing dull and dry skin cells, which can reduce the appearance of Keratosis Pilaris.

product_description: Restore moisture and obtain soft skin with this easy to spread Musgo Real Body Cream. Glycerin, olive and almond oil extracts blended with shea butter make the perfect hydrating formula for tired or tight, dry skin. Together with the distinctive, masculine fragrance of spiced citrus, it will keep your skin feeling nourished and fresh. E.N.

Ideal for home or travelling, you can wake up feeling restored and refreshed with reduced stress. Dimensions: 24cm x 12cm.

product_description:

The hydrating and soothing oil will give your skin a soft and supple texture, whilst the convenient rollerball applicator makes it ideal for using when you're on-the-go. - L.M.
Directions for Use: Apply to the face or body, massaging gently into the skin.

product_description:
A great introduction to the entire Renu range or a luxurious travel set, the Renu Beauty Bag is an exquisite collection of 8 beautifying essentials which promise to leave your skin with a youthful glow and a fresh, vibrant complexion.
The Renu Beauty Bag has been created from over twenty years experience of blending high quality natural ingredients with the latest advances in skincare technology to effectively combat the three main types of ageing.
Renu Flash Relax Mask - 30ml
A luxurious gel mask, Renu Flash Relax Mask smoothes fine lines and helps firm facial contours for an instant face-lift effect.

A luxurious cleanser which gently and effectively removes make-up without damaging the skin’s protective barrier, Renu Rich Cream Cleanser restores comfort to leave your skin clean, soft, rejuvenated and renewed.

A silky lotion which gently refreshes the skin after daily cleansing while protecting its protective barrier, Renu Soft Touch Toner restores comfort to leave your skin clean, soft, rejuvenated and renewed.

Scientifically developed using evening primrose and rosehip oils - a rich source of essential fatty acids - to maintain suppleness and elasticity, Renu Restoring Cream – Light also promotes collagen and elastin production with a blend of wild yarn extract and vitamin C.
Renu Restoring Cream (Rich) - 30ml
A gorgeous day moisturiser which helps to firm slackening skin and plump up deep wrinkles. Ideal for dryer skins requiring extra nourishment, this skin saviour is scented with a fresh, feminine blend of floral essential oils.
Renu Radiant Skin Peel - 30ml
Powerful fruit enzymes reveal instantly radiant skin, reducing the appearance of fine lines and pores while papaya enzymes gently polish away dulling dead skin and lactic acid stimulates cell renewal for smoother, fresher skin.
Renu Lip & Eye Active Lift - 15ml
Smooth fine and expression lines and plump deeper wrinkles in the vulnerable eye area with Renu Lip And Eye Active Lift. Especially prone to skin fatigue and signs of ageing, you can rejuvenate your peepers in an instant with Renu.

product_description:

Infused with Aloe, Shea Butter and Avocado Oil, the hand cream melts quickly into skin, delivering nutrients and vitamins to help hydrate rough, chapped patches. Hands feel moisturised and repaired with no greasy residue.

product_description:
Soften and smoothen your skin with the Spongellé Spongology Spongology Body Wash Infused Anti-Cellulite Glove in 'Milk & Honey' from the brand's Shower with Nature Collection. The eco-friendly exfoliating glove has been designed to cleanse, buff and massage skin with its time-released body wash.
Utilising Proprietary Infusion Technology that offers a guaranteed number of washes (over 20), the saturated glove expertly cleanses, exfoliates and massages skin; it combines organic extracts to expertly lift away impurities whilst softening and stimulating circulation to improve the appearance of cellulite and promote smoother, younger-looking skin. Its unique surface changes as you squeeze, from a gentle exfoliator to a soft, silky texture with rich and creamy lather that leaves skin feeling smooth, purified and revitalised.

product_description:
Experience a massaging cleanse with the Spongellé Body Wash Infused Buffer Duo in 'Pink Tiare', two cleansing sponges enriched with an age-defying, antioxidant-rich, time-released body wash.
Utilising Moisturising Oil Proprietary Infusion Technology that offers a guaranteed number of washes (over 30), each saturated buffer expertly cleanses, moisturises and boosts circulation; extracts of Yuzu, Edelweiss and Vetiver work in synergy to lift away impurities whilst softening and hydrating from head to toe. The unique surface changes as you squeeze, from a gentle exfoliator to a soft, silky sponge with rich and creamy lather that leaves skin feeling smooth, purified and revitalised with restored elasticity. Infused with an exotic floral fragrance. Housed in a gift box.

name: Men's Body Wash Infused Super Buffer - Verbena Absolute
product_description:
Transform your shower experience with the Spongellé Men's Body Wash Infused Super Buffer; a multi-use, multi-function sponge that cleanses, exfoliates and hydrates all-in-one.
Featuring a built-in body wash with proprietary infusion technology, the innovative buffer delivers a time-released lather to sweep away dirt and impurities while gently polishing the surface layer for long lasting freshness. Enriched with Coconut Oil and Vetiver Root, skin feels softened and invigorated with a subtle masculine scent.

name: Ultra Probiotic 185ml
product_description:
Take care of your body with Bodyism Ultra Probiotic, an extra-strength food supplement that promotes a healthy, happy gut.
Specifically engineered from organic, earth-grown ingredients, the alkaline supplement contains a mixed strain of highly concentrated and live bacteria, and is formulated on a unique, fermented green base to prolong bacteria life. Having a positive impact on your gut, the capsules deliver a concentrated amount of probiotics that food alone cannot provide, and are the perfect alternative for those intolerant to probiotic yogurts and dairy.
Not only beneficial to the gut and physical wellbeing, probiotics are also known to have a positive effect on the mind; cutting-edge research shows that they may increase anti-anxiety neurotransmitters in the body to promote good mental and emotional health.
Good bacteria is an essential dietary requirement to help optimise gut health; 70% of your body's defences are found in the gut, so it's vital you treat it well and keep it healthy. The capsules do not need to be stored in the refrigerator, so are perfectly portable and convenient.

name: Fico d'India Handbag Travel Set
product_description:
Cleanse and condition your body, even when you're on the go with the Fico D'India Handbag Travel Set. Containing miniature soap, shower gel, body cream and bath salts, this beautifully scented travel set is the epitome of classic Italian style and history. The products come in brightly coloured bags with a quirky leopard print interior. - R.H
Ortiga is a small Italian soap and scent company, which was founded in Sicily in 2006 by Sue Townsend. Using only natural products and inspired by the aesthetics, colours and scents of Sicily, the brand delivers a range of luxurious soaps, scents, creams, candles and lotions.
Single Soap 40g: Put together to give you a blissful bathtime experience, the Fico D'india Olive Oil Single Soap by Ortigia is gorgeously nourishing. The soap is infused with a blend of moisturising almon oil and milk proteins, to leave you squeaky clean and lusciously smooth.
Shower Gel 75ml: A luxurious olive oil-based body wash, boasting a unique, fresh fig scent, the Fico d'india Shower Gel by Ortigia is the perfect addition to your bodycare needs. Milky and nourishing, the gel foams in the bath and lathers in the shower, for an indulgent, every-day treat.
Body Cream 75ml: Infused with moisturising olive oil and hydrating lanolin, the Fico D'India Body Cream by Ortigia is a must-have for skin in need of a little TLC. The highly perfumed cream sumptously sinks deep into skin, leaving the lingering fragrance of powdery fig and cedar. Non-greasy, light and silky, this cream is perfect for nourishing the body and hands.
Bath Salts 75g: Are you suffering from tired limbs and tender skin? Look no further than the Fico D'india Bath Salts from Ortigia. Just a handful of these bath salts is all you need for the making of a soothing tub time session. The Fico D'india salts dissolve in the bath, making the water incredibly soft and enriched with a beautifully fresh fragrance of fig and cedar. And relax!

name: High Intensity Hand Cream (75ml)
product_description:
Supremely softening and surface smoothing, bliss high intensity hand cream waves goodbye to dehydrated skin to produce beautiful, moisturised hands! Silky but grease-free, this cream also smoothes rough cuticles.
Keep your hands looking soft and smooth with bliss high intensity hand cream. Featuring soothing glycerin, nourishing grape seed extract, hydrating macadamia nut oil, softening vitamin B5 and antioxidant apple extract, this delicious balm keeps your hands super soft and scented lightly with a delicate citrus aroma.
Directions of use:

name: Body Wash Infused Sponge Animals - Dog
product_description:
Liven up bath time with the Spongellé Body Wash Infused Sponge Animals. Forming the adorably cute silhouette of a dog, the multi-use sponge has been specifically designed for kids, harnessing proprietary infusion technology to deliver an in-built body wash system for effortless multi-tasking.
Dirt and grime is effortlessly swept away without the use of harsh chemicals, and each sponge is infused with a delectable ‘fruitilicious’ scent and soothing extract of Chamomile. Have fun at shower time while ensuring your little ones are left feeling squeaky clean.

name: Lindstrom Skin The Good Stuff Body and Hair Radiance Oil
product_description:
Experience an all-over pamper with May Lindstrom Skin The Good Stuff Body and Hair Radiance Oil; a luxurious, versatile oil for use on the skin and hair.
Infused with a cocktail of beneficial ingredients, including nourishing plant oils and translucent golden minerals, the silky oil moisturises and hydrates skin, whilst revitalising hair to leave it feeling soft, smooth and manageable from root to tip.
Enveloping the body with a decadent fragrance of Cocoa, Rose, Lavender and Ylang-Ylang, the lightweight elixir illuminates and rejuvenates dull skin to restore a dewy, youthful-looking glow. Skin is supple and velvety, and locks are repaired and glossy without greasy residue. Housed in a pump bottle for mess-free application.

name: Body Lotion 300ml - Shiny Citrus
product_description:
Feel perfectly pampered with the Sachajuan Shiny Citrus Body Lotion; a lightweight, fast-absorbing formula that works to restore long-lasting moisture and hydration.
Fortified with the brand's unique Earth Silk Technology, the scented lotion delivers anti-ageing benefits, whilst infusing skin with a fresh fragrance of Jasmine and Citrus. Expect soft, supple skin without greasy or sticky residue.

name: Paris Men Expert Clean Power 48H Anti-Perspirant (250ml)
product_description:
Stay fresh and dry with the L’Oréal Paris Men Expert Clean Power 48H Anti-Perspirant.
Suitable for groomed underarms, the long-lasting deodorant is designed to make hair appear thinner upon regrowth, and its 48 hour protective formula harnesses the odour combatting powers of antibacterial Zinc + ER-195 to leave underarms feeling fresh, clean and protected. Infused with a fresh, woody fragrance and anti-wetness micro-captors, the anti-perspirant will leave you feeling dry and comfortable with a clean, refreshing scent. - K.N.

name: Bright Teeth Whitening Pen
product_description:
Achieve that perfect, Hollywood smile with the Mr Bright Teeth Whitening Pen; a simple, safe and effective teeth whitening treatment using a minty-fresh, plant-based formula free from damaging peroxide.
Designed for convenience and on-the-go applications, the compact pen easily fits into your pocket or makeup bag, with application taking just 30 seconds. See instant results in as little as 30 minutes, with a reduction in tooth stains and discolouration, and up to 7 shades whiter in two weeks with continued use. Clinically approved and certified, smile with confidence with the help of Mr Bright.

name: Dailycare Gel Body Wash Ultra Delicate (300ml)
product_description:
BAKEL stands for ethical, high quality skincare products. Cruelty free and vegan, the products are suitable for all skin types and are clinically proven as well.
Suitable for even the most sensitive skin due to the complete lack of surface-active agents, the BAKEL Dailycare Gel Body Wash Ultra Delicate purifies your skin without stripping it of its natural hydrolipid film. The skin will feel supple, elastic and plumped up whilst the fragrance free formula is recommended for allergic and reactive skins that are easily irritated.

name: Moody Cow - Balancing Bath & Massage Oil (100ml)
product_description:
Restore harmony with this stress-relieving Moody Cow Balancing Bath & Massage Oil from Cowshed. With essential oils of rose geranium to help regulate emotions and hormones, linden blossom to relieve tension, and frankincense to soothe and calm.
Cowshed Moody Cow Balancing Bath & Massage Oil uses the minerals, vitamins and proteins of almond oil which naturally nourish the skin, while calendula (marigold) rejuvenates. This product contains no parabens, no petrochemicals and is free from sulphates, artificial fragrances and colours. It is suitable for vegetarians and has not been tested on animals.
Directions of use:
Please note:

name: Denny Best Defence Hand and Nail Cream - Winter Berries 75ml
product_description:
Pamper hardworking hands with the Leighton Denny Best Defence Hand and Nail Cream; a hydrating formula with a limited edition Winter Berries fragrance.
Harnessing the hydrating powers of Glycerin, the rich moisturiser envelops the hands and nails in a veil of essential moisture, which nourishes and softens skin. Hibiscus Flower extract works to improve skin’s elasticity to reveal a firmer-looking finish, while White Mulberry Bark extract reduces the appearance of dark spots and blemishes.
Finished with a crucial dose of Cucumber Seed extract, the hand and nail cream is rich in Vitamin C, which offers a soothing sensation to skin and ensures it is free from irritation. Skin is silky soft and comfortably hydrated.

name: Advanced Body Powder
product_description:
Protect your skin from chafing with MenScience Advanced Body Powder. Specially designed to keep your skin dry in any situation, the powerful blend of ingredients helps to keep moisture to a minimum.
Particularly ideal for areas that are prone to sweatiness, such as underarms and genitals, it helps to reduce friction caused by physical activity, leaving your skin calm and comfortable. Enriched with natural botanicals, the absorbing formula is suitable for all skin types, and will help to keep your skin feeling fresh and soft all day.

name: the Moon After Dark Bath Oil Dream (100ml)
product_description:
The gentlest way to drift smoothly off to sleep and soothe your skin overnight.  Perfect for sensitive skin.
BEAUTIFUL SLEEP: With a generous helping of French Lavender oil – known as nature’s sedative. We’ve freshened things with the apple scented Roman Chamomile good for easing away aches and pains; soft, citrussy Bergamot to brighten the spirit and balanced the set with the sweet balsamic notes of Cedarwood, loved for it’s calming.
BEAUTIFUL SKIN: Notoriously gentle – lavender is a perfect night time beauty oil, able to balance skin’s own oil production and encourage healthy new cells to form.  With Roman Chamomile – a godsend for very sensitive or dry skin as it can calm and soothe.
DIRECTIONS:
Squeeze two full pipettes into a still, deep, warm bath. For a more intense experience, massage lightly into skin before stepping in to the bath. Take three slow breaths and relax. Step out lightly moisturised from top to toe and ready for a perfect night’s sleep.
Avoid contact with eyes. As with all aromatherapy products, best to check with your midwife before using during pregnancy.

name: Laszlo Oil Control Cleansing Bar (100g)
product_description:
Repair and heal acne-prone complexions with the Erno Laszlo Oil Control Cleansing Bar. Providing a concentrated burst of potent natural ingredients, the soap bar is more than just the average cleanser, with the ability to nourish as well as heal deep within.
It works to gently eliminate oil, impurities and surface bacteria whilst breaking down dirt clogged in pores. Palm Oil is rich in fatty acids and helps to balance your complexion by mimicking the same nourishing oils and pH balance found in skin already, whilst Glycerin locks in moisture and strengthens skin structure to fight against future breakouts.
Safflower Seed Oil seals in hydration and creates a protective barrier, which helps prevent excess oil production known to cause blemishes. Ideal for combination and oily types, you can expect clean and clear skin that’s visibly transformed.

name: Ambre Solaire Ultra-Hydrating Sun Cream SPF 30 200ml
product_description:
Nourish and protect your skin with Garnier Ambre Solaire Protection  Milk SPF 30. Non-greasy and water resistant, the lotion  contains a patented filtration system containing Mexoryl SX and  antioxidant vitamin C to reinforce the skin's natural defences, whilst  protecting your skin against burning and from the skin damage and  premature ageing that are caused by UVA and UVB rays.
Wonderfully hydrating, the milk also delivers intense moisture to your skin, preventing it from drying out during sun exposure.
Directions for use: Apply a generous amount thirty minutes before sun exposure. Reapply frequently, especially after swimming, towelling and perspiring.

name: to Cucumbers Soothing Skincare Kit
product_description:
Catering specifically for sensitive skin, the yes to Cucumbers Soothing Skincare Kit combines three of the brand's best-sellers to leave your complexion clean, calm and clarified.
yes to Cucumbers Hypoallergenic Facial Wipes (Pack of 30)
A pack of pre-moistened, biodegradable towelettes infused with green superfoods to cleanse and revitalise skin. Synergising Aloe Vera, Organic Cucumber and antioxidant-rich Green Tea, the soothing face wipes gently eliminate dirt, sweat and make-up without over-drying. Ideal for use on-the-go, you can expect a clear, clarified complexion with a healthy glow. 95% natural.
yes to Cucumbers Daily Calming Moisturiser (50ml)
A fast-absorbing formula that works to infuse sensitive skin with soothing and hydrating ingredients. Cooling and rejuvenating, the lightweight moisturiser blends Organic Cucumber with Aloe Vera and Sweet Almond Oil to hydrate and condition for long-lasting comfort. Expect a soft, smooth and healthy-looking complexion with a luminous glow.
yes to Cucumbers Calming Facial Mask (50ml)
A revitalising treatment developed specifically for sensitive skin in need of a gentle boost. Harnessing the powers of cooling Aloe Vera and Organic Cucumber, the soothing, five-minute mask rejuvenates and refreshes, whilst delivering long-lasting hydration to leave you with a soft, supple and comfortable complexion. 97% natural.

name: Hauschka Revitalising Leg and Arm Tonic (100ml)
product_description: Relieve tired, aching limbs with the Revitalising Leg and Arm Tonic from Dr. Hauschka. Infused with rosemary essential oil, the invigorating formula soothes and comforts heavy arms and legs, whilst borage helps to minimise the appearance of varicose veins and cellulite. Works to reduce water retention after a long day of sitting or standing, leaving the body feeling rejuvenated, refreshed and energised for continued activity. E.N.

name: Wild Rose Bath Cream 100ml
product_description:
Lie back and relax with the Wild Rose Bath Cream, a natural, holistic treatment from health-based beauty brand Weleda.
Transform your bath into a luxurious, pampering experience with this indulgent bath soak, formulated with a selection of exquisite essential oils and nourishing extracts. Delicate Damask Rose imbues a familiar, relaxing scent, while Olive and Jojoba Oils deeply moisturise skin for a sumptuously smooth texture. Emerge from the water with a sense of wellbeing and skin that feels soft, supple and radiant.

name: Baby Derma White Mallow Body Lotion (200ml)
product_description: Weleda Baby Derma White Mallow Body Lotion (200ml) is a mild fragrance-free lotion that works to moisturise sensitive skin types to relieve itchiness that has been caused by dryness. The body lotion has been formulated with organic white mallow and pansy extracts that soothe baby's dry skin and promote the development of healthy-looking skin. The lotion also contains organic coconut oil which hydrates with a cooling effect whilst borage seed oil and organic safflower seed oil helps to support a baby's skin barrier to leave skin velvety soft. -SA

name: Body Lotion 300ml - Spicy Citrus
product_description:
Treat your skin to the Sachajuan Spicy Citrus Body Lotion; an anti-ageing moisturiser developed with the brand's exclusive Earth Silk Technology to soften and condition from top to toe.
Fortified with Oat Beta Glucan, derived from a patented manufacturing process of Swedish cultivated Oats, the lightweight lotion absorbs quickly to replenish and rejuvenate, whilst enveloping the body with contrasting notes of sweet Jasmine and invigorating Coriander.

name: of New York Grooming Essentials Kit
product_description:
Lilibeth of New York present the Grooming Essentials Kit; the brand's unique Brow Shaper and tweezers that help you to remove unwanted hair with ease. Housed in a crocodile effect case with integrated mirror, the duo is a must-have for perfectly shaped brows.
Lilibeth of New York Tweezers
Preen and perfect brows with the stainless steel tweezers. Delivering professional results, the tweezers have been specially aligned for superior pulling power, whilst the slanted tips allow you to grip even the shortest hairs. Achieve expertly defined and shaped brows with ease.
Lilibeth of New York Brow Shaper (Black)
A high performance, pain-free hair removal tool to define the brow line without tweezing or waxing. Suitable for men and women, the easy-to-use tool features a durable stainless steel blade that effortlessly and comfortably removes even the shortest hairs, whilst its portable, fold-up design is ideal for grooming on-the-go. Can also be used on the upper lip, chin, bikini line or fuzzy facial hair.

name: Body Coffee Bean Scrub 220g - Vanilla
product_description:
Treat your skin to the Bean Body Vanilla Coffee Bean Scrub; a luxurious, skin-renewing formula infused with Organic Cold-Pressed Coconut Oil to hydrate, exfoliate and soften from top to toe.
Utilising Robusta Coffee Beans, the gentle body scrub stimulates blood flow to minimise the appearance of cellulite and stretch marks, whilst Organic Cacao and Vitamin E provide antioxidant protection to repair and restore skin. Ideal for eczema and psoriasis, its blend of Himalayan Pink Rock Salt and Demerara Sugar buff away dead skin cells, helping to eliminate blackheads and breakouts for a smoother, more refined finish.

name: Home Spa Shower Gel - Anti-Fatigue 300ml
product_description:
The Anti-Fatigue Home Spa Shower Gel from PUPA re-awakens and revitalises the senses while effectively cleaning skin, transforming your showering experience into an indulgent pampering session.
Skin is enveloped in a harmonic blend of aromatherapy oils, with fresh notes of Orange and Cedarwood helping to restore skin balance and soothing Lavender Oil nurturing the spirit. Hawaiian Green Salt and Bamboo extract work in synergy to tone and refine the look of skin, sweeping away dirt and impurities to leave skin feeling softened, purified and invigorated.

name: Mousse Intense (118ml)
product_description:
A favourite amongst males and females, the XEN-TAN Mousse Intense delivers a long-lasting olive tan with minimal effort. Spreading so perfectly this quick drying mousse is perfect for first time and time-poor tanners.
With a gentle fragrance XEN-TAN Mousse Intense makes that awful fake tan smell a thing of the past. A light foam texture effortlessly smoothes on allowing for easy application and is made fool-proof with a colour guide so that you always achieve an even, streak-less tan. An incredibly moisturising yet oil free formula means it dries almost immediately.
Directions of use:

name: Real Luxury Bath & Shower Drops
product_description:
Enjoy a calming soak with the Real Luxury Bath & Shower Drops from NEOM’s Scent To Instantly De-Stress™ collection. Designed to deliver therapeutic benefits to the mind and body, the bath and shower drops leave skin smooth and comfortable, whilst boasting a relaxing scent.
The luxurious oil comprises a natural fragrance that combines pure essential oils. Enriched with a blend of French Lavender, Jasmine and Brazilian Rosewood, the formula envelops skin in a comforting aroma that banishes feelings of stress. Complete with Vitamins A and E, alongside skin-loving Safflower oil, expect to unwind and de-stress.

name: of New York Brow Shaper - Leopard Orange/Plain Orange (Set of 2)
product_description:
Preen and perfect your eyebrows with the Lilibeth of New York Brow Shaper; a high performance, pain-free hair removal tool to define the brow line without tweezing or waxing.
Suitable for men and women, the easy-to-use, award-winning tool features a durable stainless steel blade that effortlessly and comfortably removes even the shortest hairs, whilst its portable, fold-up design is ideal for grooming on-the-go. Can also be used on the upper lip, chin, bikini line, legs, arms, knuckles and fuzzy facial hair.
Not only great for hair removal, the Brow Shaper delivers dermaplaning benefits; it gently exfoliates the top layer of dead skin cells to allow better absorption of moisturisers and serums, whilst helping make-up to sit more evenly.

name: Body Lotion for Dry Skin (400ml)
product_description:
This lavish Body Lotion for Dry Skin from Nuxe boasts an innovative formula that specifically works to hydrate dry, dehydrated skin. Easily absorbed, this non greasy lotion restores suppleness and soft texture to thirsty skin to leave you looking and feeling amazing.
Presented in a pump bottle for easy distribution, this body lotion is formulated with wheat extracts and wood for long lasting moisturisation, and almond and orange flower petals to ensure your skin is kept super soft. K.D.

name: Blood Orange + White Pepper Body Butter 50ml
product_description:
Treat your skin to intense nourishment with Bliss Blood Orange + White Pepper Body Butter 50ml. With a spicy, cocktail-inspired scent, it naturally rejuvenates and hydrates dry skin, leaving it soft, smooth and supple.
Enriched with sodium hyaluronate which locks in moisture, as well softening coconut oil and smoothing vitamin C, it penetrates deeply to deliver intense hydration.

Directions of Use:

Apply generously after showering.

name: Home Spa Salt Scrub - Rebalancing 350g
product_description:
Refresh and revitalise dull, lacklustre skin with the Rebalancing Home Spa Salt Scrub from PUPA. Expertly formulated with a delicate blend of Polynesian Red Salt and Tiarè Flower Extract, the natural exfoliator effortlessly sweeps away dirt and impurities while penetrating skin tissue for a firming effect, minimising the appearance of lumps and bumps.
Experience a subtle tingling sensation as the advanced formula releases Active Oxygen, optimising the delivery of essential nutrients for maximum benefits and effectively creating the appearance of a smoother, more sculpted silhouette.
Recreate a relaxing, spa-like ritual from the comfort of your own home and achieve skin that feels velvety-smooth and replenished with a luminous glow.

name: Tonic Facial Gift Set
product_description:
Boasting a trio of innovative products to soothe, moisturise and cleanse the complexion, the Gentlemen's Tonic Facial Gift Set makes the perfect gift. With a facial scrub to remove dead skin cells and dirt, a cleanser to maintain pH balance and a moisturiser to keep up hydration levels, this set will leave the skin toned and silky soft. K.D.
Gentlemen's Tonic Exfoliating Facial Scrub 100ml
Cleanse and refresh your skin with Gentlemen's Tonic Exfoliating Facial Scrub. The moisturising formula softens and conditions your skin, whilst the exfoliating action of bamboo particles gently removes dirt and dead skin cells, revealing radiant skin.
Gentlemen's Tonic Foaming Cleanser 150ml
Gentlemen’s Tonic Daily Foaming Cleanser uses alpine moss and quillaja as ultra mild agents that enhance the cleansing process whilst maintaining the skins' natural pH balance. Water chestnut also provides an added moisture boost to ensure the skin is not dried out.
Gentlemen's Tonic Daily Moisturiser 100ml
Nourish and soothe your skin with Gentlemen's Tonic Daily Moisturiser. Suitable for all skin types, but particularly ideal for men with dry or sensitive skin, this luxurious moisturiser provides intensive hydration to rejuvenate and protect your skin.

name: works Sleep To Go
product_description:
Relax and unwind with this works' Sleep To Go. Combining two aromatherapeutic solutions for a good night's sleep, the set inspires feelings of calm and prepares you for a deep and restful slumber.
deep sleep pillow spray (5ml):
A best-selling natural sleep aid that inspires feelings of calm. Designed to inspire a rejuvenating and deep sleep, the pillow spray is formulated with 100% pure essential oils of Lavender, Vetivert and Wild Chamomile; it releases relaxing vibes so you inhale calm and exhale any nerves and worries. Spray onto your pillow before bedtime; feel your troubles melt away and enjoy a peaceful slumber. Suitable to use during pregnancy.
deep sleep stress less (5ml):
A natural remedy that inspires a relaxed and deep night's sleep. Formulated to help to calm the senses and counteract physical and mental fatigue, the multi-purpose, aromatherapy blend can be used any time to promote restful sleep. Containing refreshing Eucalyptus, Frankincense and Lavender Essential Oils, it can help to fight infections and ease hypertension, nervous tension and insomnia; perfect for those wanting to clear their mind and improve sleep quality.

name: Dante Il Frutteto Fig and Almond Milk Soap 250g
product_description: Treat your skin and senses to the Il Frutteto Fig and Almond Milk Soap from Nesti Dante. Crafted in Florence using traditional methods and natural ingredients, the vegetable-based soap gently cleanses and rejuvenates, whilst moisturising and soothing to leave skin feeling soft and supple. Housed in decorative packaging, the soap bar makes an ideal gift for yourself or a loved one.

name: System Mini Replacement Pads
product_description:
The Slendertone System Mini Replacement Pads are two adhesive pads to replace your old pads in your Slendertone System Mini Skirt. The pads are easily switched so you can be ready to tone your bottom at all times.
These patented Slendertone System Mini Replacement Pads last for up to approximately 20 sessions for great body toning. The adhesive electrode pads need to be replaced regularly to keep their effectiveness, as they will gradually loose their intensity.

name: Gorgeous Cow Blissful Time Duo
product_description: Cowshed's new floral and feminine mood will make anyone feel gorgeous!A  sweet, exotic and floral blend that revives the mind and restores  balance. This Gorgeous Cow Blissful Duo is perfect for those who need  some extra TLC at bathtime. Contains:

name: Dante Romantica Cherry Blossom and Basil Soap 250g
product_description:
Energise skin with the Nesti Dante Romantica Cherry Blossom and Basil Soap; a fragrant, vegetable soap bar that is hand-crafted in Italy using the saponification method. Arriving wrapped in thick textured paper finished with a decorative floral print, the soap is an ideal gift, or the perfect treat to yourself.
Traditionally made utilising natural, raw ingredients, the soap gently cleanses skin to eliminate traces of dirt and impurities, without stripping skin of essential moisture. Romancing the senses, the cleansing bar boasts a refreshingly aromatic scent of cherry blossom and basil, which work in synergy to deliver an uplifting fragrance that will invigorate the mind and body.

name: Dante Dolce Vivere Rome Soap 250g
product_description:
Inspired by Italian beauty and lifestyle, the Dolce Vivere 'Rome' Soap from Nesti Dante utilises high quality, natural ingredients to leave you feeling perfectly pampered.
Crafted in Florence using the traditional saponification method, the vegetable-based soap bar gently cleanses and purifies without over-drying; it forms a creamy lather upon contact with water to restore soft, supple skin after every use. Beautifully wrapped in decorative paper, the soap imparts a luxurious fragrance of Blooming Oleander, Muscat and Fig to rejuvenate the senses.

name: Seaweed And Aromatic Bath Gel (500ml)
product_description:
Revitalise the body with the Darphin Aromatic Seaweed Bath and Shower Gel; an aromatic foam gel that effectively cleanses skin.
The formula can be poured into a running bath, or can be massaged over the body during a shower to eliminate the body of dirt, excess oil and other impurities, without stripping skin of essential moisture. A blend of six Essential Oils, including Lemongrass, Orange and Lemon envelops skin in an aromatic fragrance.
Skin feels soft and refreshed, whilst boasting an energising scent.

name: Dante Dei Colli Fiorentini Lavender Soap 250g
product_description:
Take an aromatic journey through the hills of Florentine with Nesti Dante's Dei Colli Fiorentini Lavender Soap, a perfumed cleansing bar that has been crafted using the old craft saponification method of boiling in a cauldron.
Developed in Florence with high quality ingredients, the natural, vegetable-based soap gently cleanses and purifies your skin to leave the body feeling soft and supple; it transforms into a rich lather that eliminates impurities whilst imparting the relaxing scent of Tuscan Lavender. The soap is embossed and wrapped in elegant, decorative paper.

name: to Carrots Nourishing Body Wash 500ml
product_description:
Cleanse and comfort your skin with the yes to Carrots Nourishing Body Wash, a refreshing formula that gently lifts away dirt and impurities whilst protecting and comforting skin.
Fortified with naturally antioxidant organic Carrots and a cocktail of vitamin-rich Melons, the body wash cleanses away grime whilst protecting against free radicals and gently exfoliating to soften and refine the appearance of skin. The body is left feeling smooth, clean, revitalised and naturally nourished.

name: Botanicals Boticario di Havana Soap on a Rope 148g
product_description: The Archipelago Botanicals Boticario di Havana Soap on a Rope blends a luxurious combination of fragrances including Mandarin, Bergamot Leaf, Neroli, Wild Basil, Crushed Thyme and Coriander to refresh and soothe the skin. The triple-milled, pure vegetable-based soap has been blended with ground coffee beans to gently exfoliate the skin and buff away dry areas, particularly elbows, knees and feet. Fastened with a handcrafted rope, the luxurious soap will leave skin cleansed, soothed and deliciously scented.

name: Orange Juice Hand Cream 100ml
product_description: Treat dry, over-worked hands to the Orange Juice Hand Cream from NAOBAY (Natural And Organic Beauty And You). Enriched with moisturising Shea Butter, the fast-absorbing formula delivers optimum hydration to smoothen and rejuvenate hands, whilst conditioning nails and cuticles without greasy residue. A nourishing blend of Orange Juice, Chamomile and Aloe Vera soothe and protect from environmental aggressors, leaving hands renewed and softened with restored comfort.

name: Me Super Toning Body Oil 200ml
product_description:
Restore softness and suppleness with Balance Me's Super Toning Body Oil; a 100% natural, spa-inspired formula that delivers multiple benefits to improve skin tone and texture.
Infused with Macadamia and Sweet Almond Oils, the lightweight, non-greasy blend replenishes and hydrates dry skin, whilst Wheat Germs provide anti-ageing properties to help firm and plump.
Its antioxidant-rich cocktail of Juniper, Geranium and Bergamot Essential Oils seek to stimulate circulation and minimise the appearance of cellulite during massaging. Skin is smooth, even and refined.

name: Wild Rose Creamy Body Wash (200ml)
product_description:
With nourishing organic musk rose oil, rich in skin-caring essential fatty acids Weleda Wild Rose Cream Body Wash is the ideal companion to cleanse and nourish dry or stressed skin.
This harmonising body wash is an exquisite composition based on richly nourishing rosehip oil, blended to perfection with organic essential oil of damask rose which provides a delicate mild fragrance. Weleda Wild Rose Creamy Body Wash will provide you with a luxurious bath time experience each time you use it.
Directions of use:

name: Brown For Men Balancing Face Wash 100ml
product_description:
Experience a refreshing cleanse with Molton Brown Balancing Face Wash, a facial wash for men that works to eliminate impurities and excess oils.
Ideal for normal to oily skin, the face wash is enriched with African Whitewood extract and a handsome fragrance to help lift away dirt and excess oil without upsetting skin's natural pH balance. Expect a soft, clean and revitalised complexion.

name: Red Grape Sunscreen Body Emulsion SPF50 150ml
product_description:
The KORRES Red Grape Sunscreen Body Emulsion SPF50 provides high level protection against sun damage and premature skin ageing, with a selection of age-defying actives and advanced sun filters for a dual-phase treatment.
The hydrating, milk-textured formula rapidly absorbs into skin without feeling oily or greasy, imparting a velvet-smooth texture with maximum protection against harmful UV rays.
A fatty acid-rich blend of Red Grape Oil and Alaria Esculenta extract work in tandem to promote enhanced elasticity and smooth the look of fine lines, while anti-inflammatory Provitamin B5 and naturally-derived Polysaccharides deeply moisturise and nourish while activating collagen synthesis.
The powerful sunscreen leaves skin with an advanced level of protection against UV stress and antioxidant damage, with an enhanced ability to regenerate and retain hydration levels for a visible reduction in premature signs of ageing.

name: Bees Ultimate Care Body Lotion (170g)
product_description:
Treat extremely dry skin to the Burt's Bees Ultimate Care Body Lotion; a fast-absorbing, ultra-moisturising formula that works to nourish and hydrate from top to toe.
Harnessing the powers of Baobab Oil and nutrient-rich Pumpkin Seed, the lightweight lotion softens and conditions skin, whilst delivering a refreshing fragrance of Green Tea Extract. Expect smooth, supple and comfortable skin after use.

name: Me Skin Brightening Body Polish (150ml)
product_description:
Combining naturally active botanicals with hi-tech natural formulations, the Balance Me Skin Brightening Body Polish is a three-in-one exfoliator that works to gently buff the skin for ultra-silky, radiant results.
100% natural and packed full of vitamins, natural sea salt helps improve skin tone whilst a synergy of sweet almond and coconut oil work to seal in moisture and revitalise skin with natural cell renewal. Super hydrating and intensely invigorating, the addition of spearmint oil helps lift and refresh the senses. Expect radiant, smooth, expertly buffed skin. - K.N.

name: Skin Waterproof Body Lotion (236ml)
product_description:
Tend Skin Waterproof Moisturising Lotion is a state-of-the-art moisturising product that has spared no expense to provide the best possible ingredients and formulation.Two major ingredient types that have not yet been used together in a moisturizing product are combined. One type is the Ceramide group of ingredients. The other is an ingredient derived from the "Sweet White Lupin" plant.
Like all Tend Skin products, Waterproof Body Lotion contains no animal derived ingredients and was not tested on animals. You will find that the moisturising effect lasts and lasts. Unconditionally Guaranteed!

name: Arden Visible Difference Moisture Formula for Body Care 300ml
product_description:
Treat your skin to the nourishing properties of Elizabeth Arden Visible Difference Moisture Formula for Body Care, a lightly scented moisturiser that delivers all-day hydration.
Utilising active ingredients and key components to instantly hydrate and soften skin, the emulsion expertly cares for and comforts your body. Its enveloping formula refines and firms contours with long-lasting results, whilst maintaining softness for skin that feels supple and comfortable. Melts quickly into skin to relieve and nourish.

name: Alcohol Free Deodorant
product_description: Stay dry and odour-free with the Anthony skincare for men Alcohol Free Deodorant (70g). The alochol-free formula is gentle on skin, preventing staining and irritation. The clear solid stick anti-perspirant glides onto the armpits easily without transferring onto clothes. - K.R

name: Organics Great Day Body and Hand Wash (250ml)
product_description:
Cleanse and protect your skin with NEOM Organics Great Day Body and Hand Wash. Packed with mineral rich Japanese seaweed and anti-oxidising pomegranate, the wash will leave your skin feeling clean and soft.
A scent that focuses the mind, the wash combines a spearmint fresh scent with lemon, mandarin peel and orange for extra sparkle. -SA

name: Karité Paris Shea Shower Gel - Almond and Honey 250ml
product_description:
Treat your skin to a moisturising cleanse withl Institut Karité Paris Shea Shower Gel in 'Almond and Honey', a soap-free body wash with a melting, creamy texture.
Infused with 25% Shea Butter, a vitamin-rich ingredient that intensely nourishes and soothes skin, the shower gel performs a gentle cleanse, lifting away dirt and impurities whilst moisturising, comforting and protecting skin. Rich and soothing, the formula delivers a cocoon of comfort and hydration that leaves the body feeling incredibly soft, supple and regenerated.
Enriched with the sweet fragrance of Almond and Honey.

name: Family SPF 30 - Super Sensitive Duo (2 x 150ml)
product_description:
Protect yours and your family’s skin with Ultrasun Family SPF 30 Super Sensitive Duo all day UVA/UVB protection.
This formula is water-resistant and only one application is needed to provide all day protection giving you more time to enjoy the sun. This duo pack contains 2 x 150ml bottles, providing enough sun protection for the whole family.
Specially formulated to be free from oils, emulsifiers and perfumes, Ultrasun family SPF 30 Super Sensitive Duo is perfect for children’s delicate skins and helps prevent uncomfortable sun reactions such as prickly heat. It also provides extra protection for areas more vulnerable areas such as shins, noses and shoulders.

name: Klein Eternity for Men Deodorant Stick (75g)
product_description: Calvin Klein's Eternity for Men Deodorant Stick delivers long-lasting freshness and protection against wetness and body odours, without leaving marks or stains. Inspired by love and intimacy, the deodorant imparts a masculine fragrance of revitalising lemon and bergamot, blended with coriander, basil and sandalwood. E.N.

name: British Botanical Hand & Nail Butter 100ml
product_description:
Elemis have collaborated with artist Amanda Ross, known for her exquisitely detailed botanical prints, to create the British Botanical Hand and Nail Butter. Harnessing the powerful ingredients grown in the countryside, the formula is infused with a blend of lavender, geranium, chamomile and palmarosa to calm and soothe over-worked hands.
A dose of burdock extract is combined with moabi butter and UK organic oat to replenish moisture and rejuvenate hands, whilst strengthening brittle nails and conditioning cuticles. Skin will be left smooth, comfortable and velvety soft with a delicate fragrance. Fast-absorbing and non-greasy. E.N.

name: Laszlo White Marble Sheet Mask
product_description:
Attend to skin and uncleansed pores with the Erno Laszlo White Marble Sheet Mask, designed to offer a relaxing at-home treatment for the face. Imbued with delicate calming notes, and made in a refined formula ready to combat the production of melanin, the dual action of this salve cleanses as well as restores, providing all-over comfort and relief.
Containing clarifying Yuzu Fruit Extract, for a balanced complexion, as well as anti-oxidants performing against colour loss, this fundamental mask helps soothe, refine and rehydrate the skin, offering a balanced, even tone that lends a natural, replenished look. C.R

name: Mio Second Trimester Butter Bundle (Worth £76)
product_description:
Achieve that ‘pregnancy glow’ with the Mama Mio Second Trimester Butter Bundle. Combining a trio of bestselling Mama Mio products, the bundle is designed to treat and nourish skin during the second trimester of pregnancy, when hormones can cause skin to become prone to sensitivity and dryness. Host to a moisturising body butter, soothing breast cream and a refreshing facial wash, each product within the bundle is suitable for use whilst pregnant and will leave skin thoroughly nourished.
The Tummy Rub Butter (120g)
Help protect your skin against pregnancy stretch marks with The Tummy Rub Butter. Enriched with Omega 3, 6 and 9 essential fatty acids, the butter contributes towards skin's strength and elasticity, whilst organic Shea Butter provides a barrier to lock in moisture. Specially formulated with organic Rose Hip oil, which works to prevent and reduce the appearance of stretch marks during and after pregnancy, the luxurious butter works to hydrate skin, while Argan Oil helps nourish.
Pregnancy Boob Tube (100ml)
The Pregnancy Boob Tube bust cream soothes skin to leave it with a healthy glow. Enriched with organic Omega oils, Boob Tube hydrates by providing antioxidants to strengthen and help reduce the appearance of wrinkles. Specially formulated with unique Green Cabbage Leaf extract, its new and improved formula makes it pregnancy and breastfeeding safe.
Gorgeous Glow Facial Wash (100ml)
Gently cleanse skin with the foaming Gorgeous Glow Facial Wash. Specially formulated with Tea Tree oil and Green Tea Leaf, the wash helps keep skin hydrated and provides powerful antioxidants that shield skin from free radical damage and environmental stresses. The luxurious formula contains a blend of natural, Coconut-derived cleansers enriched with organic Omegas and Vitamins to nourish skin. Experience skin that is full of moisture with a boost in radiance for a brighter complexion.

name: Sea Buckthorn Hand Cream (50ml)
product_description:
Winner of an Ethical Living Favourite award, Weleda Sea Buckthorn Hand Cream provides intensive care for dry hands. The combination of precious sea buckthorn oil and sesame oil supports the natural functions of the skin and helps to keep your hands soft.
The vitamins and unsaturated fatty acids in Weleda Sea Buckthorn Hand Cream help protect the hands from dehydration; dry hands are softened, becoming more supple and smooth. Its essential oils provide a fresh fruity fragrance and penetrate quickly without leaving a greasy film. Used daily, this rich cream helps to rediscover your hand's natural softness. Suitable for vegetarians.
Directions of use:

name: Brown Delicious Rhubarb & Rose Body Lotion
product_description:
Transport your senses to Yorkshire's iconic ‘Rhubarb Triangle' with the Delicious Rhubarb & Rose Body Lotion from Molton Brown.
Fortified with the brand's signature Skin-Pampering Complex, the lightweight, quick-absorbing lotion moisturises and conditions skin, whilst imparting a delicious fragrance of sweet Rose, zesty Yuzu Fruit and bitter Rhubarb.
Your body feels sumptuously soft, smooth and perfectly pampered from top to toe. Housed in a convenient pump bottle decorated with a metallic cap and tonal grosgrain bow.

name: Spa Factory Organic Sweet Orange, Ground Argan Oil and Jojoba Body Polish
product_description:
Brighten and refine your skin with Natural Spa Factory Organic Sweet Orange, Ground Argan Oil and Jojoba Body Polish, a gentle exfoliator that delicately buffs away dead cells to reveal smoother, more radiant skin.
Infused with Argan Shell and Orange Zest, the foaming polish naturally sloughs away dulling dead skin cells and performs a smoothing effect to promote a younger-looking body. Its refreshing dose of Bergamot and Jojoba and Argan Oils moisturise, soften and protect the skin to leave the body feeling smooth, radiant and renewed.

name: Dante Dolce Vivere Portofino Soap 250g
product_description:
Inspired by Italian beauty and lifestyle, the Dolce Vivere 'Portofino' Soap from Nesti Dante utilises high quality, natural ingredients to leave you feeling perfectly pampered.
Crafted in Florence using the traditional saponification method, the vegetable-based soap bar gently cleanses and purifies without over-drying; it forms a creamy lather upon contact with water to restore soft, supple skin after every use. Beautifully wrapped in decorative paper, the soap imparts a luxurious fragrance of Water Rose and Marine Lily to relax the senses.

name: Arden Prevage Body Total Transforming Anti-Aging Moisturizer
product_description:
Elizabeth Arden Prevage Body Total Transforming Anti-Aging Moisturizer isn’t just another moisturiser. Utilising the benefits of clinically proven antioxidants and Tripeptide Complex it zeros in on your body's anti-ageing skincare concerns.
During consumer testing, 85% of Elizabeth Arden Prevage Body Total Transforming Anti-Aging Moisturizer users reported a reduction in the look of minor scars, stretch marks and dimpled skin and 67% of consumers also saw a reduction in the appearance of age spots and discolourations. A high performance moisturiser, it uses idebenone, clinically proven as the most powerful antioxidant and Tripeptide Complex to reduce the visible signs of body ageing, leaving skin smoother, firmer and totally transformed.
Directions of use:

name: & Fandango Men's Shower Twin Pack
product_description:
Men's Shower Twin Pack from Scaramouche & Fandango, a brand who create premium male grooming products to make you feel like a new man. Made in the UK, the kit includes two essentials ideal for the man on-the-move. E.N.
Shampoo (200ml)
Deeply cleanse hair with the detoxifying shea butter and black quinoa shampoo. Specially formulated with essential amino acids, the shampoo penetrates and strengthens the hair's cuticle, whilst removing excess oil and dirt to leave hair refreshed and revitalised. Keravis protein protects the hair from daily pollution so you can experience healthy-looking hair.
Body Wash (200ml)
Awaken your senses with the Brazilian papaya body wash. Its cleansing formula is rich in sugars and minerals C to hydrate skin and leave you feeling refreshed all day long. Enriched with antioxidant vitamin C, the body wash energises skin and protects from environmental stresses for younger-looking, hydrated skin.

name: Klein CK One Deodorant Stick (75g)
product_description:
With lasting freshness and maximum protection, the Calvin Klein CK One Deodorant Stick perfectly complements the Calvin Klein fragrance. The gentle, comfortable deodorant stick is lightly scented with the citrus sheer fragrance formulated with Pineapple, Mandarin, Jasmine and Sandalwood.
Protecting your skin throughout the day, the deodorant smoothly releases a soft, refreshing lotion. – E.W.

name: Infused Pedi-Buffer - Mandarin Mint
product_description:
Pamper aching feet with the Infused Pedi-Buffer from Spongellé; a luxurious sponge exfoliator to massage, cleanse and moisturise dry skin for a soft, silky finish.
Multi-functional and reusable for up to 30 washes, the innovative buffer is enriched with a revitalising fragrance, perfectly balancing effervescent Mandarin with hints of freshly cut Mint and Eucalyptus. The textured side sweeps away rough patches and callouses, with healing extracts of Arnica, Sea Kelp and Peppermint helping to soothe away aches and strains. Feet feel perfectly polished with spa-like pedicure results.

name: Body Wash 300ml - Spicy Citrus
product_description:
Feel perfectly pampered with the Sachajuan Spicy Citrus Body Wash; a lightweight, invigorating formula that infuses skin with a stimulating Coriander and Jasmine fragrance.
Utilising the brand's Earth Silk Technology, derived from a patented manufacturing process of Swedish cultivated Oats, the body wash creates a luxe lather to effortlessly eliminate impurities without over-drying skin. Ideal for bath or shower, you can expect smooth, supple and hydrated skin from top to toe.

name: Radiance Microdermabrasion
product_description:
Revitalise skin with the HoMedics Radiance Microdermabrasion; a salon-grade treatment to transform your skincare regime and improve overall skin texture from the comfort of your own home.
The handheld microdermabrasion device features a diamond tip to deliver powerful mechanical exfoliation, buffing away the top layer of dead skin cells to reveal a smoother, firmer feeling surface, with visible results in as little as 3 weeks.
Delivering a gentle vacuum-like massage, it stimulates cellular renewal to promote a more even and refined complexion, with four speed settings to provide customisable treatment levels to suit all skin types.
Each treatment only takes 5 minutes, and the device can be used 1-3 times a week for optimum results. Skin appears rejuvenated and replenished, with visibly diminished wrinkles, blackheads and scarring for an overall healthier and younger looking visage.

name: Age Delay Hand & Cuticle Care Cream (100ml)
product_description:
Hands are the best way to tell a person’s age. Look after yours with the Alpha-H Age Delay Hand & Cuticle Care Cream. This elegant cream absorbs instantly, exfoliates dead skins cells and imparts an invigorating citrus fragrance.
Alpha-H Age Delay Hand & Cuticle Care Cream is a dual purpose treatment cream which simultaneously exfoliates dead cells from the surface whilst moisturising the new skin underneath to visibly restore youthful texture and clarity to hands that have prematurely aged. 10% glycolic acid exfoliates dead skin cells to soften coarsened skin patches and minimise the appearance of pigmentation associated with sun damage and ageing while essential fatty acids (derived from avocado and jojoba oil) help to condition and soften the hands and cuticles.
Directions of use:

name: Smoothing Coconut Hand & Body Lotion 227g
product_description:
Relieve extremely dry skin with the JASON Coconut Hand and Body Lotion; a fast-absorbing formula that works to soften and smoothen the body from top to toe.
Infused with a conditioning cocktail of Virgin Coconut Oil and Shea Butter, the lightweight lotion replenishes, hydrates and deeply nourishes skin to leave it perfectly pampered and comforted.

name: Bullocks Bracing Bath & Shower Gel
product_description:
Cleanse the body without unnecessary fuss using the Cowshed Bullocks Bracing Bath & Shower Gel; a gentle yet effective body wash with an uplifting citrus fragrance designed for men.
The cleansing formula can be applied directly to skin during showering, or can be poured under running water to deliver an invigorating and refreshing soak. Comfortably massaging over the body, the shower gel is enriched with Petitgrain, which cleanses and purifies skin, whilst Grapefruit seeks to deliver a toned appearance.
Packed with essential oils, the Bracing Bath & Shower Gel guarantees to leave skin clean and calm, whilst smelling distinctly masculine.

name: Revitalizing Citrus Body Wash 887ml
product_description:
JÁSÖN Revitalising Citrus Body Wash Pump (900ml) is a body cleanser that leaves skin feeling hydrated and rejuvenated as well as thoroughly clean. Lemon extract and orange peel oil provide a hydrating and nurturing formula with a refreshing scent.
Vitamin E and Pro-Vitamin B5 have been added to the natural blend for brighter protected skin from head to toe. - K.R

name: Boo Splendidly Soothing Bath Soak (250ml)
product_description:
Mums and mums-to-be deserve to be indulged once in a while, so treat yourself with Love Boo Splendidly Soothing Bath Soak. A blend of naturally soothing ingredients, you’ll be left feeling relaxed and calm.
Love Boo Splendidly Soothing Bath Soak contains white water lily and mallow to deeply moisturise, while chamomile and arnica soothe tired and aching muscles. Beautifully fragranced with natural rose extract, this soak offers perfect pampering for mothers.
Directions of use:

name: Splendide Mani Smoothing Hand Cream (207ml)
product_description:
Treat hardworking hands to the nourishing properties of Borghese Splendide Mani Smoothing Hand Cream, an intensive hand treatment that smoothens and relieves dry, chapped skin.
Promoting long-lasting comfort, the hand therapy expertly hydrates and protects with its dose of antioxidant Vitamin E and moisture-binding Hyaluronic Acid, and softens cuticles for a healthy-looking manicure. Hands feel soft, supple and silky.

name: Body Coffee Bean Scrub 220g - Manuka Honey
product_description:
Treat your skin to the Bean Body Manuka Honey Coffee Bean Scrub; a luxurious, skin-renewing formula infused with Organic Cold-Pressed Coconut Oil to hydrate, exfoliate and soften from top to toe.
Utilising Robusta Coffee Beans, the gentle body scrub stimulates blood flow to minimise the appearance of cellulite and stretch marks, whilst Organic Cacao and Vitamin E provide antioxidant protection to repair and restore skin. Ideal for eczema and psoriasis, its blend of Himalayan Pink Rock Salt and Demerara Sugar buff away dead skin cells, helping to eliminate blackheads and breakouts for a smoother, more refined finish.

name: Almond Body Wash (200ml)
product_description:
Treat sensitive, easily irritated skin to Weleda's Almond Body Lotion, a mild, soap-free formula that gently cleanses and cares for sensitive skin.
Harnessing the strengthening and soothing properties of almond oil, the body wash envelops skin in a comforting veil, utilising mild, plant-based surfactants to cleanse away impurities and leave skin feeling silky soft. Skin's moisture balance is regulated and the lipid layer feels replenished. - K.N.

name: Dante Dei Colli Fiorentini Broom Soap 250g
product_description:
Take an aromatic journey through the hills of Florentine with Nesti Dante's Dei Colli Fiorentini Broom Soap, a perfumed cleansing bar that has been crafted using the old craft saponification method of boiling in a cauldron.
Developed in Florence with high quality ingredients, the natural, vegetable-based soap gently cleanses and purifies your skin to leave the body feeling soft and supple; it transforms into a rich lather that eliminates impurities whilst imparting a passionatie fragrance. The soap is embossed and wrapped in elegant, decorative paper.

name: Dante Romantica Lily and Narcissus Soap 250g
product_description:
Energise skin with the Nesti Dante Romantica Lily and Narcissus Soap; a fragrant, vegetable soap bar that is hand-crafted in Italy using the saponification method. Arriving wrapped in thick textured paper finished with a decorative floral print, the soap is an ideal gift, or the perfect treat to yourself.
Traditionally made utilising natural, raw ingredients, the soap gently cleanses skin to eliminate traces of dirt and impurities, without stripping skin of essential moisture. Romancing the senses, the cleansing bar boasts captivating and seductive scent of lily and narcissus, which work in synergy to deliver an uplifting fragrance that will invigorate the mind and body.

name: - Invigorating Body Scrub (200ml)
product_description:
Remove dead cells and debris with ARK Invigorating Body Scrub, a natural blend of mint, multi-fruit acids and loofah particles.
Helping you to achieve smoother skin and stimulate circulation, the scrub removes dryness and flaky patches to leave skin fresh and energised. -SA

name: Perfect Night's Sleep Bath & Shower Drops
product_description:
Experience an ultra-relaxing soak with the Perfect Night's Sleep Bath & Shower Drops from NEOM’s Scent To Sleep™ collection. Designed to deliver therapeutic benefits to the mind and body, the bath and shower drops leave skin smooth and comfortable, whilst boasting a calming scent.
The luxurious oil comprises a natural fragrance that combines pure essential oils. Enriched with a blend of English Lavender, Sweet Basil and Jasmine, the formula envelops skin in a relaxing aroma that encourages a good night’s sleep. Complete with Vitamins A and E, alongside skin-loving Safflower oil, expect to unwind and de-stress.

name: Health Propolis and MGO 400 Manuka Honey Toothpaste with Tea Tree Oil 100g
product_description: Manuka Health's Propolis and MGO™400+ Manuka Honey Toothpaste with Tea Tree Oil helps to maintain healthy teeth and gums, leaving the mouth feeling refreshed. The pleasant, menthol formula combines BIO30™ New Zealand Propolis, high grade MGO™ 400+ Manuka Honey and Tea Tree Oil with natural plant extracts, resulting in gentle cleansing and effective oral hygiene.  The essential oils and herbs provide a great taste and leave teeth feeling fresh and clean.

name: The Ritual of Dao Bed and Body Mist (50ml)
product_description:
Experience the calming benefits of Rituals The Ritual of Dao Bed and Body Mist, a body and textile perfume that gently refreshes your skin and linens.
Utilising an ancient Chinese philosophy that helps one achieve perfect harmony, the mist combines the nourishing properties of Yi Yi Ren with a gentle White Lotus fragrance to moisturise skin and promote a good night's sleep. Safe for use on all textiles, does not stain.

name: Body Ultimate Blends Mythic Olive Nourisher Gift Pack
product_description:
Discover the benefits of Olive Oil for your skin with the Garnier Body Ultimate Blends Mythic Olive Nourisher Gift Pack. Host to a duo of nourishing skincare products, the gift set boasts a luxurious body lotion and body oil, both enriched with Olive Oil and guaranteeing to leave skin touchably soft, smooth and well cared for.
Ultimate Blends Mythic Olive Nourishing Lotion (250ml)
Meet the needs of dry skin with the Mythic Olive Nourishing Lotion. The lightweight lotion melts quickly and easily into skin, allowing you to get dressed immediately after. Suitable for daily use, the lotion envelops skin in floral and vanilla notes and leaves the body smooth and soft with a supple appearance.
Ultimate Blends Mythic Olive Nourishing Oil (150ml)
Achieve touchably soft skin with the Mythic Olive Nourishing Oil. Luxuriously silky, the oil formula boasts a nourishing blend that absorbs quickly and does not leave a greasy residue. Enriched with extra virgin olive oil, the formula is tailor made for dry skin types and will leave the body feeling nourished, soft and smooth.

name: Nurture Hand Lotion 100ml
product_description:
Indulge skin with the AromaWorks Nurture Hand Lotion, a softening blend of 12 BioActive ingredients and essential oils that perfectly combine to moisturise and soothe.
Featuring an uplifting fresh aroma of crisp May Chang, sweet Roman Chamomile and delicate Sandalwood, the hand lotion works to intensively hydrate dry and chapped skin whilst working to reduce inflammation and soreness. Hands are left feeling nourished and smooth with a refreshing scent.

name: Ambre Solaire Dry Mist Sun Cream Spray SPF 20 200ml
product_description:
Garnier Ambre Solaire Dry Mist Sun Cream Spray SPF 20 is a non-sticky, lightweight sun cream that offers high protection without leaving white marks. The spray is quick and easy to apply and instantly absorbs into skin for a dry, bare skin feeling. Its advanced formula contains Mexoryl® XL, an advanced patented filter to shield skin from the sun's harmful UVA and UVB rays. Defends against sun-induced damage and premature ageing caused by sun exposure. Enriched with a hydrating complex to retain the skin's moisture levels and nourish skin to prevent it drying out. E.N.
Directions for use: Apply a generous amount thirty minutes before sun exposure. Reapply frequently, especially after swimming, towelling and perspiring.

name: Deeply Nourishing Body Cream
product_description:
Repair dry and sensitive skin with the Deeply Nourishing Body Cream from Thalgo. Melting into the skin quickly, without leaving a greasy residue, the cream is designed to provide a comforting feel to skin.
The body cream is the first intensive treatment that boasts Cold Cream Marine, which delivers nourishment and gently yet effectively provides a soothing feel to dry and sensitive skin. Enriched with a blend of Wild Rose Oil, Cocoa and Cupuaçu butters, the rich and creamy formula leaves skin feeling comforted and enveloped in a refreshing aroma, which combines peach, green leaves and white musk.

name: works Perfect Legs Sculpt and Shine Serum 60ml
product_description:
Dare to bare with this works' Perfect Legs Sculpt and Shine Serum, an innovative highlighter that helps define and shape your legs with its light-diffusing powders and subtle golden glow.
Gliding effortlessly across skin, the roll-on illuminator delivers an expert sculpting effect whilst infusing skin with beneficial ingredients. Natural Caramel combines with light-diffusing powders and Hyaluronic Acid to leave skin with an ambient, glossy sheen, whilst Algae extract performs a tightening effect for a more defined appearance.
Described as an 'anti-ageing optical illusion', the highlighter enhances skin radiance and tricks the eyes. Expect 'sculpted', youthful pins. Your legs, but better.

name: Advance 50 Plus Multivitamin Tablets - (100 Tablets)
product_description:
Centrum Advance 50 Plus Multivitamin Tablets have been specifically developed to support the changing needs of your health and wellbeing over the age of 50+, delivering tailored levels of vitamins and minerals for optimum efficacy and benefits.
The world’s number one multivitamin is established through 30 years of scientific research and nutritional expertise, combining 25 key nutrients with all 13 essential vitamins to support vitality and immunity while contributing to normal vision and heart health.
B Vitamins help to release food-based energy for an overall boost, plus Vitamin C, Zinc, Copper and Selenium work in tandem to support the immune system and increase antioxidants. High levels of Calcium and Vitamin D maintain strong bones, while Vitamin A and Riboflavin sustain normal vision. Age is just a number with this daily food supplement that provides all the resources you need to keep you feeling in your prime.

name: Luminous Shimmer Tan 150ml
product_description:
He-Shi Luminous Shimmer is a subtle and sophisticated wash off bronzer that leaves your skin with a gorgeously glittering finish.
Your all year round must-have item, the He-Shi Luminous Shimmer is resistant to water so you can wear it with confidence. Enriched with Organic Quinoa Protein to restore hydration and protect your tan, this Shimmer also aids skin repair and protection.
Directions of use:
Wash off using soap and warm water.

name: Double Strength 30'S
product_description:
Promensil Double Strength 30'S is a dietary supplement that has been formulated with 15 years of scientific research to provide women with support and wellbeing during and after the menopause.
Recommended during the early stages of menopause, the double strength tablets are formulated with a balanced source of isoflavones, inlcuding red clover, a naturally occurring plant oestrogen that helps maintain good general health throughout the menopause.
Boasting the title 'most extensively studied menopause supplement', Promensil may also help to maintain a healthy cardiovascular system by maintaining the elasticity of blood vessels and healthy bones. - K.N.

name: Rose de Mai Body Oil 50ml
product_description:
Rejuvenate skin with the long-awaited Chantecaille Rose de Mai Body Oil, a luxurious treatment infused with the signature essence from one of the world’s rarest roses.
Layered with delicate oils including Tamanu, Moringa and Borage Seed, the rich formula veils skin with essential moisture and nourishment. With a delicate and uplifting scent, the indulgent body oil leaves skin feeling sumptuously softened with a radiant glow – akin to the dew-glistened purity of a fresh rose petal.

name: 300,000 Pulse Elos Replacement Cartridge
product_description:
Used in conjunction with your Iluminage TOUCH, the Iluminage TOUCH Quartz Cartridge - 300,000 Flashes is a replaceable cartridge that slots easily into your TOUCH hair removal device for continued use. 
The replaceable cartridge contains 300,000 pulses and simply snaps onto your Iluminage TOUCH. Long-lasting, the cartridge removes fair hair from the surface of your skin with innovative elōs technology.

name: Hauschka Rose Nurturing Body Oil (75ml)
product_description:
Deeply nourish and protect skin with the Dr. Hauschka Rose Nurturing Body Oil. Enriched with delicate rose essential oil to soothe, calm and comfort sensitive skin and improve well-being, whilst jojoba oil maintains moisture to leave the body supple and soft.
Damask roses are carefully blended with sunflower oil using unique rhythmic processing methods, heating the mixture to body temperature 37°C to transfer skin balancing properties into the oil. Expect rejuvenated, harmonised and strengthened skin from top to toe. E.N.

name: Magik Organiks Moisture Therapy Triple Oil Shea Body Butter
product_description:
Nourish your skin with the Spa Magik Organiks Moisture Therapy Triple Oil Shea Body Butter; an ultra-rich body balm fortified with a trio of nature’s hydration hero oils. Suitable for full body use, the intense formula can tackle dryness at even the most stubborn areas, as well as offering a soothing feel to aching muscles and a cooling effect to sun-exposed skin.
Enriched with a skin-loving blend of Avocado, Coconut and Sweet Almond oils, alongside an intense dose of Shea Butter, the rich cream effortlessly melts into the skin, without leaving behind a greasy residue. The body butter delivers a veil of long lasting hydration to skin, which works to smooth and soften the body for up to 24 hours.
Expect dry skin to be eliminated and the body to feel soft, soothed and drenched in moisture.

name: Birch Body Scrub (150ml)
product_description:
Weleda Birch Body Scrub gently exfoliates and smoothes the skin without synthetic detergents or aggressive agents. Natural plant wax pearls and pure plant oils gently massage your skin, supporting cell renewal.
Organic birch leaf extract blends with the finest essential oils to regenerate the skin and the senses. Made with organic birch leaf extract known for its purifying and detoxifying properties, the Weleda Birch Body Scrub leaves your skin feeling and looking soft and silky smooth.
Directions of use:

name: Skincare Your Fit Skin for Life Kit
product_description:
Keep your skin looking super fit with the Your Fit Skin For Life Kit from Mio Skincare. Containing Boob Tube+®, The Activist™ and Workout Wonder®, the set ensures skin will be left feeling taut, firm and smooth whilst your muscles will be cooled and revived.
Boob Tube+® Multi-Action Bust Cream (30ml)
A real treat for the chest region, this product can help improve the appearance of wrinkled cleavage. It can enhance the appearance of skin and gives it a visible glow within a matter of days. Mio make sure their body creams are of the same quality as facial care so if you want your face to look firm go ahead and put it on there! This cream is the beginning of the road to perky looking breasts!
The Activist™  Active Body Oil (30ml)
This oil helps nourish your mature skin, containing key nutrients skin needs to help keep it looking supple and soft. Rich in antioxidants the oil moisturises and provides a cocktail of vitamins. Of course it’s also suitable for super young, super dry skin.

Workout Wonder®  Muscle Gel (30ml)
Give your muscles a break without stopping your workout by using the Workout Wonder Muscle Gel. A potent mixture of herbs and extracts of Arnica, Horse Chestnut, Murumuru Butter, Spearmint combines with V-Tonic TM and all natural Magnesium; so your skin and your muscles receive the perfect pre and post workout care.

name: ISSA™ Cobalt Blue Hybrid Replacement Brush Head
product_description:
The ISSA™ Hybrid Replacement Brush Head from FOREO has been developed for powerful and effective cleaning, whilst remaining gentle to teeth and gums. Durable and flexible, the unique brush head features premium-grade silicone outer bristles to reach the gums and inner PBT polymer inner bristles that vigorously remove plaque build-up. Soft and non-abrasive for the ultimate brushing experience. E.N.
Size: H:80 x W:15mm
Weight: 9.8g
User Time: Up to 6 months
Please Note: This replacement head is compatible with the FOREO ISSA™ toothbrush device.

name: Organics Great Day Body Scrub (332g)
product_description:
Reveal smooth, radiant skin with the NEOM Organics Great Day Body Scrub. Boasting an organic sugar base which gently sloughs away dirt and dead skin cells, the scrub is enriched with safflower and jojoba oils and vitamin E to nourish and soften your skin.
With an invigorating fragrance of wild mint and mandarin that will energise your senses and promote positive thoughts, this indulgent scrub will leave you feeling revitalised both in body and mind. It's also made with 97% organic ingredients, so you can be sure your skin is getting the best possible care. - L.M.

name: Associates Support Breathe Roller Ball 10ml
product_description:
Experience the powers of the Aromatherapy Associates Support Breathe Roller Ball; an intense pulse point therapy expertly designed to soothe, rebalance and revitalise.
Infused with a natural blend of Pine, Tea Tree, Peppermint and Eucalyptus Oils, the refreshing formula is perfect for combating the effects of colds and flu; helping to maintain easy breathing and clearing your head, nose and chest, whilst stimulating the senses.

name: Body Coffee Bean Scrub 220g - Peppermint
product_description:
Treat your skin to the Bean Body Peppermint Coffee Bean Scrub; a luxurious, skin-renewing formula infused with Organic Cold-Pressed Coconut Oil to hydrate, exfoliate and soften from top to toe.
Utilising Robusta Coffee Beans, the gentle body scrub stimulates blood flow to minimise the appearance of cellulite and stretch marks, whilst Organic Cacao and Vitamin E provide antioxidant protection to repair and restore skin. Ideal for eczema and psoriasis, its blend of Himalayan Pink Rock Salt and Demerara Sugar buff away dead skin cells, helping to eliminate blackheads and breakouts for a smoother, more refined finish.

name: Maxiwhite Teeth Whitening Pre-Filled Trays (10 Trays)
product_description:
Whiten teeth from home with the Janina Maxiwhite Teeth Whitening Pre-Filled Trays; a low abrasion, five-day system that brightens the smile without using harsh ingredients.
The pack contains ten, pre-filled ready-to-use trays. The soft and flexible trays are designed to fit all, sitting comfortably on both the top and bottom rows of teeth to provide effective whitening action for the entire mouth.
