Working tirelessly for 35 minutes, the whitening treatment utilises Sodium Percarbonate, which seeks to eliminate the appearance of stains and whiten teeth an average of 3.6 shades from the first use*. Within a week, teeth should be visibly whiter by a minimum of 7 shades.

name: Black Cool Moisture Body Lotion 473ml
product_description:
This lightweight, quick-penetrating lotion helps nourish body skin as it soothes and hydrates.
Special cooling ingredients calm and refresh overheated skin, making it perfect for application after shower, sports or workout. Skin feels restored without stickiness or greasiness. Clean, natural fragrance leaves skin smelling subtly clean and refreshed without being overly strong or heavy. - SC
Directions for use:
Apply generously all over the body, especially to area that are excessively rough or dry like elbows, knees and feet. Use after showering or whenever skin feels dry. For maximum moisturization, apply to slightly moist skin.

name: Foot Balm (75ml)
product_description:
Refresh your feet with Weleda’s award winning Foot Balm. Composed of relaxing plant extracts and invigorating essential oils of lavender, rosemary, sweet orange and litsea cubea this non-greasy cream whisks away perspiration so feet stay feeling dry.
Packed with soothing and cool natural ingredients, this refreshing balm is the perfect treat for hot, tired or aching feet. Natural antiseptic calendula helps keep bad-smelling bacteria in check, whilst myrrh extract contributes astringent action that helps to protect your skin against blisters. Weleda Foot Balm instantly cools and moisturises and helps nourish dry feet to keep your skin feeling supple and soft.
Directions of use:

name: Skincare Atlantic Kelp and Magnesium Anti-Fatigue Body Cream 200ml
product_description:
Instantly energise skin with the REN Skincare Atlantic Kelp and Magnesium Anti-Fatigue Body Cream; a rich moisturising lotion with a convenient pump applicator. The nourishing formula effortlessly glides over skin, absorbing quickly to envelop the body in a veil of moisture. Comfortably massaging the moisturiser over the body helps to relieve feelings of muscle fatigue and therefore offers a relaxing feel.
Infused with Atlantic Kelp Extract, which is rich in Hyaluronic Acid, the body cream works to retain healthy moisture levels in skin, whilst leaving the body smooth and nourished. The hydrator also boasts a blend of Plankton Extract and Magnesium PCA, which seeks to energise the body by encouraging cell renewal and reducing stress damage.
Finished with a signature dose of REN’s anti-fatigue essential oil blend, the cream not only indulges the skin, but has an uplifting effect on the senses too.

name: of New York Brow Shaper - Leopard Pink/Plain Pink (Set of 2)
product_description:
Preen and perfect your eyebrows with the Lilibeth of New York Brow Shaper; a high performance, pain-free hair removal tool to define the brow line without tweezing or waxing.
Suitable for men and women, the easy-to-use, award-winning tool features a durable stainless steel blade that effortlessly and comfortably removes even the shortest hairs, whilst its portable, fold-up design is ideal for grooming on-the-go. Can also be used on the upper lip, chin, bikini line, legs, arms, knuckles and fuzzy facial hair.
Not only great for hair removal, the Brow Shaper delivers dermaplaning benefits; it gently exfoliates the top layer of dead skin cells to allow better absorption of moisturisers and serums, whilst helping make-up to sit more evenly.

name: Krill Oil for Kids Orange Burst Liquid Omega 3 - 150ml
product_description:
Cleanmarine Krill Oil for Kids Orange Burst Liquid Omega 3 is the world’s first flavoured Krill Oil liquid supplement specifically formulated for children with the added benefit of Vitamin D3, which helps build strong bones.
It can be a challenge making sure little ones have a balanced diet and so this easy-to-consume supplement provides the perfect dose of Omega 3 fatty acids, which contribute to healthy heart, brain, eye and joint function as well as helping to enhance moods and improve concentration. Plus it’s sugar free, naturally sweetened with Stevia and has a delicious Valencia Orange taste!
Why choose Krill Oil over Fish Oil? Krill are shrimp-like crustaceans that provide a more sustainable and ethical source of Omega 3 with zero by-catch. The fatty acids within Krill Oil are bound to phospholipids, a major component of human cell membranes, thus are much more rapidly absorbed than the acids from fish oil supplements. Krill Oil is also rich in Astaxanthin, a natural antioxidant, and there’s no fishy aftertaste.

name: & Evelyn Jojoba Oil Conditioning Hand Wash (250ml)
product_description:
Leave your hands feeling soft and supple with the Crabtree & Evelyn Jojoba Oil Conditioning Hand Wash. This convenient soap-free gel is pH balanced for gentle cleansing and leaves hands feeling refreshed.
Scented with a blend of lavender and green herbs with a hint of citrus to leave hands smelling divine, Crabtree & Evelyn Jojoba Oil Conditioning Hand Wash will gently and naturally care for your skin whilst maintaining heavenly healthy hands and fighting against bacteria.
Directions of use:

name: Chapman Skinesis Overnight Hand and Nail Treatment (15ml)
product_description:
Nourish and hydrate dry, tired hands with the Skinesis Overnight Hand and Nail Treatment from Sarah Chapman. Fortified with a blend of eight antioxidant-rich oils, including argan, jojoba, chia seed and grapeseed, the powerful elixir protects and replenishes hands whilst you sleep to reveal softer, smoother skin.
Ideal for all skin types, the award-winning treatment is infused with firming Collageneer® and Volufiline™ to restore a youthful-looking, plumper appearance and an even tone. Conditions cuticles and strengthens nails, whilst delivering a subtle floral fragrance of jasmine and neroli pure essential oils. E.N.

name: Arnica Massage Oil 100ml
product_description:
Soothe aching joints and muscles with the Arnica Massage Oil from holistic cosmetic brand Weleda. One of their best-selling treatments, the all-natural formula is derived from a selection of powerful homeopathic, plant-based oils including Sunflower, Olive and anti-ageing extract of Arnica Flower.
Combined, it rapidly absorbs into skin to impart a smooth, supple texture and help improve elasticity levels. A relaxing blend of Lavender and Rosemary essential oils imbues a heady, calming scent, perfect for a warm down after a vigorous workout or long day. Alternatively, use prior to sporting activities to help stimulate blood circulation.

name: Boo Mummy & Me Pamper Kit (5 Products)
product_description:
Give the gift of luxury to those deserving mums and mums-to-be with the Love Boo Mummy & Me Pamper Kit. The perfect baby shower present, this set contains everything mums need to make motherhood all the more enjoyable!
The Love Boo Mummy & Me Pamper Kit contains a selection of five treats for both mother and baby. All paraben, sulphate and petrochemical-free, these natural products are safe to use during pregnancy, nursing and on new borns.
This pack contains the following products:

name: CREW Men's Cutting Body Hydrator (90ml)
product_description:
Help define your muscles with AB CREW Men's Cutting Body Hydrator, a unique formula that works to hydrate your skin whilst targeting fat below the surface for a more refined, defined physique.
Combining mushroom derivative with clinical marine complex, the moisturising blend delivers lasting hydration deep down and focusses on fat below the skin to enhance your muscles and create a more toned looking bod. Infused with a subtle, masculine scent of young vetiver and forest woods. - K.N.

name: 250+ Pure Manuka Honey Blend
product_description:
MGO™ 250+ Manuka Honey Blend is derived from Leptospermum Scoparium, a plant unique to New Zealand; its flowers are powerfully fragrant and full of nectar which attributes Manuka Honey with its rich, dark and full-bodied flavour.
MGO™ 250+ Manuka Honey is certified to contain a minimum of 250mg/kg methylgyoxal. Methylgyoxal is a naturally occurring compound in Manuka Honey that lends the substance its remarkable and unique properties. No other system of measurement gives such a clear and simple indication; the higher the MGO™ rating, the higher the Methylglyoxal content.
All of our MGO™ Manuka Honey products are scientifically tested and verified to ensure you are getting consistent quality. Every batch is subjected to laboratory tests that measure various quality parameters including Dietary Methylglyoxal content. Great care is taken to ensure that the Methylglyoxal is maintained from the bee-hive to the finished product so you do not lose any of the valuable properties of this remarkable honey.

name: Choice Organic Ultimate Oil Blend
product_description:
Fuel your body with Udo's Choice Organic Ultimate Oil Blend, a certified organic, unrefined, sustainable and vegetarian blend of seed oils, including Flax, Sesame and Sunflower.
In today's society, diets often lack the essential fatty acids and omegas required for a healthy lifestyle. Udo's Choice Organic Ultimate Oil Blend combines carefully selected oils to help supply the ideal Essential Fatty Acid (EFA) ratio of 2:1:1 omega 3, 6 and 9.
As the body cannot naturally produce EFAs, it is important we obtain these vital nutrients elsewhere; most omega oils are received through our diets, but food processing and exposure to light, heat and oxygen can degrade the nutritional value of Omega 3 and 6. To help combat this, this organic solution provides a premium source of undamaged Omega 3 and 6 in a perfect ratio that supports optimum health.
Fuelling your body with essential fatty acids can help improve the condition of skin, hair and nails; improve recovery after training; and maintain a healthy heart.

name: Knackered Cow Relaxing Bath & Shower Gel
product_description:
Relax the mind and body with the Cowshed Knackered Cow Relaxing Bath & Shower Gel; a calming bath soak and body wash that seeks to soothe the feeling of tired muscles, whilst providing a gentle yet effective cleanse.
The bath and shower gel can be poured under running water for an unwinding soak in the bath, or can be massaged into the body to eliminate dirt and impurities. Enriched with a skin-loving blend of Lavender and Eucalyptus Essential Oils, the formula has a soothing effect and a therapeutic fragrance that envelops the body in a veil of relaxation.
The bath and shower gel leaves skin cleansed, calm and comfortable, whilst encouraging a good night’s sleep.

name: Sacred Union Scent and Dry Oil 100ml
product_description:
Ethical British brand Mauli presents the Sacred Union Scent and Dry Oil; a luxurious, multi-tasking treatment that combines a harmonious blend of nourishing oils and fine essences to pamper and soothe the skin, hair and mind.      
Inspired by traditional Indian massage rituals to begin each day with healing, the dry oil mist is brimming with minerals, vitamins and antioxidants, delicately balancing oils of Argan, Moringa, Watermelon and Coconut to intensively condition, hydrate and soften.   
Pure therapeutic oils of Lime, Lavender, Blood Orange and Geranium work in tandem to encourage positivity and peace, alleviating feelings of stress, fatigue and self-doubt for a greater sense of wellbeing and clarity.
Effortlessly absorbed, the oil veils skin with an intense, opulent scent, while leaving it feeling softened, hydrated and positively glowing. Spritz into hair for enhanced shine, indulge in an aromatic massage or add to a freshly drawn bath for a moment of undulated relaxation.   
Presented in elegant recycled packaging, the bottle is hand-finished with a delicate bell ornament that can be worn on the wrist as a subtle, constant reminder to ‘value the past, live fully in the present and with hope for the future’.

name: ISSA™ - Cobalt Blue
product_description:
Helping you to achieve the cleanest mouth you've ever had, FOREO ISSA™ presents the first beauty routine for your smile. Featuring soft and ultra-gentle silicone bristles to create the perfect friction, the lightweight and travel friendly, ergonomic brush has 3D flexibility and curves to the shape of your mouth to reach every crevice.
Working to ensure your mouth and gums are healthy and to help you achieve brighter and whiter teeth, the ISSA™ is electric and has a pulsating action that stimulates additional blood flow to achieve healthier gums and prevent gum disease.
With an 8-speed interface, the device allows you to chose your frequency of pulsations to suit your requirements. Every 30 seconds, the ISSA™ will pulse rapidly, indicating it is time to clean a different section of your mouth, and after 2 minutes it will pulse again to signify the end of the dental care routine. -SA
Please Note: A USB charger is included, and not a mains adapter. Also, the brush head only needs to be replaced once a year.

name: Body Ultimate Blends Delicate Oat Dream Gift Pack
product_description:
Treat your skin with the Garnier Body Ultimate Blends Delicate Oat Dream Gift Pack. Host to a duo of nourishing skincare products, the gift set boasts a luxurious body lotion and body balm, both enriched with cleansing Oat Milk and White Almond Cream, which calm, soften and repair the body, alongside leaving skin delicately fragranced.
Ultimate Blends Delicate Oat Milk Lotion (250ml)
Pamper and unburden skin with the Delicate Oat Milk Lotion. Tailor-made for the fragile areas on the face and body, the light, comforting formula actively targets sensitive patches to help to restore the skin with an even surface complexion, working diligently to ensure optimum purity.
Ultimate Blends Delicate Oat Milk Balm (200ml)
Gratify and enrich skin with the Delicate Oat Milk Balm. Working predominantly to protect the outside epidermis, the restorative, active salve inputs extra hydration and moisture to weakened cells, helping to relieve tension and impairment.

name: Associates Enrich Massage & Body Oil 100ml
product_description: Experience the intensely conditioning and deeply penetrating powers of macadamia, coconut and evening primrose in this dry skin oil and indulge your senses with the exotic scent of geranium, ylang ylang and vanilla. - SC

name: AtoControl Bath and Shower Oil (400ml)
product_description: Suitable for dry and irritated skin, the AtoControl Bath and Shower Oil from Eucerin® gently cleanses and soothes skin. Its unique formula is enriched with omega oils to soften and protect skin, whilst preventing further dryness and relieving itching. Can be used daily as a bath additive or shower oil to leave skin feeling comfortable with a smooth and supple texture. E.N.

name: RATANHIA MOUTHWASH (50ML)
product_description:
Refresh your breath with Weleda Ratanhia Oil. Mouth-tingling, each invigorating sip of pure organic and natural plant extracts soothe and tone your gums whiles freshening your breath.
This exclusive complex of plant extracts including myrrh and ratanhia are not only suitable for vegans but also famed for their astringent and soothing properties. The mix of this with peppermint, sage and eucalyptus essential oils make up the Weleda Ratanhia Oil – which heals and refreshes the mouth.
Directions of use:

name: Vitamin E 14,000iu Oil - Lipid Treatment 30ml
product_description:
JÁSÖN Organic Vitamin E Oil 14000IU (30ml) is a face and body oil that instantly hydrates the dryest of areas for softer, healthier skin. Rich avocado oil and a high dose of Vitamin E provide a intensely moisturising formula.
For anywhere from your face and shoulders, to your hands, cuticles and knees; pop a few drops into your bath for an all over oil indulging treat. - K.R

name: & Evelyn La Source Hand Wash 250ml
product_description:
Clarify and refresh hands with the Crabtree & Evelyn La Source Hand Wash; a lightweight, pH balanced formula that utilises naturally-derived surfactants to cleanse skin without stripping moisture.
Infused with extracts of Brown Algae and antioxidant-rich Green Seaweed, the luxurious gel gently eliminates impurities whilst softening and conditioning hands to leave them smooth and comfortable. Imparts a crisp, fresh scent of aquatic, musk and sea breeze accords.

name: Body Defence Sunscreen SPF 30 125ml
product_description:
Providing broad spectrum sun protection against UVA and UVB rays, the Zelens Body Defence Sunscreen SPF 30 strengthens the skin's natural barrier and helps to delay signs of ageing. Fast-absorbing and non-greasy, it remains water-resistant for up to 40 minutes.
Fortified with silica-based capsules containing organic UV filters, the formula creates an invisible layer over skin to shield from free radicals and repair DNA, whilst Squalane (derived from Mediterranean Olive Oil) nourishes and hydrates to boost elasticity. A powerful antioxidant blend of Vitamin E, Grape Seed Oil and Sesame Seed Oil enhances protection against UV-induced skin damage. Can be used on the hair.
Please Note: Formulated with Squalane that is plant derived.

name: Body Wash Infused Sponge Animals - Butterfly
product_description:
Liven up bath time with the Spongellé Body Wash Infused Sponge Animals. Forming the adorably cute silhouette of a butterfly, the multi-use sponge has been specifically designed for kids, harnessing proprietary infusion technology to deliver an in-built body wash system for effortless multi-tasking.
Dirt and grime is effortlessly swept away without the use of harsh chemicals, and each sponge is infused with a delectable ‘fruitilicious’ scent and soothing extract of Chamomile. Have fun at shower time while ensuring your little ones are left feeling squeaky clean.

name: Brown Coco & Sandalwood Body Lotion
product_description: Perfectly pamper skin with Molton Brown's Coco & Sandalwood Body Lotion; a fast-absorbing moisturiser developed to nourish, comfort and hydrate from top to toe. Blended with Filipino Coconut Fruit Extract, the luxurious, lightweight lotion conditions and softens skin, whilst imparting a long-lasting fragrance of Jasmine, Coconut and Sandalwood. Housed in a pump bottle for mess-free application.

name: Dante Platinum Natural Soap 250g
product_description:
Pamper skin with the Nesti Dante Platinum Natural Soap; a limited edition design to celebrate Nesti Danti’s 70<sup>th</sup> anniversary.
Expertly hand-crafted in Italy using the artisan saponification method, the soap bar has been traditionally made with natural, raw ingredients as well as purified Platinum to add a touch of luxury to your bathing experience.
Transforming into a rich lather upon application, it releases an opulent floral scent with notes of Camellia Bella di Firenze and Toscana White Jasmine. Wrapped in lavish textured paper, the soap leaves skin feeling sumptuously supple and makes a wonderful gift.

name: Holiday Ornament Body Wash Infused Buffer - Winter Rose
product_description:
Get into the festive spirit with the Winter Rose fragranced Holiday Ornament Body Wash Infused Buffer from Spongellé. The white, snowflake shaped sponge arrives with a useful hanging ribbon for when it is not in use, which can double up as a Christmas ornament. Ideal as a gift or indulgent treat for yourself.
Enriched with extracts of Yuzu, Edelweiss and Vetiver root, the multi-purpose buffing sponge is designed to cleanse, exfoliate, massage and hydrate the skin.  Its unique surface transforms as you squeeze, changing from an exfoliating, massage texture to a smooth, cleansing sponge.
The innovative buffer is infused with Winter Rose fragranced body wash, which envelops the body in a festively floral aroma. Creating a creamy lather for up to 5 showers, the sponge leaves skin thoroughly cleansed and feeling soft and silky.

name: Dante Romantica Lavender and Verbena Soap 250g
product_description:
Energise skin with the Nesti Dante Romantica Lavender and Verbena Soap; a fragrant, vegetable soap bar that is hand-crafted in Italy using the saponification method. Arriving wrapped in thick textured paper finished with a decorative floral print, the soap is an ideal gift, or the perfect treat to yourself.
Traditionally made utilising natural, raw ingredients, the soap gently cleanses skin to eliminate traces of dirt and impurities, without stripping skin of essential moisture. Romancing the senses, the cleansing bar boasts a refreshingly aromatic scent of cool lavender and zesty verbena, which work in synergy to deliver an uplifting fragrance that will invigorate the mind and body.

name: Golden Dry Skin Salve
product_description:
Suitable for extremely dry, rough and itchy skin, Lano Golden Dry Skin Salve intensely moisturises for long-lasting comfort. The brand's exclusive Ultra Pure Medical Grade Lanolin nourishes and heals skin. Known as Nature's Wonder Moisturiser™, Lanolin has a molecular structure that closely resembles and mimics your own skin lipids to help relieve and safeguard unhappy skin.
Its rich, versatile formula is infused with soothing Manuka Honey and healing Vitamin E, and can be used all over the body, including hands, feet, legs and arms. The non-greasy salve is ideal for travelling and is safe for use on newborns.
Use as an intensive overnight mask, or on feet to help prevent shoes from chafing.

name: Signature Hand & Body Set (Worth £72.00)
product_description:
Perfectly pamper skin with the Signature Hand & Body Set from Cowshed. Combining four full-sized treats, the kit works to cleanse, nourish and fragrance the hands and body.
Dirty Cow Freshening Hand Wash (300ml)
A gentle yet effective formula containing naturally cleansing and hydrating infusions of pure essential oils. Grapefruit and Petitgrain refresh and tone the skin, whilst Lavender and Vitamin E work to nourish and protect. Hands are revitalised and restored.
Cow Pat Moisturising Hand Cream (300ml)
Expertly blended with essential oils of Grapefruit, Coriander and Lavender, the invigorating hand cream envelops skin with an uplifting fragrance, whilst Shea and Cocoa Butters soften and nourish to leave hands smooth, supple and revitalised.
Knackered Cow Relaxing Bath and Shower Gel (300ml)
Made in England using natural ingredients, the relaxing formula blends calming Lavender and Eucalyptus essential oils to soothe over-worked muscles, whilst cleansing and nourishing skin from top to toe. Can be used as a bath soak to prepare for a restful night's sleep.
Knackered Cow Relaxing Body Lotion (300ml)
A fast-absorbing formula that works to relax the mind and body. Enriched with Shea and Cocoa Butters, the nourishing lotion replenishes moisture and hydration, whilst essential oils of Lavender and Eucalyptus help you to unwind after a long, tiring day. Delivers a fresh, herbaceous fragrance.

name: Fabre ORAL CARE Elgydium Clinic Dry Mouth Spray 70ml
product_description:
Pierre Fabre ORAL CARE Elgydium Clinic Dry Mouth Spray is a lubricating formula that helps combat mouth dryness whilst promoting oral health.
Utilising a patented Mouth Lubricating Complex that forms a humectant barrier on the inside of the mouth, the spray expertly relieves feelings of discomfort associated with dry mouth, and protects from demineralisation* with its dose of Xylitol.
Expect a comfortable, lubricated mouth with improved oral health.

name: Diamancel The Conqueror Foot Callus Rasp
product_description:
Industrial-strength and furiously fast-acting, bliss diamancel the conqueror foot callus rasp takes care of thick, dry, and cracked callus buildup. This effective diamond-sided rasp easily buffs away corns, calluses and other rough spots.
Sporting calluses, corns or hardened heels? Give your frightening feet a well deserved treat with bliss diamancel the conqueror foot callus rasp and bid goodbye to all of the above. Made from nickel-coated flexible fiberglass files, electroplated with industrial grade diamond chips this wonder-file rarely (if ever) wears out. Easy and safe to use, this professional strength file uses diamond dust to quickly slough away dead skin cells (no matter how tough).
Directions of use:

name: Bomb Hand to Hand Combat Hand Cream 75ml
product_description:
Deeply nourishing and ultra-lightweight, the Time Bomb Hand to Hand Combat Hand Cream works to restore velvety soft, supple skin.
Enriched with Shea Butter and Moroccan Argan Oil, the fast-absorbing, plumping formula hydrates and replenishes tired, hard-working hands, whilst Vitamin E shields against environmental aggressors for long-lasting comfort. Conditions cuticles and fights signs of ageing, including dark spots and fine lines.

name: Moroccan Rose Otto Body Wash Deluxe Shower Size
product_description:
Cleanse and refresh skin with the REN Moroccan Rose Otto Body Wash Deluxe Shower Size; an award-winning formula that works to purify, soften and delicately fragrance the body.
Harnessing the powers of Moroccan Rose Otto Oil, recognised as one of the world's most exquisite essential oils, the luxurious body wash creates a rich, creamy lather to gently eliminate dirt and impurities without over-drying. Extracts of Chamomile and Neroli Flower Water calm and soothe skin for long-lasting comfort. Housed in a pump bottle for mess-free application.

name: Fondant Shower Gel (200ml)
product_description:
Get gorgeously soft, clean skin with NUXE Fondant Shower Gel. Enriched with natural active ingredients, this soap-free and gentle foaming gel leaves skin looking refreshed and smelling beautiful.
NUXE Fondant Shower Gel is blended with almond and orange petal flowers, and as it’s soap and paraben-free, is suitable for all skin types. Light and enchanting, this sensual shower gel will leave you feeling revived and your skin rejuvenated.
Directions of use:

name: Baby Derma White Mallow Nappy Cream (50ml)
product_description: Soothe irritated skin around your baby's nappy area with Weleda Baby Derma White Mallow Nappy Cream (50ml). Formulated with Organic White Mallow Extract, Organic Coconut Oil and Organic Seasame Oil, the 100% certified-natural cream promotes the development of healthy skin whilst soothing the nappy area. Ideal for combating baby skin problems such as baby eczema, sensitive skin, rash on baby skin and neurodermatitis, the cream slo contains Zinc Oxide which protects against dampness and prevents soreness. -SA

name: Sun-Kissed Glow Gradual Tan Lotion (200ml)
product_description:
A beautifully fragranced, two-in-one cream infused with a hint of tanning agent, this Natio Sun-Kissed Glow Gradual Tan Lotion gradually builds a light golden tan while keeping your skin moisturised all day long.
Blissfully scented with Australian tangerine and cinnamon essential oils, this Natio Sun-Kissed Glow Gradual Tan Lotion is loaded with vitamin E and deeply hydrates skin while leaving your body with a natural and even glow.
Directions of use:

name: People Natural Rosemary Deodorant (75ml)
product_description: Bringing you the purest deodorant that nature can offer, Green People present the Natural Rosemary Deodorant; a refreshing formula for all skin types. Fortified with aloe vera, prebiotics and lavender to prevent irritation and protect from perspiration without leaving marks or stains. Fast-drying and delicately fragranced with rosemary and lavender. E.N.
